item.text: @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA ga na bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyor ka chen po'i cho ga /
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags gsang sngags bdag po ru/ /dbang bskur 'byung po tshar gcod pa/ /gsang sngags

sdud mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /rgyud rnams ma lus kun dang ni/ /rnal 'byor pha rgyud ma rgyud kyi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud/ /rgyud rnams
kun dang mi 'gal phyir/ /man ngag cung zad dran pa 'di/ /blo dman bsgrub pa'i don du ni/ /rnal 'byor cha rkyen bstan par bya/ /sbyor ba'i rim pa dpag med kyang / /sgrub pa po yi don slad du/ /dgos
pa bsdus pa bstan pa 'di/ /sgrub po slob dpon dang bral na/ /sbyor ba 'di rnams bstan par gsungs/ /de la sbyor ba rim bzhin bstan/ /dang po tshogs gnyis rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid skad
cig lhar sprul la/ /snying gar zla ba'i maN+Dal bsam/ /hUM gi 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /sgrib pa sbyangs nas phyi nang gsal/ /mdun du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang / /pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan gsum mam

gcig /la la gzhal yas sprul par 'dod/ /de ru dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang / /bsod nams don phyir spyan drangs bstim/ /bla ma sbyang sogs byas nas kyang / /gzhan sogs man ngag bzhin du bya/ /phyag 'tshal phyi
nang gsang bas mchod/ /mtshams med mi dge sdom nyams nas/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa kun/ /sgyu ma'i sems kyis bshags par bya/ /dge ba kun la rjes yi rang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /

mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba 'debs/ /rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi/ /rdo rje rnams la lus 'bul lo/ /bsod nams ci bsags thams cad kun/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya/ /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /de nas

phyi nang snod bcud kun/ /stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /de nas nam mkha'i chos 'byung la/ /yi ge cho 'phrul 'phros pa las/ /'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bskyed/ /de yi steng du ri rab bskyed/ /de steng rdo rje

rgya gram la/ /'khor lo rtsibs bcu 'bar bas mtshan/ /zla ba'i steng du gnod mdzes sprul/ /yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /khro bo bcu sprul hUM bzhi yi/ /gsang sngags bzlas nas bka' bsgo bya/ /khro bo sprul pas bgegs rnams bkug /yang sgo sku gsung thugs kyi ni/ /phur bu'i

sngags brjod tho bas brdung / /bsregs nas nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /rdo rje gur dang ra bar 'gyur/ /yi ge b+h+rUM gyi 'phro 'du las/ /gnod mdzes 'od du zhu nas kyang / /gzhal yas khang ni mdzes par gyur/ /de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyad gdan/ /rang

gi sems kyi cho 'phrul las/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /yi ge A lis mtshan par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /yi ge kA lis mtshan par bya/ /hUM las rdo rje de nyid mtshan/ /byin rlabs bsdus nas 'od du zhu/ /de las sku ni bskyed par bya/ /pad+ma dbus kyi lte ba

la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bskyed/ /lho yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /bcom ldan mgon po nag po bskyed/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /lus ngan rgyal po bskyed par bya/ /byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa

bskyed par bya/ /byang shar du ni gnod sbyin bskyed/ /shar lho ru ni ro langs ma/ /lho nub rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /nub byang du ni 'jigs byed ma/ /mtshams rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /'od skyed ma dang yid 'phrog ma/ /kun bzang ma dang glu sgra ma/ /shar gyi sgo ru srog gcod ma/ /lho yi sgo ru

dbugs rngub ma/ /nub kyi phyogs su khrag 'thung ma/ /byang gi phyogs su sha za ma/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed nas kyang / /yi ge hUM gi 'od zer dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshigs bcad sgras/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstod byas nas dam tshig la/ /

byin rlabs bstims te dbang bskur ro/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /thun bzhi thun brgyad par dag tu/ /bsgoms nas brtan par gyur pas na/ /las rnams gzhan nam rdzogs rim la/ /gzhug par bya ba kho na yin/ /'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ka ste dang po'o// //bcom

ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mi nus pas/ /lha rnams so so kun la yang / /rgyan gcig pa la sbyor ba bstan/ /dang po gtso bo'i sbyor ba ni/ /bdag nyid skad cig lhar sprul la/ /yi ge hUM gi man ngag sogs/ /rim pa bzhin du shes

par bya/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul ba dang / /gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su gsol/ /lus 'bul dge rtsa bsngo bar bya/ /tshad med bzhi bsgom stong nyid bsgom/ /stong pa'i ngang las yi ge hUM/ /de las phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur/ /de nyid las

ni sku bskyed do/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa/ /mche ba gtsigs mdzad spyan mig bzlog /phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams mdzad nas/ /phyag g.yon nam mkha' lding ni bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum klu la shis/ /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnams mdzad nas/ /g.yon pa rtse

gsum bsnams pa ni/ /gshin rje dag la shis par bstan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /g.yon pa dril bu bsgrags pa ni/ /gnod sbyin drag la shis par bstan/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstims/ /byin rlabs dbang bskur byas nas kyang / /thun mtshams bzhir

ni brtan par bsgom/ /gtso bo'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig lhar sprul thugs ka ru/ /nyi ma'i steng du hUM sogs rdzogs/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags par bya/ /rjes su yi rang la sogs bya/ /stong pa nyid du

bsgoms nas kyang / /stong pa'i ngang las cho 'phrul du/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i nyi zla'i steng / /de steng hUM las rdo rjer gyur/ /rdo rje las ni sku bskyed do/ /khro chen khams gsum rnam rgyal ni/ /sku mdog dmar po dbu gsum pa/ /phyag drug dang po rdo rje'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po dgra sta'o/ /bar ma

gnyis kyis 'ching byed pa/ /gung mo mthe bong ngos btud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang ba yin/ /de nyid snying gar bzung nas ni/ /de 'og g.yas pas zhags pa bsnams/ /g.yon pa ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes spyan drangs bstims nas kyang / /byin rlabs

dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /thun mtshams bzhi ru brtan par bsgoms/ /snying ga'i man ngag gsal nas kyang / /lce ni rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs/ /bzlas brjod 'phros 'dus bsnyen pa bya/ /dus grangs mtshan ma thim pa dang / /bsgrub pa gang 'dod brtsam par bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal

ba'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig lha ru sprul nas kyang / /hUM gi man ngag rdzogs pa yis/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngang nyid las/ /rin chen gdan sogs rdzogs byas la/ /

yi ge hUM las be con gyur/ /de nyid las ni sku rdzogs gyur/ /dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /sku mdog nag po dud sprin 'dra/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa tsan+dan bing chen bsnams/ /g.yon pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs ni brkyang bskum

tshul du bzhugs/ /ye shes mgon po spyan drangs bstim/ /byin rlabs dbang bskur la sogs bya/ /de ltar bstan nas bzlas brjod bya/ /mgon po mdun du spyan drangs nas/ /bzlas brjod la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /mgon po las kyi

sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// //lus ngan gsung mchog sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig lhar sprul hUM gis ni/ /spyan drangs la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya/ /stong pa'i ngang las pad sogs gdan/ /yi ge hUM las mchod rten gyur/ /de nyid las ni sku

bskyed do/ /lus ngan sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /zhal gcig phyag g.yas mchod rten bsnams/ /g.yon pa le'u le bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes spyan drangs bstims nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro/ /bzlas brjod bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni/ /de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /

lus ngan po'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o// //khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig lhar sprul hUM gis ni/ /sbyor ba la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /de nas phyag 'tshal mchod sogs bya/ /stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje'i gdan/ /de steng hUM las rdo rje'o/ /de nyid las ni sku

rdzogs gyur/ /khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku sngon po/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis brang du bsnol/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro/ /bsnyen pa la sogs

rdzogs nas ni/ /de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro la sogs kyang / /sprul pa dang ni rang rgyud kyi/ /man ngag rnams ni shes par bya/ /mdun du sprul dang

bskyed pa ni/ /gtso bo'i dbang du bya ba dang / /so so rang rang dbang du'o/ /de rnams cho ga la sogs kyang / /man ngag bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin kha dog dmar nag la/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas g.yon gri gug cang te'u bsnams/ /ro langs ma ni sngo skya

ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkug pas yongs su bsdams/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol nas bsdams/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro

mdog ser skya/ /phyag gnyis spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /me lce'i phreng ba yongs su 'dzin/ /'jigs byed mdog ni sngo nag la/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa/ /g.yas kyi dang po glang po bsnams/ /g.yon pa glang po'i pags pa bsnams/ /de 'og g.yas pa rdo

rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /de 'og g.yas pa lcags kyu bsnams/ /g.yon pa mi mgo rlon pa bsnams/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro de rnams kyang / /gtso bo gos sngon la bskor lhan ne'i tshul/ /dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bsgom thabs dang / /yang na so so

re re dang / /rje khol tshul du gnas nas kyang / /las rnams kun la mngags pa dang / /yang na sbyor thabs tshul gnas nas/ /gsang mchod 'bul zhing phyag rgya bsgrub/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ka steng bdun pa'o// //rdo rje lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

lha mo 'di rnams cho ga yang / /mkha' 'gro bzhin du 'dir shes bya/ /'od skyed ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar mo'o/ /phyag gnyis me tog bsnams pa'o/ /yid 'phrog ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog ser mo mdzes pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis dri

yi spos phor bsnams/ /kun bzang ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog dmar mo mdzes pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis zhal zas ro brgya ldan pa bsnams/ /glu sgra can ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog sngon mo mdzes pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar gyis

rol/ /lha mo 'di rnams kun la yang / /dkyil 'khor las dang mchod pa'i tshul/ /gsum pa'i man ngag shes mod kyang / /khyad par mchod pa'i tshul du bstan/ /mchod pa'i lha mo'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o// //sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgo ma'i cho ga la sogs kyang / /

gong gi cho ga sbyor shes bya'o/ /srog gcod zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis tho ba zhags pa bsnams/ /dbugs rngub ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog ser mo 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis hom gzar

zhags pa bsnams/ /khrag 'thung ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog dmar mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phyag gnyis gri gug zhags pa bsnams/ /sha za ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /phyag gnyis rnon po zhags pa bsnams/ /

khro mo 'di rnams spyad tshul yang / /dkyil 'khor las sbyor ba'i tshul/ /khyad par gsad pa'i las la shis/ /sgo ma bzhi'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor blo rnams rim pa yis/ /bsdus rgyas rim pa bstan

par bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkyil 'khor la/ /dbus dang 'dab brgyad lha dgu'o/ /phyi rim keng rus 'bar bas bskor/ /gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi po gnas/ /sgo rnams bzhi la sgo ma bzhi/ /'di ni rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i tshad/ /rnal 'byor bsdus la mos pa yis/ /

lha ni bcu gsum bsgom par bya/ /de las kyang ni bsdus 'dod na/ /lha ni dgu po bsgom par bya/ /de las kyang ni bsdus 'dod na/ /lnga dang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig /man ngag cho ga mthong bas bya/ /ma mthong bas ni dam tshig nyams/ /de dag thams

cad kun la yang / /tshogs bsag lha bskyed mkhas pas bya/ /bsdus rgyas kyi sbyor ka ste bcu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams mchod pa'i rim pa ni/ /sha chen po las byung ba yi/ /dri mchog dud pa rgyun mi gcad/ /bde gshegs

shangs la phul gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /sha chen bdug spos dbul ba'o/ /b+ha ga rang byung me tog 'di/ /yid 'ong nam mkha' khyab tsam du/ /bde gshegs dbu la phul ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /rak+ta'i me tog

dbul ba'o/ /tshil chen dur khrod ras las ni/ /ma rig mun sel sgron ma byung / /bde gshegs spyan la phul gyur pas/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /tshil chen mar me dbul ba'o/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar/ /rdo rje dri chus bkang nas su/ /bde

gshegs thugs la phul gyur pas/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /rdo rje chu yis mchod pa'o/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar/ /rdo rje dri chen gtams nas su/ /bde gshegs ljags la phul gyur pas/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /dri chen lha

bshos mchod pa'o/ /sil snyan rol mo dpag med rnams/ /yid 'ong mdzes par sprul nas su/ /bde gshegs snyan la phul gyur bas/ /sku gsung thugs mchog mnyes gyur cig /sgra dang rol mos mchod pa'o/ /rdo rje lha mo 'od skyed ma/ /rdo rje me tog bsnams nas

ni/ /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod phul na/ /mchod pa dam pa'i tshul gyis bzhes/ /rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog ma/ /dri yi dung phor bsnams nas su/ /gser 'od bzhad pa'i tshul gyis su/ /mchod pa dam pa 'bul gyis bzhes/ /rdo rje lha mo kun bzang ma/ /zhal zas ro mchog

bsnams nas su/ /dmar mo bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mchod pa dam pa 'bul lo bzhes/ /rdo rje lha mo glu sgra can/ /sgra snyan gar gyi rol mo yis/ /'od sngon 'phros pa'i bzhad tshul gyis/ /mchod pa dam pa 'bul lo bzhes/ /sgeg mo la sogs brgyad rnams kyang / /

rgyud rnams gzhan dang mthun pas na/ /de bzhin 'dir yang dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje glu rnams mdzes pa yis/ /bstun nas lha la mchod pa 'bul/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ka ste bcu gcig pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams bstod pa'i rim

pa ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje stobs kyis 'byung po 'dul/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam rgyal rdo rje khro bo ni/ /dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /sku mdog 'od dmar bgegs rnams

bsreg /bdud las rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /nag po'i zhags pa 'dzin mdzad cing / /tsan+dan bing gis thams cad 'joms/ /mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lus ngan po ni rgyal po'i mchog /mchod pa'i rten gyis don rnams

'grub/ /ne'u le rin chen gter brtan bsnams/ /dgos 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo bdud rtsis bdud rnams 'joms/ /phyag rgya sdigs mdzub mdzad pa yis/ /sdang mig mi 'gyur zhe la gnon/ /'od sngon po la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gnod sbyin khro bo

'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /sku mdog dmar nag 'od zer can/ /gri gug 'bar bas gcod mdzad ma/ /cang te'u sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ro langs ma ni mthu mo che/ /sngo skya rdo rje lcags sgrog sdom/ /phyag rgya spyi bor bsnol mdzad ma/ /ro langs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mkha'

'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /dmar skya me lce phreng ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje mes ni thams cad bsreg /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'jigs byed ma ni thams cad 'joms/ /sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /phyag mtshan drug gis 'byung po 'dul/ /'jigs byed ma la phyag

'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lha mo 'od skyed ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /rdo rje me tog phyag na bsnams/ /'od skyed ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /dri mchog dpag

med phyag na bsnams/ /yid 'phrog ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lha mo kun bzang ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/ /zhal zas ro mchog brgya ldan bsnams/ /kun bzang ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lha mo glu sgra can/ /zhal gcig phyag

gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /sgra snyan gar gyi rol pas gnas/ /glu sgra can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje khro mo srog gcod ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag /sgrub la gnod pa'i srog gcod ma/ /tho ba zhags pa bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro mo

rdo rje dbugs rngub ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /sgrub la gnod pa'i dbugs rngub ma/ /hom gzar zhags pa bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro mo chen mo khrag 'thung ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/ /sgrub la gnod pa'i khrag

'thung ma/ /gri gug zhags pa bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro mo chen mo sha za ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /sgrub la gnod pa'i sha za ma/ /rnon po zhags pa bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje glu ni mdzes pa yis/ /bstod pa rnams kyis lha bstod pas/ /

tshogs chen dpag med sogs par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i sbyor ka ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal te/ /rdor dril byin brlabs mchod pa bstan/ /rdor dril rab gnas byas pa dang / /dang po stong dang snying rje las/ /yi ge oM hUM rnam gnyis

phyung / /de las rdor dril bskyed par bya/ /ye shes rdor dril byin brlab bstim/ /yang na rab gnas byas pa la/ /dang po byin brlabs gsal bas chog /lag na rdo rje byin brlabs la/ /lag mthil nyi zlar byin gyis brlabs/ /lag g.yon mthe bong srin lag gis/ /

rdo rje dril bu blang bar bya/ /dril bu 'og la rdo rje steng / /brla g.yon steng du gzhag par bya/ /lag g.yas srin lag mthe bong gis/ /rdo rje ra dbrag btsugs nas ni/ /bskor ba'i tshul gyis thugs kar blang / /rgyu yi yi ge gnyis po yang / /rdor dril la ni mtshan mar bsam/ /

phyag na rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /'gying bag tshul gyis bstan par bya/ /dang po g.yon du gar gsum bsgyur/ /de nas g.yas su gar gsum bsgyur/ /de nas thugs ka mgrin pa dang / /spyi bo dag tu gar gsum bsgyur/ /de nas slar la phab nas ni/ /lte ba la sogs

gnas brgyad du/ /rdo rje dril gnyis gsor bar bya/ /de nas dril bu babs gsum dang / /rdo rje lan gsum gsor bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje dril thabs ni/ /brgyad kyi tshul du mchod par bya/ /dang por rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /gsor zhing thugs kar brtan par gzung / /de nas rdo

rje dril bu gnyis/ /bsnol zhing 'khyud nas mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /nu ma g.yas g.yon thad ka ru/ /rdo rje steng la dril bu 'og /bsnol zhing 'gying bag phan tshun bkyer/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /gar gyi tshul du bskor nas kyang / /rdor dril lan gnyis

gsor bar bya/ /dril bu thugs ka'i thad kar gsil/ /rdo rje dpung g.yon thad gsor nas/ /de nas sa la bkyer bar bya/ /slar la log cing dpung g.yon bskor/ /dril bu thugs ka'i thad gsil la/ /rdo rje gsor nas thugs kar ni/ /thad kar dkrol zhing gzung bar

bya/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu gnyis/ /gar gyi tshul du bkyer ba dang / /rdo rje dang ni dril bu gnyis/ /g.yas g.yon dbang du bkyer ba dang / /de ltar rdo rje dril thabs kyis/ /rdo rje glu dang bstun nas su/ /bde gshegs rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /glu gar rtsed 'jo'i phyag rgya yis/ /

'dzul lam nam mkhar 'phur bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod kyi/ /spros la dgal ba'i dus su bya/ /rnal 'byor bsdus pa 'dod pa yis/ /sbyor thabs tshul gyis bzhi po bya/ /shin tu bsdus pa 'dod pa yis/ /lha rnams bstod pa bar bar du/ /

rdo rje dril thabs gsor bar bya/ /yang na dril bu rgyun du la/ /rdo rje mtshams su shes par bya/ /de rnams bsam pa'i mchod pa yang / /yi ge gnyis kyi man ngag gam/ /thabs dang shes rab mchod pa'am/ /phyag 'tshal tshul du bya ba'o/ /rdo rje dril

thabs kyi sbyor ka ste bcu gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag rgya'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ /g.yas kyi gung mo dag la ni/ /sor mo bzhi po btsugs nas kyang / /rtse lnga'i tshul du bya ba dang / /g.yon pa'i sor mo spro pa'am/ /sgra sgrogs

tshul du byed pa'am/ /yang na mthe bong mthe chung gnyis/ /bkug nas gsum po rtse gsum tshul/ /g.yas pa snga ma dang 'dra la/ /g.yon pa'i gung mo bkug nas su/ /mdzub mo rgya ba sbyar bkug pa'o/ /sor mo rnams kyang bcings nas su/ /gung mo mthe bong ngos

btud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang pa yis/ /lag g.yas mtheb mdzub zhags pa bya/ /g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub ral gri'i tshul/ /gnyis ka lhag ma rnams ni bcing / /g.yas kyi khu tshur bcings nas su/ /mthe bong nang nas gdon par bya/ /g.yon gyi

mthe bong mdzub mor sbyar/ /lhag ma rnams ni bcing bar bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje thal mo las/ /gung mo la ni mdzub mo sbyar/ /mthe bong bsnol te sbyar bar bya/ /yang na lag gnyis sbyar ba'am/ /g.yon gyi sor mo spyir bsdus pa'o/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs

nas ni/ /mdzub mo bsgreng ste brang du bsnol/ /g.yas kyi khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dgug /g.yon gyi khu tshur bcangs te bskor/ /gung srin la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkug nas yongs su bsdam/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab

brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol nas gnas/ /phyag gnyis spyi bor thal sbyar nas/ /me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'dzin tshul dang / /g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /gung mo bkug pa'i rgyab tu ni/ /mdzub mo nges par sbyar bar

bya/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul dang ni/ /g.yon gyi sor mo bsdus te bskor/ /lag gnyis mtheb mdzub sbyar nas ni/ /gsum po brkyang ste rtse mor sbyar/ /lag g.yas khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /gung mo brkyang ste g.yon pa yi/ /khu tshur bcangs te gru mo gzugs/ /lag

pa sbyar te bskongs pa dang / /sgra snyan gar gyi rol pas gnas/ /lag g.yas khu tshur tho ba'i tshul/ /g.yon pa mtheb mdzub zhags pa'i tshul/ /lag g.yas sor mo bskongs pa dang / /g.yon pa mtheb mdzub sbyar te bcangs/ /lag g.yas gung mo srin lag gnyis/ /

bkug ste gsum pa bcing bar bya/ /lag g.yon mtheb mdzub sbyar te bcang / /g.yas kyi gung mo mdzub mo brkyang / /srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan/ /g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub sbyar te bcang / /phyag rgya'i sbyor ka ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das phyag

na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM nI lAm+ba rad+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye badzra pA NI hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la

ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM bai shra ba Na hUM phaT/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM phaT/ oM pra bi ta pa ta ye hUM phaT/ oM na mo me ha rA ya hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta bak+t+ra ye hUM phaT/ oM shab+da gIrta ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra be tA lI hUM phaT/ oM

pra taM sta nA ya hUM phaT/ oM sha so gu pA ya hUM phaT/ oM ra ga d+ha pri ya ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ka ye hUM phaT/ oM ya man+ta sa pak+Shi ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra be ra ye hUM phaT/ oM rak+ta ka ra lo ka bi sha na/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA NA ye/ na gwa la ga ra ba ra ta ke twa byA g+h+ra tsarma Ni ba sa ni ya b+ha ma ko re ga

ru ra ru stim ti maM/ kro d+ha mu rten trai lokya tra ha ya/ /b+h+rUM me na ko pa ya sa na ru drA ya nA ga ra tsa tu rmA ra b+hak+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM tre lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba

tA nAM/ d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+phar Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+bar d+har badzra pA

Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ nai bi t+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ shab+da pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ tsa ri pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal

de ba tA nAM/ ta ra ni r+yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ bas+t+ra ni R+yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ gan+d+ha rba ni r+yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ ma Ni rat+na sarba bstu ni r+r+dzat+na yA mi hUM/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra

pA Ni maN+Dal de ba tA nAM/ s+pha R+She ni R+yA ta yA mi hUM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na AR+yA ar+tha sid+d+ha ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bstu rat+na ba ti hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta si ti hUM phaT/ oM saM ma shi ta ya ba ra ba hUM phaT/ oM tsam+ba sha sa pa ri hUM phaT/ oM ku mA ri b+ha dza sha ma

ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM hUM/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM badzra pA NI/ hr-i da ya na sa ma ya ma ti kra ma te uts+tsha ta naM/ b+ha bi shu ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha/ ma ti pra ti ba ba ta/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nAM/ pra ha ra

pra ha ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hr-i da ya ni/ bin+da bin+da/ bi si nA ge ta ma ni daM ma na da/ nA ga sha rI ra na/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ /nA ga ya na ni/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi d+ha ra nA mA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uts+tsha Ta nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAm+ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha na ba la ba ra kra mA ya hUM phaT/ /kr-i tA n+tA ya

phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ku sha ta na ut+ta nA ya phaT/ pre ta bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pasma ra bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+ha nAM/ bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/

sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yang / /bsnyen dang bsgrub pa las kyi sbyor ka'i sngags kyi rim par bya'o/ /dbye ba'i rim pa ma shes na/ /las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de brtson slob dpon la gus pas/ /ser sna

g.yo sgyu med pas su/ /yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas la/ /yang yang mnyan pas man ngag ni/ /the tshom med pa shin tu gces/ /de bas man ngag can ni btsal/ /man ngag med pa'i nan rtags la/ /dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi sbyor ka ste bco lnga pa'o// //

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags rnams kyi ni btu ba'i mchog /byas pas the tshom sel bar 'gyur/ /phyag 'tshal mgo la brgyan par bya/ /kA li'i sde tshan bzhi pa yis/ /bzhi pa dag la is su brgyan/ /kA li'i sde tshan drug pa yi/ /gsum

pa dag la mas su brgyan/ /ba zhes bya ba yi ge la/ /ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge btags/ /de 'og ra yi yi ge'o/ /da la ha btags de'o gar/ /de 'og ba dang dza la ni/ /ra btags pa ni de yi 'og /na la is su brgyan hUM phaT/ /yang na hUM gnyis sogs pa'am/ /yi ge bcu gsum

pa zhes bya/ /tsheg bar chod pa'i dbang du byas/ /oM gyi yi ge dang por mtshan/ /yi ge na la is su brgyan/ /yi ge la la mas su brgyan/ /ba la ta ni gdags par bya/ /ra yi yi ge gcig pu gnas/ /da la ha ni gdags par bya/ /ra yi yi ge gcig pu gnas/ /

ba dang dza ni sdebs pa la/ /yi ge ra ni gdags par bya/ /ba ni gcig pu gnas pa la/ /na la is su brgyan par bya/ /ma dang ha dang ya dang gsum/ /gdags pa med de so sor gnas/ /ka la sha ni gdags par bya/ /sa la is su brgyan par bya/ /na dang pa dang ta dang

gsum/ /gdags pa med de lugs su gnas/ /ya la es su brgyan par bya/ /ha la u ni btags nas su/ /zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya/ /pha ni gcig pu ta ni bzlog /yang na hUM gsum phaT kyang gsum/ /hUM gnyis dang ni phaT gnyis ni/ /las gzhan

drag po'i skabs dang sbyar/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig ces/ /tsheg bar bcad par shes par bya/ /yang na hUM gnyis bsnan pa rtsa gnyis pa/ /ya yi yi ge drag po gnyis/ /bsnan pas rtsa bzhi pa zhes bya/ /de yang drag po'i

skabs yin pas/ /khyad par du ni shes par bya/ /yi ge rkang grangs dbang byas na/ /de ltar ma nges rtsa drug nas/ /sum cu rtsa gcig bar du yod/ /oM gyi yi ge dang por mtshan/ /mtshan gyi yi ge'i steng du ni/ /ma dang ha dang tsha dang na dang ni/ /da la ha ni gdags par bya/ /ra la

os su brgyan pa ni/ /sha dang na dang ha la u/ /zla tshes thig le ha la brgyan/ /pha dang ta log yi ge'o/ /yi ge bcu gsum zhes su bya/ /yi ge drug ces bya ba ni/ /mtshan gyi man ngag kho na'o/ /swA hA oM dang ho dang gsum/ /zhi rgyas dbang gi yi ge mtha'/ /dza sogs pa

yi yi ge rnams/ /'gugs pa la sogs mtha' ru bstan/ /man ngag can gyis sbyor zhes bya'o/ /yi ge hUM ni 'bru gcig po/ /'di yang bzlas pa'i yi ge snying po yin/ /yi ge btu ba ma shes na/ /sngags kyi mthu ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de btu/ /lha

rnams gzhan po'i sngags rnams kyang / /bdag gis btab ma nus pas/ /slob dpon la ni gus bya'i phyir/ /slob dpon rna brgyud man ngag las/ /yi ge btu ba shes par bya/ /yi ge btu ba'i sbyor ba ste bcu drug pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bzlas brjod man ngag bstan par bya/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /bla med bzlas brjod bzhi ru bstan/ /dang po phyi yi bzlas pa ni/ /sems dpa' sum brtsegs tshul du bya/ /de ni kun gyi thun mong yin/ /khyad par re re'am gnyis sdebs su/ /las kyi khyad

par skabs dang sbyar/ /mtshon gang nas dang rta rnga'i tshad/ /mtshon gyi sum cha de yi phyed/ /pad+ma la sogs mtshon gyi phyed/ /rin chen smug po gur lta bu/ /ngang pa'i rgyu yi tshad tsam mo/ /yang na dar mo gru gsum ni/ /tsi ta'i tshad tsam nyid du

'dod/ /de lta'i gnas ni nyid du yang / /ye shes bzhugs pa'i gnas su 'dod/ /la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni/ /rang byung nyid du yod par 'dod/ /de ni rgyu'am nus pa'i tshul/ /la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni/ /de nyid las ni sprul pa yi/ /kun brtags de la de skad

gdags/ /gzhan yang gzhung lugs mi mthun pa'i/ /dang po dbang bskur dus su ni/ /dang por dkyil 'khor bcug pa'i lha dang ni/ /de nyid so so tha dad 'dod/ /thugs ka dbu steng gong 'og gnas/ /lha nyid 'jug pa'i tshul la yang / /'khor lo rdzogs pa'am lha de

nyid/ /bdag nyid man ngag thob gzhung gis/ /lha de rkyen gyi tshul yin la/ /rang 'byung nus pa rgyu yin pas/ /gnyis med gcig tu sdebs te bsgoms/ /de ltar the tshom bcad nas ni/ /rang gi rig pa pho brang nyid/ /shin tu gsal bar sbyangs nas ni/ /ye shes lha

la bsnyen pa 'bul/ /dang po 'od zer spros nas ni/ /ye shes spyan drangs lha de la/ /mtshan ma la sogs gsal nas ni/ /'khor lo bzhin du dbul ba dang / /pad+ma brtsegs dang rin chen thag /de nyid thun mong shes par bya'o/ /lugs 'byung lugs bzlog 'khor

lo'i tshul/ /shes rab sbyor thabs mchod pa'i tshul/ /mchog gi dngos grub 'dod pa'o/ /lce ni rdo rje dkar por bsgyur/ /yang na sngo ljang nyid du bya/ /nyi ma shar ba bzhin du gdal/ /de ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul/ /drag po bsgrub pa'i gnas skabs su/ /man ngag

gong bzhin bzlog ste gsal/ /lce ni rdo rje ser po dang / /dmar po rgyas dang dbang la shis/ /mthing ga drag po'i tshul du bstan/ /'od zer 'khor lugs gong bzhin no/ /las kyi rim pa'i skabs dang sbyar/ /ba thag tsha tsha'i tshul dang ni/ /drag po kho na'i skabs dang

sbyar/ /rngul chu brug pa bzhin du'am/ /srin po ngur skad ji bzhin du/ /shin tu drag cing myur bar bzlas/ /las kyi khyad par gzhan dag la/ /spros te sbyang ba'i tshul dang ni/ /'od zer sbu gu btsugs pa dang / /me yi tshul gyis bsregs pa dang / /lcags kyu lta bus bkug pa dang / /

mtshon cha char bzhin dbab pa dang / /'khor lo bzhin du bskor ba dang / /mnan pa'i tshul du bya ba dang / /mda' zam tshul du bya ba dang / /'khrul 'khor tshul du bya ba dang / /'phen sdud tshul du bya ba dang / /dang pos bkug la gnyis pas bsreg /

dang pos bkug la gnyis pas bsad/ /dang pos bkug la gnyis pas mnan/ /yang na gsum sdebs tshul gyis bya/ /bzhi sdebs lnga sdebs pa yang yin/ /sdebs sbyor cho ga thams cad kyang / /man ngag bzhin du shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i man

ngag rnams/ /brgyud pa las ni shes par bya'o/ /de rnams bzlas brjod byed pa yang / /sems ni gzhan du mi g.yeng zhing / /tshig gzhan gyis ni bar mi chod/ /yi ge man ngag ma nyams par/ /sgra yi brjod tshul skabs dang sbyar/ /de la nan tan cher bskyed la/ /mtshan

ma'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i dngos grub gsum po yang / /dang po rab la gsum du bstan/ /sprul dang yang sprul sum sprul lo/ /'bring la sgra dang dri dang ni/ /'od du yang ni bstan pa yin/ /tha ma nam smad nam stod dang / /nyin mo dag dang gsum du

bstan/ /de dag rtags rnams kun la yang / /gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug dang / /dri ni zhim dang mi zhim dang / /sgra ni snyan dang mi snyan dang / /ro yang zhim dang mi zhim dang / /'od dkar 'od ser 'od dmar po/ /ljang dang nag la sogs pa yi/ /rtags la sogs pa de dag

la/ /gsum dang bdun dang bco lnga dang / /nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag tu brtag /thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur dang / /phung po khams gsal ting 'dzin gsal/ /'od la sogs pa zhi ba'i tshul/ /de sogs rtags rnams byung ba na/ /lha yi dngos grub yin par brtag /mtshan

ma la sogs mi brtan zhing / /phung po la sogs mos 'gyur zhing / /ting 'dzin rnams ni mi gsal ba/ /'od dmar gnag cing rtsub 'gyur na/ /de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams kyang / /bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya/ /rtags rnams de rnams byung na yang / /

don dam rang bzhin med pa la/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bu'i sems/ /re dang dogs pa rnams spangs te/ /dga' dang mi dga'i sems mi bya/ /'jigs pa la sogs sems spangs te/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas phul nas/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo la sogs bya/ /de ltar byas

tshe mkha' 'gro mas/ /lung bstan gnas su khrid pa dang / /man ngag 'jigs pa med pas blang / /bdud kyi ltas rnams 'byung ba ni/ /gong bzhin byas pas med par 'gyur/ /nang na mtshan ma bsnyen pa gtso/ /de 'og grangs kyi bsnyen par gtso/ /dus kyi bsnyen

pa tha ma'o/ /grangs kyi rab 'bring tha ma ni/ /gtso bo 'bum dang nyis 'bum dang / /sum 'bum dag tu shes par bya/ /rnam rgyal la sogs bzhi po la/ /'bum phyed 'bum dang nyis 'bum mo/ /'khor rnams lhag ma kun la ni/ /khri dang nyi khri sum khri'o/ /yang na

lha rnams so so yi/ /sku gcig bsnyen pa byed pa na/ /rab kyi bsnyen pa sum 'bum mo/ /'bring gi bsnyen pa bdun 'bum mo/ /tha ma'i bsnyen pa bye ba'o/ /dus la yang ni gsum gsum yod/ /zla gcig zla gnyis zla gsum bar/ /lo phyed zla dgu lo gcig gi /

lo gnyis dang ni lo gsum dang / /lo bzhi tha mar shes par bya/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /dam tshig nyams pa yin pas na/ /sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor la sogs kyis/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskang nas ni/ /slar la sogs pa'i cho ga bya/ /de ltar byas kyang ma

byung na/ /rnal 'byor sdig sgrib che bas na/ /sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor la sogs kyis/ /sdig sgrib la sogs sbyangs nas ni/ /slar la sogs pa'i cho ga bya/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /yang na bsgom pa gcig pus bya/ /yang na bzlas brjod gcig pus so/ /

bsgom dang bzlas pa'i dngos grub ni/ /byung bar de ni ma gyur na/ /tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod sbyin sreg dang / /gtor ma la sogs so so la/ /man ngag cho ga thob pas na/ /dngos grub nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad kun la yang / /the tshom can

gyis mi 'grub ste/ /the tshom med nges 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /mtshan ma gsum mam nus pa brtag /yungs kar dag la sngags bzlas nas/ /shing ljon la sogs me tog la/ /btab nas bskams gyur rab yin no/ /

chu la bzlas te gtor ba na/ /char pa la sogs 'bebs pa dang / /thal ba la ni sngags bzlas na/ /char ba la sogs gcod par 'gyur/ /de ni 'bring gi nus pa'i rtags/ /yungs kar phyag mtshan la sogs pas/ /sngags bzlas gtor zhing brabs pa yis/ /gdon

dang nad la sogs pa sel/ /de ni tha ma'i nus pa'i rtags/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /lha sogs man ngag thams cad spro/ /khams dang bag chags med phyir ro/ /cho ga thams cad gong bzhin no/ /man ngag mi mthun gzhan yang sbyar/ /de ltar byas na dngos

grub 'byung / /dngos grub byung bar ma gyur kyang / /sgrib pa rnams ni mgo mnan nas/ /tshogs chen khyad par bsags nas ni/ /dam tshig ma nyams rnal 'byor pas/ /skye ba phyi ma la sogs su/ /dngos grub rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub khyad par ma thob na/ /

skye ba bdun la gdon mi za/ /nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyis ni/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo la sogs la/ /rang 'byung yi ge nus pa ni/ /rlung gi rta la zhon nas kyang / /snying ga'i 'khor lo la sogs bskor/ /gsang ba'i bzlas brjod

man ngag ni/ /byang chub sems kyi man ngag gam/ /phyag rgya la brten ji bzhin no/ /mthar thug gi ni bzlas pa yang / /snang ba gsum gyi mtha' la ni/ /me rtog ye shes stong nyid gsal/ /de ni bzlas pa'i mchog yin no/ /bzlas pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni/ /rnal

'byor blo dman don du bstan/ /bzlas brjod kyi man ngag gi sbyor ka ste bcu bdun pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs rim man ngag cung zhig bstan/ /dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs dang / /blos su bsam pa'i rim pa yi/

dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs dag la yang / /rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems/ /tsa yi gtso bo d+hU tI yin/ /d+hU tA nyid kyi gzhung lugs kyang / /srog rtsa nang du rgyu ba dang / /de la brtan par 'dod pa'o/ /de la sogs pa'i gzhung lugs mang / /bdag gi gzhung gis nang du rgyu/ /

shin tu phra ba rta rnga tshad/ /de bas phra bar 'dod pa'ang yod/ /dbugs kyi dngas ma shin tu phra/ /'od dang ldan pa nyid la ni/ /byang chub sems ni til mar bzhin/ /de la khyab par brten pa yi/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi rtsa gnyis ni/ /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /mdun gyi rtsa ni

da da dz+nya/ /de rnams tshad la sogs pa yang / /d+hU tI nyid dang mthun pa'o/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams la yang / /gzhung lugs mi 'dra mang du bstan/ /'khor lo gcig dang 'khor lo gnyis/ /'khor lo bzhi dang 'khor lo drug /'khor lo brgyad dang 'khor lo dgu/ /rdo

rje nor bu'i cha la yang / /pho brang bzhi yi gnas rtag tu/ /'khor lo mi mthun 'dod pa dang / /'khor lo mang po 'dod pa rnams/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti gzhung lugs yin/ /rlung gi gzhung lugs dag la yang / /lte ba'i lkog dang lte ba dang / /snying ga mgrin pa yan lag gi /gnas

ni lnga po dag las kyang / /srog gi rlung dang gyen du rgyu/ /me dang mnyam nas thur du sel/ /kun la khyab pa'i rlung rnams ni/ /gnas lnga tha dad gtso bo yin/ /yan lag lnga dang dbang po lnga/ /de ltar tha dad 'dod pa'ang yod/ /bdag gi gzhung gi gnas skabs kyis/ /

las kyi sgo nas phye bas na/ /thams cad ngo bo gcig yin no/ /byang sems 'bebs pa'i gtum mo yang / /'khor lo brten dang mi brten pa'i/ /dregs 'dzin ma ni bcu bzhi po/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti la sogs gzhung / /rang bzhin gtum mo 'dod par ni/ /mkhas pa rnams ni

kun ka mthun/ /byang chub sems la gnyis yod do/ /don dam dang ni kun rdzob bo/ /kun rdzob la yang gnyis yod de/ /snyigs mar gyur dang bcud du gyur/ /bcud du gyur la gnyis yod de/ /til mar bzhin du khyab pa dang / /'chi ba'i dus tshe 'byung ba'o/ /

de la brten pa'i man ngag tshogs/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /bsam zhing bsgom pa'i rim pa yang / /rang 'byung yi ge'i gnas tshul ni/ /yi ge hUM dang a dang ni/ /oM dang haM gi rnam pa bzhi/ /man ngag sbyor rdzogs shes par bya/ /'khor

lo rnams ni gsal byas la/ /lte bar kA li nyis lnga pa po/ /snying gar dang po sde tshan dang po brgyad/ /mgrin par A li bcu drug po/ /dung khang la ni nyis ldab bo/ /gtum mo zhes bya lte ba'i lkog /sor gnyis sor bzhi sor drug tu/ /mar me bzhin du gnas pa las/ /

rlung ma nyid ma'i stobs kyis su/ /las kyi rlung ni sngon mo bcus/ /sbar nas de la gtad par bya/ /rtags brgyad byung nas shin tu spar/ /dga' ba la sogs rim skyes pas/ /rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong par 'gyur/ /'khor lo gcig dang 'khor lo gnyis/ /gsum

la sogs pa'i man ngag ni/ /rim pa bzhin du sbyor shes bya'o/ /rlung rnams g.yas dang g.yon du ni/ /gnyi gar rgyu dang dal bar rgyu/ /de la gtad pa'i rim gyis ni/ /spro bar nus na bsdu bar bya'o/ /rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong nyid 'gyur/ /yang na thig le'i rnam pa la/ /

spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang / /lnga ru blta dang gcig tu blta/ /rim gyis bstan par gyur nas ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ka ste bco brgyad pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga bstan

pa/ bgegs bskrad pa'i thabs la/ cho ga che chung gi rim pa bsgrub bya'i skabs dang sbyar te/ thabs dpag tu med par bya'o/ /de la rdzas kyis bskrad pa dang / sngags kyis bskrad pa dang / stang stabs kyis bskrad pa dang / /phyag rgyas bskrad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin

gyis bskrad pa dang / /yang na rdzas dang sngags kyis bskrad pa dang / rdzas dang stang stabs kyis bskrad pa dang / rdzas dang phyag rgyas bskrad pa dang / /rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskrad pa dang / /yang na sngags dang gnyis 'dus dang / /stang stabs dang gnyis 'dus dang /

phyag rgya dang gnyis 'dus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis 'dus dang / phyag rgya stang stabs gnyis 'dus pa dang / bzhi ka la ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya la yang de bzhin te/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang de ltar bya/ /gnyis 'dus gsum 'dus bzhi 'dus su/ /thams cad kun la sbyar

bar bya/ /yang na lnga 'dus kho nas bya/ /bgegs kyi rim pa'ang lngar shes bya/ /sne gdon phra mo kun la ni/ /sbyor ka gcig pu kho nas bzlog /rgyal 'gong la sogs gdon la ni/ /sbyor ba gnyis kyis bzlog par bya/ /de bas mtho ba'i bgegs gnyis la/ /gsum

dang bzhi ni bya ba yin/ /bgegs ni chen po thams cad la/ /sbyor ba lnga po kho nas bya/ /rdzas kyi bya thabs bstan pa ni/ /gu gul yungs kar sha chen dang / /tshil chen dang ni thal chen dang / /dur khrod sol ba grog mkhar sa/ /de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la/ /gzugs

brnyan bca' bar bya ba'am/ /brdeg pa'i rdzas su bya ba dang / /bdug pa'i rdzas su bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i rdzas su bya ba ni/ /gla rtsi dang ni rma bya yi/ /rgyal mtshan klu la shis par bstan/ /yang na dur khrod chen po'i rdzas/ /rgyan cha rnams kyis byin brlabs la/ /bskon

pas srung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sku ni byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sku dang glegs bam la sogs pa/ /byin gyis brlabs nas mdun bzhag pas/ /bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs phyag mtshan la/ /byin gyis

brlabs nas lag bzhag na/ /bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin/ /khyad par nag po chen po yi/ /sku ni byin brlabs bzhag pas su/ /bsrung bar de ni 'gyur ba yin/ /skud sngon mdud pa bdun byas nas/ /mgul du bcings pas bsrung bar 'gyur/ /yang na smyag shad

lcug ma yis/ /byabs pas de ni tshar gcod do/ /de la sogs pa'i mthun rdzas rnams/ /thams cad kyis ni bya ba yin/ /'khor lo bcas nas lus la gdags/ /bsrung ba'i mchog ni yin par gsungs/ /sngags kyis bskrad pa bstan pa ni/ /oM na mo nI lAm+ba

ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo hUM hUM phaT/ ces bskrad pa'o/ /mA ra ya phaT gdags pa ni gsad pa'o/ /yang na 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba bzhin du bya'o/ /oM na mo nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti ye hUM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba dang spel te bya'o/ /bsgrub

bya'i ming gi mtha' la sred byed kyi yi ge dang ldan pa ni bgegs zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /ming gi mtha' la bsrung ba'i sngags dang ldan pa ni bsrung pa'i sngags so/ /ming gi mtha' la dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba'i sngags kyang shes par bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa

rdzogs pas ni/ /sngags ring kho nas bya ba yin/ /khyad par du ni klu la shis/ /yang na drag po'i sngags 'di ni/ /oM ma hA tsaN+Da ro Sha Na hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba dang spel te bya'o/ /yang na rgyud bzhin btub pa dang / /mi btub pa yi rim pa ni/ /slob dpon so so'i gzhung

lugs so/ /ji ltar mos pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /drag po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhan rnams kyang / /man ngag gzhan gyis sbyor shes bya'o/ /stang stabs sbyor bas tshar bcad ni/ /mnyam pa'i stang stabs la sogs pa bco brgyad kyis tshar bcad pa dang / /pheg rdob

skor bu la sogs pa/ /gyad 'gros rnams kyis tshar bcad pa dang / g.yas brkyang la sogs pas tshar bcad pa dang / de gsum gang yang rung bas bya'o/ /stang stabs kyi sbyor ba las shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang / lag stabs la sogs

pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa shes par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs ni/ dang por bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje/ gtum khro 'bar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan bgrad pa/ gos sngon po gsol ba/ sku che ba/ yan lag rags pa/ g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang bas

bgegs kyi snying gar mnan pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje gsor ba las 'od zer 'phros pas/ rdo rje phra mo'i mtshon cha grangs med par brgyud mar byung nas/ spyi gtsug tu brgyab pas rkang pa'i mthil du 'byin pa/ hUM sgra dang zhags pa'i sgra bsgrags pas thams cad

dang ras shing brgyal bar byed pa/ /sku las khro bo dpag tu med pa byung bas/ bsgrub bya'i ba spu'i bu gar zhugs nas khrag 'jibs par byed pa/ thugs ka nas khro bo dpag tu med pa byung nas/ bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzir ba/ sku las me dpung byung nas sreg par byed pa/ zhal nas

sngags kyi sgra brjod pas 'byung po thams cad brlag par byed pa/ de lta bu'i khro bo gcig bsgoms la/ ye shes bstim/ byin gyis brlab/ dbang bskur la nus pa'i mthu can du bya'o/ /bgegs chen po bskrad pa yang / cho ga phra mos mi thub ste/ dang po kho nar sngon du

bsnyen pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bskyed la/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i gtor ma gcig byin gyis brlabs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa la dbul/ mthu bskyed la gsol ba gdab/ yang gtor ma gcig la thun mong gi rdzas dang ldan

pa'i steng du/ khrag sna snying sna sha sna gsum dang ldan pa'i rdzas la/ byin gyis brlabs la chos skyong ba'i srung ma la phul la/ bdag gi stong grogs mdzad par las bsgo'o/ /gtor ma cha gcig la drug cu pa ldan pa'i rdzas la byin gyis brlabs la/ 'byung po thams cad

la byin la/ gnod pa ma byed par bsgo ba bya/ yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs zhi bar bya ste/ de ltar yang nas yang du byas pas bgegs zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas kyang 'gror ma btub na/ drag po'i las bya ste/ dang po kho na bdag gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i sprul

pa bkye bas/ 'byung po thams cad bkug pa dang / yang na nad pa nyid la bsams te/ yi ge suM las 'phros 'dus pa las/ ri rab tu gyur nas/ ri rab kyis snying gar mnan par bsam/ de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /bgegs bsreg pa ni/ yi ge hUM gi 'phro

'dus/ lce nag po rdo rje sbu gu can du gyur nas/ de'i nang na tshur 'od zer me 'dra ba byung nas gang la gnod pa'i sar gtad la bgegs thams cad bsreg par bya ste/ yang na lce rdo rje sngon por bsgyur la/ 'od zer sngon po rlung 'dra bas thams cad gtor zhing bskrad par bsam

mo/ /yang na srog gi 'od zer 'phros pas/ bgegs thams cad bcom nas slar 'dus pas snying ga'i lha la mchod par bsam mo/ /yang na mdun gyi lha mchod par bsam mo/ /bsreg gtor bcom pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /yang na gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni/ gong

gi sku bskyed pa la sogs pa man ngag sbyor ba yod pa rnams/ rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /khyad par sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ /thugs kyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang / /gsung gi yig 'bru spro ba dang / /sku yi sprul pa spro ba dang / /yang na thugs kyi phyag mtshan yin/ /lte

'og gnas su bstim pa dang / /gnas dgu dag tu bstim pa dang / /thams cad kun du bstim pa dang / /de ltar bstim la lus dgang ngo / /thur du bda' dang gyen du bda'/ /srog 'gro steng 'og bda' ba dang / /'byung sa gnyis nas gdon pa dang / /thams cad

bcom nas gdon pa dang / /'dod pa'i tshul gyis bda' ba dang / /bton nas bzhu btul bya ba dang / /de nas lha la mchod pa bya/ /de la sogs pa'i man ngag gis/ /sbyor ba gzhan yang shes par bya/ /de lta'i sbyor ba byed pa yang / /phal dang phal gyi thun mong

min/ /lus kyi rgyan cha la sogs ldan/ /ngag gi ma nyams yon tan ldan/ /bar chad rdul tsam ma shor bar/ /dper na rngul chu brug pa bzhin/ /de gsum gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /snod min pa la gsang 'gyur yin/ /dper na srin po ngur skad bzhin/ /tshig mi

gsal bar don gsal ba/ /yid brtan drag tu bzla bar bya/ /de lta'i bgegs bskrad sbyor ba yang / /thams cad kun la bya ba min/ /bsgom sgrub par chad byung ba dang / /slob dpon gzhan don mdzad pa la/ /'byung pos bar chad byas pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bya

bar gsungs/ /rdo rje spun la bya ba yin/ /gzhan yang sems can gzhan po ni/ /mi dge spang zhing dge bcu spyod/ /de la'ang bya bar gsungs pa yin/ /gnyi ga mi byed sems can la/ /sbyor ba chung ngu bya bar gsungs/ /mi dge bcu ni dang len cing / /rdo rje slob

dpon la smod cing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang / /rgyal khams yongs su gnod pa dang / /dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog dang / /theg chen gsang sngags smod pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar 'gyur la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni byar mi rung / /gal te sems can

de dag kyang / /gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol bshags nas/ /sangs rgyas theg pa'i sgor 'jug cing / /yang dang yang du gsol 'debs na/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bya bar gsungs/ /sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag kyang / /rang gi srog bzhin ma btsas na/ /snod dang mi ldan la spel nas/ /be'u sbrel

g.yang gar khrid pa bzhin/ /gcig lhung bas na gnyis ka lhung / /de bas nan tan cher gyis la/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /btsas ka dam bzhag byas te gtang / /bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ka ste bcu dgu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo

rje bsnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug sngags kyi ni gtso bo ru/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i phyir/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i man ngag rnams/ /cung zhig bsdus te bstan par bya'o/ /dang po skad cig ltar bsams te/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng hUM gi 'phro

'du yis/ /mchod pa la sogs rdzogs byas nas/ /stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngang las ni/ /paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam/ /pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /rdo rje'i gur du gyur nas kyang / /cho

ga gsum mam skad cig mas/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sku bskyed la/ /don du rdo rje sems shes bya/ /rdo rje bsnams dang chos nyid kyi/ /don la sems dpa'i ye shes la/ /las su ming dang tha dad tsam/ /de nyid sku mdog dkar la 'tsher/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /

rgyan rnams thams cad rdzogs ldan zhing / /rdo rje skyil krung tshul du bzhugs/ /ye shes spyan drangs snying gar bstim/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin brlabs dbang bskur bya/ /de ltar brtan bsgoms thugs ka ru/ /zla ba pad+ma lte ba la/ /man ngag bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /de

ltar gsal nas bzlas brjod bya/ /thugs 'khor gsal dang lha mchod dang / /sbyang dang bsdu ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /'bum gsum bsnyen pa bya ba dang / /dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi/ /bsnyen pa la sogs tshad phyin nas/ /de nas 'khor rnams

so so la/ /'bum phrag re re bsnyen pa bya/ /'khor rnams bsnyen pa'i man ngag ni/ /mdun du pad+ma'i gdan bskyed de/ /skad cig klu brgyad sprul nas ni/ /spyan drangs la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /'od zer 'phros pas mchod mnyes la/ /don rnams gang yin grub par

bsam/ /gong bzhin mtshan ma'i rtags phyin nas/ /de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /lha bskyed la sogs cho ga ni/ /bsnyen pa'i dus dang mthun par bya/ /gtso bo'i bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig /'khor rnams khri dang stong dang ni/ /brgya yi bar du rab 'bring

ngo / /dug gis zin pa'i bsgrub bya ste/ /mdun sogs bya ba rdzogs byas la/ /lus kyi yan lag brgyad po la/ /yi ge dgod sogs bya ba ni/ /mgor k+ShuM sna dang rna bar yuM/ /mig du hUM dang khar ni suM/ /mgrin pa smraM snying khar y+m+r+yuM/ /lte bar k+Sh+m+r+yuM du shes par bya'o/ /

kha dog dkar po bsam par bya/ /sngags rnams de yi mthus su ni/ /snying ga'i dug ni bcing bar bya/ /ye shes yi ge hUM gis ni/ /dug 'phrog la sogs man ngag sbyar/ /de 'og phyi ma'i las brtsam mo/ /rin chen la sogs/ bum pa la/ /skyon bral yon tan

ldan pa ru/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pas dgang / /dang po bum sbyang bum bskyed la/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /de steng yi ge suM las ni/ /gyur pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan mdzad cing / /sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis pa/ /kha T+wAM thod pa

phyag na bsnams/ /sbrul gyi rgyan dang ldan pa la/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung bcas/ /klu rnams mgo bo'i cha rnams ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'og bsdus nas/ /de steng rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /pad+ma yi ni 'dab ma la/ /klu chen brgyad po bsgom par bya/ /shar

du nor rgyas bu dkar po/ /byang du 'jog po ser po'o/ /nub tu stobs rgyu dmar po ste/ /lhor ni pad+ma sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che/ /dkar ser du ni bsgom par bya/ /me mtshams su ni dung skyong dkar sngo'o/ /bden bral du ni rigs ldan sngo dmar po/ /rlung mtshams

'khyil pa dmar ser po/ /de ltar klu brgyad bsam pa ni/ /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs bya/ /de dus rdo rje mkha' 'gro ru/ /dug sel ba yi dus 'di ru/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /cho ga bskyed tshul thabs dang mthun/ /rma bya'i sgra yi chun po yis/ /mgo

bo la sogs lus kun la/ /byab cing man ngag sbyor shes bya'o/ /rkang mthil bar du drangs nas ni/ /bum pa'i nang du dbo bar bya/ /lha gsal la sogs man ngag bya/ /oM hri tan+da ra hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba man ngag tu/ /hUM gsum phaT gsum shes par bya/ /oM

bA su ki hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hri tan+da ra swA hA/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM karko Ta hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM pad+ma tri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM shaM kha pA la hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM ku li sha laM hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM hu lu ta ke li hri tan+da ra swA hA/ oM hri tan+da

ra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ a mu ka sa nirba shiM ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ba su ki hr-i tan+da re de ba dat+ta nirba shiM ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ bsnyen bsgrub la sogs bya ba yang / /sngags kyi dbye ba la sogs kyang / /man ngag can gyis sbyor shes bya/ /dug phrogs 'o ma nag por

'gyur/ /de 'og yungs kar la sogs kyis/ /sngags bzlas pas su brdeg par bya/ /brdegs pa tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi/ /snying ni 'bar ba la sogs 'gyur/ /de yi snying gar yi ge hUM/ /bsgoms pas rnam shes bcings shing gzung sa/ /de tsam gyis ni dbugs g.yo

'gyur/ /bdag gi sna sgo'i 'od zer gyis/ /mche bas zin pa'i sna sgor thim/ /lus bkang bas ni rkang lag 'dar/ /de nas hUM gi glu blang bya/ /de yang sngon du se gol gtogs/ gsum gyi sgra yis ldang bar 'gyur/ /langs nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom/ /yan lag thams cad

bsrung bar bya'o/ /klu sman dkar gsum sna tshogs kyis/ /mchod dang gtor ma klu la shis/ /de sogs sbyor ba gzhan yang / /slob dpon mkhas pas sbyor shes bya/ /dug gis zin pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /kha dang smin ma rkan dang ni/ /sna rtse sna sgo mtshan

ma dang / /bshang ba mthe bong gzung ba rnams/ /gso ru mi rung spang bar bya/ /rigs ldan mgo brgya gtsigs pa dang / /ka ma la ni dug gi mche ba ste/ /bzhis zin pa ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma rnams ni gsor rung bas/ /rnal 'byor snying rje dang ldan pa/ /dbang

bskur man ngag ldan pa yis/ /cho ga gzhung bzhin byas pa dang / /gzhan sgrol stobs kyis bdag kyang sgrol/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par gsungs/ /de bas brtson 'grus bskyed de bsgrub/ /mchod bstod la sogs byas nas ni/ /lha gshegs ting 'dzin bsdu bar bya/ /

de 'og smon lam gdab bya ba/ /dper na sman rnams mthu yis ni/ /rdzas kyi dug ni 'joms pa bzhin/ /de bzhin klu yi dug rnams ni/ /sngags kyi mthus su 'joms par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dug rnams ni/ /ye shes mthu yis 'joms par 'gyur/ /rdzas kyi mthu

yi stobs rnams kyis/ /dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig /sngags kyi mthu yi stobs rnams kyis/ /dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig /ye shes mthu yi stobs rnams kyis/ /dug rnams ma lus zhi gyur cig /dug rnams zhi byed mthu yis ni/ /thams cad byang chub thob par

shog /dug zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgug pa la sogs sbyor ba gzhan yang bstan/ /lha bskyed sbyor ba rdzogs nas ni/ /sngags rnams so so'i mtha' la ni/ /dgug pa'i yi ge gdags par bya/ /

yang nA ga rA dzA dza dza zhes pas/ thun mong gi sngags su shes par bya'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i 'od zer gyis/ /gang 'dod gnas nas bkug nas ni/ /shing chen dag gi sdong po la/ /shing gi chol ni phyung nas su/ gro ga dag la klu gzugs bri/ /'od zer 'phros pas de la

bkug /de nas shing chen nang du gzhug /kha bcad tshon gyi skud pas bcing / /thal sogs 'dag pas zhal zhal bya/ /yang na pha bong la gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar mi bya bskrad pa ni/ /shing shun la sogs dag la ni/ /rlung ngam sha ba'i gzugs bris la/ /de yi

steng du bsgrub bya'i gzugs/ /gang 'dod pas ni bris nas bzhag /rtsa sngags mtha' la bskrad sngags gdags/ /gang ltar 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /sngags kyi 'od zer stobs kyis 'phang / /gong gi sbyor bas bkug nas su/ /gru gsum nag po'i brub khung

du/ /nag po'i sbyor bas kha bcad la/ /ri rab gzugs bri mnan par bya'o/ /lha rnams bcu bdun stang stabs kyis/ /ji tsam 'dod par mnan par bya'o/ /gsang bar 'dod pa'i sbyor ka yis/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs gong bzhin bca'/ /bsnyen pa la sogs rdzogs

pa yis/ /gsang sngags la sogs shes byas la/ /mtshon cha phyag mtshan byin brlabs la/ /khro bo mtshon cha thogs pa yis/ /lus rnams gtub cing gsod bar bsam/ /yang na 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba bya/ /yang na sngags kyi 'od zer gyis/ /gang 'dod par ni bsreg par

bya/ /yang na sbyin sreg dag gis bya/ /dam la ma thogs klu rnams ni/ /sgrub pa po la bar chad byed/ /dang po zhi bas gdul bar bya/ /zhi bas 'dul bar ma gyur na/ /de la drag po'i las rnams brtsam/ /dam la thogs pa'i klu rgyal ni/ /bsten cing bsgrubs na dngos grub ster/ /

bde gshegs sprul pa bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos grub mchog kyang ster bar byed/ /klu rgyal de bsgrub sbyor ba yang / /sngon 'gro cho ga rdzogs nas ni/ /de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /stong pa'i ngang las pad zla'i gdan/ /de steng cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang

'dod bskyed/ /gzhan dag sprul pa'ang gang 'dod pa yang yod/ /mdun du pad zla'i gdan steng du/ /cho ga gsum mam skad cig sbrul/ /sku mdog dkar po sbrul zhags bsnams/ /klu rgyal de 'dra spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /de nas

gang yin bzlas brjod bya/ /klu'i cho ga'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /'khrul 'khor rim pa brtsam par bya/ /dang po las bzhi'i rim pa ni/ /zhi ba go ro tsa

na blang / /gro ga'am smyug ma'i shun pa la/ /rtsa sogs dkar po ma yin spangs/ /zhi ba 'dod pa'i smyu gu yis/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed 'khor lo bri/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug bri/ /shes rab cho gas yang dag bri/ /yang na gcig

dang gnyis su bya/ /sngags ni thams cad dgod pa dang / /gcig dang gnyis su dgod pa'o/ /yi ge re re dgod pa dang / /thams cad rdzogs par dgod pa'o/ /shar nas brtsams te bri bar bya/ /de ma thag tu dor ba yang / /bsgrub bya'i ming dang nA ma dang / /bskul ba'i tshig

dang bcas pa bri/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge hUM gi 'od zer las/ /sngon po'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /mchod bstod bsnyen pa byas nas su/ /dkyil 'khor nyid la gzhug par bya/ /byin dang ldan pa'i lha nyid ni/ /yi ge'i gzugs las 'phros pas na/ /

dkar po don byed brtul zhugs can/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi dbus dkar nas/ /skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya/ /me tog dkar pos thun gsum du/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis gtor bar bya/ /bdag nyid sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa gang 'dod bya/ /zhi ba'i

dkyil 'khor dkar po la/ /de yi mdun du bsgrub bya ni/ /pad+ma zla bar gnas pa ste/ /kho dog dkar po zla ba'i mdangs/ /bsgrub bya gnas par mthong nas ni/ /bum pa dkar po'i zla ba'i mdangs/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni bkang ba yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni bsam par bya/ /rdzogs sangs

rgyas pa grangs med dbang / /thob nas bsgrub bya gang yin la/ /bdud rtsi spyi bor blugs par bya/ /bdag nyid sngon po'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi 'od zer spros pa las/ /bsgrub bya'i mi mthun zhi bar bya/ /de nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /oM na mo nI lAm+ba ra d+har badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/

che ge mo zhi bar gyis shig /na ma swA hA/ dug ni zhi bar 'dod pa ni/ /gur gum dag gis 'khor lo bri/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas/ /nag po'i gcig tu las rnams 'grub/ /de ltar rnal 'byor sgrub pa pas/ /'khor lo'i man ngag yod pa na/ /the tshom med par

byas nas ni/ /sngags ni nan tan cher bskyed na/ /nges pa kho nar 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi/ /thams cad sngon bzhin byas nas ni/ /

sngags ni thams cad dgod pa na/ /mi dgod pa ni sngon bzhin bya/ /'khor lo yang ni sngon bzhin no/ /stong pa'i mtshams ni blangs nas su/ /ming dang bskul tshig swA hA spel/ /gzhi ni gro ga'am ras la bya/ /gur gum kha che skyes la sogs/ /gang 'dod pa yis bri bar bya/ /kham

por ser bor kha sbyar nas/ /skud pa ser pos bcing bar bya/ /bdag nyid rgyas pa'i lha nyid du/ /bskyed pa la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /yi ge hUM ni ser po yis/ /lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'dra spros nas ni/ /rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa la sogs

bya/ /de nas 'khrul 'khor dag la bstim/ /byin dang ldan pa'i lha rnams ni/ /yi ge'i gzugs las 'od 'phros pas/ /ser po'i byed pa brtul zhugs can/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis snod bkang la/ /skud pa ser pos bcing bar bya/ /me tog ser pos thun gsum du/ /rgyas pa'i

sems kyis gtor zhing mchod/ /bdag nyid sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /cho ga gang 'dod la sogs bya/ /yi ge'i gzugs su mthong byas la/ /bsgrub bya'i mi mthun rgyas byas te/ /me tog ser po dus su mchod/ /lha yi rnal 'byor shes pa yis/ /thams cad rdzogs nas

dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan steng du/ /bsgrub bya ser po mdun bsams la/ /gser sogs bum pas dbang bskur bya/ /rgyas pa'i mi mthun skyon rnams ni/ /bkru zhing de nyid rgyas par bsam/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bon las/ /me tog ser pos dus

gsum du/ /sngags bzlas skyon rnams sbyang bar bsam/ /oM na mo nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM che ge mo rgyas par gyis shig swA hA/ rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag bstan/ /nya dang de bzhin rgyas pa'i nya/ /de yi dus su yang dag sbyar/ /rgyas

pa'i las ni 'di dag la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dbang gi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ /grA ba dmar po'i rdzas rnams la/ /'khor

lo gnyis ni sngon bzhin bri/ /sngags sogs dgod pa sngon bzhin bya/ /bsnyen pa yang ni sngon bzhin bya/ /rgya skyegs tsan+dan khu ba'am/ /srin lag khrag gis bri bar bya/ /kham phor nag po la sogs min/ /kha sbyar 'khor lo gzhug par bya/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyis

bkang nas su/ /skud pa dmar gyis bcing bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /'od 'phros spyan drangs sngon bzhin mchod/ /de nas 'khor lo dag la bstim/ /dbang du byed pa'i lha rnams ni/ /sngags kyi gnas su nus mthu can/ /'od zer dmar

po'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrub bya dbang du bya bar bsam/ /me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod/ /cho ga las bskyed rdo rje 'dzin/ /dmar po kha dog dbang du byed/ /nub phyogs ngos su kha bltas la/ /zla ba dmar po dag la ni/ /bsgrub bya bsam par

byas nas ni/ /snying ga'i yi ge'i 'od zer gyis/ /bsgrub bya gnas nas bkug bsams la/ /khri yi sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la phog gyur pas/ /de yi sems ni yengs gyur nas/ /zhabs kyi drung du 'gyel bar bsam/ /skra grol ba

la gos med pa/ /shin tu g.yeng ba'i bsgrub bya bsam/ /dbang du mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA tsaN+Da ro Sha Na hUM hUM phaT/ che ge mo dbang du bgyis pas ma ya ho/ /gang dag dbang du mi 'gyur ba/ /kha ti ma yi me ni du ba

med/ /sngags bzlas 'khrul 'khor la ni bsro/ /las su bya ba dus bstan pa/ /nag po'i brgyad nas brtsams nas ni/ /de bzhin nag po'i brgyad kyi bar/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dbang la sbyor/ /de bzhin dbang gi 'khrul 'khor la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis

brtson par bya'o/ /dbang gi 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po yi ni 'khrul 'khor dag /dur khrod dag gi ras ma la/ /ske tshe ni ma pa'i bye brag gis/ /tsha ba gsum gyi

mar dang dur khrod sol/ /da du ra dang gtum po'i sa bon dang / /khro mdzub khrag dang tsi ta khu ba dang / /byi brun gyi ni 'jim pa blang / /gtum byed kyi ni phru ba'i chus/ /ltogs chen sgro yi smyu gu yis/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ldan/ /gtum po

khros pa'i sa bon gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bri/ /bcu yi nyi ma phyed na bri/ /sngags la sogs pa dgod pa ni/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rnam pa ni/ /de nas stong pa'i le'u tshe rnams/ /ming dang bskul tshig hUM phaT ldan/ /rnal 'byor

khros pa'i gzugs can gyis/ /'od zer 'phros pas lha rnams dgug /cho ga la sogs byas pa la/ /de nas bkug ste 'khor lor gzhug /gsod dang ldan pa'i khro bo ni/ /nus dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams/ /gdug pa'i tshogs kyis gsad

par bya/ /de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya/ /byi brun 'jim pa gtum byed chus/ /kham phor sbyar zhing dgang bar bya/ /me tog nag pos dus gsum mchod/ /bdag nyid khros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lho phyogs kha bltas bsgrub bya mdun/ /'brub

khung la sogs man ngag rdzogs/ /gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /gsod pa'i man ngag la sogs bya/ /gnas der bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /rgyal rigs thod pa'am gzhan yang rung / /nang gi 'bru dang sman dag dang / /gling rta mi khrag thod pa bkang / /

bkang ste thod pa gsum sgyed bzhag /dur khrod dag gi ro shing bskul/ /khros pa'i me yis bskul bar bya/ /dur khrod ras mar bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs bri/ /steng gi thod pa bcug ste bzhag /thod pa kha sbub thal ba phyogs su gtor/ /'dis ni nges par gsod

par 'gyur/ /yang na gzhan sogs sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ drag po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bskrad pa'i 'khrul 'khor brtsam/ /dur khrod ras ma khru gang la/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /'khor lo'i sngags sogs sngon bzhin bri/ /stong pa'i le'u tshe blangs nas ni/ /gang ming bskul ba'i sngags dang ldan/ /bdag nyid lha yi sbyor

sogs ldan/ /'od zer 'phros nas spyan drangs mchod/ /gsol bstod byas nas bsnyen pa bya/ /khri ni thos nas nag po'i phyogs/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bzhi la/ /gsol ba btab ste bstod pa bya/ /them pa'am rgya gram lam du sba/ /bsgrub bya ji srid mnan pa ru/ /'thab

cing 'thab pas dbye bar bsam/ /gtor ma byin nas skrod cig ces/ /gsol ba mang du gdab par bya/ /khros pas nub byang kha bltas te/ /sngags bzlas myur bar 'bros par 'gyur/ /khyim du rtag tu 'thab 'bros pas/ /oM nI lA m+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM

hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta che ge mo skrod cig dat+tA ya hUM phaT/ sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di yis ni/ /nges par gnas nas skrod par 'gyur/ /skrod pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor sbyor ka ni/ /gong du

bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /'khor lo bris nas cho ga bya/ /bzlas pa khri ni them nas ni/ /br-i ti ka ye shing la gdags/ /mi yi rje ngar bsgrub bya yi/ /dri chen dag gis thod pa dgang / /ming dang bskul ba'i sngags ldan pa/ /'bum tsho bzhi ni thon pa dang / /shing gi gong ma

dag la gdags/ /'khor zhing 'khrug cing myos par 'gyur/ /yang na skad cig tsam gyis 'gugs/ /oM nI lAm+bar d+ha ra ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta ye badzra pA Ni ye hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM che ge mo dzaH/ zhes bya ba yi sngags kyis na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa 'di rnams 'grub/ /

'gugs pa la sogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ka ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag ni/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis rgyas btab la/ /rnal 'byor bla dman don du ni/ /

yang nas yang du gsol btab pas/ /yid ches brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /man ngag rim pa bstan pa la/ /bla ma las ni gsan bar gyis/ /gsang sngags sgo ni dpag med nas/ /thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa/ /sems can las ni sna tshogs pas/ /so so'i mos pa

mi mthun phyir/ /dper na sman rnams nus pa yis/ /nad rnams so sor sel ba bzhin/ /man ngag thabs rnams so sos kyang / /dug gi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang / /phrad pa tsam gyis nad 'joms pa'o/ /yang na gnyis

'joms gsum 'joms dang / /bzhi 'joms lnga 'joms la sogs dang / /mang po 'dus nas 'joms pa dang / /de dag kun gyis ma choms pa/ /sbyor ba gzhan sogs 'joms pa dang / /gzhan po kho nas 'joms pa dang / /sman dang sbyor ba de dag kyang / /mkhas

pa yis ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /mi mkhas pa yis gnod par 'gyur/ /sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni/ /brtson 'grus nan tan ma byas na/ /dug rnams 'joms par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin mthun pa'i dpe rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan nas/ /

zhib pas 'di ru ma phye'o/ /bsgom pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs 'joms/ /bsgoms pa las byung dngos grub kyis// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin thob par ma gyur pas/ /tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod dngos grub bo/ /des ma byung na sbyin sreg

gis/ /dngos grub bsgrub par gsungs pa yin/ /des ma byung na bzlas brjod do/ /des ma byung na gtor ma'o/ /de rnams kun la ma byung na/ /las kyi phran tshegs gzhan yang bstan/ /yang na de dag thams cad kyang / /gcig 'dus gnyis 'dus gsum 'dus

dang / /bzhi 'dus lnga 'dus la sogs pas/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar gsungs pa yin/ /yang na mchog 'dod pa la ni/ /thams cad rdzogs par dgos par gsungs/ /thun mong dngos grub bsgrub pa la/ /che chung gi ni rim pas gsungs/ /sbyor ba re res kyang ni 'grub/ /gsang

sngags la la'i bzhed kyis ni/ /dper na sbrul ni smyu gur zhugs/ /rtsa bar 'gro dang rtse mor 'gro/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sngags pa yang / /rig 'dzin sa dang rdo rje dmyal/ /la la dag gi gzhung gis ni/ /bar ma do nas 'gro ba'o/ /la la skye ba phyi ma la/ /la la dag gi

bzhed kyis ni/ /gnyis pa gsum pa dag la'o/ /bzhi pa lnga par 'dod pa'ang yod/ /la la skye ba bdun pa la/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par bshad/ /de ltar gzhung lugs mi 'dra ba/ /mang du gsungs pa de dag kyang / /'gal ba med de kun ka bden/ /gsang sngags

kyi ni gzhung gis kyang / /skye ba bdun las mi 'da' bas/ /ma bsgoms kyang ni sangs rgyas sa/ /zhes su rgyud las gsungs pa yin/ /skye ba bdun zhes bya ba yang / /sngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sngags dang sman la sogs pa yi/ /stobs kyis lus sems las

rung ba'i/ /sha dang thod pa la sogs pa/ /bsten cing zos pas dngos grub thob/ /de bas sngags mthu'i yon tan no/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /skye ba bdun pa 'ong srid kyang / /de lta 'ong ba shin tu dkon/ /skye ba bdun pa zhes bya'i gnas/ phal cher dur khrod chen po yi/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas su skye/ /rig 'dzin sa zhes bya ba yang / /gcig ni de la bya ba yin/ /rig 'dzin sa la gsum yod de/ /dur khrod rig 'dzin sa dang ni/ /bar snang lha gnas sa rten dang / /mkha' spyod 'og min stug po'i sa/ /gnas ni de gsum yin par gsungs/ /

skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ /mi yul gnas ni khyad par can/ /sngags spyod pa yi gnas dag tu/ /'ga' tsam 'byung ba dag kyang yod/ /skye ba gcig pa la sogs gzhan/ /de rnams gnas kyang de bzhin no/ /skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ /dad dang snying rje la sogs

ldan/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i chos la spyad/ /mthun 'jug spyod pa kun la mkhas/ /bzo dang rig pa'i gnas la mkhas/ /lta ba ma nor gdeng du gyur/ /spyod pa la dor thabs la mkhas/ /man ngag thob pa tsam gyis ni/ /the tshom med par 'jug par byed/ /man ngag bsgoms

ma thag tu ni/ /ting 'dzin skyes 'gyur rang bzhin gyis/ /khams dang dus dang bye brag shes/ /rgyud lung mtshan gyi man ngag la/ /thos pa tsam gyis dbu zhabs kyi/ /man ngag rnams ni khong du chud/ /bshad pa'i rgyud dang 'grel pa dang / /mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa

rnams/ /ma thob pa ru shes par 'gyur/ /dper na shing mdzer bsal ba tsam/ /rgyud lung man ngag mdo mdo yi/ /mkhas pa la ni brten nas su/ /thams cad don rnams khong chud pas/ /skabs phyed shin tu spyi don rgyas/ /dka' 'grel mngon rtogs rim pa ni/ /rtsom nus don

la shin tu mkhas/ /mig ni yun rings mi 'dzums shing / /yi dam lha bsgom dus su ni/ /skye ba bdun pa'i grib ma snang / /skye ba gnyis la grib ma gnyis/ /gsum la gsum/ bzhi la bzhi/ /lnga la lnga/ /drug la sogs pa gzhan po la/ /grib ma'i rtags kyang de bzhin

no/ /bsgom pa'i stobs kyis khyad par ni/ /zhag bdun zla gcig zla bdun du/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni lung ston cing / /chos bshad rtags rnams ston par mdzad/ /chos ston pa yi mdzad spyod kyang / /dngos su sprul nas ston pa dang / /yang sprul sum sprul la sogs su/ /

sprul nas ston dang yang na ni/ /sku ni mi snang sgra yis su/ /nam mkha' las su ston pa dang / /yang na phyag mtshan la sogs la/ /sgra byung nas ni ston pa dang / /yang na rmi lam mtshan mas su/ /dus bzhi dus gsum dus gcig tu/ /yang nas yang du ston pa'o/ /ma thos

pa yi man ngag rnams/ /ston par byed na skye bdun sogs/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin byang chub sems/ /yang na dang po skyes nas ni/ /theg chen chos la mos nas kyang / /man ngag bsgom la shin tu dga'/ /slob dpon la ni

man ngag gi/ /rna brgyud gcig tsam thos nas su/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gong bzhin byung nas su/ /gzhan la yang ni ston par nus/ /yang na skye bdun gang zag de/ /skyes ma thag tu yi dam lhas/ /rmi lam la ni chos bstan nas/ /man ngag de

bsgoms dngos grub ni/ /phra mo dag gis thob nas kyang / /gzhan la chos ni ston par nus/ /de nas rim gyis gzhan yang 'byung / /yang na skye bdun gang zag de/ /rkyen ni gnyis po 'dzom pa las/ /bsgom pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis su/ /

'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par/ /thun gcig la ni bsgom pa rnyed/ /de nas rim gyis bsgoms pas su/ /zhag bdun nas ni lung ston 'byung / /de nas rim gsum gong ma bzhin/ /de nas mngon shes drug ldan nas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pa'i

rnal 'byor thams cad kun/ /skye ba 'di la phyag rgya thob/ /de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /god ma bzhin du skye bdun du/ /len pa'i rtags ni gong bzhin 'byung / /skye ba 'di thob tshul rnams kyang / /theg chen snod du rung ba las/ /dbang bskur man ngag thob pa yis/ /dam tshig

ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /bskyed rim brtan par 'gyur ba yis/ /lus kyi rnam rtog bzlog nas kyang / /rdo rje bzlas la brtan par bya/ /rdo rje bzlas la brtan nas kyang / /dag gi rnam rtog bzlog nas ni/ /sems dben pa ni brtan par bya/ /sems kyi 'khrul rtog

bzlog nas kyang / /sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /'od gsal la ni 'jug par bya/ /de nas spros med man ngag las/ /lhun gyis grub 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchog /yang na bskyed rim la brten nas/ /tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin sgrub/ /tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin

gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya/ /nges su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis/ /rdzogs rim man ngag gang bsgoms kyang / /zla ba drug gis phyag rgya 'thob/ /rdzogs rim bskyed pa la brten nas/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa yis/ /

phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par gsungs/ /de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung / /spyir na lta ba gdeng gyur gtso/ /lan cig bzlog pa'i tshul du ni/ /byas na the tshom mi skye zhing / /ldog par mi 'gyur 'byung pos kyang / /tshugs par mi 'gyur 'bras bu 'byung / /de lta ma gyur rnal

'byor pas/ /man ngag nyams su lon par bya/ /man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis su/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston pas/ /lung ston pa yi dus su ni/ /lta ba man ngag zab mo ni/ /bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob/ /yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni/ /blo yi rab

'bring khyad par ni/ /bag chags rkyen la sogs pa yis/ /rab 'bring dgu dang gsum dang ni/ /dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /skye ba 'di la lung ston pas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rkyen ni rab tu ma gyur pa/ /rab kyi

'bring sogs ldan pas ni/ /bar ma do la lung ston 'gyur/ /rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni/ /skye ba phyi ma lung ston no/ /'bring gi gsum po rigs ldan yang / /gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi ru sbyar/ /tha ma'i rigs ldan gsum po yang / /lnga dang drug dang bdun du sbyar/ /yang na

rkyen sogs ldan 'gyur yang / /rgyu la sogs pa'i nus pa rnams/ /drag zhan gyi ni nus pa yis/ /rkyen gyi tshul bzhin sbyor shes bya'o/ /rgyu rkyen gnyi ga 'bring sogs kyi/ /rim pa ni ldan pa rnams/ /gong ma gnyis dang mi mthun pas/ /gsum dang bdun du sbyor shes

bya'o/ /gnyis ka gzhan par gyur pa ni/ /gsang sngags snod du mi rung bas/ /dbang bskur mi bya 'jug pa tsam/ /dge ba'i sa bon chung 'gyur yang / /smon lam btab pa'i dad ldan te/ /gsang sngags las ni mos 'gyur nas/ /yang dang yang du gsol 'debs la/ /

phyi yi dbang bskur tsam byas la/ /mi zab dbyings kyi man ngag bstan/ /de la bstan pa'i gang zag la/ /lhag pa rnams ni rim gyis bstan/ /yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni/ /yi dam lha sogs so so ru/ /so sor bag chags bzhag pa dang / /mos pa la

sogs rim pa yis/ /the tshom la sogs med mod kyi/ /dngos grub 'grub par ma gyur na/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyis/ /tha mi dad par bsgoms nas kyang / /man ngag yang yang sbos kyang ni/ /'gal pa med de dngos grub 'grub/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /sgrib pa

shin tu che gsungs pas/ /sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor bzlas brjod dang / /gtor ma la sogs cho ga yis/ /bdun nas stong gi bar du ni/ /mkhas pas ci nus rgyud brtags la/ /cho gas sdig pa byang bar gsungs/ /dper na/ /lus kun la ni gnod pa yi/ /tsher ma'i phung

pos lam rnams 'gags/ /me yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /bsregs pas thams cad med par byed/ /de nas lam ni bskyed nas ni/ /gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin sngags sogs mthu rnams kyis/ /sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin

gyi lam bskyed nas/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub khyad par ma thob na/ /phra mo la sogs thob par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i lung ston phra mo 'byung / /gal te de ltar ma gyur par/ /tshe dbang ma thob rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas/ /skye

ba phyi ma la sogs su/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /sdig sgrib rtsad nas ma chod kyang / /che long rags pa mgo bcom nas/ /gzhan dag mi spyod mgo gnon cing / /dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /smon lam dge ba

bsngo legs pas/ /skye ba 'di brjes gzhan dag tu/ /dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang / /rigs dang phyag rgya'i man ngag sogs/ /skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ru dam tshig ldan sogs pas/ /rim gyis skye bdun brgyud nas su/ /'bad rtsol drag po ma byas

bar/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'gro bar gsungs/ /de sogs lud bstan sbyor ba rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston du/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas shes par bya'o/ /'dir ni blo dman don ched du/ /cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan

yang / /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de/ /sa gnas rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang / /bde gshegs byin brlabs mkha' 'gro'o/ /mkha' 'gro de dag gnyis ka yang / /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i/ /gzugs dang

sna tshogs sprul nas ston/ /de la 'jigs dang mi 'jigs dang / /ro dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te/ /phyag rgya brda la sogs pa yi/ /ston pa'i dus su lan rnams ni/ /ston par shes par ma nus na/ /dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan cher bskyed

de/ /man ngag thos pa che ba gces/ /thos pa che bar ma gyur kyang / /gang bsgrub rgyud skor la sogs la/ /slob dpon la ni yang nas yang / /the tshom chod par mnyan par bya/ /rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas/ /bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen bcu bdun po/ /shes par de ni ma byas na/ /

dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon bla ma la brten pas/ /ma tshang yang ni 'grub par gsungs/ /'jig rten pa la gnyis yod de/ /rgyal bas bka' la btags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang / /bdud ni nag po la sogs pa/ /dam la ma thogs

bar chod mkhan/ /de ltar gnyis su ma shes na/ /dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'chor/ /de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs kyang / /gong ma bzhin du ston pas na/ /de yi rim pa'ang gong bzhin bya/ /de yang brtag pa'i cho ga yang / /zhag gsum zhag bdun rtsa gcig tu/ /

re dogs la sogs thams cad kun/ /spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la/ /nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya/ /tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang / /byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu/ /byed cing phyag rgya sogs ston pas/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang / /mtshan ma la sogs

gsal 'bar zhing / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs/ /thams cad brten zhing mi 'gyur ba/ /lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya'o/ /de las bzlog pa thams cad kun/ /bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na/ /'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus/ /bsgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams/ /sgrub pa nyams su len pa la/ /bstan cing spel na bsod nams 'phel/ /nyams su mi len ser sna can/ /rdzas dang lus srog la sogs pa/ /bla ma la ni

'bul mi nus/ /de la man ngag bstan mi bya/ /de la man ngag bstan pa na/ /dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel/ /dam tshig nyams te mkha' 'gros gsod/ /cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po/ /ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la/ /rna ba brgyud

pa'i man ngag de/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan/ /des ni ro langs ma la bstan/ /gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang / /slob dpon phyag na rdo rje la/ /brgyud pa'i man ngag rim pa rnams/ /nan tan gyis ni btsa' bar bya/ /de la btsa' ba ma shes na/ /dper na yid bzhin nor bu

ni/ /klu rgyal gtsug nas rnyed nas ni/ /'dam rdzab nang du stor ba bzhin/ /de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di/ /lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi/ /sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas/ /dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na/ /dngos grub mi thob nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas

nan tan bskyed de btsa'/ /lung bstan pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sems can rtsod ldan gyi/ /dus su rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung bas/ /yo byad rdzas chud sgrub pa pos/ /

nyams pa 'phel du mi gzhug phyir/ /maN+Dal cho gas bskang ba ni/ /dang po rnal 'byor 'gyod sems kyis/ /shin tu gus pas maN+Dal bca'/ /maN+Dal bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa/ /sa gzhi shin tu mnyen pa la/ /skyon spangs yon tan ldan pa yi/ /maN+Dal lnga ni bca' bya ste/ /

dang po maN+Dal dkar po bca'/ /gnyis pa sngon po dag tu bya/ /gsum pa mthing ga dag tu bya/ /bzhi pa ser po dag tu bya/ /lnga pa dmar po dag tu bya/ /dkar rtsi dang ni ba bla dang / /yang na rtswa sngon me tog gis/ /gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa ni/ /mtshal la sogs pa'i rigs

dang ni/ /gur gum la sogs rigs dag dang / /sbyar ba'i nag po'i rigs dag gis/ /kha dog bsgyur bar bstan pa yin/ /yang na thams cad dkar dang sngo/ /de gnyis gcig gis bya ba yin/ /bsdus rgyas mkhas pas shes par bya/ /ba yi rnam pa lnga dang ni/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dag ni/ /dngos grub can
