gyi snod du gzhag /rin chen bum pa la sogs kyi/ /skyon spangs yon tan ldan pa yi/ /snod du thun mong khyad par rdzas/ /tsan+dan med du mi rung ngo / /kha rgyan 'bras bu can gyis bya/ /dang por bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas/ /tha mal 'du shes spangs nas ni/ /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /

dang po bum pa byin gyis brlabs/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gdab/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun du gdab/ /gong gi bkra shis snod kyi rdzas/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas btab nas kyang / /dang po bum pa'i chus su bsang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil

pa'i sngags kyang bzlas/ /thugs ka'i a las zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po nyid du bsam/ /oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hUM/ /bdun dang lnga dang gsum du bzlas/ /tsan+dan las kyi bum pas bsang / /yi ge du 'phros tsan+dan phog /de las 'phros pas maN+Dal gang / /oM d+hUM pa s+pha

ra Na hUM/ zhes pas lan bdun bzlas so/ /me tog lnga dang gnyis gcig la/ /kha dog mtshan nyid shes byas la/ /yi ge paM las pad+ma ni/ /stong ldan brgyad ldan dag tu ni/ /gyur par bsams nas sngags bzlas dgram/ /oM baM pad+ma maN+Dal hUM/ zhes gong ma bzhin du

brjod par bya'o/ /de steng b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / /lnga dang gnyis dang gcig tu bya/ /de nas thams cad kun la yang / /gsum du bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod/ /zla ba pad+ma gzhal yas khang / /gsum dang gnyis dang gcig tu yang / /rnal 'byor bsdus dang rgyas pa ni/ /

nyams pa che chung go rims so/ /de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid dang / /dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor kun/ /khrus byas gos ni bzang po gon/ /rgyan cha la sogs mdzes par byas/ /shar ram nub tu kha bltas te/ /so so lha yi ting 'dzin bskyed/ /rdo rje

dril bu byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje dril bus bskul nas kyang / /tshigs bcad dag gis gsol ba btab/ /sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' la gdags/ /thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /yi ge bzhi 'phros lha mor gyur/ /bla ma yi dam lha dang ni/ /gsang sngags bdag

po dkyil 'khor lha/ /dkon mchog gsum sogs spyan drangs nas/ /bla ma sbyangs nas mi bskyod 'gyur/ /mchod yon mchod sogs rgyas par dbul/ /de yi sngon du phyag rnams bya/ /gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mchod nas bstod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas

sngags bzlas 'od zer gyis/ /lha rnams la ni phog nas su/ /'od zer bskul nas tshur la 'dus/ /nyams pa'i lus la phog nas su/ /ba spu'i khung zhugs sdig pa bsdus/ /snying gar yi ge kaM ngam ni/ /'od nag tu ni gyur par bsam/ /srog go 'dus kyi sna nas byung / /

lha dang bdag gi bar du ni/ /pad+ma nag po'i gdan bsams la/ /sdig pa'i gzugs de de ru bzhag /de nas yi dam lha yi sngags/ /bzlas pa'i 'od zer 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /sdig pa rnams ni sbyang bar bya/ /yang na sdig pa de nyid sbyangs nas kyang / /lus kyi lhag ma

sbyang ba'am/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa yis/ /man ngag bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang / /snga ma bzhin du sbyang bar bya/ /yang na yi ge brgya pa gcig pus bya/ /yi ge brgya pa 'bum dang ni/ /rang gi snying po 'bum gyis ni/ /rtsa ba nyams pa chen po skongs/ /sum cha phri bas gnyis

pa skongs/ /phyed phri bas ni gsum pa skongs/ /sum gnyis phri bas bzhi pa skongs/ /sum cha'i sum cha phri bas ni/ /lnga pa skongs te drug pa ni/ /sum gnyis phri bas skongs pa'o/ /de yi phyed phyed phri bas ni/ /tha ma gsum gyis go rims sbyor/ /yan lag brgyad dang brgya

phyed dang / /nyi shu rtsa gcig dag gis so/ /che chung rim pa dag gis ni/ /tha ma me'am chu yi ni/ /sbyin sreg dag gis sbyin par bya/ /gsang sngags bdag gam bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /rta mgrin bum pa gong bzhin bcas/ /byin brlabs la sogs byas nas ni/ /tha ma dag par

bkru ba'o/ /sbyin sreg khrus dang ldan pa'am/ /yang na maN+Dal bzlas pa yi/ /cho ga gcig pus byar yang rung / /dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba yi/ /sbyor ka 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskang pa'i sbyor ka ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang gi rim pa bstan pa ni/ /bum pa gsang ba ye shes dang / /bzhi par bstan pa de rnams la/ /gnas ni yid 'ong la sogs su/ /dus la sogs pa 'joms pa dang / /slob dpon slob ma mtshan nyid ldan/ /sngon gyi gling gzhi rjes mthun

par/ /dkyil 'khor byas nas slob ma gzhug /dbang bskur rim pa ma nor bar/ /rnam grangs rnams ni shes par bya/ /bskur thabs man ngag shes byas la/ /bskur ba'i gnas kyang ma nor brtag /de ltar byas pas sgrib pa 'byang / /sa yang rim gyis non par 'gyur/ /

de phyir man ngag bstan par bya/ /rtags la sogs pa'ang shes par bya/ /brda mi shes na sngags pa min/ /las dang po yis rdzas la brten/ /dgos pa shes na the tshom med/ /nus pa mthu dang ldan pas ni/ /'bras bu khyad par thob par 'gyur/ /de dag spyi dang khyad par ni/ /cho

ga man ngag rgyas pa rnams/ /rgyun 'grel kun na gsal bas na/ /'di ru bdag gis mdo tsam bsdus/ /bum pa'i dbang ni rnam bzhi ste/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /mthar thug pa ru shes par bya/ /phyi ni phyi rgyud dag dang mthun/ /nang ni nang rgyud dag dang mthun/ /yang

na gnyis ka phyi ru bstan/ /nang gi slob dpon lus la gzhag /gsang ba yul ni nyid la sbyar/ /mthar thug slob ma mgo bo ru/ /dga' ba bskyed pa'am rdo rje'i rtsa/ /de rnams man ngag rgyas bshad pa/ /las kyi phreng bar shes par bya/ /gsang ba dbang la bzhi ru bstan/ /phyi ni

bdud rtsi byin brlabs sbyin/ /yang na mtshan ldan phab nas ni/ /srin mtheb dag gis sbyin par bya/ /nang gi gsang ba pho brang nas/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung nas sbyin/ /gsang ba yum gyi mkha' nas blangs/ /mthar thug gsang ba'i pho brang du/ /mchog dga'

skyes par shes par bya/ /shes rab ye shes la yang bzhi/ /phyi ni las kyi phyag rgya ma/ /nang ni 'od kyi rig ma yin/ /gsang ba bya gdong ma la bya/ /mthar thug dregs 'dzin gtum mo yin/ /mthar thug la ni gnyis su bstan/ /rten bcas dang ni rten med do/ /rten med la yang

gnyis su bstan/ /spros bcas dang ni spros med do/ /dbang gi man ngag rgyas bshad pa/ /slob dpon zhal gyi man ngag dang / /las kyi phreng bar shes par bya/ /brda yi cho ga mdo tsam bstan/ /ka la sha a b+he She ka zhes pa ni/ /bum pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda/ /lag pa'i sor mo bkang nas

ni/ /rtse mo bsdus pa'i bum pa'i tshul/ /gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa/ gsang ba'i ngag brda lus kyi brda/ /sdom pos khro mo gnon pa ni/ /lag brda 'dri na shes par bya/ /pradz+nyA dz+nyA na gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa ni/ /shes rab ye shes ngag gi brda/ /lus kyi brda ni lha sbyin brda/ /yang na khyad

par dga' ba mtshon/ /pra dz+nyA dz+nyA gu h+ya a b+hi She ka zhes pa/ /bzhi pa'i ngag brda lus kyi brda/ /lhan cig dga' ba skyes sa ru/ /mthe bo bcug nas mtshon par bya'o/ /de ltar brda rnams ma shes na/ /mkha' 'gro dngos grub ster ba na/ /brda rnams dris nas ster bar byed/ /brda

rnams dri shes slar la 'chor/ /yang na brda rnams gzhan po yang / /ma shes na ni mkha' 'gros gsod/ /brda la sogs pa ma shes na/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i dus dang ni/ /'byung po nyams gsod gsol ba dang / /mu stegs shan 'dres 'byung ba dang / /phyag dang phyag gi

lan dus su/ /brda mi shes na sngags pa min/ /dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang / /chags lam grol lam gnyis shes bya'o/ /dbang bskur med na 'bras bu med/ /de bas dbang bskur nan tan bya/ /dbang gi sbyor ka ste sum cu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dam tshig rnams ni cung zhig bstan/ /dang po spyod pa'i dam tshig ni/ /chags lam spyod lam grol lam spyod/ /de ltar gnyis ka spyod pa la/ /dang po mchog dang rab mchog go/ /de la yang ni phyi nang ngo / /dang po phyi yi spyod dus su/ /yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs

kyis/ /zhi bas 'dul dang drag pos 'dul/ /mthun 'jug spyod pa mkhas shing zab/ /zas dang gos sogs thams cad kyang / /rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la/ /phan sems spyod pas 'jug bya'o/ /phan sems med pa nyon mongs can/ /bdag gzhan lha dang snying rje spangs/ /

'gro don mchod pa spangs pas na/ /dam tshig nyams te ngan 'gror ltung / /nang spyod du ni bstan pa ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa la/ /chags pa'i lam pas 'jug par bya/ /grol ba'i lam pas byin gyis brlabs/ /de ltar byin brlabs bdud rtsi ba lta/ /thams cad lha bsgoms

mchod byas na/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khyi phag spyod pa bzhin byas na/ /dam tshig nyams te yi dags sa/ /chang ni bdud rtsi chen po ste/ /btung bar bya ba kho na yin/ /zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ste/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod mchog tu/ /rul sogs

skyon rnams spangs pa yi/ /bdud rtsi ro ldan snod bkang ste/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /a las ka pA la ni bskyed/ /zla ba dang ni de yis bskyed/ /has ni gzugs sogs rnam rtog sbyangs/ /hrIHsa ni ro sogs rnam rtog sbyangs/ /hoHsa ni bdud rtsi chen por

bzhu/ /mthe bong hUM las sa gzhi'i tshul/ /srin mtheb suM las ri rab tshul/ /bar nas maM 'phros bdud rtsi bkug /bdag gzhan lha ni mchod byas pas/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar ma byas glang chen bzhin/ /chags shing brkam sogs

myos 'thung na/ /skye ba lnga brgyar smyon par skye/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa yang / /yang na rigs lnga'i sbyor sogs bya/ /yang na mA ma kI yis sbyangs/ /yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil sogs bya/ /mtshan ldan snod dang chos 'byung dang / /zla ba la sogs bsams byas

pa/ /mchod par bya ba'am yang na bdun/ /spyi gtsug bla ma gzhag byas la/ /sku gsung thugs ni gnas gsum gzhag /de nas 'thor zhing mchod pa yis/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la a mr-i ta kuN+Da li

zhes pa'am/ /a mr-i ta khA hi zhes pa gang yang rung / /gsum gsum kun la dbul bar bya/ /de nas rang snying lha gsal la/ /ci ran gnod pa med tsam btung / /nad la gnod par gyur kyang ni/ /thigs pa gsum ni dam tshig go/ /grol bas kyang ni mchod pa yi/ /dus

su btung bar bya phyir ni/ /yul dus gnas skabs sbyar te btung / /btung ba la sogs gzhan po yang / /bdud rtsi ma byas 'thung byed pa/ /yi dags gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa'i dus su ni/ /phyag rgya ma ni bsten pa yang / /rnal 'byor chags pa'i lam

pas ni/ /rtags ldan mtshan nyid la sogs ldan/ /de ltar bsten pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /dbang bskur rnam gnyis dus dang ni/ /mchod pa'i dus dang ting 'dzin ni/ /ye shes skye ba bogs dbyung phyir/ /dam tshig tu ni bstan pa yin/ /yang na bskyed rim bstan pa dang / /

rlung rnams las su rung 'gyur na/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub myur 'dod phyir/ /phyag rgya la ni brten par bya/ /rnal 'byor grol ba'i lam pas ni/ /yid kyi lha mo gzugs mdzes ma/ /mchod pa'i dus su dam tshig go/ /de nas mkha' 'gro lung ston dus/ /dngos grub myur du

thob 'dod na/ /mkha' 'gro'i man ngag la brten no/ /de ltar go rims ma shes na/ /dam tshig nyams te srin bur skye/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa la/ /'khrul 'khor sbyor ba shes bzhin du/ /mi rtsom pa ni dam tshig nyams/ /mi shes gnod pa mi byed la/ /byed na

yang ni dam tshig nyams/ /de sogs sbyor ba gzhan po yang / /man ngag gis ni shes par bya/ /mchog gi spyod pa'i dus su ni/ /brtul zhugs smyon pa lkugs pa dang / /gcer bu la sogs dus skabs sbyar/ /de ltar ma shes dam tshig nyams/ /rab mchog gi ni

dus dag tu/ /don dam rang bzhin med pa'am/ /sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas/ /rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dus su ni/ /spyod pa la sogs byed pa ni/ /dam tshig nyams te bogs chung ngo / /mthun 'jug spyod pa 'gal ba med/ /lta ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /chos

rnams sems kyi 'khrul pa ste/ /sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med/ /chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/ /sems nyid de yang skye med phyir/ /yod med mtha' las 'das pa'o/ /bsam du med cing brjod du med/ /dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin no/ /lta spyod

kyi dam tshig gi sbyor ka ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab gnas cho ga bstan par bya/ /sku gzugs la sogs kun la ni/ /rab tu gnas pa ma byas na/ /mu stegs lha rten bcas dang 'dra'o/ /rigs dang na tshod med

pa'i mi/ /thams cad kun gyis bkur mi byed/ /de bzhin 'dir yang sku sogs la/ /phyag la sogs pa byas gyur kyang / /bsod nams chen po thob mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'dod na/ /rab gnas byas pas thob par 'gyur/ /de bas rab gnas bya ba

gces/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /so so rang rang bsnyen pa bya/ /de ltar mi 'grub rnal 'byor pas/ /shAkya thub bsnyen pa kun gyi ma/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bsnyen pa yis/ /gsang sngags thun mong bstan pa yin/ /bsnyen pa rnam

gsum rdzogs byas la/ /de nas sa chog la sogs pa/ /gzhan dang mthun par rgyas par bya/ /maN+Dal byi dor legs byas la/ /rgyan dang rol mo la sogs dgram/ /lha yi sta gon rdzogs byas la/ /de nas bum pa'i sta gon bya/ /maN+Dal me tog gcal bkram la/ /bdag nyid

lha ru bsgoms nas su/ /yungs kar nim pa lag gnyis kyis/ /blangs nas gsum gsum mer bstabs bya/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya/ sarba pA paM da ha na badzra swA hA/ chu snyim pa bkang ba lan gsum blugs la/ /bla mas zan chu bsre snod thogs/ /lan gsum

byabs te mer bcas rnams/ /phyi rol dag tu bskyal bar bya/ /nam mkha' lha bkang spos thogs nas/ /dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshigs bcad la sogs bsgrag par bya'o/ /de nas

maN+Dal steng du ni/ /sku gdung la sogs gzhag byas la/ /slob dpon nub tu gnas nas ni/ /oM hUM baM a zhes brjod pas/ /ba yi rnam lnga gang yin pa/ /de ni mar chu sbyar ba dang / /dri zhim tsan+dan chu nyid dang / /'dag chal shing shun chu gsum ni/ /byin brlabs dUr bas rim

bzhin bsku/ /u dum+WAr b+hang tra dang / /tsa ba le ke na dang ni/ /a shwad byang chub shing gang rnyed/ /zhib btags chu sbyar snod g.yas gzhag /de nas khrus rnams rim par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i cho ga yis/ /sku gzugs sta gon gnas par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor

bsgrub par bya/ /de rjes rab gnas brtsam par bya/ /sku rnams so so'i sa bon las/ /cho ga gsum sogs gang 'dod bskyed/ /ye shes lha yang so sor bstim/ /sku gdung brtan par bskyed cing bstim/ /glegs bam so so'i snying po la/ /yang na A li kA li'am/ /so so'i

dkyil 'khor dag kyang rung / /lha khang la sogs kun la yang / /so so'i dkyil 'khor gang 'dod bya/ /yang na yi ge b+h+'+rUM ni rten yin la/ /de la brten pa gang 'dod pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu dag la ni/ /hUM dang a yi sa bon las/ /d+harma a badzra hUM zhes/ /sngags kyis

bskyed pa byas nas ni/ /phyag mtshan lha ni gang 'dod bstim/ /phyag mtshan la sogs gzhan la yang / /phyag mtshan snying po lha gsum dang / /sgrub pa po yi las dang sbyar/ /phreng ba la yang de bzhin no/ /mtshan ldan yi ge a yin no/ /rgyan dang rgyan cha la sogs pa/ /

byin gyis brlab pa tsam ni bya/ /de dag thams cad kun la yang / /bskyed dad bstim pa byas nas ni/ /de nas byin rlabs dbang bskur bya/ /de nas mchod lnga dbul bar bya/ /de 'og lA s+ya la sogs brgyad/ /mchod pa nyi shu po yang bya/ /gos dang rgyal mtshan la

sogs pa/ /rin chen bkra shis sgra dang ni/ /rol mo la sogs cho ga rnams/ /rgyas par phul nas bstod pa bya/ /de nas bzlas brjod ci ran bya/ /spyan 'byed sngags la sogs pa ni/ /glog phreng rgyud du shes par bya/ /yang na phyag mtshan la sogs kyi/ /cho ga bsdus

par shes par bya/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga sogs/ /byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa tsam/ /de ltar rab gnas zin nas ni/ /bla ma mkhas pa de la ni/ /ci bdog yon rnams dbul bar bya/ /des ni bsod nams chen po thob/ /ji ltar phongs par 'gyur yang ni/ /

mchod pa'i yo byad rnams ni dbul/ /ser sna can ni dbul mi nus/ /des ni sdig 'phel bsod nams med/ /rab gnas bzang po zin nas ni/ /rab gnas bzang por gshegs su gsol/ /rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ka ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'chi ba bslu ba'i man ngag ni/ /'chi rtags rnam par bstan pa dang / /'chi bslu cho ga rgyas pa rnams/ /'chi bslu chen por shes par bya/ /'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du ni/ /gos sngon 'chi ba bslu ba mchog /man ngag cung zhig bkol

nas bstan/ /spyir ni 'chi ba bslu ba la/ /dge ba'i phyogs ni mtha' yas mchog /gang byas kyang ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /gos sngon 'chi bslu'i rim pa yang / /nad pa sems ni dag pa yis/ /gos sngon rna brgyud man ngag can/ /mkhas pa de ni spyan drangs la/ /

gnas khang dgon par maN+Dal bya/ /maN+Dal byas pa'i 'og tu ni/ /rgyan rnams ma lus dgram par bya/ /nad pa la ni chos bshad la/ /dang po sems ni dag par bya/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyis ni/ /nor rnams ma lus thams cad dang / /rang lus srog dang bcas pa dbul/ /

de ltar 'bul ba de la ni/ /dang po dbang bskur rdzogs pa la/ /de nas man ngag gzhan sogs bya/ /de ltar byas 'og sos gyur la/ /rang 'tsho rdzas tsam slar la sbyin/ /nor rdzas srog rnams dbul mi nus/ /ser sna can ni bzlog par dka'/ /de ltar ser sna can de la/ /dbang

bskur mi bya gzhan po bya/ /cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ /rgyas par byed na bskyed rim rdzogs par bya/ /yang na bsdus dang shin tu bsdus/ /de ltar byas 'og nad pas ni/ /khrus kyi rim pa rdzogs byas la/ /gos bzang byin brlabs bskon nas ni/ /

shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas nas/ /mdun du maN+Dal lnga byas te/ /dang po phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /nad pa de ni mi nus na/ /mchod g.yog dag gis byed du gzhug /de nas skyabs gsol tshigs bcad brjod/ /bcom

ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /sku mchog stobs ldan khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gsung mchog sgra mchog 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs mchog ye shes ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mchog stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas lus 'bul zhes ni sbyar/ /bdag la gnod pa'i

nad rnams kun/ /khyod kyi mthu yis sbyang du gsol/ /'byung po'i gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /zor dang dug rnams thams cad kyang / /mthu stobs bdag pos bzlog tu gsol/ /bcom ldan khro chen rnam par rgyal/ /sku gsung thugs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal

ldan mgon po nag po che/ /lus ngan rgyal po mthu bo che/ /khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po/ /ro langs ma ni mthu mo che/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /'jigs byed ma ni mthu mo che/ /rdo rje lha mo 'od skyed ma/ /rdo rje lha mo yid 'phrog

ma/ /rdo rje lha mo kun bzang ma/ /rdo rje lha mo klu sgra can/ /khro mo chen mo srog gcod ma/ /khro mo chen mo dbugs rngub ma/ /khro mo chen mo khrag 'thung ma/ /khro mo chen mo sha za ma/ /sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug /

de bzlas pas ni bzlog par bya'o/ /dang po sku yi bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /lus kyi nad rnams sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas thugs dang gsung gis spyad/ /thal chen rak+ta byang chub sems/ /sbyang sogs byin brlabs byas nas ni/ /gnas gsum dag tu mtshan cing byug /

de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad bton nas ni/ /nad rnams sdig sgrib bkru bar bya/ /de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sngags/ /bzlas pas bde gshegs 'od zer bstim/ /de nas nad pa'i steng phyogs su/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bzhugs

bsams la/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes bdud rtsi snying gar gzung / /de rnams byas pas 'chi ba bzlog /'chi bzlog chen po bya ba ni/ /sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor dbang bskur bya/ /gtor chen la sogs gzhan yang bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas 'chi ba bzlog /

rang dang gzhan ni gnyis ka la/ /man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa na/ /rlung dang thig le yi ge dang / /gtum mo 'khor lo la sogs ni/ /'chi bslu cho ga dag dang ni/ /bla ma'i man ngag brgyud pas bya'o/ /'chi ba bslu ba'i sbyor ka ste sum cu gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stang stabs rim pa cung zhig bstan/ /shar phyogs g.yas brkyang la gnas nas/ /rkang pa dang ni lag pa yis/ /rdo rje rtse gsum stang stabs bya/ /gar bsgyur de ni thabs re bya/ /rkang lag mthun par bsgyur ba bzlog /lho ru g.yon

brkyang la gnas nas/ /ral gri'am dbyug to 'dzin pas su/ /rkang pa lag pa gnyis kas su/ /sa dang bar snang gnyis ka la/ /rin chen 'bar ma bre bar bya/ /nub phyogs g.yas brkyang la gnas nas/ /'khor lo'am ral gri de bzhin bre/ /byang phyogs g.yon brkyang la

gnas nas/ /rdo rje rgya gram tshul du bre/ /yang na zlum po la sogs rim/ /bsrung ba'i tshul du bya ba dang / /phyogs bzhir 'byung po bkug nas ni/ /mnan cing bsnun pa'i tshul du bya/ /gzhan yang stang stabs rgyas pa ni/ /snyoms 'jug la sogs rgyud na gsal/ /mkhas pas de ru

shes par bya/ /'dir ni bsgrub pa'i don du bsdus/ /stang stabs sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /bgegs bskrad don du nan tan bya'o/ /stang stabs kyi sbyor ka ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// //ston pa phyag na rdo rje nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni yan chad du/ /brgyud pa'i rim pa'i man ngag 'di/ /

snying po la sogs sgrub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i slob ma/ rin chen bkra/ /de rtsar hUM gi rnal 'byor dang / /brtul chen po ni rnal 'byor la/ /lo gsum bar du snod brtags nas/ /bde ldan rin chen yang gter du/ /btsa' dka' dam bzhag byas nas gtad/ /

rin chen rdzas dang srog lus kyis/ /bla ma mnyes pas man ngag thob/ /de bzhin phyi rabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /phyi rabs blo dman la sogs shing / /ser sna la sogs g.yo sgyu can/ /sgom sgrub la sogs mi nus la/ /man ngag bstan na dam

tshig nyams/ /de bas phyi rabs rnal 'byor pas/ /snod ldan brtags la sbyin par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/ /rin chen phreng ba sbyor ka 'di/ /bdag gis snod ldan don brtsams pas/ /'di brtsams pa yi dge ba yis/ /bdag dang sems can thams

cad kyang / /bla med byang chub thob par shog /sbyor ka chen po'i man ngag slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur ro/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra ba liM ta bid+hiH/ bod skad du/ phyag

na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /bdag gis gtor ma bshad par bya/ /phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa/ /phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo / /gsang

ba bla med mchog tu 'dod/ /phyi nang thun mong shes par bya/ /rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus/ /tshar gcad pa yang shes par bya/ /dgug dang bskrad dang gsad pa dang / /mnan dang bsreg par shes par bya/ /rgyun nam dus chen bzhi gsum gnyis/ /chung ngu rgyun

nam chen po ni/ /bcu gnyis bzhi'am tha ma gcig /rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga/ /'bru dang shing thog sman rnams dang / /chan thug khur ba la sogs pa'i/ /rdzas rnams thams cad tshogs par bsags/ /de steng dkar gsum klu la shis/ /khrag sna snying sna sha sna

gsum/ /de sogs thun rdzas tshar gcod do/ /bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang / /bla ma nas bzung bsrung byas la/ /cho ga gsum du bskyed pa'am/ /chung ngu skad cig lhar bskyed la/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i pad+ma ru/ /rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang nas ni/ /steng du rdo rje sngon po

bsam/ /khong seng can la hUM gis mtshan/ /mtho gang la ni ri bong can/ /de la bcu drug bdun pas mtshan/ /rdo rje mtshan ldan bar du ni/ /sdud sbyong 'phro ba'i mthing dmar dkar/ /pad 'og ye shes lnga ldan gsum/ /gru gsum 'og na zla gam can/ /thugs kyi mthing gnag

'phros pa las/ /rdo rje lte bskul mtha' gnyis bskyod/ /dmar po 'bar bas mtshan ldan dros/ /thugs kyis bsdus shing gsung gis sbyangs/ /sku las 'phros pas ri bong bskul/ /shes rab can las 'od zer 'phros/ /de yis yab yum bskul nas ni/ /kha dog

dkar pos bdud rtsi phob/ /dang po skul byed 'og tu zhu/ /khong seng can nas pad+mar babs/ /babs pa'i rting la de nyid lhung / /lan gsum bskor nas 'o ma bzhin/ /lnga pa'i dang po lnga pas mtshan/ /de yis gdan bskyed 'khor bcas dgug /dzi hUM rdo rje khong seng can/ /

bdud rtsi gsol bas mnyes par bsam/ /yang na lha mo dkar mo yis/ /mtshan ldan gyis ni bkad nas mchod/ /bstod nas bshags shing las bcol lo/ /de yang rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus/ /de ltar byas nas gshegs su gsol/ /yang na skad cig

lhar bskyed la/ /thugs ka'i hUM gis bdud rtsi sbyangs/ /slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi phab/ /yud tsam sprul pas lha yis gsol/ /yud tsam mos pas gsum ka gsol/ /shin tu bsdus pas zas de bzhin/ /phan gdags pa'i sbyor ka ste dang po'o// //dgug pa'i

gtor ma'i cho ga ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /thun mong gtor ma dang mthun no/ /khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon la/ /nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa'am/ /

cho ga rnam lngas lhar bskyed pa/ /gang yang rung byas byin gyis brlab/ /gtor ma'i rdzas ni thun mong rdzas steng du/ /khyad par rdzas ni rak+ta sna tshogs dang / /gshog pa can gyi sha sna sna chogs shis/ /byin gyis brlabs la bde gshegs mchod/ /gnyis pa mkha' 'gro ma

la mchod/ /gsum pa chos skyong rnams la mchod/ /bzhi pas 'byung po thams cad tshim par bya/ /yang na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis su mchod par bya'o/ /sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags la ba liM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi zhes lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI/ /badzra DA ki nI/ rat+na DA ki nI/ pad+ma DA ki nI/ bi shwa DA ki nI/ /sa ma ya DA ki nI/ /sarba DA ki nI/ i di ba liM ta kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal mgon po nag po ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso bo yin pas/ /

rtsa ba'i sngags la btags te dbul/ /'jig rten pa'i mgon po nag po ni phyogs skyong gi gtso bo yin pas sngags kyang gong bzhin shes par bya/ phyogs skyong gi sngags ni/ in+d+ra zhes bya ba las kyi tshogs dang mthun/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags

ni oM a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pas bya'o/ /de nas bstod pa bya zhing phrin las bcol/ /'od zer 'phros pas thal mo brdab/ /des su thams cad bskul nas ni/ /gang la bya ba dgug par bsam/ /de 'dra lan grangs brgya nas stong / /khri nas 'bum gyis

khugs par 'gyur/ /'gugs pa'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// //bskrad pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun/ /khyad par gtor ma phal cher yang / /bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor ka ste/ /man ngag khyad

par bstan pa ni/ /shing lo'am gro ga dag la ni/ /rlung dang bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la/ /'od zer rlung gis bskyod pa dang / /khro bo dag gis bskyod pa dang / /rlung lha dag gis bskyod nas ni/ /nam mkha' mtha' gtugs bskyal bar bya/ /bskrad pa'i gtor

ma'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// //mnan pa'ang gong ma bzhin te mthun/ /khyad par ri rab 'bum dang ni/ /rdo rje dang ni khro bo yang / /'bum du byas te 'od zer sogs/ /sbyor ba gzhan dang man ngag bzhin/ /mnan pa'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// //gsad pa khro bos gsad

pa dang / /mtshon cha'i char sogs dbab pas gsad/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas sogs gzhan/ /mkhas pas man ngag sbyar bar bya'o/ /gsad pa'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o// //bsreg pa sku gsung thugs kyis bsreg /yang na me la sogs pa yi/ /sbyor ba gzhan du shes

par bya'o/ /bsreg pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// //bcing ba yi ni sbyor ba yang / /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lu gu rgyud dang zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bcing bar bya/ /bcing ba'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o// //klu dang rgyal po gnyis las

ni/ /khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni/ /dngul dang 'khar ba shing phor dang / /sa dkar snod du bya bar shis/ /sman sna 'bru sna snying po lnga/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum klu la shis/ /rin chen snod ni mdzes pa ru/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga/ /dar zab shing thog la sogs pa/ /rgyal po

nyid la shis par gsungs/ /de gnyis byin gyis brlab pa yang / /rdzas kyi steng du hrIH'am hUM/ /de yi 'od kyis rdzas rnams bsreg /skyen dag nas ni bdud rtsir bsam/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /mchog sbyin byas pa'i lag mthil du/ /briM las dpag bsam shing

lo bsam/ /de yi yal ga'i gseb tu ni/ /si las bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsam/ /de yis bdud rtsi yi ni rgyun/ /lag mthil du ni babs nas kyang / /gtor ma'i nang du 'dres par bsam/ /de nas oM AHhUM lan gsum bzlas/ /de nas rang gi mdun du pad+ma bzhi bsam/

de nas rang gi snying ga'i hUM gi 'od kyis/ klu thams cad ni pad+mar bkug /'od zer 'phros pas sbyong sogs bya/ /thams cad 'od du zhu ba las/ /bde gshegs sku yi sprul pa'am/ /gsung gi rigs kyi lta ru gyur/ /spyan drangs bstim zhing dbang bskur bya/ /de nas lce rdo rje

rtse lnga sbu gu can du bsams la/ des drangs la gsol bar bsam/ bstabs pa'i sngags ni/ oM ba su ki ba liM ta khA hi zhes klu rnams kyi so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la btags la dbul bar bya'o/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni badzra muHzhes btags

la gshegs su gsol/ /rgyal po yang sprul pa dang las kyi rigs su bsam/ phyi ma mthun te man ngag tu shes par bya'o/ /klu dang rgyal po'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o// //de dag thams cad phyi yin no/ /nang gi snying ga'i lha rnams la/ /gtor ma zas rnams yin pas na/ /

bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /lha la ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul/ /de ni rnal 'byor lam pa yin/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i man ngag bzhin/ /nang gi gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o// //gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni/ /lte ba pad+ma gtor ma'i snod/ /de steng zla ba'i steng du

ni/ /byang chub sems kyi kun+da la/ /bdud rtsi la sogs yon tan sogs/ /gtor ma'i rdzas su bstan pa yin/ /de 'og rlung sngon bskyod pa las/ /me 'bar bdud rtsi zhu ste phab/ /'khor lo mkha' 'gro rnams la mchod/ /rtog pa zhi ba las rnams 'grub/ /gsang ba'i gtor

ma'i sbyor ka ste bcu pa'o// //bla med gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la/ /thams cad rdzogs pa'i man ngag tshang / /bla na med pa'i man ngag gi sbyor ka ste bcu gcig pa'o// //gtor ma'i man ngag sbyor ka rnams/ /man ngag rim pa bkod pa yis/ /

bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra bi d+hiH bod skad du/

tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs chen khyad par bsags pa dang / /dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang / /sgrib sbyang mchog ni thob bya'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor lugs mthun bdag gis bshad/ /tshogs ni gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /

phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa'i/ /de yang 'khor lo bskor dang mchod pa brtsam/ /phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo / /dgug dang bskrad dang mnan pa dang / /gsad pa la sogs tshar gcad pa'o/ /de sgrub rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ /sngags pa gcig tu rtog byed dang / /

dus rnams kun du rtse gcig ldan/ /rgyud rnams kyi ni snying po shes/ /de nyid bcu ni mchog tu rig /zab cing rgya chen chos la mos/ /yid ni shin tu 'jam pa dang / /bsnyen bkur ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/ /nga rgyal med cing gshegs la brtson/ /brda dang phyag rgya'i

mchod pa yi/ /lan dang sbyor ba sogs la mkhas/ /gsang thub tshod rig lus ngag gzo/ /de la sogs pa'i cho ga mkhas/ /gu ru la sogs lha dang bstun/ /de steng las kyi rnal 'byor gnyis/ /byan po byan mo gsol ka gsum/ /phyi mtshams nang mtshams

rol mo pa/ /de ni rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i tshad/ /lha steng las kyi skar ma dang / /mtshan ma nyid ni bsdus pa'o/ /lnga pa yan chad shin tu bsdus/ /'khor lo bsdus rgyas mkhas pas bya/ /mchod pa bzhi gsum gnyis su bya/ /de yi rim pa'ang gong bzhin du/ /bsod

nams rim pa'ang de bzhin thob/ /'khor lo gral ni dkyil 'khor tshul/ /yang na mchog 'dod pa dang thun mong ni/ /grags ma grangs kyi rim pa yis/ /mchod pa'i tshul gyis rim pas bya/ /byin gyis brlabs sam rigs mthun par/ /nyams dga' yid 'jug gnas

dag tu/ /'khor khang sum rim dang po yi/ /sgo bzhi gnyis pa lho la gsum pa shar/ /de yi thun mong khyad par ni/ /dang po sa 'og phyi ma ste/ /rim gsum gyen du brtsigs pa ni/ /lus 'dod pa dang phyi ma'i lugs/ /phan 'dogs don du bstan pa'o/ /dur khrod mtsho gling

'jigs pa'i gnas/ /'di 'dra'i rigs mthun la sogs pas/ /tshar gcad don du gong bzhin bya/ /dus ni rgyun nam lo'am zlar/ /khyad par bzhi gsum gnyis dang gcig /bcu gnyis bzhi ru dam tshig go/ /de ltar ma byas mkha' 'gros gsod/ /byas na dngos

grub chen po 'thob/ /yon tan sbyor ba'i rim pa dang / /sgrub po 'dod pa'i rim pa yis/ /gong gi khyad par shes par bya/ /phyi ltar ba yi rnam lngas byug /nang ni bdud rtsi rnam lngas byug /phyi ni mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams bris/ /nang ni dur khrod chas kyis

brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri/ /ngag gi brda skad thabs gsum gyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams ni bsdu bar bya/ /dbyug sngon gyis ni lus ngag brda/ /bum pa nas bzung phyi nang gsang / /dril nas dbye gsal rim pas bya/ /slob dpon mdun du 'khon gcugs

sbyang / /las kyi sems dpa' gral la dgod/ /rgyan cha gan la go bgor gnas/ /slob dpon gyis ni byin brlabs shing / /las kyi sems mas rtags gsum gdab/ /rang gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal bya/ /gar mas maN+Dal mchod pa rnams/ /rim par byas nas gsol ba

gdab/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom/ /so so'i lha yi nga rgyal bya/ /de ltar mi shes lhag pa'i lha/ /de ltar byas nas gtso bo'i brdas/ /karma la ni bskul bar bya/ /karma 'khor ma dang bcas la/ /tshogs kyi bye brag brgya rtsa brgyad/ /'gying bag tshul gyis drang bar bya/ /

tshogs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni/ /rtsa ba lnga las rtsa lngar gyur/ /thun mong du ni brgya bya la/ /rnal 'byor zab mo'i spyod pa yin/ /sha yi bye brag nyi shu lnga/ /btung ba'i bye brag de bzhin no/ /sman gyi bye brag nyi shu dang / /bshos dang dkar gyi bye brag kyang / /phyed mar byas pa'i sum cu

yin/ /spos kyi bye brag brgyad du bstan/ /de nas bsdus pa phyed du bstan/ /shin tu bsdus pa de yi phyed/ /de ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa ni/ /bcu dang lnga dang gsum du bya/ /de yi rab 'bring sgrub pa'o/ /bsod nams che chung rim pa

de'o/ /tshogs de slob dpon byin gyis brlabs/ /rlung gis me sbar mtshan ldan dros/ /de nyid gsum gyi las byas la/ /bdud rtsi bab cing rdo rjes dkrugs/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'od du zhu/ /btung ba'i byin rlabs la sogs kyang / /man ngag bzhin du byin brlabs la/ /

bdud rtsi mchod pa phyogs bkram la/ /dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mdun du lha bskyed spyan drangs bstim/ /dang po phyag 'tshal mchod lnga 'bul/ /de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul/ /de 'og lcags kyu lnga po dang / /glu dang gar gyi mchod pa 'bul/ /hUM gi glu

blangs mchod pa ni/ /nyi shu yang ni bya bar gsungs/ /bstod cing rol mo'i mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas rnal 'byor rnams la mchod/ /lhag ma mkha' 'gro rnams la mchod/ /maN+Dal sngon po byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ /me tog sngon po'i tshom bu bya/ /

sa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /bskyed cing spyan drangs bstim byas la/ /byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa bya/ /lhag ma kha chus btab nas ni/ /sbyang dang spro ba bsdus byas la/ /'khor khang phyi logs maN+Dal bya/ /khrag gis byug cing me tog dgram/ /bshud glu brda

yis spyan drangs nas/ /rnal 'byor skra bshig thal bas byug /rgyan chas gon la rtags rnams gdab/ /lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas nas/ /rdo rje'i glu blangs rol mo brdung / /mchod cing bstod nas mthol bshags bya/ /phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol/ /

tshogs kyi sbyor ka'i phrin las kyis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi las rnams 'grub/ /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#/ /zab ba don gyi cho ga rnams/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /zab phyir man ngag bkol nas bstan/ /mchog gi tshogs

kyi 'khor lo ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no/ /khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni/ /rin chen phub pa dgu rim mam/ /bdun rim lnga rim sum rim ni/ /mu stegs nyan thos skye bo yis/ /skrag 'gyur log spyod spyad byed gsum/ /

de dag spang phyir gong bzhin bstan/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs/ /bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa ni/ /mtshan rnams bcu po rdzogs pa dang / /shes rab che dang snying rje che/ /dad pa la sogs che ba dang / /rnal 'byor ldan pa phyag rgya mkhas/ /sbyor thabs

kun la rab tu mkhas/ /de lta'i rnal 'byor nyung yang lnga/ /mang bar gyur na rnal 'byor kyang / /bskyed de de ltar rigs par spyad/ /lnga gnyis zung du gnas pa las/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pas/ /nang gi mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /de nas

gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /dga' ba'i ye shes bcu drug ni/ /'khor lo'i tshul las lhan cig bskyed/ /ye shes 'khor lo zhes su grags/ /yang na sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /thig le phra mo bsam pa ni/ /rnal 'byor

pha yin rtsa rnams ma/ /rlung ni las kyi sems dpa' yin/ /de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams/ /slob dpon zhal las shes par bya/ /'khor lo gsum la'ang de bzhin no/ /tshogs zhes bya ba mang po yin/ /'khor lo zhes bya ba skor du btub/ /mchog ces bya ba lhan

cig dga'/ /de ltar mchog gi 'khor lo ni/ /yang yang sbyang zhing bsgom par bya/ /mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o// //dgug pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no/ /khyad par cho ga

bstan pa ni/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon nas/ /nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed nas/ /'khor bskyed pa'am mi bskyed pa'o/ /bskyed pa hUM gis bskyed pa dang / /mi bskyed skad cig sprul pa'o/ /ye shes

dkyil 'khor spyan drangs sogs/ /byas nas bskyed rim mthar phyin nas/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa la/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas nas/ /dur khrod ras ma dag la ni/ /mdun du gzugs sam 'khor lo bri/ /dgug pa'i yi ge'i 'od zer gyis/ /bsgrub bya bkug

nas bstim par bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag la/ /mchod bstod la sogs byas nas ni/ /phrin las bcol zhing rbad pa dang / /sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad du ni/ /rab kyis bya ba 'bring gis ni/ /lnga brgya tha ma stong gis ni/ /

bzhi po rab tu re re yang / /de bzhin gcig gis 'grub pa dang / /yang na thun par bzhi dag tu/ /rtsa gcig lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad/ /de lta'i 'khor lo rtsa gcig dang / /lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad du ni/ /sgrub po khyad par rab 'bring gis/ /bsgrub bya gang yin khug par 'gyur/ /

nyi shu rtsa drug mtha' la ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bcug nas su/ /'gugs byed bsre bas gzhug par bya/ /dgug pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka la/ /nyin dang mtshan du brtsam par bya/ /dgug pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o// //bskrad pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /thun mong

cho ga thams cad ni/ /phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun/ /khyad par 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /sngon po la sogs gos gon la/ /bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang / /cho ga gsum gyis bya ba yin/ /de nas ye shes spyan drangs nas/ /cho ga la

sogs rdzogs par bya/ /mdun du dur khrod ras ma la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ci 'dod mdun du bsam/ /yang na gtso bo lnga'am drag po gnyis/ /las la med du mi rung ngo / /

gtso bo drag po'i las ni bsdus/ /slob dpon gnyis po shin tu bsdus/ /dkyil 'khor gsum po sprul pa las/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /tshogs kyi rdzas rnams ma lus bsags/ /khyad par tsit+ta sna tshogs dang / /sha sna khrag sna la sogs pas/ /tshul khrims bsrung

ldan nas bzung nas/ /sgo mangs can ni yan chod kyi/ /rang gi sbyor ba ma byas par/ /gzhan la nyos dang bslangs pa yis/ /rdzas rnams rdo rje can gyis ni/ /rgyud las bsngags par bcom ldan gsungs/ /byan pos btso bsreg byas nas ni/ /yon bdag 'khor dang bcas nas

ni/ /bskor ba bdun nam gsum byas la/ /'gying bag 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni/ /slob dpon la ni rdo rje'i glus/ /phyag rgya bsgyur nas drang bar bya/ /hUM bla ma rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /gnyis med ye shes mthu ldan pas/ /dbyings las ma g.yos rtogs med kyang / /sems

can gdul ba'i don slad du/ /rdo rje can gyi sku sprul nas/ /rtse gcig ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgya chen 'di/ /bdag gzhan lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /yi ge

gsum gyi bdud rtsi yis/ /bsreg sbyangs bdud rtsi zhu nas kyang / /bde gshegs mchod bstod rdzogs byas nas/ /phrin las bcol bas khro bo yi/ /sngags bzlas pas ni bsgrub bya ste/ /'khor lo rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /bsgrub bya de ru bzhag nas su/ /khro bo dpag med spros

pa yi/ /zhal nas rlung nag 'tshub ma ni/ /btang bas bsgrub bya bteg nas kyang / /nub byang mtshams kyi rlung lhas ni/ /khyad par de nyid bskyod nas kyang / /nam mkha'i mthas gtugs sa ru bskyal/ /de ltar lan gsum lha gsum gyis/ /cho ga byas te bskyal bar bya/ /bskrad

pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o// //mnan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun/ /khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni/ /ri bo dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /slob dpon lho phyogs kha bltas te/ /ser nag la

sogs rgyan cha gon/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni/ /dur khrod ras ma dag la ni/ /ba bla'am ldong ros khu bas sam/ /gser gyis ri rab bris nas kyang / /de 'og mthing shun dag gis ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs bris la/ /de gnyis

dag gi bar du ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming rnams bris nas kyang / /shugs ldan pa dang mgo 'chos dang / /kun du rgyug pa yan chod kyi/ /rnam gsum po ni thams cad kun/ /chos mthun spyod pas btsal nas kyang / /byan po de rdzogs rdzas rnams la/ /yid 'ong dpag med

bshams nas kyang / /bskor nas slob dpon la phul bas/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga yis/ /sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad pa gnyis/ /ting 'dzin ldan pas bsgrub bya ste/ /ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang / /yi ge gnyis po ri

rab bri/ /rgya mtsho bskyed nas mnan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mtha' ma'i cho ga yis/ /khang pa'i phyi rol dag tu ni/ /drag po'i 'brub khung byas nas kyang / /nag pos kha ni bcad nas kyang / /de steng las kyi rgya gram bri/ /de sogs cho ga'i sbyor bas su/ /mkha' 'gro

rnams kyis mnan par bya'o/ /mnan pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o// //gsad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor ka ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /phan gdags pa dang mthun par bsam/ /khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /slob dpon lho

phyogs kha bltas te/ /gnag cing drag po'i rgyan cha gon/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni/ /dur khrod ras la gzugs bris la/ /phur bu gri gug mtshon cha rnams/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs nas/ /phur bus gdab cing gri gug gtub/ /thun mong rdzas

rnams steng du ni/ /gdong pa can ni sna tshogs kyis/ /gsum dang ldan pa yid du 'ong / /slob dpon la ni phul nas kyang / /dang po bsgrub bya de nyid la/ /bkug nas khro bo'i mtshon cha yis/ /gsang ba'i cho ga byas nas su/ /rtsa gcig la sogs sngags kyis ni/ /de bzhin

byin brlabs byas nas ni/ /dang po 'khor lo mchod nas kyang / /cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /slar yang bsgrub bya bkug nas ni/ /mdun bsams gsad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rdzogs nas tha ma ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis gsad pa yi/ /sbyor bas cho ga rdzogs par

bya'o/ /gsad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o// //sreg pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka ni/ /cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun/ /dkyil 'khor gsum du sbyin sreg gsum/ /rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis/ /sngags la sogs pa'i 'khor lo yis/ /bskor

ba'i tshul du tha ma ni/ /las mkhan gyis ni bsreg par bya'o/ /de yi cho ga thams cad ni/ /sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya'o/ /sreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o// //bstabs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun/ /khyad par

cho ga bstan pa ni/ /rnam par bam pa ma yin pa'i/ /mtshan ldan bam chen blangs nas ni/ /ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang / /de nyid dkyil 'khor gsum po la/ /bstabs te yang na rdzas la ni/ /bsams te byin brlabs byas nas kyang / /gar ma dbyug sngon

rta mgrin gyis/ /lan gsum lan bdun nyi shu gcig /bstabs pa'i tshogs ni mkhas pas so/ /de nas phyi rol dag tu bya/ /de ltar gnyis bstabs gsum du bstabs/ /slob dpon man ngag shes par bya'o/ /bstabs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste brgyad

pa'o// //thun gsum thun bzhi dag tu ni/ /nyin dang mtshan ni lan gsum du/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis 'dod pa dang / /bar chad rnam gnyis bsal ba'i phyir/ /cho ga 'di byas dge bas su/ /

thams cad byang chub thob par shog /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho tr-i bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga /

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdig pa gzhil dang bsod nams 'phel/ /dgug dang dbang byed gsad pa'i sa/ /sgrub po rnams la phan btags phyir/ /bdag gis sbyin sreg bshad par bya/ /dang po bkra shis gnas dag tu/ /brtag sogs bsdus

rgyas rnam gsum bya/ /'bring ni rang nyid gos sngon gyi/ /ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' bsgo zhing / /shar du kha bltas 'byung po la/ /yid dang mthun pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'am/ /hUM gis yang ni sbyang bar bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgya de bzhin shes/ /snying ga'i yi

ges skyon sbyangs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o/ /de ni rgyas pa'i rtags sogs 'dod/ /'bring ni sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs/ /me tog tshom bu grangs mnyam pa/ /gzhung bzhin bris pa rdzogs par 'dod/ /tha ma mdzes pa'i snod dag la/ /yig 'bru

gsum gyis byin brlabs nas/ /ting 'dzin sbyang ba kho nar 'dod/ /sa skyon sbyang ba gsum shes bya/ /thab brtsigs rgyar ni khru gang la/ /zabs su khru phyed zlum pos bskor/ /sor bzhi gsum ni dor byas la/ /rdo rje dbus su brgyad pa'i tshad/ /thab

khung dkar po rgyab tu me ri'o/ /steng du rdo rje phyi rol 'od zer dkar/ /bud shing dkar po khru gang tshad/ /tsan+dan dkar po 'o mas spangs te bzhag /mchod sbyin shing ni mdzub gang tshad/ /'dab ma dang bcas rtse mo'i ngos/ /sngar bzhin spangs pas yam shing bya/

dkar gsum mngar gsum mar gyi 'og /'bras chan 'bru ni sna tshogs dang / /ku sha yon chab g.yas su gzhag /me tog la sogs bsang gtor dang / /zhal bsil rnams ni g.yon du gzhag /dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar gnyis/ /mtshan nyid rgyas

par gzhan du bstan/ /yang na g.yas kyi sor mo bskum pa las/ /yi ge hUM gi 'od zer de yis ni/ /rdo rje can gyi 'od zer bkug pa yis/ /rdul ba shig ye shes gong bu las/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dgang gzar gyur/ /g.yon gyi mthe bos mthe chung mnan/ /gong bzhin

sbyangs nas blugs gzar gyur/ /de nyid rdo rje dril ni mdun/ /de nas dkar po'i rgyan cha bgo/ /yid dang mthun pa'i ku sha'i steng / /sems dpa'i skyil krung shar du blta/ /thab sogs tsan+dan chus gtor te/ /bud shing ma nor zlum por brtsig /de nas rtswa

ni ku sha la/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li sarba big+h+naM nA sha ya hUM phaT/ las kyi sngags kyis bsang gtor bya/ /bum sbyangs bskyed dgug bzlas pa yis/ /rtsa gcig bdun gyis 'od zer dgang / /thab kyi kho ra khor yug la/ /ku sha'i rtse mo phyi ru bstan/ /

de nas lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /cho ga lnga'am cho ga gsum/ /skad cig bsdus rgyas shes par bya/ /thab la sogs pa'i man ngag kyang / /las kyi tshogs su shes par bya/ /de yang slob dpon man ngag gtso/ /bram ze'i khyim mam gtsub shing me/ /

rlung g.yab kyis sbar las kyis bsang / /sbyang zhing bskyed nas raM dkar pos/ /me lha dkar po drang srong zhi ba'i tshul/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa dkar por ldan/ /phyag na dbyug pa bgrang phreng dang / /gun+d+he skyabs sbyin bsnams pa'o/ /'od 'phros sngar bzhin

spyan drangs te/ /oM ba pa ka ag+na ye A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya/ /ma ma shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te spyan drang ngo / /bgegs bskrad bstims te mchod pa dbul/ /rtsa sngags nyid la mchod sngags btags te dbul/ /oM ba pa ka ag+na ye/ che ge

mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes sreg rdzas dbul bar bya'o/ /de yi man ngag 'od zer ni/ /sum skor du ni bya ba dang / /nyis skor du ni bya ba dang / /bdag nyid rab tu shes par bya/ /bzhi skor dag dang slob ma'o/ /'od zer dkar po 'phros pa las/ /thugs dang snying ga brgyud pa

dang / /gsum nas ngag la brgyud pa dang / /dbu nas mgo la brgyud pa yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang / /rtsa ba gsum 'dus bskang bar bya/ /spyi bo'i gtsug nas brtsams nas ni/ /sdig dang srin bu zad pa'i phyir/ /dmar pos bsreg cing dkar pos bkru/ /sgo dgu

dag nas bsdu ba dang / /thams cad kun nas bsdu ba dang / /snying gar bsdus nas dbyung ba dang / /til gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /sdig pa'i gzugs la de gzhug bya/ /rdzas rnams bdud rtsis mchod pas ni/ /de nas sdig pa de bsreg bya/ /yang na rdzas la bstims te

bsreg /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa ni/ /nad kyi ming nas smos nas ni/ /gong ma de bzhin bsreg pa'am/ /nad kyi ming dang gzugs bris la/ /'od zer dmar pos bsregs nas ni/ /dkar pos sbyang zhing zhi bsams la/ /'byung ba'i dgra rnams de bzhin bsam/ /'byung

po kun dang dgra kun yang / /'od zer bkye bas zhi bar bsam/ /gzugs dang ming bris zhi bar bya/ /sreg rdzas bdud rtsi 'od kyis mchod/ /mchod pas mnyes pas gong bzhin bskor/ /de lta min na 'og bzhin no/ /man ngag de la nan tan bya/ /mar dang dkar gsum

mngar gsum dang / /yam shing dkar po zho can dang / /de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /til ni med du mi rung ngo / /tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya/ /bstod cing phrin las bcol bar bya/ /thugs ka nyid du pho brang bca'/ /skad cig

de gsal ye shes dgug /bstim la mchod pa rnam lnga bya/ /rtsa sngags mchod sngags btags te dbul/ /sreg rdzas kun kyang de bzhin bya/ /man ngag rim pa 'dir shes bya/ /slob dpon zhal nas shes par bya/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dag /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bsdus

rgyas pa'o/ /rtsa lnga lnga bcu brgya yis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa che bar gyur na ni/ /nyis 'gyur gsum ni brgyad brgya'o/ /shin tu che gyur stong gi bar/ /de yis sdig dang bsod nams ni/ /che chung rab 'bring shes par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na nges par

zhi/ /tha ma dgang blugs mthol bshags bya/ /bstod cing las bcol gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin bsdus nas me lhag mas/ /mchod nas sreg rdzas gong bzhin dbul/ /dgang blugs la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya/ /thun

gsum sbyor ka sbyin sreg la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya/ /sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ /maN+Dal kha dog ser po la/ /khru do khru phyed khru gang du/ /bskor te gru bzhi'am zur brgyad

du/ /byas nas sor gnyis sor bzhi can/ /dbus su rin chen 'bar bas mtshan/ /bar du me ri'i kha khyer steng / /rin chen rdo rjes bskor bar bri/ /ser po'i rgyan chas bgos nas ni/ /byang phyogs ngos su kha bltas la/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgoms nas/ /las kyi bum pa

sbyang sogs bya'o/ /'bras bu 'o ma can gyi shing / /kha dog ser po dbus kyi cha/ /thab khung dbus su brtsegs par bya/ /khru gang khru phyed mdzub gang du/ /dri zhim spangs pa yam shing bya/ /las kyi bum pas bsangs nas ni/ /mchod rdzas ser po la sogs rnams/ /g.yon du mar sar

zho la sogs/ /me sbar brtag cing thab khung sbyang / /thab bskyed me lha bskyed pa ni/ /sde tshan drug pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa lnga pa'i dang po ni/ /bskyed pa la ni bsngags par gsungs/ /me lha ser po zhal gcig ni/ /phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis dbang chen

gdan/ /spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro/ /mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni/ /de nas sreg rdzas rnams ni dbul/ /rtsa sngags nyid la mtha' bzhi ru/ /gzar bu rin chen rdo rjes bya'o/ /rgyas par bstan pa zhi dang mthun/ /man ngag nyis skor la sogs kyang / /zhi dang

mthun te khyad par ni/ /'od zer sna bug zhugs nas ni/ /snying ga dag tu phyin nas ni/ /lus kun rtsa yi rlung rnams dang / /byang chub sems ni gsal zhing rgyas/ /yang na 'od zer lus kun la/ /khyab pas tshe dang bsod nams dang / /stobs rnams gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur/ /tha

ma dgang blugs bstod par bya/ /de ni 'bar ba'i rnam pa'am/ /thugs ka nyid du gos sngon can/ /bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas la/ /dbang bskur mchod pa la sogs bya/ /dgang blugs bstod nas bshags pa bya/ /ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu/ /yi ge bcu bdun

mtha' bsgyur la/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te bya/ /me lha rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni/ /cho ga la sogs gong bzhin bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzung nas/ /stong gi bar du tshun chad du/ /sbyor ba gnyis po gang byas kyang / /ji ltar 'dod pa rgyas par

'gyur/ /thun gsum sbyin sreg sbyor ka las/ /rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o/ /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /dbang gi sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni/ /sa gzhi dmar ba'i thab khung du/ /

b+ha ga lta bu'am zla gam bya/ /tshad ni rgyas pa'i chung 'bring ngo / /kha khyer mu ran gnyis dang bzhi/ /gri gug gam gzhus ni dbus su mtshan/ /pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad la'o/ /bud shing dmar po tsher ma'i shing / /yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis sam/ /sor brgyad tshad la dri

mar bsku/ /mchod rdzas dmar po g.yas su gzhag /mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas ni/ /dmar po'i ro dang dris bsgyur nas/ /g.yon du bzhag nas stan dmar po/ /rol pa'i 'dug stangs nub phyogs blta/ /dmar po la sogs rgyan chas bgo /bud shing bcer te

gsang bar bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bsgoms nas/ /me sbar la sogs cho ga bya/ /rlung gi yi ge bsngags pa yin/ /kha dog dmar po rlung la gnas/ /spyan drangs bstims te dbang bskur ro/ /mchod pa la sogs dbul ba ni/ /me lha'i sngags la mtha' bskyur la/ /

cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni/ /me lha'i thugs kar lha bskyed nas/ /spyan drangs la sogs cho ga bya/ /'od zer dmar po 'phros nas ni/ /lha mnyes pas ni dgug par bsam/ /yang na man ngag sbyor ba gsum/ /tha ma me yi cho ga ni/ /me lha'i sngags kyis gsum mam

bdun/ /lha yi nyi shu rtsa brgyad sngags/ /bdun nam brgya yi bar du bya/ /de ltar sbyin sreg sbyor ka la/ /nyin mtshan du ni brtson par bya'o/ /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa dbang gi sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gsum pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /gsad pa'i sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni/ /

thab khung gru gsum kha dog gnag /rdo rje gri gug nang dang steng / /bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags/ /bdud rtsi la sogs tshon rtsi byug /bud shing nag po tsher ma can/ /yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad/ /mchod rdzas la sogs nag po shis/ /tshil chen mar nag la sogs pa'i/ /

khyad par gdong pa can gyi sha /rgyud las byung ba'i sreg rdzas shis/ /nam phyed nyin phyed dus dag tu/ /sa gzhi mtho ba'i stan dag la/ /brkyang bskum la sogs rgyan cha rdzogs/ /bskyed rim tshul du byas nas ni/ /me sbar la sogs cho ga bya/ /me lha gang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ /ye shes

spyan drangs mchod sogs dbul/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ka'i man ngag ni/ /'di ni shin tu zab ces pas/ /gzu lums rtog ge dgag pa'i phyir/ /slob dpon zhal las shes par bya'o/ /lha yi cho ga rdzogs nas ni/ /me lha bsams te bsang byas la/ /rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas

ni/ cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o/ /drag po las kyi sbyor ka ste bzhi pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /bsdus pa las kyi sbyor ka ni/ /thun mong cho ga thams cad ni/ /gong ma bzhin du shes byas la/ /brko zhing bru ba ma nus pas/ /maN+Dal bdud rtsis byugs nas su/ /

tshon rnams kyis ni bri bar bya/ /de nas cho ga rdzogs bya'o/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ka ni/ /maN+Dal byas la me tog dgram/ /skad cig lhar bskyed byin brlabs la/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o/ /khyad par zhi ba dngul dang ni/ /khar ba dag ni shis pa

ste/ /rgyas pa'i gser dang ra gan dang / /dbang gi zangs la drag po'i lcags/ /khyi yi thod pa'ang bya bar gsungs/ /dbyibs rnams so sor byas pa'am/ /yang na bsams te byas pa'o/ /de rnams rnyed par ma gyur na/ /sa ni rin chen dang 'dra bas/ /kham phor snod rnams kun la ni/ /so

so'i dbyibs ni byas pa dang / /bsams te byin gyis brlabs byas la/ /cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o/ /sbyin sreg las kyi sbyor ka rnams/ /rna bar brgyud pa'i rim pa yis/ /rgyud la gab pa'i don rnams kun/ /bdag gis sgrub pa po la bstan/ /'di bstan pa yi dge bas ni/ /thams

cad byang chub thob par shog /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga/ /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni m+bi lAlba ra d+ha ra ho tro bi byeH/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga /dpal gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /man ngag

rim pa dran tsam zhig /slob ma'i don du bshad par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /sgrub pa yi ni dus dag tu/ /sbyin sreg dag gis gsad par bya/ /sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang / /byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba dang / /snying po dag tu bya mi dgos/ /maN+Dal gru gsum lho phyogs

bstan/ /khru gang tshad la phyed brkos nas/ /gsum dor gsum ni kha khyer ro/ /bdud rtsi sogs tshon nag por bya/ /de dbus rdo rje steng yang de/ /bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags/ /bud shing gnag cing gdug pa'i shing / /thab kyi tshad las sor mtho tsam/ /yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad/ /

mchod rdzas nag po la sogs shis/ /sreg rdzas mar nag rus khrag sha/ /skye tshe shang tshe yungs kar dang / /de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas bya/ /rdzas de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bya/ /mchod rdzas g.yas la sreg rdzas g.yon/ /byin gyis brlab cing gzhag par bya/ /dgang

gzar blugs gzar gzhan dang mthun/ /yang na lag pa dag gis bya/ /de gnyis rdo rje dril bu yang / /mdun nyid du yang gzhag par bya/ /bzang ngan de ni bya mi dgos/ /las kyi bum pas thams cad bsang / /dus ni nam phyed nyin phyed bya/ /rgyan cha gon la lho phyogs blta/ /

g.yon brkyang 'dug ste drag tu bzlas / /mche ba gtsigs shing khro gnyer basbu/ /dang po bskyed pa sngon song nas/ /me sbar brtag cing bgegs bzlog bya/ /bzang na de ni bya mi dgos/ /tha mas sbyang zhing bskyed pa dang / /cho ga gsum dang skad cig mas/ /me lha nag po khros

pa bskyed/ /ye shes me lha spyan drangs bstim/ /gnyis su med par rgyas btab la/ /me lha'i sngags la mchod sngags btags te dbul/ /de nas sreg rdzas dbul bar bya/ /de dag dbul ba'i man ngag kyang / /khro bo dag gi cho 'phrul gyis/ /gzugs brnyan dgug

bstim gtubs te dbul/ /yang na rdzas mchod mnyes pa las/ /'od zer khro bas rka dgug cing bsreg /man ngag de la nan tan bya/ /oM badzra kro d+ha asne/ che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ stong rtsa brgyad nas brgya rtsa brgyad/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o/ /yang na bsod nams dag

gi rim pa yis/ /brgya dang stong dang khri ru bya/ /de ltar byas pas de gsod cing / /khyad par du ni 'byung po gsod/ /tha ma dgang blugs bstod bya'o/ /de yi thugs kar gos sngon bskyed/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bstim/ /rgyas btab mchod pa gong bzhin dbul/ /de

nas sreg rdzas /rim bzhin dbul/ /rtsa sngags nyid kyis dbul bar bya/ /gong gi man ngag shes par bya/ /dgang blugs phul la bstod par bya/ /phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin bsdus te me lha bsang / /rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /me

yi lha la dbul zhing bstod pa bya/ /phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya/ /slob ma rnams kyi don ched du/ /bdag gis man ngag 'di bkod pas/ /slob dang sems can thams cad kyang / /gos sngon dngos grub

thob par shog /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /dus bzhi rtsod pa rgyas dus su/ /sgrub pa po yang mang 'byung zhing / /dman la mos pa'ang mang du 'byung / /bla mar gus pa'ang dpag tu med/ /de 'dra'i sems can dpag med kyang / /bsdu na gsum du

'dus 'gyur te/ /sprul dang kha dog rjes 'jug pa'o/ /rjes 'jug gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /sprul la mthun 'jug sbyang ba med/ /sprul rjes 'jug gi gang zag la/ /dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung yang / /nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'dus/ /lus ngag yid du shes

par bya/ /lus kyi dam tshig nyams pa ni/ /tsha tshas sbyongs te tshogs sbyor ltos/ /ngag gi nyams pa bzlas pas 'dag /yid kyi lha yi sbyor kar ltos/ /thun mong sbyin sreg tshogs gtor rnams/ /phan 'dogs sbyor kar blta bar gyis/ /nus pa chung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ma

bshags maN+Dal gyis sbyang bya/ /maN+Dal bsdu na rnam gnyis te/ /yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed pa'o/ /dngos byed skyon spangs gnyen bzhi la/ /brgya'am lnga bcu nyi shu lnga/ /lnga'am bsdus pa gcig kyang bya/ /dbyibs legs mdzes pa bsham par bya/ /kha dog kun nas sngo yang rung / /

dkar po mthing ga ser dmar bya/ /yang na yid dang mthun pa'ang rung / /tshad ni khru gang yan chad bya/ /tshon ni dkar rtsi yung ba dang / /sngo rtsi gur gum mtshal gyis bya/ /ba yi rnam lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ /dum bu gcig par bzhag nas kyang / /dri zhim pa yi sman gyis bsgo/ /bdud rtsi

lnga dang thun mong rdzas/ /gser sogs kha rgyan lnga ldan du/ /bcug la byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /rang nyid cho ga gsum gyis bskyed/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags 'dis gdab/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ byin brlabs bkra shis rdzas dang sreg /de yis thams cad

bsang bar bya/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yungs kar la gdab 'byung po bsrel/ /rang gi snying ga'i yig 'bru las/ /'od 'phros yi ge a ru gyur/ /de 'phros taM gi yi ge las/ /sa gzhi rin chen bzhi ru gyur/ /sngags 'di btab pas bzlas par 'gyur/ /oM

a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hUM/ grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas/ oM rat+na traM maN+Dal hUM/ tsan+dan ga pur gla rtsi sogs/ /mdzes pa'i snod du bzhag pa la/ /'od 'phros pas ni d+hU yig thim/ /bdug pa'i mchog tu gyur par bsam/ /rnal 'byor 'byor pa chung gyur yang / /tsan+dan med du mi rung

ngo / /rgyan gyi me tog lnga gsum sogs/ /gcig sogs yang na lnga grangs bstun/ /de steng paM las pad+ma bya/ /sngags 'dis bdag po'i rkyen bya'o/ /oM pad+ma maN+Dal hUM/ stong ldan 'bum ldan du gyur bsam/ /de yi steng du b+h+rUM yig las/ /gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa bsam/ /

badzra re khA'i sngags ni kun la gdab/ /snying ga'i 'od kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /mchod rdzas pad+ma mdun du bskyed/ /rgyun ni gong gi yi ge las/ /de dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni/ /nyams pa dgos pa gzhan mos 'jug /de 'og dam tshig nyams pa kun/ /lus bkru gos bzang

rgyan cha bgo/ /lhar bsam rdor dril sngags byin brlag /sa bon yi ge 'od zer gyis/ /lha mo bzhi bskyed lha spyan drangs/ /gsol ba gdab la rtsa sngags gdags/ /bla ma mi bskyod gyur sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa thams cad bya/ /rgyud las byung ba'i bstod pa bya/ /mnyes pas

'od zer rang 'dus pas/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma la/ /kaM dang na la sdig pa bsdu/ /sdom nag gzugs su gyur bsams te/ /phyir 'gro rlung gis mdun du dbyung / /sdig pa'i gzugs dbyung sngags kyis bsreg /lus ngag so so'i sdig sbyong ba/ /so so'i gnas su ni bsams te/ /

so so'i sdig pa 'dus nas byung / /gsod pa khro ba'am gong sbyor bzhin/ /yang na lus kyi srog chags gzugs/ /ngag gi yig 'bru sems kyi 'od/ /gzugs su dbyung ste rgyud las 'byung / /yang na lha yi 'od zer gyis/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun khyab ste/ /rgyud kyi sdig pa bsregs par bsam/ /

de 'og 'od zer dkar po'i rgyun/ /bdud rtsi lta bus lus khyab nas/ /gsos nas mchog tu gyur par bsam/ /yang na brgya rtsa rtsa ba'i sngags/ /bzlas pas gong bzhin sdig pa sbyong / /yi ge brgya pa'i dbang por bsgyur/ /brgya rtsa sngags 'bum bzlas pa

dang / /sum cha phyed phri rab nyams sbyong / /sum gnyis sum cha sum cha dang / /sum gnyis phri bas 'bring gsum sbyong / /de las phyed phyed phri bas ni/ /tha ma'i nyams pa rnam gsum spyod/ /sum brgya nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ni/ /yan lag che chung

nyams pa sbyong / /de 'og zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /nus pa yod na tshogs 'khor bya/ /de 'og bum pa rnams bsams te/ /gcig tu lha mo rnams bskyed de/ /gcig tu rdor 'dzin mi bskyod pa/ /bskyed nas byin brlab tshul bzhin bya/ /dang po lha mos khrus byas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pas gnyis med bsam/ /mi bskyod bum pas dbang bskur bas/ /yang na gnyis kas dbang bskur bya/ /de 'og mchod nas 'od khrus bya/ /de 'og bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod/ /gong gi sbyor ba rdzogs pa kun/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i maN+Dal yin/ /de las gzhan du gcig

kyang rung / /rdzogs la brtan pa ma thob par/ /maN+Dal 'jog na mkha' 'gros gsod/ /rnal 'byor spyod lam ma zhugs par/ /gong ma'i maN+Dal de dag kun/ /yid kyis mdun du bsam byas nas/ /yid kyis dbul ba yid kyis yin/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i dri zhim rdzas/ /bsku

ba nang gi yin par 'dod/ /phyi ru phyi yi me tog yin/ /bla ma las brgyud maN+Dal sbyor ka 'di/ /blo zhan don du bdag gis cung zad bsdus/ /'khrul par gyur na mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod/ /'di byas dge bas gos sngon can thob shog /rnal 'byor dbang gis nyes par snang / /

blun po legs par bshad pa dman/ /mthong rgya chung na yangs pa'ang dog /rgyud dang man ngag la brten nas/ /rnyed 'dod rnams kyis 'dod 'dod spyad du med/ /ma mthong dogs na skal rnams med par thal/ /slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa'i maN+Dal gyi sbyor ka rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ karma kra ma nA ma muk+ti kA ba li/ bod skad du/ las kyi rim pa mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang rdo rje bsnams/ /spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mthu ldan pas/ /nyon mongs gdung bzhi byed pa/ /

zhabs kyi pad+ma la btud nas/ /dang bas shin tu gus phyag 'tshal/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /las kyi rdo rje phreng ba 'di/ /rgyud rnams ma lus sna tshogs nas/ /man ngag dgos pa btus te bshad/ /rgyal bas sngon gyi dus dag tu/ /zhal nas gsungs pa tsam

gyis ni/ /sems can don grub glegs bam med/ /de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su ni/ /po ti dag la brten gyur pas/ /bla mas dgongs pa'i po ti la/ /dga' ba chen po bskyed par bya/ /de nas ma ga gang zag la/ /ston pa thugs rje che ldan pas/ /sdud pa rdo rje gsang bdag la/ /

brgyud pa rim gyis 'ongs pa 'di/ /bka' dang mi 'gal mthun pa ru/ /bka' yi don nyid dpyis phyin par/ /man ngag rim pa bstan pa la/ /dga' ba chen po bskyed par gyis/ /man ngag 'di ltar ston pa ni/ /slob dpon mkhas pa yang dag ldan/ /dus gsum bde gshegs dang

mtshungs pa/ /shin tu drin che gus pas bstod/ /sems can mun khang 'khyams pa la/ /mar me bstan pas lam rnyed bzhin/ /'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can la/ /man ngag rin chen 'di bstan pas/ /phyag rgya mchog gi lam rnyed 'gyur/ /de bas shin tu drin che bas/ /

yul zhing sne phran bcas pa dang / /rin chen la sogs nor rdzas dang / /bu dang chung ma bran 'khor bcas/ /srog lus man chad phul gyur kyang / /bla ma'i sku drin 'khor mi 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /bla ma mnyes par mi byed na/ /man ngag thob kyang ltung bar 'gyur/ /

gzhan yang rgyud ni sna tshogs las/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i don slad du/ /mthu yi sbyor ba'i man ngag rnams/ /dgos pa bsdus te bstan par bya/ /de lta'i bla ma rin chen la/ /gong ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /man ngag bstan pa'i slob ma la/ /rnam pa bzhi ru shes byas la/ /phyi

ltar nang ltar gsang ba ltar/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ru bstan/ /phyi ltar bstan pa'i slob ma yang / /dang po dkyil 'khor bcug nas ni/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur rdzogs byas la/ /mi zad dbyings kyi chos rnams bshad/ /des su rtogs pa'i rim pa ni/ /thun mong

dam tshig nyams blangs la/ /nyams na bshags la brtson par bya/ /nyams pa chen po byung ba na/ /bshags nas rim par bskyar bar bya/ /de ni slob dpon nyid las blang / /gzhan gyi skabs dang sbyor shes bya/ /khrus la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /nyams su blangs te spyad

par bya/ /de yi rnal 'byor mos pa ni/ /mas mtha' thun tshod chung ngu gcig /nyin zhag 'das na nyams par 'gyur/ /dang por bskyed rim bsgom pa ni/ /rim gyis sam ni cig car du/ /bskyed pa brtan par gyur pa'i chad/ /thun tshod chen po brtan pa dang / /kha dog spros par shes

pa dang / /lus ngag yid gsum skyon rnams ni/ /rim gyis bri bar gyur pa dang / /khyad par lus kyi skyon bri'o/ /lus kyi mdog bzang lus snyoms dang / /yun rings btang yang mi tshor na/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan pa'i tshe/ /de nas gsang dbang bskur nas ni/ /nang ltar

bstan nas rim gyis bsgom/ /de ltar phyi yi gang zag ni/ /de nas mar la 'gro ba dkon/ /skye ba 'di rjes phyi ma ru/ /rten dang dbang po khyad par 'gyur/ /de ni rim gyis 'bras bu thob/ /nang ltar bshad pa'i slob ma ni/ /phyi ltar thun mong sngon du 'gro/ /nang ltar man ngag

khyad par bstan/ /de nas rlung dang gtum mo dang / /yig 'bru thig le rnams la bslab/ /de yang gsang dbang bskur nas ni/ /rlung dang yig 'bru bsgom par bya/ /de la brtan par gyur nas ni/ /snang ba gsum la rim gyis bslab/ /de nas tshe ni nam 'phos nas/ /

gong ma rnams la rim gyis bslab/ /gsang ba ltar ni bstan pa yis/ /slob ma de la gong ma gnyis/ /thun mong du ni sngon du 'gro/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nas/ /gnyis po la ni zhugs nas su/ /man ngag stobs zhugs ting 'dzin gyis/ /bde ba ye shes rim skyes

nas/ /snang ba mched par gyur pas su/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma ji bzhin pa/ /thugs su chud pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /lhan cig dga' ba la zhugs pas/ /spros med 'od gsal de bzhin thob/ /de nas rim gyis mthar thugs/ /thob par de ni ma gyur kyang / /tshe dbang bsgrub pas thob

pa'am/ /yang na rdzas dang man ngag dang / /thabs kyi sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /phung po bzhu btul byas nas su/ /gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin gyur nas kyang / /de nas rim gyis 'gro ba'am/ /yang na 'chi bar gyur na ni/ /byang chub sems kyi man ngag blang / /de ltar mi 'dod

man ngag blangs/ /skye ba phyi ma dag tu ni/ /mthar thug pa ni thob par 'gyur/ /de yang / /tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i man ngag ni/ /tshe dbang bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /dam tshig ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /skyon spangs dbang thob man ngag thob/ /rgyud kyi don mkhas cha rkyen tshang / /dam can

mkha' 'gro bsten pa yis/ /lung bstan phra mo thob nas kyang / /tshe srog nyams pa 'tsho bar byed/ /de yang / tshe yi rang bzhin gnas dang ni/ /ming zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs ni/ /de yi tshe yi rang bzhin ni/ /'od zer kha dog lnga dkyil na/ /thig le byang chub sems zhes bya/ /dkar

la 'tsher zhing snum la 'gril/ /de yang che chung rab 'bring gsum/ /sran ma yungs 'bru shin tu phra/ /mu stegs dag gis de la 'khrul/ /rtag pa mi 'gyur gcig pur 'dzin/ /de ni dam pa'i don du 'dod/ /'jig rten pa yi skad du ni/ /bla dang tshe zhes kyang ni zer/ /bdag cag

rnal 'byor pa yi gzhung / /de ni kun rdzob sgyu mar 'dod/ /dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med/ /gnas ni tsit+ta'i dkyil na gnas/ /de yang rtsa brgyad dkyil na gnas/ /shin tu rtogs dka' d+hU tI'i nang / /de nyid dbye na rnam gsum ste/ /de la brten pa'ang rnam pa gsum/ /gcig

ni 'chi ba'i dus tshe 'byung / /gcig ni lus kun khyab par gnas/ /de la gzhan dag gnyis su 'dod/ /khyad par gnas dang las kun byed/ /kha cig khyad byed de kun la/ /lud cing zag pa thur du 'bab/ /gzhan ni kun du khyab cing rgyu/ /de la'ang las kyi 'phen shugs kyis/ /

mang po la ni rgyu ru 'dod/ /srog dang dbang po che zhes pa/ /ming gi rnam grangs nyid du 'dod/ /de yang rlung dang rtsa dang ni/ /byang chub sems su byas pas na/ /tha dad nyid du 'dod pa'ang yod/ /shes pa bsdus dang ma bsdus pa/ /gnas skabs don gyis 'jug

pa yin/ /tshe bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ rang gi snying gar 'od kyi gzhal yas khang / /de yi dkyil na a dkar gnyis/ /phra 'dus zla ba kha sbyor gyur/ /de nas hUM gnyis 'phro 'du las/ /rdo rjer gyur pas steng 'og mnan/ /tshe rnams 'phrog pa'i 'byung po de/ /drag po sbyor ba la sogs

kyis/ /sngags brjod phyag rgya bcas nas su/ /bcom zhing brlag nas med par byas/ /lha mo'i sprul pas tshe rnams dgug /sngags brjod phyag rgyas bkug nas kyang / /bsrung zhing ye shes che yang dbab/ /dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ /rdo rje sor mo nang bsnol te/ /mthe

bong gnyis kyi nang du dpe ba/ /oM badzra A yu She hUM/ A be sha ya A A/ lus la mar rim bzhin du bstim/ khyad par snying gi dkyil du bstim/ /baM yig dmar po 'phros pa las/ /man ngag la sogs sbyor bas bcing / /bsdu zhing gzung ba'i man ngag ni/ /shes rab la sogs

thabs kyis bstan/ /tshe yi yon tan la sogs ni/ /rgyud la sogs las shes par bya/ /tshe dang dum bu rnam smin gsum/ /de gsum thabs sogs mthun pa yang / /gcig la gcig bstan mdung khyim 'dra/ /yi ge gsum gyi man ngag kyang / /gnas gsum dag tu

bcing ba yin/ /sbyor ba la sogs bcing bar bya/ /de ni tshe sgrub man ngag go/ /byang sems blang ba'i man ngag kyang / /de yang rnal 'byor spyod pa yi/ /mkhas pas 'chi rtags shes nas ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i snod nang du/ /blangs nas mtshal chen dang sbyar nas/ /sbyor

ba'i stobs kyi shangs su 'phang / /rnam shes rlung la zhon pa de/ /dang po rten dang bral tsam na/ /sngags bzlas 'od zer stobs kyis su/ /snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya/ /de nas snga ma'i rten la gzhug /sbyor ba la sogs gzhan yang myur bar bya/ /gzhan yang gsang ba spyod pa ni/ /

mdzad pa'i dus ni rnam gsum ste/ /dang po bdud rtsi spyod pa la/ /mos pas 'jug dang dngos la 'jug /mos pas 'jug pa gzhan dang mthun/ /dngos su 'jug pa'i thabs bstan pa/ /bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la/ /rang gi lus las btsal bar bya/ /btsal nas bsgrub pa'i

ri lu de/ /tshad du phyin nas bza' bar bya/ /bza' ba dang po rim gyis bslab/ /zas dang rjes zin rting nyid la/ /zhag gsum na ni ci ran bza'/ /btung ba'ang de bzhin de rting la/ /zhag lnga na ni bza' bar bya/ /de nas zla phyed zla gcig go/ /de rnams par gyi 'tsho ba ni/ /

nang gi bdud rtsi slar bsdams la/ /bza' zhing btung ba nyid du bya/ /de rnams bag la zha nas ni/ /bar bar gong bzhin bza' bar bya/ /yang na rim bzhin de bzhin lnga ba/ /de nas nang gi rgyun bzlog gis/ /rim bzhin lus rnams gso bar bya/ /lus ni shin tu rgyas gyur na/ /

ting 'dzin bogs ni skye bar 'gyur/ /man ngag stobs kyis zhugs pa yis/ /mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /yang na bogs ni dbyung ba'i thabs/ /nang gi gso thabs spo ba dang / /phyi yi gso thabs spo ba dang / /lus la rdzas rnams byugs pa yis/ /ting 'dzin bogs

rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /thabs des skye bar ma gyur na/ /man ngag bsgom pas spo bar bya/ /des kyang skye bar ma gyur na/ /gnas la sogs pa spo bar bya/ /spos kyang skye bar ma gyur na/ /'byung po'i gnod pa yod pa yin/ /'byung po bsal ba'i thabs rnams bya/ /

'byung po bsal kyang ma byung na/ /sngon gyi bag chags mthug pas ni/ /de nyid sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/ /des kyang skye bar ma gyur na/ /tha mi dad pa'i 'du shes kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs spos pa yis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni skye bar 'gyur/ /des kyang skye bar ma gyur na/ /slob

dpon man ngag nyams pa yin/ /slob dpon dam tshig nyams pas kyang / /man ngag mthu ni chung bar byed/ /ye shes skye ba'i gnas rnams ni/ /slob dpon dam tshig nyams sogs la/ /dam tshig la sogs nongs pa dang / /rang gi man ngag nyams pa dang / /dam tshig nyams

pa'i the tshom zos/ /lta spyod nyams su ma lon dang / /dus dang rtags sogs ma shes dang / /man ngag bsgom rim ma shes dang / /sbyang ba la sogs ma shes dang / /sems 'dzin phra mo yod srid kyang / /ye shes skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnams skyon spangs

yon tan ldan/ /de ni ye shes ma skyes kyang / /tshogs chen khyad par bsags nas su/ /skye ba phyi mar ye shes kyi/ /nges pa don yin thogs med do/ /mtshan nyid la sogs gzhan dag tu/ /snga ma las kyi 'phel shugs kyis/ /ma nges pa dag bstan pa de/ /sngags kyi

nus mthu khyad par gyis/ /las kyi 'phen pa bcom nas kyang / /skye ba phyi mar nges pa'i don/ /phyi mar rkyen sogs thams cad kun/ /nges pa kho nar 'dzom par 'gyur/ /de ru rkyen rnams gzhan 'gyur na/ /dge bar bsngo ba legs 'gyur bar/ /ma 'tsham skye ba bdun la

nges/ /de bas gsang sngags mthu rnams ni/ /dug gis sman 'gyur ji bzhin no/ /de bas gsang sngags mthu rnams kyis/ /lan ni nye bar 'bras bu myur/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa ni/ /de bas mthu chung bskal pa gsum/ /nyan thos de bas mthu chung bas/ /bskal pa bzhi ni

'gor ba yin/ /de dag kun la rab 'bring gsum/ /ring dang myur dang shin tu myur/ /gsang sngags la la'i gzhung dang ni/ /slob dpon la la'i gzhung gis ni/ /bcud kyis len gyi man ngag gis/ /lus sems las su rung gyur nas/ /man ngag stobs kyis ye shes

skye/ /des ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ /phyag rgya mchog ni 'dod pa na/ /tshe la dbang sgyur bsgrubs nas ni/ /man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /phyag rgya mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /slob dpon la la'i gzhung gis ni/ /bskyed rim brtan par gyur pa dang / /

bcud kyis len gyi man ngag bsgrub/ /des ni tshe la dbang sgyur 'grub/ /tshe dbang thob pa des kyang ni/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya mchog gnyis thob/ /bcud kyis len gyi man ngag kyang / /mkha' 'gro'i rgyud du shes par gyis/ /phyag rgya mchog gi man ngag cung zhig tsam/ /rnyed par

bya ba'i lus kyi phreng ba thabs kyi rim pa bkod pa'o/ /gzhan yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i don slad du/ /las kyi phreng ba gzhan yang bstan/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bskyed la/ /mdun du mgon po nag po ni/ /sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi/ /hUM de nyid las bskyed pa

ni/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa de/ /mdog gnag 'od 'bar chen po ni/ /gri gug thod pa lag na 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i do shal byas/ /mche ba gtsigs mdzad 'jigs byed pa/ /bong thung lus gnag gzi brjid che/ /kha nas khrag ni 'bab pa'o/ /de la

bzlas pa'i man ngag ni/ /oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na badzre na swA hA/ bzlas pa yi ni man ngag kyang / /rten dang brten pa'i gnas tshul des/ /gru gsum gzhal yas sgo gcig pa/ /de yi bdag po rigs dang bstun/ /'phro 'du bya ba'i tshul rnams kyang / /'khor lo tsha tsha gdab

pa'i tshul/ /lce yang rigs dang bstun pa yin/ /ngag gi bzlas pa byed tshul yang / /nyi ma shar dang ru chu brug /de yi bzlas pa'i grangs rnams kyang / /sum 'bum drug 'bum sa ya ru/ /bzlas pa byas pas mtshan ma rnyed/ /des su 'byung bar ma gyur na/ /sbyang ba byas te

bzla bar bya/ /sngags kyi nus pa che chung dang / /mos pa yi ni khyad par dang / /bag chags che chung khyad par gyis/ /rdo rje drag po'i rgyud rnams las/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba gzhan dag gis/ /bsnyen dang gsad pa'i las rnams bya/ /lha yi sbyor ba spo ba yang / /de bzhin du

ni shes par bya/ /gnas la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /gzhan pa dag kyang spo bar bya/ /lha rnams so so spo ba yang / /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa dang / /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa dang / /zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa dang / /phyag mtshan rnams kyang 'gyur ba dang / /sku mdog la sogs

'gyur ba rnams/ /so so'i rgyud dang bstun pa yin/ /sngags la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang / /de bzhin du ni shes par bya/ /khyad par las rnams so so'i sngags/ /oM ma hA kA lA ya/ ya ti pra ti dz+nyA sma ra si ta di daM/ ma ma ru shA/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma ra ma ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha

ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na mi ke na hUM hUM phaT/ hUM b+ha ga pA na/ oM bi laM ba hUM hUM phaT/ oM g+hu swA hA/ gsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+h+rUM/ mngon spyod kyi'o/ /oM dzr-IM swA hA/ dbye ba'o/ /oM khaM swA hA/ bskrad pa'o/ /oM hUM swA hA/ dgug pa'o/ /oM

a swA hA/ dbang gi'o/ /oM hUM swA hA/ rengs byed kyi'o/ /sngags 'di dag thams cad yi ge 'bum bzlas pas 'grub par byed do/ /mgon po'i las ni thun mong pa'i las so/ /sbyin sreg dag gis gsad pa ni/ /gru gsum nag po'i thab khung du/ /shin tu drag po'i me

lha bsam/ /sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / /bsdus rgyas myur ba'i rim pa rnams/ /man ngag la sogs shin tu gab/ /mchod pa dbul ba'i rim pa ni/ /tsha ba'i mar dang tsher ma can/ /til nag po dang dug chus byug /oM ma hA kA la ming 'di zhes bya ba sha trU na mA ra

ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /mngon par bsgrub pa'i las drag shul shi ba'i ro bzung la/ de ni yang ni gtub par bya/ /stong par byin brlabs yi ge las/ /bsgrub bya ci 'dra de la bsam/ /lcags kyus snying drang rlung gis bteg /rnam par shes pa de

la bstim/ /rdo rje phur bus de la brdeg /bsad nas me la sbyin sreg bya/ /me yi lha la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /ming nas smos pa de la dbul/ /lha la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /dbul bar dgra yi ming de gzhug /'bum la brgyad kyis bstabs la dbul/ /de ni dur khrod gdon

rnams kyis/ /'du zhing de nyid za bar bsam/ /de yang bsod nams rab 'bring gis/ /bcu gnyis phyed dang de yi phyed/ /'chi bar de ni gdon mi za/ /bsreg pas gsad pa'i las rim mo// //gzhan yang ting 'dzin rim pa yis/ /gsad pa rab tu brtsam par bya/ /

'di ni bsam pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /ma hA kA la'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gdug pa khro bo'i sems kyis ni/ /de yi lte ba'i rtsa ba la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis lag pa gcad/ /ming gi yi ge dang po las/ /gsad bya mdun du bsam

par bya/ /rnam shes de la bcug nas ni/ /kha sbyar nang nas gnas mthong nas/ /de phyung srog dang dbral mthong nas/ /ro ni dum bu stong du gtub/ /bza' 'am yang na gtor ma bya/ /de ma thag tu spyi gtsug bsam/ /khrag skyugs 'dar zhing mgo skyes kyang / /kha ni thur

du bub par bsam/ /sum rtse me yi gzugs can ni/ /bshang lam zhugs nas snying gar ni/ /the tshom med cing brtan gyur na/ /nges par 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /thod pa ma chag ma gsal/ /

ma hA kA la'i snying po bri/ /bzlas pa'i yungs kar de ru blugs/ /dgra yi sgo khar sbas na ni/ /nor dang bcas pa zla drug gis/ /brlag par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /gang yin pa yi rigs rgyud kyi/ /thod pa de nyid blangs nas ni/ /cig shos kyi ni khrag gis bri/ /sngags ni

nag po nyid kyis bya/ /yang na ma hA kA la dang / /nag po nyid kyis bsres nas bya/ /ma hA kA las byed pa na/ /ming spel ba ni tshogs rgyur bcad/ /yang na gling bcad 'khor lo bcad/ /gro ga'am dur khrod ras ma la/ /gzugs dang ming ni bris pa gzhug /de steng de gshed

gzugs rnams gzhug /smin par byed pas kha bcad nas/ /de steng gzhan gyis dgag par bya/ /gnag dang dkar bas rgya gram bcing / /nag po yod pa'i sar sbas na/ /gdon mi za bar brlag par 'gyur/ /de ni thabs kyis gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //gzhan yang

gsang ba'i rim pa ni/ /gru gsum nag po'i snod nang du/ /khrag sna snying sna sbyar ba yi/ /mthun pa'i dam rdzas rnams kyis dgang / /dur khrod ras ma dag la ni/ /de yi ming dang gzugs bris la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni gtor mar dbul/ /nag po'i rten ni yod pa'i sar/ /

bstabs pa'i tshul gyis rbad par bya/ /de ltar byas pa'i gtor ma ni/ /brgya nas stong gi bar du ni/ oM ma hA kA la shA sa na u pa hA ri NaM e Sha a pa sh+tsi mA kA lo ya mi ti tad rat+na tra ya/ a pa ka ri NaM ya di pra ti dz+nyA sma ra si ta di daM/ duSh+TAM satwa kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma ra ma ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha

ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags kyis gsad par bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor los gsad pa ni/ /bde gshegs sprul pa'i nag po ni/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i sku 'chang ba/ /bskyed pa la sogs rdzogs

byas la/ /tshes grangs shis pa nyid la ni/ /'khor lo legs par bca' bar bya/ /'khor lo bca' ba'i lugs rnams ni/ /dur khrod ras ma dag la ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs bris la/ /lto bar 'khor lo bca' bar bya/ /rtsibs ni bcu gnyis brgyad du bya/ /

le tshe re re por len bya/ /ming dang drag sngags spel te bri/ /sngon du cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /'khor lo bsgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis/ /bskyed cing dgug pa'i las byas te/ /mchod pa la sogs rdzogs bya'o/ /de nas gsang pa'i las rnams bya/ /nyi ma bzhis bskor thim

par byed/ /sngags ni khri dang bzhi khrir bzlas/ /de nas bcing ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /dur khrod nag po'i gnas dag tu/ /gru gsum nag po'i gting brus la/ /gting brus sbas te mnan par bya/ /des su ma byung bskyar bar bya/ /oM ma hA kA la sha trUn mA ra ya phaT/ ces pa ming dang

spel bar bya/ /'khor los gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //gnod sbyin gyis ni gsad pa'i thabs/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pa'i/ /cho ga thams cad rdzogs byas la/ /mdun du gru gsum dkyil 'khor la/ /gnod sbyin drag po bskyed par bya/ /de nyid nus pa bskyed

pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba gzhan yang shes par bya/ /drag po'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /gang yang mi 'du rang dbang med/ /lcags kyi tsha tsha gdab pa bzhin/ /'phros pas thams cad brlag par byed/ /sum 'bum drug 'bum dgu 'bum du/ /bzlas pas don rnams
