grub par byed/ /tshad du phyin pa'i dus su ni/ /shin tu dag cing pos pas su/ /rang dbang med par las rnams byed/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la yak+Sha hUM phaT/ dzaHmA ra ya/ sha trUn mA ra ya/ sngags kyi man ngag bsgyur shes bya/ /sbyin sreg ting 'dzin thabs dang ni/ /gtor ma

'khrul 'khor gsad la sogs/ /thabs kyis zin pa'i sbyor shes bya/ /gnod sbyin gyis gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //ro langs mas ni gsad pa'i thabs/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas/ /dur khrod chen po'i dkyil dag tu/ /ro langs ma ni bskyed byas la/ /rang

bzhin ma yang spyan drangs te/ /de gnyis cho ga rdzogs byas te/ /bsnyen pa tshad du phyin pa na/ /dur khrod ro yi thod pa ru/ /khrag thun rdzas la sogs pa la/ /drag po'i thun sngags bzla bar bya/ /khri yi bar du bzla bar bya/ /de nas gang yin sa ru brdeg /de ltar lan gsum byas pa

yis/ /gang yin de ni brlag par 'gyur/ /dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas dag tu/ /nag po'i nang du 'khrul 'khor mnan/ /nag po'i nang du gtor mas dgang / /cig shos nang du bcas pa yis/ /nag po nyid la gtad par bya/ /tsha ba'i rdzas kyis bsreg par bya/ /de ltar

sbyor ba'i man ngag rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te ma byas na/ /rang nyid la ni gnod par 'gyur/ /oM badzra be+e tA lI hUM phaT/ sha drUn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sngags kyi man ngag sbyor shes bya/ /ro langs mas gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma yis

gsad pa'i thabs/ /chu ngogs thibs po'i gnas dag tu/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bsgrub par bya/ /zhing chen gyi ni gdan bting la/ /drag po rol pa'i 'dug stangs bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma sku mdun gzhag la/ /zhing gi rgyus pa thugs kar gzung / /drag tu bzlas pa'i stobs kyis su/ /

sbyor ba gang 'dod 'grub par byed/ /khyad par sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ /gnag cing thibs po'i nang dag tu/ /gru gsum nag po brus nas kyang / /gzugs brnyan bca' ba'i thabs byas te/ /de ru gsad pa la sogs bya/ /yang na 'bab chu'i dogs dag tu/ /sba zhing mnan

pa'i thabs bya'o/ /oM badzra DA kI hUM phaT/ sha trU na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha nan/ sngags kyi sdeb ni ma shes na/ /sbyor ba 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro mas gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //'jigs byed ma yis gsad pa'i thabs/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i

gnas dag tu/ /drag cing gtum pa'i chas gos gon/ /dang por bsnyen sbyor tshang bas su/ /nag po 'gro mgyogs sgyur dka' dang / /bdag po sme brtsegs thod nang du/ /de rnams rigs mthun rdzas bsags te/ /chu gsum la sogs rdzas rnams la/ /

sngags kyi sbyor ba btab pas ni/ /nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /oM badzra b+hai ra wA ya hUM phaT/ sha trU na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ drag po'i sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /'byung po rnams ni brlag par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba gzhan yang sbyor shes bya/ /'jigs byed

mas gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //khro mo chen mo srog gcod ma yis gsad pa yi/ /man ngag thabs kyi rim pa bstan/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /yi ge i yi gdan stengs su/ /bsgrub bya de ru bzhag nas ni/ /bzlas pa drag tu byas nas su/ /srog gcod pa

ni bskul bar bya/ /khri yi sngags kyis dgug par bya/ /khri yi sngags kyis gsad par bya/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas/ /srog gcod ma ni mdun du bskyed/ /grub pa mo yang spyan drangs te/ /mthu bskyed la sogs byas nas ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams

las/ /drag po'i brgyud pa'i mthu rnams ni/ /mda' zam btags pa'i tshul du byung / /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga nas/ /char bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /oM pra ti ta na hUM phaT/ sha trU na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sngags kyi sbyor ba gzhan dang mthun/ /drag

po'i las rnams gzhan po yang / /man ngag stobs kyis sbyor shes bya'o/ /srog gcod mas gsad pa'i rim pa'o// //dbugs rngub mas gsad pa'i rim pa ni/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas nas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas/ /drag po'i las kyi sbyor ba ni/ /

gru gsum 'bar ba'i gnas dag tu/ /'jigs pa'i rgyan cha gon nas ni/ /bram ze'am rgyal rigs nag po'i phyogs/ /mthun pa'i rdzas ni btsal nas kyang / /gru gsum steng du rten bcas nas/ /nag po 'bar ba'i sbyor ba brtsam/ /drag po'i rdzas la sngags bzlas te/ /bdun

dang nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / /zla ba dang gcig gi bar du bsgrub/ /de nas 'khor lo ldan pa'am/ /shugs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu myur bar 'phang bar bya/ /de nyid bskor ba'i tshul du'am/ /ri mo'i tshul du byas pa yis/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba'ang de bzhin bsam/ /oM

shwA sa gA pa ye hUM che ge mo sha tU na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ yang na drag po'i 'brub khung du/ /tsher ma can gyi shid bkang ste/ /raM las drag po'i me dpung bsam/ /gro ga 'am ni shing shun la/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris nas kyang / /khri'am 'bum du bzlas nas ni/ /bsgrub bya bkug

nas bstim par bya/ /drag po yi ni sngags kyis bsreg /'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /sbyor ba la sogs gzhan po yang / /man ngag can gyis sbyor shes bya'o/ /shwA sa gA pas gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o// //rak+ta'i las kyi phreng ba yis/ /gsad pa'i

las 'di brtsam par bya/ /dmar zhing chags pa'i rang bzhin can/ /khog pa'i rten ni btsal bar bya/ /'od ma'i gzhu ni lta bu yi/ /dkyil du de nyid bzhag nas kyang / /dus la de ni bab pa yi/ /smin byed dang po rgyug pa dang / /mdongs dang ldan pa'i mtshal chen gnyis/ /bsres

la sngags ni gdab par bya/ /dus tshod gsum du bsgrubs nas kyang / /bsgrub bya'i 'og tu sbas na ni/ /gang 'dod pa yi don rnams 'grub/ /yang na 'od ma lta bu'i dkyil/ /'dab brgyad dang ni ldan pa la/ /kha mthing la sogs mes spar la/ /dbang byed sngags ni bzlas pas

su/ /nges pa kho nar khugs par 'gyur/ /oM rak+ta pri ya ni hUM che ge mo ba shiM ku ru hUM/ sbyor ba la sogs gzhan po yang / /man ngag stobs kyis phye bar yang / /rak+ta bri ya nis gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o// //maM sa bag tris gsad pa ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas la/ /

sha zan de ni stong dag gi /rten la sogs pa rdzogs byas la/ /bug pa can gyi snod nang du/ /rdo rje'i mchu ni sbyar nas kyang / /rlung gi shugs kyis sngags 'di 'phang / /de yi sbyor ba ma zhig par/ /gang la bya ba de ru brdeg /des ni grong rnams 'khrug cing 'gas/ /'di yi sbyin

sreg gtor ma dang / /thabs dang 'khrul 'khor dag gis ni/ /gsad pa'i man ngag sbyor shes bya/ /oM mAM sa bag tri che ge mo sha trUn mA ra ya phaT/ maM sa bag tris gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o// //gzhan yang rdzas kyis gsad pa ni/ /da du ra dang 'ol ma se/ /

'gu phaT taM dang khu bar sbyar/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi la blud na smyo bar 'gyur/ /gsol ba 'debs na gso bar bya/ /khu ba la sogs rnams kyis ni/ /lus la byugs shing khong du blud/ /des ni nges par thar par 'gyur/ /gsad pa'i sbyor ba'i las rnams

kyang / /sangs rgyas la sogs bstan pa ni/ /'jig pa la sogs nges pa dang / /ru dra nag por gyur pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bya bar gsungs/ /de las gzhan du byas pa na/ /rang nyid nyams te dmyal bar ltung / /de yi sbyor ba byed pa yang / /tshad med sngon du 'gro byas la/ /

man ngag the tshom med par ni/ /byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /de yang bsgral bya'i yul de la/ /lus ngag yid gsum zhi bas ni/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i bden pa bdar/ /lan gsum byas kyang ma nyan na/ /ltung bar mi 'gyur bya bar gsungs/ /bsad pa las kyi phreng ba'o// //bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po sku yi sbyor ba dang / /gsung dang thugs kyi sbyor ba dang / /las ni gzhan sogs sbyor ba dang / /rdzogs pa mthar thug sbyor ba rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du bstan par bya/ /nag po 'jigs

pa'i cha lugs 'chang / /zhal gcig gam ni gnyis pa'am/ /zhal gsum pa'am phyag drug pa/ /gang 'dod pa ni bskyed par bya/ /des su bsnyen pa rdzogs byas la/ /ro bsregs thal ba'i 'jim pa la/ /nag po'i gzugs brnyan byas pa la/ /de nyid sbyin sogs

bskyed byas la/ /sngags bzlas pa yi stobs kyis su/ /shin tu 'dar zhing 'gul bar 'gyur/ /gtor ma la sogs byin nas kyang / /bstod cing gsol ba btab pas su/ /dgra rnams nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /drag po'i gru gsum thab khung du/ /gdug pa can gyi me

sbar nas/ /mar nag tsha ba gsum dang ni/ /sha khrag gsum gyi rdzas bsregs la/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste de la bstim/ /drag po'i sngags ni bzlas nas kyang / /rdzas rnams me yi nang gtor bas/ /nges pa kho nar 'jig par 'gyur/ /thabs dang ting 'dzin 'khor lo dang / /

gtor ma la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /gsad pa'i man ngag sbyor ba ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sbyor shes byas/ /de nas gsung gi nag po yi/ /sbyor ba bstan pa gang yang mthun/ /thugs kyi nag po'i sbyor ba yang / /gzhan du brgal te bstan pa na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis

sbyor shes bya'o/ /gsum ka la yang bzhi bzhir bstan/ /dper na rgyal po blon po dang / /las byed 'khor dang mi mthun phyogs/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sprul pa dang / /sa nas rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /dam can dam la gnas pa dang / /des su gdul bar bya ba bzhin/ /

de bzhin mkhas pas shes par bya'o/ /de rnams sku gsung thugs kyi don/ /bsdus pa bstan pa'i rim pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyis gsad pa'i las kyi rim pa'o// //las kyi rim pa gzhan bstan par bya ste/ /grong khyer dkrug pa'i cho ga ni/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar

gnas pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /nag po chen po lnga brtsal la/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba bri/ /mthun pa'i rdzas kyis dgang bar bya/ /sngags bzlas pas na don rnams 'grub/ /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swA hA/ sngags ni khri tsho re re bzlas/ /nag po 'bar

ba kha bcad do/ /grong gi dkyil dang phyogs bzhi ru/ /rked nub tsam du brkos nas su/ /de dag sa gter sba bar bya/ /thod pa la sogs snod nang du/ /mthun pa'i rdzas ni bsag par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dgra sngags bzlas/ /de yang grong khyer gseb du bskyal/ /bdun

bdun bar ni bcad byas la/ /de ltar byas na grong khyer 'khrug /grong khyer dkrug pa'i las kyi rim pa'o// //char ni dbab pa'i rim pa yang / /dang por bsnyen sbyor goms pa yis/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar bskyed la/ /rdzas rnams bsags pa'i thabs dag ni/ /yi ge

gnyis kyis sbyang byas la/ /klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas kyi/ /gzugs brnyan byas la kham phor du/ /bzhag nas bdud rtsi sogs kyis dgang / /ba nag 'o mas bkang nas ni/ /gzhon nu nag mos bkal ba yi/ /skud pa yis na bcing bar bya/ /rlung lha'i

phyogs su rdzing bu bya/ /klu yi rgyal po de ru bzhag /de yi 'gram du dkyil 'khor bya/ /sol ba rus pa ldong ros dang / /so phag lo ma rus phye la/ /nag po dkar po ser po dang / /dmar po ljang gu'i sa tshon bya/ /dur khrod srad bus thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum

byas nas ni/ /de yi dbus su mtha' yas bzhag /mgon po'i bdag po chen po bzhi/ /rgyud bzhi dang ni bstun nas kyang / /gang mos mgon pos gnan par bya/ /bdud rtsi me tog nag po dang / /'du byed khu ba glang po'i chang / /blugs dang mchod pa dbul bar bya/ /rang gis

rnal 'byor rnam pa yis/ /bzlas pa'i man ngag shes byas te/ /sngags bzlas pas ni char dbab pa'o/ /gal te mi 'bab de yi tshe/ /klu yi mgo ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /sprin dbral ba yi thabs rnams ni/ /dur khrod ras la nyer 'dug nas/ /sngags bzlas pas ni

'grub par 'gyur/ /oM AR+yA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ sngags las 'od zer 'phros pa yi/ /sprin pa bsdus shing sprin dral bas/ /gseb nas char ni 'bab par bsam/ /char dbab pa'i sngags bzlas pa/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru/ /g+hu Du g+hu Du/ ma sha ma sha g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ho

Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan+ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru kaM sa p+ta pA tA la ga tA na nA gA kaR+Sha ya baR+Sha ya gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuH/ hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ des ni char rnams mi 'bab na/ /sngags bzlog nas bzlas pas char 'bab bo/ /des char

mi 'bab na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// //char sogs bzlog pa'i cho ga ni/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas la/ /dur khrod sol ba'i rdzas dag la/ /sngags de bzlas shing btab pas su/ /de nas nam mkhar gtor bar bya/ /de ltar

byas pas bzlog par 'gyur/ /des ni bzlog par ma gyur na/ /gnas ni dben par gnas byas te/ /bdag nyid legs par bsrung byas la/ /bdag gi lus ni mer bsgoms te/ /gzhan nas kyang ni me byung nas/ /'jig rten thams cad mes gang bsam/ /sngags kyi 'od

zer las me byung / /char pa la sogs bsregs par bsam/ /des kyang bzlog par ma gyur na/ /glog phreng gi ni sbyor ba las/ /ji ltar 'byung zhing bzlog par bya'o/ /des ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur/ /char dang ser ba la sogs pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //

rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa ni/ /dus la bab nas 'chi 'gyur na/ /phung po bsreg par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /lha yi gnang ba thob par bya/ /lha yi gnang thob ma gyur na/ /sems ni las su rung bar bya/ /sems 'dzin nus

par ma gyur na/ /dus dang grangs kyi bsnyen pa ni/ /mos dang ldan pas rdzogs byas la/ /de nas brtsam par bya ba yin/ /de yang thun mong sngon song nas/ /phyis ni bsnyen pa gso don du/ /bsdu na lnga dang gsum du bya/ /dang po 'chi rtags brtag par bya/ /bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer

bskyed/ /skad cig tsam mos thugs kar ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ /yi ge hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /bla ma la sogs spyan drangs la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul ba dang / /gsol ba gdab cing skyabs su 'gro/ /lus dbul

dge rtsa bsngo bar bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang stong nyid bsgom/ /stong pa'i ngang las cho ga ni/ /rnam pa lngas bskyed bde gshegs tshul/ /cho ga gsum bskyed sems dpa'i tshul/ /de yang myur bar bskyed 'dod na/ /stong pa'i ngang las sa bon byung / /de nyid 'phros pas sku bskyed

ngo / /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ut+pal mdog /mche ba gtsigs pa sgeg dang bcas/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub 'chang / /'od kyi sprul pa'i dkyil na gnas/ /pad+ma stong ldan 'dab dkyil na/ /nyi zla'i gdan la zhabs kyis brten/ /ye shes kyi ni mthu bskyed cing / /byin

gyis brlabs pa la sogs bya/ /sku de nyid ni brten par bsgom/ /gshin rje srog gcod de la yang / /bden pa'i tshig gis bka' bsgo bya/ /de dag 'ongs par gyur nas kyang / /gtor ma yang ni gtang bar bya/ /de nas rnam shes 'pho ba'i phyir/ /

man ngag stobs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rna ba'i drung du sngags 'di bzlas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje bsam/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya yar+ha te samyak+saM bad+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+ya ma b+h+ya bi ni/ byo ma rU pa ya/ /sarba bya pi ni shi pa ya hri/ brarma mA ta

hrim/ baSh+ph+yi dang ya te/ hUM ru dra dang yi te/ k+Shu ru drak+Sha ra pi sarba ni hUM ru drak+Sha ra pi sarba ni hUM ru dre sa ru pe/ hri na da/ At+ma ke / hUM bin+du sha re re/ oM shag tri saM shag tri sam sha tri sa yo dza ni/ ma byo ma yo dza ni/ b+ho Sha ta kai ba l+ye ba de h+ma bid+h+ye na ma/ UM hUM hUM ltuM k+ShuM k+ShuM k+ShuM na/ oM oM I u/ byo ma

bya pi ni po sha Ta/ de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /mi bskyod gnas ni nyams dga' ba/ /dga' dang 'chi ba rnam spangs par/ /rnam par shes pa byung nas 'gro/ /de yi tshangs pa'i sgo nas ni/ /rnam shes myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum byed cing / /ro ni ngo

mtshar phyag rgyar ldan/ /de lta bu yi sems can de la ni/ /bar ma do yi gnas dag tu/ /'od kyi phreng ba'i 'khor lo yis/ /mi bskyod pa dang tha mi dad/ /'od kyis bzung nas 'khor lo yi/ /cha lugs 'dzin pa nyid du lta/ /de yi sdig pa bsdus nas kyang / /khog pa'i rten la

bsdu bar bya/ /ga phur gur kum la sogs pa'i/ /spos kyi chu yis bkru bar bya/ /dri ma med pa'i ras la ni/ /byin gyis brlabs nas g.yogs par bya/ /rol mo'i cha byad dang ldan pas/ /dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas su bskyal/ /de nas ro ni bsreg bya ste/ /sa dang sta gon

cho ga dang / /slob dpon las dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /de nas ro ni bsreg par bya/ /yang na sta gon byas rting la/ /bsreg par bya ba nyid du bya/ /sa ni brtag dang bslang ba dang / /sbyang dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang / /gzung dang bsrung ba nyid du bya/ /de rnams zhib tu bya ba

yang / /dkyil 'khor spyi rgyud gzhan dang mthun/ /de nas maN+Dal steng du ni/ /thig le byas te tshom bu dgram/ /lha bskyed pa'am lha sprul pa/ /ye shes spyan drangs gnyis su bsre/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod dang / /rdo rje

glu dang gar sogs kyis/ /mchod cing bstod pa rgyas par bya/ /gsol ba btab ste snyan gsan dbab/ /de nas sbyin sreg dag gis sbyang / /bum pa byin gyis brlab pa yang / /bya dang mi bya gnyis su bstan/ /byed na cho ga gzhan dang mthun/ /slob ma sta gon gnas pa

yang / /gshin dang gson ni gnyis su bstan/ /mi bskyod gnas na gnas pa der/ /dbang bskur byed na 'dir bkug la/ /sta gon yang ni rgyas par bya/ /sta gon byed pa'i tshul rnams kyang / /gson la byed pa ji bzhin bya/ /dbang bskur de ni mi byed na/ /sta gon de yang mi bya ste/ /mi bskyod gnas su

bzhag nas ni/ /byin brlabs byas te smon lam gdab/ /ro de nyid ni byin brlabs la/ /sreg khang thur la khru do'am/ /khru gang rko ba che chung tshad/ /rgyar yang gru bzhi khru do'am/ /mu ran sor brgyad bcu drug tshad/ /kha dog dkar po zlum zhing 'khyil/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad

bri/ /phyi rol bri dang mi bri dang / /'bri bar rgyan rnams gzhan dang mthun/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rdzogs par dgram/ /shing rnams dri dang ldan pa dang / /'jag ma ku sha la sogs kyis/ /thab khung 'og tu gding bar bya/ /phung po shar du kha bstan te/ /tsog pur bcas te

gzhag par bya/ /shing rnams mchod rten dbyibs su brtsig /phyi ni mchod rten dbyibs 'dra la/ /kha dog dkar por byas nas kyang / /skar khung bzhi ni gtod par bya/ /mchod rdzas la sogs bkram nas kyang / /bdag nyid bskyed pa rdzogs byas la/ /pho brang byin gyis

brlabs nas kyang / /me lha rgyal po bskyed par bya/ /ye shes me lha spyan drangs la/ /bgegs bstsal mchod cing bstod pa bya/ /ye shes dgug cing bstims byas la/ /rgyas gdab dam tshig bsgo ba dang / /dbang bskur byas nas mchod par bya/ /bstod pa la sogs rdzogs

nas kyang / /me lha shar lhor bzhugs pa'am/ /yang na thugs kar pho brang bca'/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim/ /byin brlabs la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod bya/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags la ni/ /sdig pa

zhi byed sngags bzlas la/ /bar du ming ni gzhug par bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya ru bzlas/ /mchod rdzas g.yon du bkram nas kyang / /sreg rdzas g.yas su dgram par bya/ /mar dang yam shing zho dang ni/ /mngar gsum 'bras chan la sogs pa/ /rim pa bzhin du dbul

bar bya/ /tha mar dgang blugs phul nas ni/ /mchod cing bstod de gsol ba gdab/ /badzra muHyi mtha' can gyis/ /gshegs su gsol te dam tshig bsdu/ /tha ma me yi lha la ni/ /cho ga gong bzhin bsdus te bya/ /ye shes me lha gshegs nas ni/ /dam tshig me lha bsdu

bar bya/ /de ltar rten dang sdig bshags la/ /brten po gong bzhin bkug nas ni/ /pho brang gnyis su bca' byas nas/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas pas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji bzhin par/ /dkyil 'khor bcug la dbang bskur bya/ /de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ /

mi bskyod pa yi gnas dag tu/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste/ /rlung gi 'khor lo'i shugs kyis 'phang / /de ltar byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /man ngag lag len goms pa yis/ /sbyangs nas bde 'gror nges par skye/ /rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /ngan song

gsum na 'khyams na yang / /sngags la sogs pa'i mthu rnams kyis/ /dus de ru ni shin tu bde/ /de nas myur du thar bar byed/ /gzhan yang dur khrod rus pa ni/ /lo brgya'am lo stong lon pa la/ /bsreg pa la sogs byas pa na/ /sdug bsngal las ni thar bar 'gyur/ /

rus pa med na ming sogs la/ /cho ga byas na thar bar 'gyur/ /nyams su ma lon cho ga 'khrugs/ /rang nyid dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /de bas mkhas pas bsgrims te bya'o/ /phung po rten dang bcas pa yi/ /bsreg pa las kyi rim pa i thi// //rdzogs pa'i man ngag

bstan pa ni/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ /lte ba snying ga mgrin pa dang / /mgo bo yi ni gnas dag tu/ /sprul pa chos kyi sku dang ni/ /longs spyod bde chen gnas zhes bya/ /lte bar drug cu rtsa bzhi la/ /gsal byed yi ge nyis lnga ba dgod/ /snying gar sde tshan

mang po brgyad/ /mgrin par A li bcu drug dgod/ /dung khang gi ni gnas dag tu/ /A li gnyis ni bzlas par bya/ /bde chen gyi ni gnas dag tu/ /a wa d+hU tI dbus su rgyug /la la nA dang ra sa nA/ /g.yas dang g.yon du rgyug pa yin/ /de rnams nang na rdo rje rlung / /phra mo

dag ni gnas pa yin/ /de la rten gyi byang chub sems/ /nyi ma'i zer bzhin khyab par gnas/ /bde chen tshangs pa'i mthongs khung nas/ /rdo rje nor bu mthar thug par/ /shin tu khyab par rgyas pa yin/ /gtum mo sbar ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /de nyid gsal ba rgyas pa dang / /byang

chub sems kyang shin tu gsal/ /de la brten pa'i byang chub sems/ /mi 'gyur stobs 'dzin sa legs la/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i gnas dag tu/ /dga' ba skyes pa bum pa'i dbang / /'bras bu yang ni bstan pa yin/ /la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni/ /rtsa dang rlung dang brten

pa la/ /bshad tshul bzhi yis bum pa'i dbang / /dngos su dga' ba'i don la yang / /dga' bde bzhi yi don tshang bas/ /bum pa'i dbang bzhi de la sbyar/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la/ /rtsa rlung rten dang brten pa la/ /shes pa'i dbang ni tshul bzhin bshad/ /de ni mchog

dga' skye ba'i sa/ /mchog dga' nyid dang dga' bzhi tshang / /gsang ba'i dbang bzhi de la sbyar/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la/ /khyad par dga' ba bskyed pa'i sa/ /rlung sogs shes rab ye shes dbang / /khyad par dga' ba de la yang / /dga' bzhi skyed pa'i rim pa la/ /shes rab

ye shes don shes bya/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i sa/ /mthar thug bzhi yi dbang 'di yin/ /de yi gzhung lugs gnyis po yang / /man ngag rim par sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi pa de la'ang gnyis su bstan/ /rten bcas dang ni rten med do/ /rten

bcas la yang gnyis su bstan/ /spros bcas dang ni spros med do/ /rten bcas gtum mo nyid la brten/ /spros bcas kun du bzang mo'i mkha'/ /rnam dag klong dkyil bstan pa'i phyir/ /ye shes thabs kyis mtshon byed ni/ /man ngag spros te bstan pas su/ /

mkha' dbyings rnam dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /spros med man ngag bstan pa ni/ /gong gi man ngag de dag kun/ /'di yis rtogs pa spang bya yin/ /dngos po gnas pa'i gnas lugs ni/ /rang gi byang chub sems nyid ni/ /dkar po la sogs ma yin zhing / /mtshon byed kun gyis

mtshon du med/ /shas brjod kun las 'das pas na/ /gang du yang ni bsam du med/ /yengs su yang ni rdul tsam med/ /chos rnams ye nas skye med la/ /skye ba med ces sgro mi 'dogs/ /chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems/ /sems nyid ye nas skye med la/ /skye ba med ces

sgro mi 'dogs/ /blun po gang zhig mi shes pas/ /dper na nam mkha' 'di med ces/ /sgro 'dogs 'byes pas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis su/ /skye ba med la sogs pa ru/ /ye nyid nas su sgro mi 'dogs/ /de lta bu yi don nyid la/ /the tshom med

par gtan la dbab/ /de nas rnal 'byor gdeng gyur pas/ /bsam med yengs med tsam du ni/ /bsgom pas man ngag rtogs par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtogs pas rdzogs rim gyi/ /dbang gi man ngag mthar thug yin/ /rab tu gnas pa'i rdzogs rim yang / /rnal 'byor mkhas

pas sbyor shes bya'o/ /mi mkhas pas ni dug tu 'gyur/ /de yang dus skabs bzhi ru ni/ /rim pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/ /dang po bya ba'i dus dag ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas la/ /nam mkhar gnas pa de dag la/ /sngon gyi bzhin du gsol ba gdab/ /cho ga yan lag rdzogs

byas nas/ /dag pa la sogs byas pa la/ /dang po de la nus pa gzhug /nus mthu bskyed pa'i cho ga ni/ /byas nas de la tshogs bsag go/ /de nas dus ni gnyis pa ru/ /phra mo 'thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /snying ga'i pho brang gnas dag tu/ /de dang de ni tha mi dad/ /de nyid

la ni de nyid kyis/ /de nyid du ni cung zhig tu/ /de yi de yi thabs kyis su/ /de lta de ltar rdzogs par bya/ /dus ni gsum pa dag la ni/ /ye shes thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'khor lo rten gyi gnas dag tu/ /de nyid de ltar gnas pa na/ /de nyid la ni de nyid do/ /de nyid thabs

kyi sbyor bas su/ /de de man ngag rdzogs par thob/ /dus ni bzhi pa dag la yang / /rnam rgyud stobs kyi spyod yul yin/ /de ltar rab gnas rdzogs rim bya/ /rdo rje nor bu'i rtsa ba ru/ /dga' ba skyes pa bum pa'i dbang / /gsang ba'i pho brang gnas dag tu/ /mchog dga'

skyes pa gsang ba'i dbang / /khyad par dga' ba'i gnas dag tu/ /khyad par dga' ba skyes pa ni/ /shes rab ye shes dbang nyid do/ /rin chen pho brang gnas dag tu/ /lhan cig dga' ba skyes pa ni/ /dbang ni bzhi par shes par bya/ /de la rdzogs rim las kyi rim/ /

phreng ba lta bur brgyud de 'ongs/ /de dag drag po'i las sogs rnams/ /rin chen phreng ba ltar brgyud 'di/ /srog lus rdzas rnams 'bul byed pa'i/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /btsa' dka' dam bzhag byas te gtad/ /de ltar mi byed rmongs pas su/ /dam med

rmongs pa'i lag shor na/ /dus min shi nas dmyal bar ltung / /de nas nan tan bskyed de btsa'/ /bdag gis sems can gdon pa'i phyir/ /man ngag rin chen 'di byas pas/ /bdag dang 'gro ba'i sems can rnams/ /phyag rgya mchog ni thob par shog /las kyi rim pa

mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon bIr+ya gu pa sU trI zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dur khrod nags tshal du brgyud pa'i slob dpon la shin tu gsang zhing

zhus pa'i don lags so/ /[ ]@##/ /phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba bzhugs/ @##/ /phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang la bsnyen pa'i rim pa ni/ /maN+Dal

'dom gang gru bzhi pa/ /ba yi rnam lngas byi dor bya/ /dbus su lnga ldan sbrul dgu dgod/ /mdun du bum pa bzed zhal dang / /mchod pa rnam lnga bcas par dgod/ /'khor sogs snod ni mdzes pa ru/ /'o ma dang bcas sman rnams kyis/ /bkang ste mdun

du bzhag pa'o/ /zhes pa ni/ 'o ma'i nang du klu sman sna tshogs pa blugs la gzhag pa'o/ /de steng gzhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /rdzas gong du bsags pa de rnams la bya'o/ /rdzas de rnams gang la dbul bar bstan pa'i phyir/ shin tu gsal byed gdan stengs su/ /lnga ldan

mtha' yas sbrul dgu pa/ /zhes bya ba ni mdun du rgya mtsho chen po bsams pa'i nang du/ phuHlas klu mtha' yas sku mdog ser po/ phyag gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba/ dbu la sbrul mgo dgu yod pa/ sbrul 'khyil pa lnga'i steng na bzhugs par bsam mo/ /hUM las phyag na rdo rje chu

las nya ldang pa'i tshul du dkrongs kyis bskyed do/ /sku mdog mthing ga /dbu skra thor tshugs gcig tu bcings pa/ zhal bgrad pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan bzlog pa/ zas su sbrul za ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par bsams

la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang / dgug gzhug bcing bstim/ de la mchod pa'i yan lag dang / mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod bstod/ oM AHhUM gsum gyis gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs/ de nas klu la mchod pa'i phyir/ rtsi sman mchod cing

mdun gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ste/ gong du bskyed pa'i klu la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bcing bstims la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do/ /de nas sngags brjod cing 'o ma dang bcas rtsi sman gyis mchod do/ /klu'i nad dang gdug rtsub thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig

ces brjod cing bstod do/ /de nas sngags 'di bdun 'bum du bzlas so/ /oM badzra nyi ma sa bla na klad pa naM/ kun na zhi/ tsi t+ta ku li naM/ tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer/ dus bzhi'i mchod pa rgyun du bya'o/ /klu yi gtor ma dus bzhir btang / mtha' ma rtags byung ba dang / las kyi mtha' brtul

bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag rnal 'byor pa sdang mig tu blta zhing / zhes pa ni/ bdag phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal du gnas la/ mdun du gru gsum mthing nag brus la/ ngar phye la sogs pa'i rdzas la ling+ga byas la/ /ming rus gro ga'am shing shun la bris la gzhug go/ /de sbal pa

nag po dang lto sbyar la tshon skud kyis dkris la gru gsum du gzhug go/ /de'i bla dgug par bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ yang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la gong gi ling+ga la bstim mo zhes pa ni go sla'o/ /sngags ni oM badzra nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la badzra aM ku sha dzaHzhes pas dgug

pa'o/ /de nas dgra bgegs bsgral ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ seng ldeng gi phur pas gdab cing brub par bya zhes pa ni/ lag tu nyungs kar blangs la/ nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la che ge mo mA ra ya rbad ces bzlas shing / gru gsum du nyungs kar brab bo/ seng ldeng gi phur pas

dril zhing / nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ces phur pas gdab bo/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad la/ de nas thal mo brdab cing nad dang gdon bgegs thams cad brlag par bsam mo zhes pa ni/ thal mo brdab

cing gdon bgegs stong phrag brgyad cu/ sku la bsngo ba'i dgra thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa dbang du bsdus shing lus rdul phran du rlogs shig ces brjod do/ /de nas las kyi mtha' brtul bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsreg mnan bskyar ba nyams dang sbyar/ /zhes 'byung

ste/ thab khung rnying pa'am sar par gdug pa can gyi shing la me btang la/ sbyin sreg bya ba dang / mnan pa bskyar ba kun man ngag bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod pa ni/ lcang lo

can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste/ /log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po mtha' yas ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs mdog /

phyag gnyis thal sbyar rin chen 'dzin/ /sbrul mgo dgu yi btsun mo yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud pa'i 'khor bcas la/ /mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bdud rtsi zil dngar sman gyis mchod/ /klu yi gdug rtsub zhi gyur cig /oM nA ga badzra pu Sh+pe hUM/ oM

nA ge badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM nA ga badzra A lo ke hraMH/ oM nA ga badzra gan+dA+e gaM/ oM nA ga badzra ni bi d+ye hUM/ oM nA ga badzra bo d+ha ka re hUM/ bstod pa dang mchod pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ser ba dbab par 'dod na/ maN+Dal gru bzhi pa cig

byas la/ de'i steng du lnga ldan mtha' yas sbrul rgyu ba'i gzugs dang / bzed zhal dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /dug rdzas sna tshogs dang / yungs kar la sogs pa'i rdzas dang / dri mi zhim pa sna tshogs bsag go/ /rabs chad kyi thod pa mtshan ngan cig gi nang du/ tshil

dang / khyi nag dang / bong bu nag po dang / rta nag po dang / de rnams kyi khrag blugs so/ /thod pa'i phyi rol du yang bsku'o/ /tshil chen dang / khrag phyed phyed dong chung du yang blugs la/ zor thun gyi rdzas su gzhag go/ /thod pa'i nang du ser ba byung ba'i chu yang blugs so/ /thod

pa de yugs sa mo'i dor rtas dril la maN+Dal gyi byang shar du gru gsum gyi steng du gzhag go/ /'gram du seng ldeng gi phur pa cig kyang gzhug go/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje bskyed la mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / sngags bzlas pa kun bsnyen pa ltar bya'o/ /de nas las la sbyor ka ni/

mchod bstod gong bzhin bya/ /sngags 'di bdun 'bum bzlas shing / thod pa dong chung du ser rta'i nang du yungs kar la sogs pa'i thun brdeg go/ /nyi mas bla na ser ba phob/ klad pa nan ser ba phob/ kun zhi ser ba phob/ tsit+ta ku li nan ser ba phob/ /tsi tra mutra ser ba phob/

bzlog byer ser ba phob/ nA ga hril hril ser ba phob/ /nA ga phrom ser ba phob/ nA ga phob ser ba phob ces bzlas so/ /sngags de rnams yi ger bris pa thod par gzhug go/ /de nas skabs skabs su gtor ma gtong ngo / /de nas thod pa khyer la yul gyi chu mig gam/ lha

tho'i rtsar song la gser skyems gtang / /lha 'dre la dmod btsugs la thod pa gzhag go/ /'gram du phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la gzugs so/ /de nas dong chung gi khrag dum ka yang gtor ro/ /de nas dong chung gi khrag la khrag dum ka yang bsnan la/ gong bzhin zor sgrub zhag

lnga'am drug tu bya'o/ /de nas rtag tu sngas su bcug la thun brdeg go/ /de nas dgra'i yul du phyin la/ zhing thog dang ser rta'i thog tu zor 'phang ngo / /thun brdeg go/ /yul 'dir sngags bzlas shing ser ba phob bya'o/ /ser ba dbab pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ser ba bsrung bar 'dod na maN+Dal mchod pa gong bzhin du byas nas/ thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / phur pa rnams bsags la/ lag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la/ nyi ma sa bla'i rting la badzra pra be+e sha ya phaT/ sa 'di srungs shig byer ya zhes

'bum tsam bzlas so/ /skabs su gtor ma gtang ngo / /thal chen dang ske tshe ras kyi khung du phur la phur pa'i ske la gdags so/ /phur pa khyer la yul phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du lha ma srin sde brgyad la phur pa btab par dmigs la tho gzugs so/ /de nas ser ba byung na/

ser ba 'ong ba'i phyogs su thal chen dang ske tshe 'phang zhing sngags bzlas/ g.yas g.yon du mdzub ris byas la bsrung ngo / /des kyang ma thub na/ rang gi lag pa g.yas g.yon du/ bsrung ba'i zhing yul bsams la/ thal mo kha sbub ste/ ser ba pha ri la 'phangs par bsam

mo/ /sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/ badzra pra be sha ya phaT/ sa 'di srungs shig byer ya bya'o/ /des ser ba thub par 'gyur ro/ /ser ba bsrung ba'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /char dbab par 'dod na/ klu'i rten sa chu mig gi bgab

ni dma' bar sbra phub la maN+Dal bya/ phyag na rdo rje dang lnga ldan sbrul dgu pa mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas la gzungs gdon/ klu mchod bya'o/ /chu gtor gtang / de nas mdun du gru gsum brus la/ bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas la gzhug go/ /de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo

rje'i nga rgyal byas la/ seng ldeng gi phur pa thogs la/ nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/ nA ga hril hril/ nA ga phrom phrom/ nA ga phob/ char pa phob ces mang du bzlas so/ /klu'i spyi bor phur pa btab la char pa phob ces bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma gtang / de nas dong

sas bkab la char pa phob ces bya'o/ /dus dus bslang zhes bya ba ni/ zhag re lon zhing chu mig la yar yar sbra phub la maN+Dal dang / de ltar nub re re zhing re re bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa la chu mig gi thog tu sbra phub la maN+Dal dang mchod bstod la sogs pa gong bzhin du byas la/

klu'i gzugs la sngags bzlas la phur pa gdab po/ /zhag bdun du bya'o/ /char dbab ba'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu bzlog par 'dod na/ maN+Dal bya ba dang / bskyed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa kun gong bzhin du byas la/ mdun

du dong gru gsum brus la/ dong gi nang du bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas la gzhug go/ /rdzas ni tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / tshon skud sna lnga las sngags mdud byas pa dang / seng ldeng gi phur pa dang / de rnams la lhar bskyed pa dang / mchod bstod byas la sngags 'di bzlas

so/ /nyi ma sa bla na klad pa naM/ ku na zhi tsiT+Ta ku linaM/ tseT+ra muT+ra bzlog byer/ nA ga shig nA ga byer/ nA ga naM/ nA ga mgo naM/ nA ga ha na ha na/ nA ga ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad naM zhes grangs mang du bzlas la/ tshil chen na sar bsku/ gla rtsi lus kun du bsku/ sngags mdud lus la gdags/ mdun

du dong gru gsum brus la/ bag phye las klu'i gzugs byas te bcug la/ de la bdag la gnod pa'i klu dgug gzhug bya/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed la phur pa dril zhing sngags bzlas la/ seng ldeng gi phur pa klu la gdab bo/ de nas klu'i gzugs de'i thod par bcug la/

lha khang gi them pa'i 'og tu mnan no/ /dus thams cad du lha'i nga rgyal du byas la bzlas pa bya'o/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga bla na med pa'i dis ci 'dra ba yang thub bo/ /klu bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa bdag gnod pa bzlog par 'dod

na bsnyen pa gong bzhin du bya/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa kun byas la/ mdun du dong gru gsum brus la nad du bag phye las sa bdag gi gzugs byas la/ tshon skud kyis ske nas btags la gzhug /rdzas la tshil chen dang / tshon skud sna lnga las sngags mdud byas la/ gla rtsi dang / seng

ldang gi phur pa la sngags 'di bdun 'bum bzlas/ /skabs su gtor ma gtang / nyi mas bla na'i rting la/ sa dom nag po sod/ sa dom nag po sod/ sa dom nag po nan/ sa dom nag po nan zhes bzlas la/ tshil chen na sar bsku/ sngags mdud lus la gdags la/ gla

rtsis lus kun du bkru/ seng ldeng gi phur pa la sngags 'di bdun 'bum bzlas la/ sa bdag gi snying gar gdab/ sa bdag thod par bcug la mchod rten gyi 'og tu mnan/ dus thams cad du gong bzhin du bya'o/ /sa bdag bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud dang ma mo dang / btsan dang 'byung po phal pa'i gnod pa bzlog par 'dod na/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ yang maN+Dal dang / lha bskyed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa kun byas la/ mdun du dong gru gsum brus la/ ngar zan las 'byung po'i gzugs byas la/ tshon

skud kyis ske nas btags la nang du gzhug go/ /gnod pa'i 'byung po de la dgug gzhug byas la/ bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal du gnas te/ phur pa dang yungs kar la sngags 'di bzlas la/ 'byung po la yungs kar gyi thun brdeg /nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la phyug tsi phaT/ tsi ga phyu phaT/ lce ba ti phaT ces nus tshad

bzlas la/ /'byung po'i gzugs thod par bcug la/ mchod rten gyi 'og tu mnan no/ /skrang 'bur byung ba la yang gdab bo/ /bdud dang ma mo dang btsan dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du bsrung ba

'di khyad par du rgyal po la bya'o/ /bsnyen pa gong du byas la/ maN+Dal dang / lha bskyed pa dang / mchod bstod byas la/ mdun du dong gru gsum du/ ngar zan las rgyal po'i gzugs byas la bcug la tshon skud kyis ske nas gdags so/ /de nas phur pa dang / nyungs kar

dang / nyungs nag dang / ske tshe dang / thal chen la sngags 'di bzlas pa mang du bya'o/ /skra spyi bor bcings la/ nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/ e pa ka ra tse/ di nA ga bar ma pa la se to ye zhes bzlas la/ gzugs la yungs kar la sogs pa'i thun brdeg go/ /snying

gar phur pa btab pa thod par bcug la/ ce ti'i 'og tu mnan no/ /rgyal po bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du srung bar byed na/ bca' gzhi gong dang 'dra/ skra spyi bor bcings la/ sngags 'di bzlas/ nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/

e pa ka ra tse/ di nA ga bar ma/ pa la se to ye/ shig byer nan/ go nan/ ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nan zhes mang du bzlas la/ /thun dang mnan pa kun gong bzhin bya'o/ /thams cad bsrung ba'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gong pos gnod na 'di ltar bya ste/

sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ mdun du dong gru gsum brus la/ dong gi nang du ngar zan lnga bcug la tshon skud kyis ske nas btags la gzhag go/ /gang gnod pa'i 'gong po bris la lus la gzhug /de nas maN+Dal byas la/ lha bskyed pa dang / mchod bstod byas la sngags bzlas so/ /nyi ma sa

bla na'i rting la/ mgo ste sa ste nan zhes mang du bzlas la thun brdeg go/ /phur pa btab la thod par gzhug /rab gnas byas pa'i mchod rten 'og tu mnan no/ /phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal dang stang stabs kyis mtshams bcad do/ /'gong po thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du bsrung ba zhes bya ba/ sngags pa gzhan gyi sbod gtong bsrung bar 'dod na/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ de nas maN+Dal bya ba dang / bzed zhal dang / mchod pa bsham pa dang / maN+Dal gyi steng du mchod rten nag po khong stong brtsigs

pa'i nang du kho'i gzugs bag zan las byas la/ ming rus bcug la gzhag go/ /bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje bag zan las byas la gzhug go/ /rdo rjes de'i lus 'gems par bsam mo/ /mchod rten gyi 'og tu dong gru gsum brus la/ de'i nang du yang kho'i gzugs

dang / ming rus bcug la/ sbrul dang sbal pa gnyis kyi lto bar bcug la/ klu lnga ldan sbrul dgu pas za bar bsam mo/ de thod par bcug la gru gsum du gzhug /lan cig gzhung bzhin du mnan par bya'o/ /bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer bsams la/ phur pa 'dril zhing sngags

bzlas pas/ kho'i srung ma bdag gi bka' nyan cing las byed par bsam mo/ /bdag gis rbad pas kho rang gi srog gcod par bsam mo/ /de nas thun rdzas dang phur pa rnams bsags la/ lha bskyed pa dang / mchod bstod dang / sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la/ bar

ma ma hA AHhUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA zhes 'grub tshad bzlas/ bskor ba phyin ci log tu bya/ thun brdeg /mnan zor gyi mtha' brtul lo/ /sbod gtong thams cad bzlog pa'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdun du 'brub khung gru gsum

du/ /dgra dang bgegs kyi ling+ge gzhug /dgra yi ling+ga rkang rjes dang / /dri ma phyi sa gcin las bya'o/ /rabs chad thod par bcug nas ni/ /thod pa yugs sa'i zhabs mas dril/ /de yang re ba'i steng du gzhag /'gram du dug rdzas sna tshogs dang / /drag po'i rdzas rnams bzhag

nas ni/ /skabs su dug thun rdzas thun brdeg /de yi 'gram du maN+Dal te/ /bzed zhal mchod pa rnam lnga bsham/ /bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje dang / /lnga ldan bskyed cing spyan drangs dang / /mchod dang bstod dang gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni/ /nyi ma sa bla naM/ klad

pa naM/ kun zhi tsit+ta ku li naM/ tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer/ thum ril rbad che ge mo mA ra ya dzaHrbad naM/ 'bum mam sum 'bum bzlas la/ skabs skabs su ag tshe ba na mar thun brdeg go/ /de ltar byas nas thod pa khyer la/ lam rgya gram mam/ mchod rten dang / dur khrod dam/ gong

gsum mam/ chu mig gam/ la btsas sam/ chu gling la mnan pa gzhung bzhin du bya'o/ /dgra dang bgegs kyi ling+ga bca' ba'i rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra gsad pa'i rim pa ni dang por bdag rnal 'byor pa'i mdun du mdzub

gang pa'i 'brub khung gru gsum brus te/ dur khrod kyi sol bas nag por byug go/ /de'i nang du dgra bo'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang / bag phye las ling+ga byas la/ ming byang bcug la gru gsum du gzhug /de'i khar g.yam pa sngon po cig la/ /yung ba ser

pos ri rab dang / rdo rje rgya gram gyi gzugs bris la/ kha bcad la gzhag go/ /'gram du bzed zhal dang mchod pa rnam lnga bshams la/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje dang / mdun du lnga ldan bskyed cing spyan drangs/ mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / gsol ba gdab/ gu gul dag

gis lha dang dbral/ thun gyi rdzas rnams bsags nas ni/ drag po'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyi mas bla naM/ klad pa naM ku na zhi/ tsit+ta ku li naM/ tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer/ thum ril rbad che ge mo mA ra ya dzaH rbad naM zhes 'bum bzlas/ de nas ling+ga'i mgo bcad la/ /mgo dang

ling+ga sar pa gnyis/ /rabs chad thod pa'i nang du gzhug /mnan pa sgrub pa tshul bzhin bya/ /lha 'dre gnas pa'i sa ru gzhug /ling+ga'i lus dang gsar pa gnyis/ /ral gris gtubs la drag po'i rdzas dang gdug pa can gyi shing la sbyin sreg tshul bzhin du bya'o/ /dgra la bya ba'i

rim pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg byed na sla ba'am thab khung rnying pa ru/ brgya'am yang na lnga bzhi gcig /bskyar zhing las la sbyar bar bya/ /gdug pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs dang / mar nag tshil chen ske tshe dang / /til dang ming

byang spel te bsreg /me lha bskyed la sbyin sreg dbul/ /sngags ni nyi ma sa bla na'i rting la che ge mo rak+Sha shAn+tiM ku ru mA ra ya rbad ces pas/ dug sna tshogs dang / dri mi zhim pa sna tshogs dang / drag po'i rdzas sna tshogs dang / mar nag la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dgra

bgegs gang yin par mos par byas la/ /rdzas re dang sngags re bstun zhing sbyin sreg bya'o phyag na rdo rje dang / lnga ldan bskyed pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas la/ de nas me lha bskyed la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /drag po dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa'o// //

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gru gsum nyis 'gyur bris la nang thal ba 'jam pos byug /kha rtsang dmar gyis bskor/ nyi ma sa bla na la sogs pa la 'di gdags so/ /shig byer nan/ mgo nan/ ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nan/ sbal pa'am/ sbrul lta bu'i rjes

byung na 'gong po yin/ bong bu'i rjes byung na 'gong po yin/ /u ma pa'i bshags pa 'dra ba byung na rgyal po yin/ shing lo lta bu'i rjes sam ral pa bsnyigs pa lta bu'i rjes byung na bdud yin/ mda' mang po bzhag pa 'dra ba'i rjes byung na btsan yin/ phug ron gyi bya bra'i rjes 'dra

ba'am/ lcags thag sprel ba'i rjes byung na ma mo yin/ de rnams gang byung ba dang las la sbyar ro/ /rdo rje lce dbab kyi 'grel pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slad kyi paN+Di ta dza yA ka ra

dang / lo tsA ba mar pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn dzi hwAM be sha man+t+ra hr-i da yaM/ badzra pA Ni sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi gsang ba'i yang bkol gyi sgrub pa'i

thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar dgus ni/ /ri bong 'dzin la gar gyis bzhugs/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi gtso/ /rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nas bla ma'i bka'

drin gyis/ ji ltar rim pas sgrub pa'i thabs/ /bdag ni bla ma'i rjes dran pas/ /de yi sgrub thabs cho ga bshad/ /dang por rnal 'byor snod ldan gyis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrub 'dod pas/ /dur khrod dben pa'i gnas phyogs su/ /ro gsum med pa'i sa la ni/ /maN+Dal

dkyil 'khor legs byas la/ /me tog sngon pos mdzes byas la/ /mdun du rten la sogs pa dgram/ /phyi yi mchod pa rnam lnga dang / /nang gi bdud rtsi gtor mar bcas/ /sha chang zas kyi longs spyod bsham/ /rnal 'byor gnas bcas shes rab can/ /khrus bya

nye reg 'thor 'thung bsang gtor bya'o/ /bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug nas/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i skyil krung bca'/ /yan lag bdun dang ldan pa yis/ /sems bskyed sngon du 'gro bar bya/ /de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sa bon

gyis/ /bla ma dang gos sngon can/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs la/ sa bon las byung ba'i mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ gdan dbul ba dang / phyag btsal ba dang / nye reg dang / 'thor 'thung bsang gtor dbul ba dang / mchod pa la sogs

te yan lag bdun pa bya'o/ /bla ma dang ni gos sngon can/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa sna tshogs pa dang / me tog la sogs pa phul la/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'i phyir/ bdag gis

sdig pa ma lus par ni bshags par bgyi/ de nas bla ma dang ni gos sngon can/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ni/ slob dang mi slob la sogs sems can rnams kyi don du/ bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing / /byang

chub tu ni de dag bsngo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/

de'i mtshan nyid bral bas stong / /rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med/ /rang bzhin gyis na dngos po rnams/ /smon pa dang bral bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ /'od kyi phung por bdag rang nyid/ /de nas e dang yaM raM baM laM suM hUM rnams yongs su gyur pa las/

gru gsum pa dang / gzhu'i dbyibs dang / gru gsum pa dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi dang / nag po dang / sngo skya dang / dmar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po bsam par bya'o/ /'byung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor gong nas gong du bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du suM gyi yi ge las byung ba'i zur

bzhi rin po che'i rang bzhin can/ rwa brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i steng du/ oM me dI nI badzrI b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badzra prA kA ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra pany+tsa ra hUM yaM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badzra sa ra dz+wA la traM saM traM/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lA rka hUM raM hUM sngags/ de rnams kyis rdo rje'i sa

gzhi la sogs drug mngon du gyur to/ /de'i nang du b+hUM dang / tsa dang paM dang a nyid do/ /de steng zla ba rdo rje bsam/ /de yi lte bar hUM gis mtshan/ /hUM sngon 'od zer lngar ldan pa/ /rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa/ /rab tu khros pas brkyang bskum

ste/ /bcu drug lo lon sha tshugs can/ /spyan gsum me ltar 'bar ba la/ /shin tu khros pa'i lta stangs can/ /bsnun pa'i tshul gyis legs bzung zhing / /dril bu sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsgreng / /stod g.yogs na bza' sngon po la/ /smad g.yogs stag gi sham thabs

can/ /nyi ma'i 'od can zla ba'i mdangs/ /ha ha'i 'o dod chen po yis/ /log 'dren la sogs skrag par mdzad/ /'jigs byed khro bo'i bdag por ni/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni sku'i mtshan nyid do/ /zas su sbrul za ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sa bon bkod la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya'o/ /bzhugs su gsol ba dang / phyag btsal zhing bstod pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM badzra hrI tri ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ ar+g+has zhal bsil ba'o/ /oM badzra puSh+pa pU dza me

g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ me tog dbul ba'o/ /oM badzra d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bdug spos shangs su'o/ /oM badzra dI pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me spyan la'o/ /oM badzra gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri thugs kar ro/ /

oM badzra nai bi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhal zas zhal du'o/ /oM badzra shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sil snyan snyan du'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o/ /yang lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis

brlab par bya'o/ /mgo bo dang lkog ma dang / snying gar pad+ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po ji lta bar bkod la/ dkar po dang sngon po la sogs pa bsam mo/ /de nas spyi bo dang / mgrin pa dang / snying gar pad+ma dang /

zla ba la sogs pa/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs la/ gsang sngags bzlas par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ nyi ma sa bla na klad pa naM/ ku na zhi/ tsit+ta ku li naM/ tsi tra mu tra yak+Sha tra bzlog byer/ gsal por dmigs la bzlas pa bya/ skyo ba'am dub par gyur na/ gsang sngags yid kyis

bzlas par bya ste/ sngags kyi skyon spangs te/ mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang bar bya'o/ /bzlas pas skyo na ye shes kyi 'khor lo bton la/ mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bzod gsol bya/ de nas oM AH hUM/ sa ma ya muHsa/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su

gsol/ de nas mi dmigs par bsgom par bya'o/ /ldang bar 'dod na/ yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod la/ ldang bar bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje lce dbab kyi sgrub thabs/ gsang ba'i yang bkol gyi cho ga bkod pa yi/ bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di bkod pas/ bdag dang

sems can thams cad kyi/ /byang chub tu ni de dag bsngo/ /rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slad kyi bla ma dza yA ka ra dang / mar pa lo tsAs bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //[ ]na mo bud+d+hA ya/ badzra badzra hUM thA/ rdo rje lce dbab pa'i sngags ni/ nyi ma sa bla na/ klad pa

rna/ ku na zhi/ tsit+ta ku li naM/ tsi tra mu tra yak+Sha tra bzlog byer/ nA ga shig nA ga byer/ nA ga naM/ nA ga mgo naM/ nA ga ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad naM/ tshil chen dang / tshon skud rnam lnga la sngags mdud byas pa dang / gla rtsi dang seng ldeng gi phur pa la sngags bzlas la bsrung ngo / /sa dom nag po sod/

sa dom nag po sod/ sa dom nag po nan/ /sa dom nag po nan/ zhes gong bzhin no/ /ser ba srung na/ thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / rtsang dang / tho dang / mdzub ris kyis bsrung ngo / /sngags 'di gdags so/ /sa 'di srungs shig byer ya bya'o/ /phyu ga tsi phaT/ tsi ga phyu phaT/ lce ba

ti phaT/ thuM ril rbad/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad naM/ nA ga hri la hri la/ nA ga phrom/ nA ga phob/ phur pa dang tshil chen dang / khyi dang bong bu dang rta rnams ku nag po'i khrag dang / thod pa mtshan ngan cig dang / dor rta dang / chu dngos dang / de rnams la bya'o/ /ling+ga dang / gzugs la brten

la bya'o/ /char pa 'bebs na/ rten sa ru sbra phub la gzungs gdon/ sngags gong ma bzlas/ klu mchod dang / chab gtor bya/ dus dus su bslang / zhag bdun bya'o/ /'dis kyang bsrung / eHba gaHra tshe 'di na ba gaHbar ma/ pa laHsa ta ye/ mgo ste sa ste/ bar ma hA aH

hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes ci mang du bzlas so/ /rang phyag na rdo rje bsgom shes na rab/ ma shes na rang tam/ mang du bzlas na gang yang rung ba thub bo/ /phyag na rdo rje klu 'dul ba'i drag sngags bsgom du med pa'o/ /the tshom yid gnyis rkyen gyi rgyu bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa zab mo rdzogs

so// //de yang bya ba'i dus ni/ sngags kyi nus pa bskyed/ nyams rtags byung ba dang / las mtha' bsdus te/ mnan pa la sogs gzhan dang mthun/ sbyin sreg gi rim pa la/ rdzas ni zhi rgyas gzhan dang mthun/ /gdug pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs dang / /mar nag tshil chen ske

tshe dang / /til dang ming byang spel te bsreg /sla nga'am thab khung rnying pa ru/ /brgya 'am yang na lnga bzhi gcig /bskyar zhing las la sbyar ba dang / /sngags kyi mthar ni rak+Sha shAn+tiM gdags par bya/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa ni/ /gzhan yang dkyus las shes par bya/ /

nyam chung snod med the tshom rang 'phung 'gyur/ /nyams ldan ma yengs bsgrubs byas nas/ /bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhabs la gtugs/ a ti/ gu he/ zhar la 'di yang mchod pa ste/ /'khar sogs snod ni mdzes pa ru/ /'o ma dang bcas sman rnams kyis/ /bkang ste mdun du bzhag

pa'o/ /de steng bzhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /shin tu gsal byed gdan stengs su/ /lnga ldan mtha' yas sbrul dgu pa/ /rtsi sman mchod cing mdun gnas pa'o/ /bsreg mnan bskyal ba nyams dang sbyar/ /bdag rnal 'byor pa sdang mig gis lta zhing / yungs kar gyis brab

pa'o/ /gru gsum du brub bo/ /de nas sngags gdab bo/ /de nas thal mo brdab cing nad dang gdon bgegs thams cad brlag par bsam mo/ /yang yang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te gong gi mi la bstim mo/ /de nas phur pa gdab cing brub par bya'o/ /a

ti e'i tshogs kyi rim pa la/ dang po bdag rnal 'byor pa'i mdun du mdzub gang ba'i brub khung gru gsum brus te/ de'i nang du ming byang bu la bris la gzhag /de'i kha ru g.yam pa sngon po cig la yung ba ser pos ri rab dang rdo rje rgya gram gyi gzugs bris la bzhag /ma grub byas na ltas

ngan 'byung / /kun la yod na ngo mtshar chung / /lce dbab pa'i bya thabs rdzogs so// //rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba'i thabs ni/ rma bya'i mkhris pa dang / ka ra bsre la bsku/ sa'i bdud rtsi lo lnga brgya lon pa yan chod bsku'o/ /spos gu gul nag po dang / gla rtsi dang / mu zi dang /

ldong ros dang / dri chen dang cha mnyam du sbyar te/ sbrang rtsis sbrus te dud pa btang ngo / /sman gyi nus pa ni 'bras bu gsum dang / bus pa skyes ma thag pa'i rang 'byung dang bsres te/ dri chus sbrus pa'i ri lu khar gzhag go/ /sman gyi mchog gis bsrung ba ni/ a ru ra rnam par

rgyal ba bcangs pas bsrung ba'o/ /sa bdag gi nad thub bo// //nyi ma sa bla na la sogs pa la 'di gdags so/ /shig byer nan/ mgo nan/ ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhes bzlas shing bsrung ba bya'o/ /rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /lag na rdo rje lce

dbab kyi sngon 'gro'i lag len rnal 'byor spyod lam brgyad pa bzhugs/ @##/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams rgyun du bya ba'i cho ga ni/ thun mong gi spyod lam brgyad kyis bstan te/ khrus dang / mchod pa'i rnal 'byor dang / zas

dang / skom dang / gtor ma dang / sgom pa bzlas brjod kyi spyod lam brgyad do/ /dang po khrus kyi rnal 'byor ni/ /rang nyid bskyed pa'i rim bsgoms te/ /rin chen bum pa mdzes pa ru/ /chu gtsang srog chags med pa dang / /tsan+dan la sogs dris su dgang / /bdag gi thugs ka'i sa

bon gyis/ /bum pa sbyangs te b+h+rUM gyis bskyed/ /de ru lha bskyed ye shes bstim/ /mchod byas sngags ni bzlas nas su/ /grangs ni thim nas 'od du zhu/ /rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi/ /yi ge paM bsgom pad+mar gyur/ /de nyid nam mkha'i steng phyogs bsam/ /de steng sangs

rgyas spyan la sogs/ /rdzus skyes bum pa thogs pa bsam/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha mo yang / /bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas su/ /bkra shis rdo rje glu len cing / /bdud rtsi dkar po dri med kyis/ /rang gi spyi bor blugs par bsam/ /dri med dag nas mi bskyod 'gyur/ /de ni

dus chen khyad par du/ /rgyun du 'grub na bsod nams che/ /de ni khrus kyi rnal 'byor rgyas pa'o/ /de las bsdus pa 'dod pa la/ /rang nyid stong pa'i ngang las ni/ /sa bon las ni lhar bskyed de/ /khrus kyi bum pa dag la yang / /sngags btab sbyangs te bdud rtsir gyur/ /thugs

ka'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha la phog /lho mo bum pa thogs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i chu blugs sgrib pa dag /de las shin tu bsdus pa ni/ /skad cig rdzus skyes lha ru bsam/ /thugs ka'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros/ /chu la phog pas bdud rtsir gyur/ /lha mo

bum pa thogs pa yis/ /khrus byas dri ma dag par 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyi sngon du ni/ /sems bskyed pa dang ldan byas te/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis khrus ni 'di bya'o/ /mthar smon pa yi byang chub sems/ /phyag

rgya'i mchog tu bsngo bar bya'o/ /de rnams sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /oM badzra snA na hUM phaT/ phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/ /mthe bong bsgreng ste spyi bor bzhag /yang na rgyud gzhan so so yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis bya/ /dbang bskur khrus dang ldan pa yin/ /de nas mchod pa'i rnal

'byor bstan/ /sa gzhi skyon spangs yon tan ldan/ /ba yi rnam lngar ldan pa yis/ /maN+Dal yid 'ong mdzes par bya/ /tshad ldan dbyibs ldan de la ni/ /dang por dri ldan chu yis ni/ /byugs tshe nyi zla'i gdan du bsam/ /de steng me tog 'grems pa'i tshe/ /pad+ma dag tu gyur bar bsam/ /

de gsum sngags dang brjod par bya/ /mchod pa dri med bshams nas kyang / /rang nyid cho gas lhar bskyed de/ /rang gi thugs kyi sa bon las/ /'od 'phros thugs ka'i lha yang gsal/ /pad+ma'i steng du gzugs brnyan shar/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya

dang / /ting 'dzin ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes lha ni spyan drangs te/ /gzugs brnyan nyid la bstim par bya/ /yang na 'od zer 'phros pas su/ /bla ma spyan drangs sgrib pa sbyang / /mi bskyod gyur nas dbu la bzhugs/ /dang po phyag ni btsal bya ste/ /de nas mchod pa

rgyas par dbul/ /de yang dang po bla ma la/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha la dbul/ /mchod pa dbul ba'i dbul sa yang / /dang po me tog gdan bsam ste/ /zhabs gnyis la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas zhal bsil gdong dang phyag /'thor 'thung zhal gyi nang du dbul/ /nye reg

thugs kar byug par bya/ /yon ni zhabs kyi drung du dbul/ /sku khrus dbul dbul bar bya/ /bdug spos shangs la dbul bar bya/ /me tog dbul dbul bar bya/ /lha bshos ljags la dbul bar bya/ /sil snyan snyan la dbul bar bya/ /rin chen mdzod spur dbul bar

bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/ /sku nyid la ni dbul bar bya/ /de ni phyi yi mchod pa'o/ /nang gi mchod pa 'di lta ste/ /sgeg mo la sogs lha mo rnams/ /sprul la mchod pa dbul bar bya/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa bdud rtsi yis/ /lha rnams dgyes pa

bskyed par bsam/ /de 'og rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams/ /rang gi blo la bgrang bsngo bya/ /nyes pa gang byung de la ni/ /ched du gtang de bshags pa bya/ /dang por bsam pa gtsor byas te/ /tshig gis kyang ni bshags pa bya/ /de 'og yi ge brgya pas sbyangs/ /de nas 'jig

rten 'das pa dang / /'jig rten pa yi dge ba la/ /dga' ba bskyed de rjes yi rang / /de 'og bla ma dkyil 'khor dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab/ /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bskor bar yang ni gsol ba gdab/ /de nas

bla ma sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dag la yang / /skyabs su mchi zhing lus kyang dbul/ /de 'og sdom pa gzung bar bya/ /rol mo sil snyan ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje sngags ni mgur bcas nas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bdun gsum gyis/ /lha rnams la ni bskor bar

bya/ /de 'og mchod sogs dge ba rnams/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya/ /ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu/ /de nas ci bder don gzhan bya/ /de ni mchod pa rgyas pa'i tshad/ /de las bsdus pa 'dod pa rnams/ /maN+Dal dngos sam yid kyis bsam/ /rang

nyid stong pa'i ngang las ni/ /sa bon las ni lhar bskyed de/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /rdzas rnams dngos su ma 'byor yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis/ /mchod pa rnam lnga gsang mchod tsam/ /yid kyis bshags pa la sogs bya/ /shin tu bsdus

pa 'dod pa la/ /rang nyid skad cig lhar bsams te/ /bla ma yi dam lha la sogs/ /rdzus skyes tshul du mdun du bsam/ /bsam pas bdud rtsi mchod pa dang / /sdig pa bshags dang dge rtsa bsngo/ /'di ni shin tu bsdus pa'o/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ /rang nyid

cho gas lhar bskyed la/ /lte ba'i 'og tu rlung bsams te/ /de steng 'byung ba me bsam mo/ /rlung gi me lces snying gar slebs/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor lha gsal te/ /'od kyi khang pa'i nang na 'bar/ /lce ni hUM las rdo rjer bsam/ /yar rkan paM las pad+ma bsam/ /de nyid thabs

dang shes rab ldan/ /yang na kha ni dgang gzar bsam/ /lag pa blugs gzar nyid du bsam/ /zas rnams byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /snod ni a las ka pA la/ /rdzas ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge yis/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ru bsam/ /de 'og raM dang yaM las ni/ /me dang rlung gi dkyil

'khor ni/ /gru gsum zla gam ba dan can/ /thod pa'i nang gi yi ge gsum/ /mu tig bstar la brgyus pa bzhin/ /de steng rdo rje'i lte ba la/ /yi ge hUM gis mtshan par bsam/ /de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge oM gyis mtshan par bsam/ /yi ge hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /

ba dan bskyod pas rlung byung ste/ /rlung gis me sbar bdud rtsi bzhu/ /hUM gis bsdus shing AH sa su zhu/ /oM gyis kha dog dkar por bsgyur/ /slar yang gyen du spros pas su/ /steng gi oM bskul 'od zer 'phros/ /rang bzhin lha yi mdzod spur phog /gnyis med

rol pas byang sems phab/ /dang por oM phog zla ba zhu/ /dam tshig dang 'dres rdo rje phab/ /cha gnyis gcig 'dres rdo rjer zhu/ /bdud rtsi dri med dkar po des/ /snying ga'i lha la mchod byas te/ /sbyin sreg tshul du bza' bar bya/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor rgyas pa'o/ /rang nyid lhag

pa'i lhar bsams te/ /snying gar lha yi rnal 'byor bsam/ /zas rnams byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /pad+ma mdzes pa'i snod dag tu/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bsams te/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i zla steng nas/ /oM las 'od 'phros bdud rtsi bsregs/ /g.yas kyi nyi ma'i steng nas ni/ /

AHlas 'od 'phros bdud rtsi spel/ /gnyis ka las ni hUM 'phros te/ /bdud rtsi rnams ni 'od du 'bar/ /ho las 'od 'phros bdud rtsi zhu/ /de nas thugs ka'i lha mchod do/ /de ni bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /skad cig rdzus skyes rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag dang thugs ka'i lha

gnyis gsal/ /thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /zas la sogs pa bdud rtsir bzhu/ /slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab/ /cha gnyis 'dres pa'i bdud rtsi de/ /thugs ka'i lha la mchod par bya/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /btung ba'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ /

rang nyid bskyed pa la sogs ni/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor nyid dang mthun/ /btung ba byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /snod ni a las ka pA la/ /byin gyis brlabs nas de nang du/ /byang chub sems kyi sa bon bsam/ /thugs ka'i yi ge'i sa bon las/ /ha 'phros pas ni rnam rtog sbyangs/ /

hrIH sa ni 'od 'bar ro rnams sbyangs/ /hos ni dri med bdud rtsir bzhu/ /lag pa g.yon gyi mthe bong ni/ /hUM gis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs/ /srin lag gsum las ri rab tu/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i bang rim las/ /yi ge maM las 'od 'phros te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin

mtshams phog /yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi bab/ /yang na yum chen mA ma kI/ /bdud rtsi thogs pa dpag med byung / /dam tshig bdud rtsi'i nang du bya'o/ /cha gnyis gcig tu 'dres pa yi/ /bdud rtsi ri rab dag gis bsrubs/ /ri

rab nyid kyang 'od du zhu/ /bdud rtsi dri med dkar po des/ /thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams la/ /sbyin sreg tshul lam mchod pa yi/ /tshul gyis 'thungs pas bde ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na bdud rtsi'i mchod pa ni/ /phyi rol maN+Dal snod steng du/ /chos

'byung gru gsum bri bar bya/ /me tog tshom bu dgod par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs bsams la/ /so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bdud rtsi'i 'thor 'thung mchod pa dbul/ /thabs dang

shes rab dang ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i glu ni phra mo yis/ /lan gsum sku gsung thugs la mchod/ /de nas thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor mchod/ /de ni rgyas pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa gnyis/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor nyid dang mthun/ /gtor ma'i rnal 'byor bstan

pa ni/ /rang nyid bskyed rim tshul bsgoms la/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor nyid dang mthun/ /mchod par bya ba'i mgron rnams ni/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /mdun du paM las pad+mar bskyed/ /'dab brgyad steng du dur khrod brgyad/ /dbus

kyi lte bar e las ni/ /dar mo da ya'i chos 'byung bsam/ /de nas 'jig rten 'das par bskyed/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad la ni/ /'jig rten pa yi 'khor rnams bskyed/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis kyang / /spyan drangs dam tshig dag la bstim/ /so so'i

sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /gtor ma bstabs shing phrin las bcol/ /sil snyan rdo rje mgur glur ldan/ /mchod cing bstod nas gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin bsdus te dge rtsa bsngo/ /de ni rnal 'byor rgyas pa'o/ /bsdus pa stong nyid ngang las ni/ /sa bon las ni lhar

bskyed de/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /zas kyi rnal 'byor 'bring dang mthun/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /skad cig rdzus skyes lhar bskyed la/ /gtor ma so so'i sa bon gyis/ /sbyang ba byas te gong dang mthun/ /de rnams gtor ma'i

rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas spyod lam rnal 'byor ni/ /nang par langs pa'i tshe na ni/ /bdag rang yi dam lhar bsams te/ /'gro ba pho rnams thams cad ni/ /bde gshegs sprul pa nyid du blta/ /'gro ba mo rnams thams cad ni/ /bde gshegs yul gyi lha mor blta/ /snod

kyi 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /lha yi gzhal yas nyid du blta/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pas spyod/ /nyon mongs drag po langs tsam na/ /gang dang gang 'dul gnyen por bsten/ /'gro ba sems can don bya snyam/ /'dug na byang chub snying

por 'jug /nub mo nyal ba'i tshe na ni/ /chos nyid stong pa'i ngang las nyal/ /dge ba'i bsam pas nyal bar bya'o/ /bsdus pa'i spyod lam bya ba ni/ /dang po nang par langs tshe dang / /nyin mo thun mtshams bzhi rnams dang / /nub mo nyal ba'i dus dag tu/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid gong

bzhin bya/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i spyod lam ni/ /dang por nang par langs dus dang / /nub mo nyal ba'i dus dag tu/ /spyod lam gong bzhin dran par bya/ /rnal 'byor de rnams kun la yang / /sngon du byang chub sems bskyed cing dge ba byang chub bsngo/ /de ltar rgyun

du byas pa yi/ /dge ba'i mthu yi byin rlabs kyis/ /phyag rgya mchog gi grogs 'gyur zhing / /thun mong dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis ma thob kyang / /lha dang mi yi rigs skye zhing / /bsod nams lhun grub thob par 'gyur/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa'i

bsdus rgyas ni/ /rgyud dang sgrub thabs la sogs su/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi man ngag gis/ /shes par byas te nyams su blang / /sgom pa bstan pa'i rim pa yang / /bla ma 'chad pa'i rgyud shes pas/ /slob ma nyid kyis shes par bya/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /rdzogs

pa'i man ngag rim pa bstan/ /de las gzhan pa'i slob ma la/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i man ngag bstan/ /de la bstan nas phyi dus su/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan du rung / /de las gzhan pa kha cig la/ /zab mo'i don rnams mi bstan par/ /mi zad dbyings kyi chos rnams

bstan/ /de rnams gsum gyi 'bras bu ni/ /skye ba 'di la 'byung ba dang / /skye ba bdun la 'byung ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum gyi las kyis ni/ /thun mong dngos grub kho na 'grub/ /dper na ston gyi me tog bzhin/ /'bras bu dag la spro bskyed la/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha

gyon/ /le lo spangs shing nyin mtshan du/ /rnal 'byor dag ni chags mi bya/ /snyom las le los chags gyur nas/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa na/ /rtsa ba'i rab 'bring tha ma la/ /tha mas nyams pa'i char 'gyur bas/ /nyams pa sbyang zhing slar gso ba/ /bla ma

mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga yis/ /sbyangs pas slar ni sor chud 'gyur/ /'di dang mi ldan sngags pa ni/ /glang chen myos 'dra ji bzhin no/ /'di dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni/ /seng phrug seng ge'i gdung 'tshob 'dra/ /de la nan tan cher bskyed cig /phyag na rdo

rje lce dbab kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag /rnal 'byor gyi spyod lam brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis rgyud dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa'o/ /dza yA ka ra dang / mar pa lo

tsA bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //[ ]@/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs/ @##/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor

pas/ dang por khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rang gi snying gar nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyis gos sngon po can dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spyan drangs te/ sa bon las

byung ba'i mchod pas mchod do/ /de nas 'di skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs so 'tshal la/ /bdag lus ngag yid kyis sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /mchod pa bla

na med pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis sprul zhing mchis na/ thugs rje'i dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa rnams so sor bshags shing slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid do/ /bde bar

gshegs pa gang dag bskul ba'i sa la bzhugs pa rnams la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul bar bgyi'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa gang dag mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na

med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa bzhin/ /bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bdag gis

'phags pa rnams la lus phul te/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /de'i ngang las yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'o/ /de'i steng du hUM sngon po las byung

ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i gos sngon can gyi gzugs su gyur par bya'o/ /de nas yungs kar phyogs su gtor bar bya zhing / oM AHbig+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing bskrad par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ sa bon las 'od zer spros te spyan drang

bar bya'o/ /gzungs kyi mjug la/ oM na maHsa ma ya maN+Dal ma de/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ A ba lo kA ya A ba lo kA ya hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba btags te spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas de la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /hrI ti ha zhes pas ar+g+ha yi'o/ /oM

badzra puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas me tog dbul dbul lo/ /oM badzra d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas bdug pa mdun du'o/ /oM badzra dI paM pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas mar me spyan la'o/ oM badzra g+han+d+he pU dza me

g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas dri thugs kar ro/ /oM badzra nai bi d+ye pU dza meg+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas zhal zas zhal du'o/ /oM badzra gI ti g+haN+Ta g+haN+Ta swA hA/ zhes pas si la snyan snyan la'o/ /de nas bstod do/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas gnyis su

med par bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i steng du/ rang gi sa bon las bzlas par bya ba'i yi ges bskor bar bya'o/ /blos dmigs par bya ste/ sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban nA gA

d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA ni hr-i da yaM/ yaH sa mA ti kra mA ti/ /ut+sA da naM/ b+ha bi shud+d+he/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bi bud+d+ha/ ma ti prA p+ta/ ha ra ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hr-i da ya ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA ga da mA

ni/ bi si mA da nA ga sha rI ra Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nAg na ya nA ni/ /tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go tsha da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sa sta nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ kuSh+ma N+Do t+sA ya phaT/ pre ta

pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ b+ha k+Sha ya b+ha k+Sha ya/ sarba bag+h+na bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /gal te gtong bar

'dod na/ bzod par gsol ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing / smon lam gdab bo/ /de nas oM AHhUM muHzhes pas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol/ de nas thams cad mi dmigs par bsgom par bya'o/ /yi ge brgya ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /bla ma la gus pa

dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang ldan zhing / khyad par du gang la dad pa cher yod pa de la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/

tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha de ba pany+tsa nA ma maN+Dal bi d+hiH / bod skad du/ rdo rje khro bo gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po khros pas zhe sdang 'joms/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /rdo rje 'chang la rab btud

nas/ /de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas chen du/ /gza' skar dus tshes bzang po la/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sa brtag pa dang bslang ba dang / /me tog sngon po lnga dor zhing / /byin dang ma byin ltas kyang brtag /phan tshun mang

nyung ut+pal kha/ /oM badzra pA Ni puSh+pa pU dza hUM/ /sngags der bskyar zhing med dang mtshungs/ /btso ma gser mdog rin chen la/ /rngan pa byin la brko bar bya/ /sa sbyang ba dang bsrung bya ste/ /dri yi thig le me tog khar/ /dam tshig lha mo bskyed byas la/ /ye shes lha mo

dgug gzhug bstim/ /sa yi cho ga rdzogs byas la/ / de nas lha yi sta gon ni/ /maN+Dal yid 'ong dri med khar/ /dri yi thig le me tog lnga/ /oM hUM trAM hrIH khaM dag las/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed byas te/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /mchod gtor bstod pas

mnyes byas la/ /bdug pa lag thogs pus btsugs te/ /dril bu'i sgra sgrogs lnga ldan hUM/ /de nas gsol ba gdab bya ba/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog /rig sngags rgyal po dge ba'i mgon/ /gzungs sngags gsang sngags kun gyi gtso/ /gsang ba'i

bdag po phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag nyid 'dri bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams mnyes par mchod phyir du/ /bcom ldan bdag nyid gus pa la/ /de yi gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs

rgyas 'gro don byas don gsol/ /byang chub sems dang gsang sngags lha / /'jig rten skyong dang mthu chen dang / /yang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' rnams la/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /yo byad ci

'byor bas bri na/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /ra ba dra bas mtshams bcad do/ /hUM nyon cig bgegs

dang log 'dren tshogs/ /nga ni bcom ldan gtum po yin/ /nga yi bka' las ma 'da' zhig /nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na/ /rdo rje khro bos mgo 'gems so/ /ma 'dug song shig log 'dren tshogs/ /oM suMb+ha ni suMb+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya

ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra pA Ni hUM/ /Ar+ya te tsar hi na hUM phaT/ de nas bum pa'i sta gon ni/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ni/ /lto ba che la mgrin pa ring / /skyon la sogs pa dang bral bas/ /las kyi bum pa ma gtogs pa/ /yon tan ldan pas lha grangs bstun/ /nas dang

gro dang so ba 'bras/ /til dang lan tshwa bu ram dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi rnam pa lnga/ /gser dngul zangs lcags mu tig dang / /byA g+h+ra sing ha ha sa de ba dang / /kaN+Da ka ri ni dra sman lnga dang / /dri chen dri chu dmar zil mdangs/ /mi rta khyi bya glang po'i sha /dmar ser 'o ma gzhon nu'i chus/ /

phyed mtho tsam du dgang bar bya/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis bcings/ /'bras bu can gyis kha brgyan te/ /dris bdug maN+Dal khar bzhag la/ /mi dmigs b+h+rUM baM bdud rtsi yi/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus su ri rab che/ /sprin sgra bsnol bas sna tshogs sgra/ /lte bar b+h+rUM las gzhal yas

khang / /baM las chu skyes dam tshig bskyed/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /mchod dang gtor mas bstod byas la/ /gzungs thag ldan pas

bsnyen pa 'bum/ /de nas slob ma'i sta gon ni/ /rdo rje slob ma khrus byas la/ /slob ma sgo yi drung gnas nas/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /

dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni stsal du gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /

slob dpon gtso bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsang sngags sbyin/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi / /gsang sngags tshul spyod cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje dang / /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med bskyed/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /

'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas skyabs 'gro sdig bshags bya/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /mnyam nyid thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul pa'i sku

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngor gnas pas/ /gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la/ /bdag yid dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag

gis thog mtha' med pa nas/ /sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi / /spyan sngar da ltar mthol zhing bshags/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang / /gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje can/ /de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun/ /dge ba mdzad la

rjes yi rang / /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags bdag por dbang bskur la/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /skyon bral mthu ldan khyed rnams la/ /skye rga na 'chi mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i don du

sku sprul la/ /mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/ /bdag gis dge ba ci bsags kun/ /gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms nas su/ /bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyi don du bsngo/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang / /

bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /kun nas dang bas dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /dus 'di nas su bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bla na

med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /'gro ba sems can thams cad la/ /pha ma spun dang ming sring sems/ /bu pho bu mo'i sems bskyed de/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyung ba

dbugs dbyung bgyi/ /srid pa chags pa zhi la sgrol/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa btang / /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bsrung / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa spyad/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin par gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par phyin/ /

pha rol phyin pa 'di drug po/ /mthar gyis bslab dang mthar gyis spyod / /mthar gyis bsgrub la nan tan bya/ /de nas sdom pa dpog bya ba/ /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin pa yang blang mi bya/ /'dod pa dag ni spyad mi bya/ /brdzun pa dag kyang yang mi smra/ /nyes pa kun

gyi rtsa ba yin / /chang ni myos par btung ma yin/ /sems can gdul bya ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar mnyes byas shing / /rnal 'byor can la bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi

rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus pa yis rjes su bsrung / /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /theg pa dman la dor mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang yong mi spang / /rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi bya zhing / /

phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la gus bka' mi 'da'/ /stong nyid snying rje rab bsgom zhing / /mdor na rtsa ba yan lag gi/ /dam tshig nyin mtshan grangs kyis bsrung / /de nas bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /sdom pa legs par bsrung

bar bya/ /tshul khrims zhes bya sogs pa nas/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid snying po byang chub bar/ /bdag ni rab tu sdom par bgyid/ /de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du/ /rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus/ /thig le nyi zla pad stengs su/ /yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba

las/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs / /las kyi chu yis gtor zhing bsrung / /oM badzra u da ka hUM phaT/ mchod pa lnga yis legs mchod de/ /spyi bor me tog spos byin la/ /mar me dri ni snying gar ro/ /dril bu dkrol zhing bshos gtsang mdun/ /de nas tshigs

bcad sngags 'dis sbyin/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan pa yi/ /dus kun du ni bde legs shog /oM pany+tsa ling+ga a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ de nas so shing sbyin par bya/ /'o ma can gyi shing dag la/ /sor brgyad dang ni bcu

gnyis pa/ /me tog can ni dor bar bya/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+WA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni 'byung 'gyur ram/ /zhes pa la sogs chos bshad bya/ /oM tra ki sti ba hrI shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swab+hA ba badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM / de nas srung skud sngon po yis/ /

mdud pa lnga ldan byin brlabs can/ /dpung pa g.yas g.yon dag tu bcing / /ku sha stan gding mtshan ma gdab/ /ngan na phur bu'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bzang na mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma btang / /de nas thig ni gdab bya ba/ /ma dang taM gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor

mkha' la bteg /gzhon nus srad bu bkal ba la/ /kha dog dkar po'i thig gdab ste/ /mdzes pa'i snod du bcug nas kyang / /las kyis bsang zhing lhar bskyed la/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs mchod/ /nyis 'gyur tshad la srad bu bstim/ /rang nyid rdor 'dzin lhar
