sprul nas/ /byin gyis brlab dang bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bde gshegs mchod phyir nam mkhar gdab/ /sgo dbye gsal phyir sa thig gdab/ /tshangs thig gdab ste bgegs bskrad do/ /oM badzra rak+Sha hUM phaT/ slob dpon shar bltas slob ma nub/ /dza gsum brjod la lag tu

gtad/ /dang po nub ste de nas ni/ /lho byang gdab ste de nas shar/ /nub byang lho nas mtshams bzhir thig /rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya/ /cha bzhi cha brgyad rim bzhin du/ /dbye ba la sogs shes par bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /khyams 'dod pa dang

mi 'dod pa/ /de dag thams cad shes par gyis/ /sngags 'dis thig ni gdab par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma/ dmar ser smin ma sma ra khro/ /kham nag gyen brdzes dbu yi skra/ /zla tshes mche dkar ljags glog 'khyug /lto 'gros brgyan cing stag sham can/ /yum dang

gnyis med thugs las 'khyud/ /sprul pa gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms/ /bgegs chen bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /drag po me dpung dbus na 'phro/ /bcom ldan thugs kyi sprul pa las/ /rigs bzhi gtum po rang nyid do/ /shar du rdo rje gtum po ni/ /

bdud las rgyal byed dri za'i gdan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /spyan gsum mche gtsigs zhabs bgrad pa/ /skra brdzes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs/ /me dpung 'bar

ba'i rnam pa can/ /thugs la rdo rje'i khyung sprul lo/ /lho ru rin chen gtum po ni/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba gshin rje'i gdan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /spyan gsum zhabs bgrad mche ba can/ /skra brdzes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun

pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs / /me ri 'bar ba'i rnam pa can/ /thugs las rin chen khyung sprul lo/ /nub tu pad+ma gtum po ni/ /rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs klu dbang gdan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/ /spyan gsum mche gtsigs

zhabs bgrad pa/ /skra brdzes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs / /me dpung 'bar ba'i rnam pa can/ /thugs las pad+ma'i khyung sprul lo/ /byang du las kyi gtum po ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gnod sbyin

gdan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /spyan gsum zhabs bgrad mche ba can/ /skra brdzes lto 'gro stag gis brgyan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub rab tu gdengs / /me ri 'bar ba'i rnam pa can/ /thugs las las kyi khyung sbrul

lo/ /de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa phyag rgya bzhi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags/ /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol/ /dge ba ci bsags thams cad kun/ /byang chub thob phyir bdag gis bsngo / /phyag

rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas slob ma khrus byas la/ /yol bas bar bcad gdong g.yogs bcings/ /sngags 'di yis ni phyag byed gzhug /oM badzra na ma mi hUM/ oM badzra na ma ste hUM/

oM badzra na mo na ma hUM/ bde ba 'dod pa su zhig yin/ /bla mas don ni bri bar bya/ /skal ldan bde chen bdag cag lags/ /slob mas lan ni gdab par bya/ /de nas bla mas bde ba'i glu/ /dgyes pas blang bar bya ba 'di/ /oM a nut+ta rad+d+ha pU dza me g+ha ud+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na

khaM swa hA/ de nas slob mas gsol gdab pa/ /ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o/ /bla ma dam pa dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen por tshul bstan pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol / /de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /

dkon mchog gsum ni bdag la stsol/ /lus dang longs spyod 'di bzhis la/ /dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de yi lan ni sbyin bya ba/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po'i snod/ /gsang sngags

spyod pa'i tshul 'di ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /tshul chen khyod kyis shes par gyis / /dkyil 'khor dam par dbang bskur gyis/ /bu yi blo gros brtan par byos/ /de nas yang ni sdig pa bshags/ /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol/ /mya ngan mi 'da'

gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub sems bskyed lus phul la / /sdom pa phog ste gzung du gzhug /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de nas bzung ste gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje rigs mchog

chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ / rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las

byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi / /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /de nas rdo

rje'i lam khrid la/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis dam chu blud/ /spyi bor bcom ldan bskyed byas la/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni blud par bya/ /'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /dam las 'das na dmyal bar bsreg /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'byung / /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i

chu yis grub / /oM badzra satwA hUM/ las kyi chu yis bgegs bskrad de/ /phreng bas mgul nas bcing bar bya/ /oM badzrod ka hUM/ rdo rje thugs kar bzung byas nas/ /dam tshig khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /de ring phan chad khyod kyis

ni/ /phyag na rdo rje nga yin pas/ /nga yi bka' nyan gsung sdod pas/ /khyod kyis byas na dngos grub 'byung / /ma byas rdo rje dmyal bar ltung / /de phyir bka' nyan gsung sdod cig /oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyi bor gzhag /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor

chen po 'di'i/ /de nyid ma mthong mi rnams mdun/ /dus kun du ni ma smra zhig /ma smras dngos grub myur ba yin/ /smras na khro bos mgo 'gems so/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ de nas sngags 'dis yol ba bsal/ /oM badzra pra tIts+tsha ho/ /lan gsum brjod la mthong ngam dri/ /

dbang thob phyir na yon kyang 'bul/ /sngags 'dis me tog dkyil 'khor dor/ /oM sarba ta thA ga te puSh+pa pU dza hUM/ /sngags 'dis slob ma'i mgo la gdags/ /oM rat+na me la a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /lha yi 'khor lo bskul byas la/ /slob ma'i snying gar gzhug par

bya/ /oM maN+Dal de ba ba tiSh+Tha lhan/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs bkrol / /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /ma rig ling thog bsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin de ring bu khyod kyi/ /ma rig ldongs pa'i mun pa bsal/ /oM badzra pA sha hUM/ ye shes khro bo'i ting 'dzin

gyis/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya / /de rnams las kyi bla mas bya/ /lha ngo bstan la dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /bde gshegs bum pa'i dbang mchog

s+col/ /de skad gsol ba gdab par bya/ /yab yum snyoms zhugs 'od zer las/ /bde gshegs 'od bskul bum par thim/ /cha 'dres 'od zhu bdud rtsi de/ /spyi bo chu yi dbang bskur ro/ /mi bskyod pa yi spro bsdu yis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis bum pa sbyin/ /hUM sku

gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra A daR+sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ rin chen 'byung ldan spro bsdu yis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis cod pan sbyin/ /trAM sangs

rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid do/ /dbu rgyan rin chen bla na med/ /dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro ba/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa mA tA dz+nyA na rat+na ma hUM ta ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ 'od dpag med kyi spro bsdu yis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis rdo rje sbyin/ /hrIH

sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /mi phyed rdo rje gsal ba las/ /chos rnams kun gyi sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pradz+nyA A be sha ya sa man+ta dz+nyA na pa ne badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ /don rnams grub pa'i spro bsdu yis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis dril bu sbyin/ /

hUM thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi / /'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang / /mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pa/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM kri ta a nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na pa ne badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ rnam snang mdzad kyi spro bsdu yis/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis ming

sbyin no/ /oM rdo rje'i ming du dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang mi chod mi shigs par/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab sgrogs shig /oM pa ri sho d+ha d+harma dz+nyA na nA ma dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /me long gi ni

gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rang gi lha ni shes par gyis/ /oM AHhUM/ me long dag gi dbang yin no/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs dbang bskur ba/ /phreng ba chen po ske la skon / /'od zer 'phro 'dus byin brlabs la/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis sbyin par bya/ /ma skyes rdo

rje gsang ba'i thugs/ /'gag med shes rab dril bu'i gsung / /gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'chang / /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu 'chang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM a A/ i I/

ur Ur/ u A u A al Al/ be sha na ya na gre b+ha be shud+d+ha ni swA hA/ badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ de nas lung bstan dbang bskur ni/ /yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing gsol

mdzad pa/ /bdag la gdung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la gsol/ /bu de seng ge'i khrir bzhag la/ /rdo rje dril bu lag byin te/ /'od zer spro bsdu ting 'dzin bya/ /de nas tshigs bcad sngags 'dis sbyin/ /bu tshur rdo rje'i slob

dpon gyis / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las/ /'gro ba'i don du khyod kyis bskor/ /oM haM k+Sha d+harma tsa kra pra parta ka swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma tsa kra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ni/ /stegs bu bdud rtsi lnga yis byug /

pi parta 'am zhing gi khar/ /mtshan ldan rig ma'i b+ha ga la/ /dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du rol/ /tsaN+Da lI ni rab sbar bas/ /e waM zla ba haM las 'dzag /spro bsdu byang chub sems de sbyin/ /bu yis mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /rgyal ba thams cad rol pa yis/ /sangs

rgyas chu bo rgyun bab ste/ /nyon mongs sdig pa sbyangs pa bzhin/ /bdag la byang chub sems dpa' stsol/ /bye ba phrag brgyas gang+gA'i klung / /ji snyed mgon po thams cad kyi/ /gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun/ /mgon po bdag gi gsung la gsol/ /tshigs

bcad sngags 'dis bu la sbyin/ /yab yum snyoms zhugs bde ba'i rgyun/ /gnyis med sems kyi ros gang ba/ /thabs dang shes rab bdud rtsi'i mchog /bu yi ngag la sbyin par bya/ /oM a mr-i ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ mgrin par gsung la sbyin par bya/ /des kyang a ho

su khas btung / /de nas shes rab ye shes dbang / /maN+Dal dris byugs dri med khar/ /bdud rtsi dkar dmar thig le gdab/ /steng du stag gi sham thabs khar/ /mtshan ldan rig ma khrus byas gzhag /gnas lnga ru ni lha lnga dgod/ /spyan drangs bstim zhing mchod bstod

bya/ /de nas slob mas gsol ba gdab/ /phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'grub/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ /mgon pos kyang ni lan sbyin pa/ /bu tshur shog cig rigs kyi bu/ /

gang la dga' ba'i dngos grub ni/ /shes rab ma la brten pas grub / /rtag tu shes rab don 'dod pas/ /thabs la skrag par mi bya zhing / /pad+ma'i steng du lce yis reg /dri chen dri chu bza' bar bya/ /khu ba dkar dmar bdud rtsi mchog /lce yi dbus su brtan par bzung / /

dka' thub med cing brtul zhugs che/ /'di dang ldan na 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas slob ma'i mig phye ste/ /yum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor blta/ /rtag tu gcer bu'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje dril bu kha phye nas/ /mthong ba'i blos ni gsol ba gdab/ /rmad byung btsun mo'i

b+ha ga mchog /ye shes thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas/ /ma smin ma grol ba yi sar/ /ye shes dam pa bskyed du gsol/ /shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga la/ /slob ma dpa' bo'i tshul du rol/ /snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba yis/ /A li kA li gnyis med las/ /brkyang mas ro

ma mnan pa bstan/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le ni/ /gtum mos ri bong can haM 'dzag /dkyil drangs bzlog dang dgram zhing bstim/ /dga' bzhi gnyug ma nyams su myong / /shes rab gsal ba'i ngang la gnas/ /tshigs bcad sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab/ /hUM

thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /ye shes chen po mchog gi lam/ /srid dang zhi las rab grol pa'i/ /bde ba chen po bde ba'i mchog /yum la brten pa'i bde ba 'dis/ /bu la byin brlabs dbang bskur ro/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs

chen po/ /bde ba chen po zab mo'i chos/ /dngos grub dam pa bdag gis blang / /oM dz+nyA na sid+d+hi hUM/ de yi dngos grub dam pa blang / /bzhi pa chos nyid mngon rtogs dbang / /lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro/ /mtshon du yod pa ma yin te/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /

de nas bkra shis smon lam gdab/ /sngags 'dis bzod pa gsol bar bya/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra tsaN+Da twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba / a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba / sarba sid+d+him+mi pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha

ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn / sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba / ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH / bum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor lha/ /spyan drangs nam mkhar gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bsdu/ /de nas spyod lam rnam bzhi ni/ /'gro ba'i

don du dge ba spyad/ /gnyis po mi 'bral nga rgyal ldan/ /'di brtsams pa yis dge ba gang / /zla ba rgyas pa dri med bzhin/ /'gro ba dug can thams cad ni/ /zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog /phyag na rdo rje gtum po lha lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa klu sgrub

kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA Ni mArgASh+TAM ba / bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs lnga khro bo rigs gcig pas/ /gnyis po dbyer

med rnam bzhi 'dras/ /bcom ldan de btud sgrub pa'i thabs/ /gtum po khros pa'i gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su gdong la sogs pa dag par byas te dri chu'i chag chag btab la/ rnal 'byor pa dbang thob pas stan bde ba la 'dug ste rang gi snying gar

hUM sngon po bsam/ de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang lha dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams thugs bskul te bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa ni/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la/ /bdag

ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad 'khor yug bcas/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams/ /bla na yod med mchod par bzhes/ /bdag gis thog mtha' med pa nas/ /sdig pa bgyis pa ma lus kun/ /bcom

ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /spyan sngar da lta mthol zhing bshags/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang / /gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje can/ /de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun/ /dge ba mdzad la rjes yi rang / /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /dus gsum bde gshegs

thams cad kyi/ /byin gyi rlabs kyis dbang bskur la/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /skyon bral mthu ldan khyed rnams la/ /skye rga na 'chi mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i don du sku sprul la / /mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/ /bdag gis dge ba ci

bsags kun/ /gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms nas su/ /bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyi don du bsngo/ /de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom mo/ /de nas ye shes kyi tshogs bsags te/ oM sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85haM zhes brjod pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas rang gi snying gar a las byung ba'i zla dkyil du hUM bsam mo/ /de'i 'od kyis don byas/ bar chad bsal/ mchod pa phul/ byin rlabs bsdus sa bon la thim pas khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bltas te/ de'i

lte ba can gyi yang de ltar byas/ /de yongs su gyur pa las/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog mthing ga /g.yas rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul/ g.yon sdigs mdzub thugs kar bkan pa/ lto 'gros brgyan cing stag sham gsol ba/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/

skra brdzes shing sma ra ser ba/ zhabs gyad kyi 'dor stabs su bgrad pa/ thugs las rigs bzhi yum dang 'khyud / /seng ge stag dang ce spyang phag /sprul pa'i khro chung bsam mi khyab/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i bdag nyid bsam/ /de rjes hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes spyan drangs

mchod sogs bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab la/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur la/ /spro bsdu mi skyo'i bar du bsgom/ /de nas ting 'dzin gsum dang ma bral bar bzlas pa bya ste/ oM badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM phaT / gzungs sam

rigs lnga'i snying po gang yang 'dra'o/ /de nas gtor ma gtang / bstod pa bya/ yi ge brgya pa bklag /ye shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig pa bsdu/ spyod lam bzhi dge ba'i chos su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ sa bon raM du 'bar ba yis/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i

'phro 'du las/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba chen po gso mdzad pa/ /thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms par mdzad/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog /

las rnams kun gyi sngon du 'gro /yaM raM kaM dag sa bon las/ /rlung dang me dang thod pa'i sgyed/ /a las thod pa'i gzhal yas su/ /shu dang bi mu ma ra las/ /na dang go dang ku da ha/ /mi 'chi lnga dang rab gsal lnga/ /steng du sa bon dgod bya ba/ /oM dang hUM dang trAM laM khaM/ /

laM mAM paM tAM baM dag las/ /yab yum snyoms 'jug bdud rtsi'i chur/ /dpa' bo gsum gyis byin brlabs la/ /brjod pas dkar dmar dngul chu'i mdog /ye shes bdud rtsir byin brlabs la/ /rdo rje khong gseng ye shes ljags / /hUM mdzad sngags 'dis gsol bar

bsam/ /oM tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye ma hA ba liM i daM/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na/ khA hi khA hi/ muny+dza ho sa ma ye swA hA/ de nas sman gyi mchod pa ni/ a mr-i ta pU dza ho / /rak+ta'i mchod pa ni/ rak+ta pi pa ta yo/ tshogs kyi mchod pa ni/ ga Na pU dza ho / /de nas lhag ma bsngo bya ba/ /sngags 'di brjod

pas thim par bsam/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na twAta/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma gtang ngo / / de nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba'i lha/ /mche ba gtsigs shing me mdag spyan/ /me lce'i dbugs la

'jigs pa'i ngar/ /phyag zhabs nor rgyas bu yis brgyan/ /nag po gdol ba'i se ral kha/ /dga' bo nye dgas snyan cha mdzad/ /sbrul gdug 'bar bas phyag zhabs brgyan/ /sku yi bzhin dang gzi brjid rgyas/ /khro gnyer smin ma dpral bar bsdus/ /ya sos ma mchu

drag tu mnan/ /gshin rje'i cha byed 'jigs byed sku/ /glog ltar 'khyug pa'i ljags 'dril zhing / /gsus pa che zhing sbrul za ba/ /lag pa brdabs pa'i sgra yis ni/ /khams gsum rnams ni 'jigs par byed/ /sma ra ser po gyen du 'khyil/ /khro gnyer smin ma me

lcer 'khyug /kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /phyag g.yas gser gyi rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub log 'dren gzir/ /sku la me 'bar srid gsum 'dul/ /'dab bzangs rgyal pos ska rags mdzad/ /dpag tshad brgyad khri rgya mtsho'i zabs/ /zhabs

kyi pus mor phyin mdzad nas/ /dbang po nyi ma phrag la khur/ /A li'i gad rgyangs chen po yis / /kun du dgod cing 'khrug par byed/ /hUM dang phaT gyi gad rgyangs kyis/ /ha ha bzhad cing drag shul che/ /klu rnams 'dul bar byed la bstod/ /de nas sngags kyi bye brag ni/ /oM badzra

tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM badzra ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA Ni sa man+ta ka ra ma rak+Sha tsit+ta badzra nA ga sa man+ta hUM phaT/ rigs lnga gtum pa'i drag sngags te/ /rim pa yis ni shes par

bya/ /tad+ya thA nas b+ha ga bAn / ra dz+nyA pa yi par du ni/ /gtum po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin no/ /de dag gdags pa'i drag sngags ni/ /sbyor bas yang dag bstan par bya/ /oM ha yak+Sha sod rdo rje Na ri thA rbad/ dzA bu raM rbad/ muM rig muM rig mA ra ya shig /sog tshig nan rbad/ lus

rul nA ga mA ra ya phaT/ raM raM dza la dza la/ shig shig mA ra ya/ rdul bun rbad sod/ oM badzra tsan+Da sarba duSh+TAn krig nan/ e hur thuM dza mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ yak+Sha tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ru kraM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ra dzA tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rak+Sha tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ tsa ra tsit+ta mA

ra ya rbad/ haM shaM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ba ra sa tu tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mus mun tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ru kri tsita mA ra ya rbad/ nyi mas bla nan/ klad pa nan / tsi tra ku li nan / ku na shig//tsi tra mu tra bzlog byer/ nA ga shig /nA ga glog nA ga g+ho la nan / che ge tsit+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gdug pa

rnam gsum gsad bya ba/ /thog mar she dang rtso la sbyar/ /dregs pa bcu ni 'dul byed pa/ /gong ltar mthun dang bar pa gzung / /bsrung zhing zlog par byed pa ni/ /'gres kyis tha mar shes par bya/ /gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba ni/ /'di ltar rab tu bstan par bya/ /oM ga ru

Da haM sa ya / tsa la tsa la swA hA/ ser ba bcad pa'o/ /thal chen dang yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /oM e shong thi to/ hu lu hu lu/ dza la dz+nyi ho/ hu lu hu lu/ yang tri'i ba thi to/ hu lu hu lu/ tad tre ba pra ti ga dza tu/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'thab

pa dang / rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlas pas zhi bar byed do/ /oM mo tsa ni mo tsa ya / mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya/ dzri rbam ba ra de swA hA/ chu la btab ste gtor na bcings pa las rnam par grol lo/ /oM ta ri ni ta ra ya / mo tsa ni mo tsa ya / mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya / badzra baM ba ra de swA hA/ til

mar la mngon par bsngags te/ skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /oM tA re tut+tA re/ mo k+Sha yA badzri paM swA hA/ gur gum gyis gro ga la gang gi ming smos pa'i sngags mngon par bris la/ spra tshil gyis gtums te dri zhim pos bkang ba'i chu'i

bum par blugs te/ me tog dri zhim pa la dus gsum du mchod pa byas na/ 'thab rtsod thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /oM a ma ra Ni dzI ban+tI ye swA hA/ sngags 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ khyad par du 'brum bu la

sogs pa la chu la btab nas 'thungs na 'brum bu thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do/ /'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon la yungs kar la bsngags te gtor bas

'byer ro/ /byis pa gsar du btsa' ba la skam pa la rdo rgyus kyis bris te sgo gong du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM pur+N+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM dA na dA ya swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ oM ki li ma li ni swA hA/

oM pi tsi kuN+Da li ne swA hA/ oM mu khen+d+rA ya swA hA/ oM tsa len+dA ya swA hA/ dzaM b+ha la la gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i nor bsgrub pa'o// //de nas rab gnas bshad par bya/ /gza' skar dus tshes bzang po la/ /bkra shis bum pa mtshan ldan du/ /'dag chal la

sogs chu brgyad la/ /stong rtsa brgyad du gzungs brjod do/ /khrus khang gser dang mu tig can/ /rin chen sil ma spung bar bkru/ /ji ltar bltams pa'i tshigs bcad brjod/ /lugs ma bkru zhing me long la/ /po ti lha khang bkru bya'o/ /khrus byed na bkra shis kyi tshigs

bcad dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dgrol lo/ /sran phye dang 'bras yos dang til mar la sogs pa la ku sha'i pir gyis khrus bya zhing sngags 'di brjod/ na mo sarba ta thA ga ta du r+Na du pa pa kra sta ye swA hA zhes brjod do/ /de nas ras kha tshar ma nyams pas dril phyis bya zhing sngags de

brjod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan drangs la bdag gis dkyil 'khor bsgrub ste/ bdag nyid dkyil 'khor mchod pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha rnams shin tu gsal bar byas te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang du bsdus te spyan drangs la gnyis su med

par bstims la/ dbang bskur rgyas btab la mchod pa shin tu rgyas par bya'o/ /de yang gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM tsak+Shu dz+nyA na tsak+Shu pra be sha ya swA hA/ snyan dbye ba ni oM kar+Na ye swA hA/ shangs dbye ba ni oM na ga gan+d+he swA hA/ zhal dbye ba ni oM mu

kha ye swA hA/ na bza' gsol ba ni oM ba tsan tsa li ka ye swA hA/ dung gi so mangs dang gser gyi spu gris rab tu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba bya'o/ /pusti glegs bam rnams ni rdo rje chos dang yum chen mor byin gyis brlab bo/ /mchod rten ni rnam par snang

mdzad du byin gyis brlab bo/ /rdo rje dang dril bu la sogs pa ni rang rang gi phyag mtshan du byin gyis brlab bo / /gtsug lag khang la sogs pa de dag thams cad la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur la mchod pa rgya chen pos

mchod la bkra shis chen por mnga' gsol lo// @#/ / de nas bdun tshigs byed par 'dod na/ bsnyen pa sngon du song bas gson po'i bsrung ba byas te/ rus bu'am mtshan byang la sogs pa'i dri ma sbyangs te/ 'dod lha'i thugs rjes gshin po ngan song

gsum nas drang zhing / gshin po'i shes pa a thung gnas pa de mtshan byang la bstims te / drag po'i sbyin sreg gis gshed phral la/ dug sbyang zhing 'gro drug nas drangs te/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /'di gsum 'jig rten

dug yin te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /dkon mchog bden pas dug mi mnga'/ / dkon mchog bden pas dug bcom mo/ /dug ka shAn+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ zhes brjod cing 'gro drug nas drangs la dkyil 'khor chen por dbang

bskur te/ me mar gyis lam bstan la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su gnas spar ro// @#/ / de nas sbyin sreg bshad par bya/ /zhi ba dkar zhing zlum pa la/ /ku sha 'o ma can gyis bsreg /'bras chan dkar gsum mngar gsum dbul/ /ta la n+ya gro d+ha yis

bsreg /gru bzhi rin chen mdzes pas spras/ /sman dang rin chen sna lnga dbul/ /dbang la dmar zhing zla gam la/ /tsan+dan dmar dang seng ldeng shing / /khru gang tshad la pad+ma'i dbyibs/ /dUr ba shing thog la sogs dbul/ /drag po mthing nag gru gsum la/ /chu shing

tsher ma can gyis bsreg /rdo rje lcags kyus spras pa la/ /dug dang khrag dang drag pos dbul/ /me lha'i cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /de yi gzhal yas drag po ru/ /bcom ldan cho ga legs pa yis/ /sbyin sreg sngags ni 'di ltar ro/ /oM ag+na ye dz+wa la raM/ sarba sha trUM/ shAn+tiM ku

ru swA hA/ zhi ba'i 'o / /pu Sh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'i'o/ /ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o/ /mA ra ya ku ru hUM phaT/ drag po'i'o/ /na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ sarba sha trUM zhes pa phrin las bzhi'i sngags gdags pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i'o // //

@#/ / de nas gdon bshad par bya/ dbyibs legs mdzes pa'i maN+Dal gsum/ /bdag dang nad pa'i bar du bya/ /dang po gzungs kyi bum pa la/ /gnyis pa smyug shad lcug mas byab / /gsum pa ba su rigs drug dgod/ /'khar gzhong sman gyis bkang ba ni/ /lcug

ma'i gdan de nad rnams gdab/ /mA ga yu lu zhes brjod la/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar dag gis dbul/ /zhi ba chu yi sbyin sreg go/ /gu gul dud pas bdug pa dang / /bra ma'i lcag gis brab pa dang / /khyung dang mthu chen bsdigs shing brab/ /mdongs kyis dud khung lta bur

byab / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyon byas la/ /gdon de dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'phang / /gdon rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /sman yang rtsa lngas nad rnams 'joms / /mthong ba'i dug dang reg pa'i dug /kha rlangs dug dang bsam pa'i dug /myos pa'i dug dang dug mtsho lnga/ /gtum

po khros pa'i rgyud bzhin du/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /ye shes lha yi sngags kyis dgrol/ /mdze rigs sum brgya drug cu las/ /bsdu na bco brgyad shin tu brgyad / /rtsa dang chu dang dbang po dngas/ /skra dang rus pa sen mo spu/ /dug dang rkyen dang rigs dang gdon/ /

mngal dang srin bu chu dang ltas/ /dang po brtag pa gces pa yin/ /gnyis pa gso thabs bstan par bya/ /brtag pa brgyad la gso thabs gnyis/ /sman dang lha ru shes par bya/ /lha ni sngon du song ba yis/ /sman ni rten cing 'brel pa'i rdzas/ /bcangs pa

tsam gyis bsrung ba'i mchog /rtsa bshal rtsub bshal rna bshal sogs/ /rngabs ru'i thabs sbyor dag dang ni/ /gtar dang me thur la sogs pas/ /rig pas dpyad la kun nas dgrol/ /mdze rigs brgyad la gso thabs brgyad/ / brtag

thabs brgyad la man ngag brgyad/ /bla ma'i ngag gis brgyan par bya/ /dug la sman gyis gso bar bya/ /rkyen la rten cing 'brel pa'i thabs/ /rigs la rin chen gter gyis gzer/ /gdon la byab bsrungs lha yi sngags/ /mngal dang srin la rtsa bshal lo/ /chu la gtar dang de bzhin

te/ /las la dge ba'i stobs kyis gso/ /lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo dag las/ /bdag nyid 'phags pas lung bstan pas/ /brtsam par mi 'os ma yin te/ /yan lag brgyad du de bshad do/ /rgyud kyi dgongs pa yan lag brgyad/ /lhag chad rgyal po bka' las

'gal/ /zab mo sgrub thabs 'di bris pas/ /'dir 'jug gsang bdag 'grub par shog /phyag na rdo rje'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ma hA

yak+Sha se nA pa ti nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ga ru Da sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / bya khyung gi sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud dang ni/ /gser mig 'khyil ba'i

rgyud dag la/ /brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di/ /bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam/ /rang gi snying gar zla dkyil bsam/ /de yi steng du hUM yig bsam/ /hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros/ /

bla ma dang ni gos sngon can/ /dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol/ /skyabs 'gro lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo / /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /

de na 'od dpung tshul du bdag /de yi nang du hUM gnas pa/ /de las dzaH'phros 'khor lor gyur/ /lte bar nyi bsam hUM de nyid/ /de nas gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur/ /thugs ka'i hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur/ /hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /

khro chu'i sprul bas gdug pa bkug /sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa btab/ /btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur/ /de nas hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /rdo rje'i gur dang ra ba dang / /dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o/ /hUM gi 'phro 'dus slar la zhu/ /stong pa nyid las 'od dpung byung / /de las nyi

zla kha sbyar gyur/ /A li kA li nyi zlas brgyan/ /dbus su aHdang hUM sbyar te/ /kha dog dkar dmar nyid du gyur/ /'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du las/ /zhu bas rdo rje pad+mar gyur/ /pad lter rdo rje rked nub tsam/ /lte ba gnyis la snying pos bskor/ /de nyid ngo bo thugs dang

gsung / /gnyis kas sku gsung byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid 'od du zhu ba las/ /rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur/ /pad+ma las ni khro mor gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje gos sngon ni/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /mche ba gtsigs shing spyan

gsum dmar/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul/ /mdun du rdo rje phag mo ni/ /sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug bsnams/ /g.yon pa b+han d+ha dmar gyis

bkang / /gcer bu spyan gsum dbu skra brdzes/ /phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gdan du rdo rje rgya gram bsam/ /oM hUM trAM hrIH aH/ e waM mA ya/ hUM swad hrIH AH dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM AH hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM AHhUM sa ma ya dzaH/ oM AH hUM sa ma ya AH/ bud+d+ha ga ru Da oM/ badzra ga ru Da

hUM/ rat+na ga ru Da trAM/ pad+ma ga ru Da hrIH/ karma ga ru Da aH/ e puSh+pa ga ru Da/ waM d+hU pa ga ru Da/ mA A lo ke ga ru Da/ ya gan+d+ha ga ru Da/ ga ru Da yak+Sha/ ga ru Da ya ma/ ga ru Da hu lu/ ga ru Da tsi n+da/ dzaHga ru Da/ hUM ga ru Da/ baM ga ru Da/ hoHga ru Da/ yab kyi go cha'o/ /oM baM/ haM oM/

hri naoM/ hro hri/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ yum gyi go cha'o/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /phyi nang bdud rtsi bcas pas mchod/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHbcas pas bcing / /bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur bas rigs kyi gtso bos dbu

brgyan bsam/ /de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /thig le ge sar bcas pa'i dbus/ /A li kA li yang dag ldan/ /de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha/ /dar dkar phra ba'i skud pa tsam/ /de las bsam gyis mi khyab bsam/ /bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams nas/ /de las gzugs

sku rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /dang po rnal 'byor lung gis brgyan/ /de nas chos kyi dbyings su thim/ /phag mo'i de kho na nyid ni/ /phag zhal don dam dngos po med/ /kun rdzogs khro zhal mtshon pa la/ /bya ni gsal ba'i thabs yin te/ /khyung ni gsal ba dngos med yin/ /

ga ni gang du mi gnas te/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/ /bya ni gzugs sku rnam gnyis te/ /khyung ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /gdod nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /oM badzra

tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ badzra ga ru Da hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badzra pA Ni ga ru Da be ga hUM hUM dzaHdzaHra tse pre tsi hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ yum gyi snying po'o/ /dzaHhUM dar ma shaM ga ki ni da ri/ dar ma he sha d+hu d+hu ra/ rat+na te shaM ka ri/ dar ma

ti sha tsa ka ra/ dar ma te sha sa ma ya/ spu ta ya spu ta ya/ te pa te pa kha kha raM/ te pa te pa tsa ka ri/ te pa te pa mun du ri/ te pa te pa b+r+bud+d+ho ta ra/ te pa te pa sa mu sa muny+dza/ tsa kha mun dur khye/ badzra tsa na ran dza dzaHbadzra tsa mun+d+ha ra dzaHbadzra kha mun+d+ha ra dzaH/ te sha mun du ra naM/ dzu ru dzu ru raM/ dzu ru dzu

ru mun badzra/ dzaHhUM rdo rje ka chen bskyod/ rdo rje drag po bskyod/ /rdo rje mtha' yas bskyod/ rdo rje mthar thug bskyod/ kha dza ra dza mun dur khye/ pad+ma ran kha dza ra dza mun dur khye/ kha dza ra dza mun du ra ra sa muny+dza/ oM DA ki nI dzaHspyan drangs pa'i sngags so/ /oM kA ya bAka tsit+ta/ i daM ba liM

b+huny+dza dza ka la phul+la d+hU pa mA sa/ se sa kha na di/ te ka ka to/ oM a mr-i ta pa ti dzaHka sa ka ru/ pU dza khA hi puSh+pa/ A lo ke / gan+d+he/ nai be d+ya/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi nA ga pu a d+hi pa ti/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ oM AHhUM/ a kA hUM/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha r+m+mA NAM/ A d+ya nut+pan+na t+'+wa ta oM

AHhUM/ gtor ma bstabs pa'i sngags so/ /ka ka rak+Sha/ hUM hUM s+t+yoM b+h+yoM dzaHdzaH/ kha kha te sha rak+Sha/ hUMhUMs+t+yoM b+h+yoM dzaH/ kha kha kha tsa ba rak+Sha/ hUM hUM s+t+yoM b+h+yoM dzaH/ kha kha kha tsa kha rak+Sha/ hUM hUM s+t+yoM b+h+yoM dzaH/ kha kha kha mu du rak+Sha/ hUM hUM s+t+yoM b+h+yoM dzaH/ kha kha kha// dzaHhUM baM hoH gdon phyag rgyas dgug pa'i

sngags so/ /ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya/ spu ta ya/ spu d+ha ra/ tsa ga rak+Sha sa ma ya/ du ta ya sad ta ra/ mu du rak+Sha sa ma ya/ spu ta ya spu ta ra/ gdon gshed ma dang 'bral ba'i sngags so/ /hUM hril hril dim dim kun phob phob shar shar di ri di ri rbad/ kha thaM thaM thum/ dza re dza re b+h+yo

ha sa ha sa/ te pa te pa/ tri ta ha tri ta ha/ tri khug tri khug /tshal pa tshal pa/ srog tshig nan rbad/ lus rdul mA ra ya rbad/ raM raM dza la dza la/ shig shig rdul bun rbad sod/ nA ga sarba ga ru Da khA hi/ spyi dril ba'i sngags so/ /oM na mo bu d+d+hA ya/ kI li mi li tsan+ta na ga ban+d+ha ya swA hA/

phur pa'i sngags so/ /ra li hur hur thum b+h+yo d+ha sha hur thum b+h+yo/ ma ma shi b+h+yo/ sarba ga ru ser ba la b+h+yo/ ser ba bzlog pa'i sngags so/ /oM be ra be ra badzra d+ha ri ye swA hA/ rims nad bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /hUM di ri di ri ga ru Da b+h+yo hUM hUM dzaHdzaH/ e a ri li hri b+h+yo/ 'khor

gyi klu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /hUM dzu ti ting ting teg teg ho ho/ hUM sto b+h+yo/ gtad 'don pa'i sngags so/ /tri naM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ 'byung po skrod pa'i sngags so/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas/ /bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams/ /'di la brten

pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /phyag rgya chen po thob par shog /rdo rje skor gyi nang sgrub yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ phyag na rdo rje zhal mngon sum du gzigs pa slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+t+ra dang / lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims

kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra pA Ni sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par 'dod pas/ /

dang por chos thams cad stong par bsam/ de nas snying rje chen po bskyed/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dkyil du hUM mthing nag 'bar ba bsam/ hUM gi 'phro 'du las rdo rje mthing nag 'bar ba hUM gis mtshan pa bsam/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ de

dag yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje gtum po shin tu khros/ 'jigs su rung ba/ sku mdog mthing nag /spyan gsum pa/ 'jigs su rung ba sbrul dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ phyag g.yas rdo rje rgya gram gyi tho ba 'phyar ba/ g.yon mi rus kyi phur pa 'dril

ba cig tu bsams la/ oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM hUM trAM hrIHaHzhes go bgo'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bsam/ bdun rnam dag bya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa rang la bstim/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ sum 'bum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so/ /

@##/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'di cung zad bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do/ /thams cad srung par byed do/ /gnod pa'i log 'dren thams cad med par byed do/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ba liM i daM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ /khA hi khA hi/ b+huny+dza hoHrak+ta pi pa to/ sa ma ye swA hA/

de bsnyen pa byed pa'i dus su rgyun du gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so/ /de nas drag po'i las bya bar 'dod pas/ dang por dkyil 'khor ji tsam dran pa cig bya/ rdo rje rgya gram bri/ ra kun nag por bya/ re khA tshil dang thal chen bsres pas bri/ de'i dbus su e gru gsum

zabs su mdzub gang ba cig brus la/ nang ro bsregs pa'i thal bas byug /gru gsum de'i phyi rol dmar por bya/ de ni dkyil 'khor bya ba'i thabs so/ /de nas ling+ga bca' ba'i thabs na/ spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la de'i snying gar shog bu la dmar chen gyis rdo rje rgya

gram bris la/ bsgrub bya rang gi rten dang bral bar bsam/ gru gsum de'i dbus su ming bris la gzhug /de nas gru gsum nang du bcug la/ ske nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la/ de'i sna la mi'i rje ngar gyi phur pa sor bzhi pa cig btags la/ 'jigs byed

chen por mnga' gsol te/ sngags nam phyed dam nyi ma phyed na brdeg go/ /phyi rol du 'gro ba la sogs pa byed na ling+ga las phur ba mi dbyung bar btab la gzhag go/ /maN+Dal dbus su lha'i gdan du byas la/ sum 'bum du bzlas la gdab/ de'i dus su gtor ma dang

mchod pa dus drug tu dbul lo/ /de 'debs tsa na rang nyid phyag na rdo rje sku mdog sngo nag /zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ bsgrub bya'i steng na 'dug pa/ phyag na phur bu dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa cig tu

bsgom zhing sngags bzlas la brdeg go/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM che ge mo shi ri kI la ye ta hUM phaT/ a mu ka staM b+ha ya/ hri staM b+ha ya kI la ye ta hUM phaT ces bzlas la brdeg go/ /de ltar drag po'i las byed pa'i dus su gtor ma gtong ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM

phaT/ ma ma sarba sha trUM/ a mu ka ma tsa ye ta pra ya mAM sa dzi bo/ bu ga ru d+hi ra pri yaM b+hak+She na ba liM yi daM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ khA hi khA hi b+huny+dza hoH/ rak+ta pi pa to/ Ar+ya pra tsa gr-ih+Na/ khA hi khA hi/ rak+ta pi pa to/ a ti kra mA ti sa ma ye swA hA/ phur bu'i las rdzogs nas mtshon rnon pos

ling+ga stod smad du gtubs la/ smad lha'i zhal du sbyin sreg bya/ stod ming byang dang bcas par mnan pa bya/ las kyi dus su rdo rje rgya gram gnyis kyi bar du gzugs brnyan de bcug la thod pa'i nang du skud pa sngon dmar gyis dkri'o/ /skud pa lag pa g.yon pas bzung la/

las kyi dus su gzugs brnyan la gnas lngar phur pas gdab/ de nas slar bcug la sngon dmar gyis dkris la lam rgya gram du sba'o/ /de'i steng du phye dang sre mog gis rgya gram bris la gzhag go/ /las 'gor na bskyar la bya'o/ /spra tshil las ling+ga sor bzhi pa byas la/

bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas par bcug la tsher mas de'i kha la btsugs na/ phyir rgol ba'i kha tshums par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyi phur bu dang mi'i rje ngar la ming nas smos te/ yan lag gang dang gang la btab pa de rengs par 'gyur ro/ /mtsho lkugs par sbas na ngag rengs

par 'gyur ro/ /sgo rtsar sbas na 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /ral gri la bsngags nas g.yul du zhugs na rgyal bar byed do/ /khros bas snying gar bsnun na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i dur du sbas na rims kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rabs chad kyi thod pa la ming dang sngags bris

nas rabs chad kyi dur du sbas na rabs chad par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par bsngags la dur khrod kyi thal ba'i steng du bzhag na 'byer bar byed do/ /khyi nag po'i thod pa la sngags dang ming bcas pa bris nas klu'i gnas su sbas na mdzes zin par 'gyur ro/ /dbang ma thob cing

man ngag med/ /tshad dang mi ldan 'di mi bya/ /'di la nyes pa yod pas na/ /shin tu gsang zhing spel mi bya/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i gsang ba thugs kyi phur gcig ma'o// // /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma g+ho mi sha hUM/ che ge mo shi raM kI la ye

ta hUM phaT/ shi raM s+t+waM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ ka ti mu la ye ta hUM phaT/ ka ti mu kha s+t+waM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ hrI ta staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ pa ta kI la ye ta hUM phaT/ mchog phur gyis gnas lngar gdab bo/ /stong gsum snod kyi sems can rnams/ /khro bo gtum pa'i sku ru bsgom/ /'gro drug bcud

kyi 'jig rten dag /bcom ldan gtum por bsam par bya/ /de la bsam rgyud ni/ rlung rdo rje rgya gram nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du stong gi phyi mtha' dag rdo rje gtum po rdul snyed kyi sku'i rang bzhin du bsams te/ de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g.yo zhing brdabs

pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten khams kyi tshad tsam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dar ba dang / sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma stong gi 'od gzi brjid can gyi me'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang / ljags kyi rdo rje las bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rim pa gsum 'phros stong gsum gyi

stong rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang / klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gdug pa du ba'i 'od kyis klu phra mo dang sa bdag rnams bsregs pa dang / thugs kyi rdo rje las khro bo du ma 'phros pas/ bskal pa chen po'i rlung bzhin du bgegs kun du 'thor ba dang /

phyag gis rdo rje gsor bas gong du gnod par sems pa de'i sa phyogs su/ rdo rje chen po 'od zer sgyogs 'phen pa bzhin du yang dang yang bsnun par bsam/ de nas bzlas pa ma zin par du hUM 'brug gi sgra lta bu rgyun du gdon/ bsnun pa'i 'khor lo zangs lcags kyi phye ma dang /

yungs kar ske tshe dug chus brab bo/ /yang rnam pa gcig la/ snying ga'i hUM las 'phros pas sangs rgyas thams cad phyag na rdo rjer gyur te/ 'jim pa mi dmigs pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur/ sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ shog bu la gnod pa'i gdon laM s+t+waM b+ha nan

shAn+tiM staM b+ha naM ku ru naM hUM phaT sAts+tsha de mchod rten nag po 'od 'bar ba mthong ba tsam gyis skrag par byed pa/ bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mtshon cha thogs pa bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gzhan gyi srung ma'i rigs

rnams bkug nas mthu med par bsam zhing / gtum po'i zhabs 'og nas mi 'chor bar bsam/ de nas mchod pa dang bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de lta bu 'bum btab na/ drang srong dmod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags bcad

pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga'o//[ ]@##/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg mdor bsdus pa/ bkra shis pa'i gnas su me thab zlum po dkar po byas la/ tsan+dan nam 'o ma can gyi shing dkar po la zlum por brtsigs te/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ dang

la bdun rnam dag bya/ de nas me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod cing / 'bras chan dang mar gyi sbyin sreg bya/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas gang la dmigs pa de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ dpal 'phel ba'i gnas su me thab gru bzhi ser po byas la/ shing

ser po gru bzhi brtsigs te/ me tog ser pos dus gsum du mchod cing / rin po che lnga dang 'bru sna lnga'i sbyin sreg byas na/ gang la dmigs pa de rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /buSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa lta bu'i gnas su ni/ /me thab zla gam dmar po brtsigs/ /seng ldeng

dmar po'i zla gam brtsigs la/ me tog dmar pos dus gsum du mchod cing / me tog dang sman gyi sbyin sreg byas na/ gang la dmigs pa de nyid dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dzaHdzaHho/ dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su me thab gru gsum mthing nag brtsigs/ shing nag po tsher

ma can gru gsum brtsigs la/ me tog sngon pos dus gsum du mchod cing / dug sna sha chen tshil chen yungs kar ske tshe/ bgegs kyi ling+ga la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na/ gzas pa po tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /mA ra ya hUM phaT/ go rims dang po maN+Dal

bya/ de nas lha mchod/ de nas spyan drangs/ de nas bdun rnam dag bya/ de nas me lha'i sbyin sreg bya/ de nas thab khung mi dmigs par bya/ de nas me lha rang gnas su gsol/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //hUM bde gshegs

gtso bo gtum po dang / /lha rnams phyogs su 'khor ba rnams/ /bdag dang sems can rgyud sbyang phyir/ /skad cig tsam gyis gshegs su gsol/ /oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya dzaHbadzra AM ku sha dzaHzhes pas spyan drangs la/ yi

ge brgya pas spyi khrus dbul/ oM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM zhes pas zhal bsil dbul/ oM pra ra sat+kA ra A dI tsid swA hA/ zhes zhabs bsil dbul/ oM ka ma lA ya swA hA/ zhes pas me tog phul la gdan dbul/ gang gis 'khor ba'i nyes pa ni/ /dran pa

tsam gyis 'joms mdzad cing / /bla med byang chub thob mdzad pa/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni/ /yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs/ /skyon med sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid stong

pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /thams la mkhas phyir sna tshogs skur ston pa/ /rgyal sras khyung gi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /yid kyis ci nus dmigs pa'i mchod 'bul na/ /kun du bzang po'i mchod sprin

chen po ltar/ /sku gsung thugs la mnyes pa'i mchog gyur cig /bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/ /sdig pa ma lus bgyis pa rnams/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /spyan sngar so sor sdig bshags so/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan pa'i byang chub

sems/ /dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/ /de yi rjes su bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /byang chub sems de nam yang mi gtong ngo / /bla ma rdo rje 'chang dang ni/ /gsang sngags kun bdag rdo rje 'chang / /rigs 'dzin pa yi rnal 'byor rnams/ /dge

ba mdzad la rjes yi rang / /bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang // 'khor dang bcas la lus 'bul na/ /bzhes nas bdag la rjes mthun par/ /dngos grub rnams ni stsal du gsol/ /dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /da lta dge ba gang spyad pa/ /bdag dang

sems can don slad du/ /byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi/ /phyag rdor bdun rnam dag go/ /gser mes ma tshig pa/ g.yu mig ma phug pa/ mu tig /rin po che mdung len/ gur gum gyis bris pa'i rten 'brel gyi snying po/ rma bya'i mdongs/ bya khyung gi snying po khro gser gyis

bris pa/ gla rtsi/ ga pur/ mu zi/ btsan dug /gu gul/ tsan+dan go shiR+Sha/ sman gi sbang / bya rgod kyi tshil bu/ sbre'u'i pags pa la gtum//[ ]@##/ /klu gtor rgyas pa ni/ rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du 'bru sna tshogs dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / zan la sogs pa'i phung po stsal la/ zan la sogs

pa'i phung po la baM las rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i snod/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du paM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ de'i steng du hrIHlas 'od 'phros pas bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho kha dog dkar zhing ro mchog brgyad

dang ldan pa dri zhim pa bsam/ oM las sman gyi sdong po stong gsum gang ba/ swa las ut+pal gyi nags tshal me tog gi tshal chags pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam/ taM las dpag bsam gyi shing 'o ma dad bum pa dpag tu med pa 'bab pa bskyed la/ bdag lha'i rnal

'byor du gnas pa'i snying ga'i yi ge las 'od 'phros pas/ klu rigs thams cad sbrul mgo bdun pa la sogs pa'am/ klu rigs sa bdag tu bsam/ 'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bus/ gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad nas

bkug la/ de'i lce la rdo rje bsam/ de'i steng du hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ 'od zer gyi sbu gus 'thungs/ gnyis su med pa'i sems dang ldan par bsam/ mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa la/ oM ba ta li ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsnyan gsan dbab pa'o/ /oM b+hu a d+hi pa ti ma hA

pad+ma/ mA le mr-i dzaH A kaR+Sha ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM ba ru Na nA ga de ba tA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ma hA nA ga hoHba ti sarba phuHphuH/ sa ma ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ me tog dbul/ oM b+hak+Sha sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzaHhUM swA hA/ 'o ma la sogs dbul/ oM ba ru

Na nA ga de ba tA ye swA hA/ oM nA ga sarba phuHphuHa nan+ta kA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHtak+ShA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHba su ki ye swA hA/ oM phuHphuHkarko Ta kA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHpad+mA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHma hA pad+mA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHshaM kha pA lA ya swA hA/ oM phuHphuHhu lu kA ya swA hA/ oM

phuHphuHa nan+ta shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM nA ga rA dza a nan+tA ya swA hA/ oM nA ga shaM kha pA lA ya swA hA/ oM nA ga sarba pU dza me g+ha sa ma ye swA hA/ oM nA ga sarba i daM liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sa ma ye swA hA/ nA ga hu lu kA ya swA hA/ oM nA ga ba su ki ye swA hA/ tak+Sha ya swA hA/ ba ta li swA hA/ u pa nan+da

swA hA/ wa ru NA ya swA hA/ oM bi rU pa k+Sha NA ya swA hA/ oM nA ga le nA ga le swA hA/ oM nA ga ke she phud ya te nA ma ka pra marda nA ya swA hA/ oM b+hU a d+hi pa ti ma hA pad+ma mA le mr-i dza/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na pa ya swA hA/ oM b+hU a d+hi pa ti ma hA pa ra/ ma hA pad+ma ma lo mr-i dza/ ma hA pU dza sa ma ya

swA hA/ sa bdag mchod pa/ klu shi sa bstan pa ni/ badzra prA Ni nA ga sh+'+n+tiM ku ru swA hA/ stong bzlas na sa bdag klu gnyan kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /zab che chung blta/ zab che na gzugs sna tshogs bya ba bar bar du sha dang nya sha dang / chu mig nas chu blangs la ba dmar ser gyi'o

mas bya/ chung na gtor mas chog /bya khyung sa ma ya tan+t+ra'i rgyud las btus pa/ lo tsA ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'i klu gtor rgyas pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra tsaN+Da kro d+ha sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo rdo rje gtum

po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po sgrub pa po dkon mchog gsum la dang / bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas stong pa nyid du bsams la/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i steng du hUM las

yang dag par byung ba'i rdo rje gtum po sku mdog nag po/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pas gnam lcags kyi rdo rje zhun ma bsnams pa/ g.yon pas thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/ g.yas bskum pa/ spyan gsum

me'i mdog 'dra ba/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba/ bskal pa'i me'i nang na bzhugs pa/ sku las khro chung dang khyung mang po 'phro ba cig gsal bar bskyed la/ snying gar hUM la sngags 'dis bskor la bzlas so/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ skyon

sngags hUM la bsdu'o/ /de nas gdon gzhom par 'dod na/ rdo rje de khyung nag po phyag gnyis kyis sprul mgo nas za ba/ gshog pa gdengs pa mchu sder rdo rje 'bar bar bsam/ g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub thur du bsngams pa las me 'bar bar bsams la/ sngags

'di bzlas par bya'o/ /hUM phaT Sha Na ro ma hA tsaN+Da badzra ga ru Na de ba then phyung / sa ga nA ga snying la gzir/ thum ril rbad drag po gsum dang ldan par bzlas so/ /de nas gdon gsad par 'dod na/ rang gi rmi lam du ci byung ba thams cad bsreg cing sngags 'di bzlas so/ /

oM nA ga tsaN+Da tshal pa u rta ke /nA ga tsit+ta shak+ti tshal pa naM/ nA ga tri sa ya ti/ big+h+naM ta/ nA ga kro d+ha bi da rA dza ya/ shi shi/ nan nan/ dul dul rbud rbud thum ril dzaHdzaH/ lan gsum gyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /tha ma mnan par bya'o/ /gtum chung khra thogs ma'i sgrub thabs

rgyal po zla ba'i snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba sgeg pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra ga ru Da sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje khyung gi sgrub thabs/ rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la

skyabs su 'gro ba byas la/ rang nyid rdo rje khyung kha dog nag po lag pa gnyis kyis sbrul za ba/ gshog pa dang sgro la sogs pa gnam lcags kyi ral gri me 'bar ba/ mig khro chu khol ba lta bu/ sku che ba cig tu bsams te/ oM badzra ga ru Da tsaN+Da ma hA nA ga mA ra ya sod sod/

nA ga mA ra ya thum ril rbad rbad hUM phaT/ rtag tu bzlas la ma yengs pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /'di ni las thams cad pa'i sngags te/ gang la yang bum par chu blugs la khyung bskyed la bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de nas yungs kar blugs la khrus

bya'o/ /nad gang na bar yang byug par bya'o/ /bya'i sha mi bza'/ sgo nga mi bza'/ bya la mi brdeg /rtag tu lhar bsgom par bya'o/ /rdo rje khyung gi sgrub pa'i man ngag /slob dpon rdo rje pad+mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta sa'i snying po dang / lo tsA ba rma ban gyis

bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra tsaN+Da maN+Dal bid+hi bA sa dza ka b+ha dra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gtum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba

bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni/ /bla ma'i gdams pa'i lam zhugs nas/ /cho ga bzang po mdor bsdus 'di/ /rang dga' nyes pa dor te bri/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing / /rgyud kyi dbang thob dam tshig brtan/ /gzhan phan bsgrub la dga' ba la/ /gzhan dag gus

pas gsol 'debs sam/ /yang na rang bzhin bsgrub don du/ /nus pa dris la tshig gis sbyin/ /dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas la/ /gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma thob par bya/ /de nas bla gos

legs bgos nas/ /snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste/ /gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ /dur khrod dben pa rdo leb dang / /sngon byas yid 'ong la sogs su/ /lto 'phye'i sbyor bas brko bar bya/ /brtag cing sbyang dang bsrung bar bya/ /

nyes pa med pa'i sa gzhi der/ /rdo rje 'dzin par gsal ba dang / /baM las skyes pa'i lha mo ser/ /mdzes pa rgyan ldan lus phyed snang / /bum pa 'dzin la mchod bstod de/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang rnam thar ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha

mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /lag pa sa la brdabs pa las/ /dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yang / /khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyi/ /

dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las kyis zhes/ /zer zhing sa la thim par 'gyur/ /ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa ste/ /'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang / /dbugs 'byung gis ni byung par bya/ /yang na me yi las kyis sbyang / /stong pa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /rim pas

lha yi khang par bsam/ /me tog steng du rdo rje bzhag /bla mas khrus byas rdo rje 'chang / /bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas/ /shar bltas dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la/ /tshad med bzhi yis gzhan don bsgrub/ /rnam rgyal la sogs bskyed pa yi/ /slob ma gus pas

spos thogs la/ /mchod la tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /hUM byams pa chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhe sdang dag pas me long ye shes gsal/ /gtum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

ma lus gnas/ /chos kun bdag dang bral ba'i mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /de bzhin lho phyogs la sogs nas/ /hUM snying rje chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /nga rgyal dag pa mnyam nyid ye shes mchog /gtum po gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /rdo rje

bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste/ /kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /hUM dga' ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags dag pa so sor rtog /gtum po

gdug pa kun 'dul ba/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba mchog gi chos chen po/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod pa/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /hUM btang snyoms chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gti mug rnam dag nan

tan ye shes mchog /gtum po gdug pa kun 'dul ba/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi srog chen po/ /rang bzhin rnam dag dri ma med/ /kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /

de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /khro zhing brjid pa'i skur byas te/ /rkang pa hUM las rdo rje bsam/ /mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /'jigs spangs byang shar mtshams song la/ /rang gis bstod cing nga rgyal gyis/ /hUM dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la

gnas pa'i/ /lha tshogs bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis/ /gal te khyed rnams mi 'gro na/ /ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar

'gas shing / /lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni/ /rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za/ /de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs/ oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sarba big+h+nAn uts+tsha ta ya phaT/ ces pas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya/ /gar stabs kyis ni bskor ba dang / dang por

phyin la 'di skad brjod/ /gang dag mi 'gro bgegs yod na/ /lus ngag yid kyi nus pa rnams/ /gzhom phyir khro bo'i phur bus gdab/ /kI la ya zhes btab nas kyang / /A ko Ta yas brdung bar bya/ /me ri la sogs sngags kyis bsrung / /gtso bo'i gdon ni gru bzhi ste/ /

'khor lo dri chus zlum por bya/ /kha dog mthun pa'i me tog dgram/ /sa yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /lha ni lhag par gnas par bya/ /rang sar lha rnams rdzogs pa dang / /mchod bstod me tog spos thogs la/ /hUM dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /thugs kyi sras

po rdo rje 'chang / /dpa' bo rdo rje bde mas 'khyud/ /'khor gyi khro bo ma lus kun/ /kun nas bdag la dgongs nas kyang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang / /slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rjes su brtse

bas nyer dgongs te/ /song ni dgyes pas byon par mdzod/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed rnams/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i chos skyong rnams/ /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa/ /rdo

rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor mchog /deng bdag 'dri bar gyur pa la/ /bdag dang skal ldan slob ma rnams/ /byin gyis brlab phyir bsrung bar mdzod/ /bum pa lhag par gnas 'dod pas/ /rin chen 'byung khungs las byung ba/ /dri ma med cing lto ba che/ /mgrin phra mchu

'phyang dri zhim chus/ /dkar zhal byas nas mtshan ma dgod/ /rnam rgyal phyag mtshan rdzogs par bri/ /bskrad cing chu dang byang sems dang / /byA g+h+ra sing ha dbyig pa dang / /ut+pal gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /ha sa de ba gser dngul dang / /mu tig mu men bye ru gzhug /nas

til gro sran mung+ga dang / /ga pur dzA ti gur gum mchog /tsan+dan gnyis dang a ga ru/ /mar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /lan tshwa rnams kyis lto ba dgang / /gos kyis mgrin pa bkab pa dang / /tsu ta la sogs 'bras bu can/ /yang na me tog yod pas brgyan/ /me

tog ldan pa'i ra stegs sam/ /ku sha'i gdan la rang sar bzhugs/ /bum pa b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / /chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan bcas pa/ /rnam rgyal lha rnams tshogs par bskyed/ /gzhan du sa bon gang yin pas/ /cho ga ma lus rdzogs par bskyed/ /hUM khro bo

gtum po gdug pa 'dul/ /rang bzhin ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /rnam dag dri med sku 'chang ba/ /'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs sku la gnyis med 'khyud/ /stong pa nyid kyi bde ster ma/ /dmar ljang gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /dpa' mo bde ma phyag

'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs dang phrin las kyi/ /gtso bo khro chen 'jigs pa che/ /gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i sku/ /phyogs kyi khro bo phyag 'tshal lo/ /mar me bdug spos dri chab ma/ /zhal zas kyis ni tshim byed pa/ /mchod pa'i lha mo dgos 'dod 'byung / /

mtshams su bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma/ /dgyes pa'i dril bu sgrog mdzad ma/ /khro mo dbang phyug chen mo rnams/ /sgom bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod cing srad bu dang ldan pas/ /phrin las sbyar zhing bzlas

par bya/ /gtor mas mchod cing gsol ba btab/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang / /bsrung zhing mdzes pa'i me tog thogs/ /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos ldan zhing / /dga' ba'i sems kyis gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /byang chub

chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems mchog bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen

po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /'od kyis phur byas sdig pa sbyang / /rjes su gzung bas spro ba ni/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog/

khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed mthu yis ni/ /mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes mchog /de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing / /rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa spongs/ /ma bsgral 'khor ba'i

sems can la/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la bkod/ /bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis/ /slob ma'i tshogs kyis sdig bshags la/ /dge bsnyen la sogs rim pas sbyin/ /gang yin bslab pa bstan pa dang / /slob ma lhar

byas yang na ni/ /gnas gsum lhar bcas rtags btab la/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang / /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang / /bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol/ /bdag gis thog ma med pa nas/ /sdig pa

bgyis pa ma lus kun/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi/ /spyan sngar da lta mthol zhing bshags/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang / /sangs rgyas kun bdag rdo rje can/ /de rigs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /dge ba mdzad la rjes yi rang / /bcom ldan

phyag na rdo rje ni/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags bdag pos dbang bskur la/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /mthu ldan skyon med khyed rnams la/ /skye rgas na 'chi mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa/ /

mthun 'jug mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/ /don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med/ /mtshan mar mi rtog chos sku la/ /bde gshegs mtshan dpe'i skur snang ba/ /rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi/ /dus gsum mgon po thugs rje can/ /byams pa'i thugs las ma g.yos kyang / /

dgongs pa'i dbang gis khro sprul la/ /gsang sngags lha tshogs kun skyabs mchi/ /de sgrub des mtshon gsung gi chos/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad drag po'i tshogs/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dri ma med/ /chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi/ /sna tshogs skur sprul don mchog bsgrub/ /

rin chen skyabs mchog dge 'dun dang / /'phags pa gos sngon byang chub sems/ /dge 'dun mchog la skyabs su mchi/ /bla ma dus gsum mgon po dang / bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni/ /'khor dang bcas la lus 'bul bas/ /bzhes nas bdag la rjes brtse bas/ /

rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /tshogs gnyis las byung dge ba rnams/ /'khor ba'i sems can ma lus don/ /byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya/ /byang chub tu yang sems bskyed la/ /sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /maN+Dal

sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang / /bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po dang / /dkon mchog gsum dang bstan dga' kun/ /bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas su/ /byang

chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa

dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims rnams/ /so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs

dag pa'i/ /dam tshig yin par rgyal bas bsgrags/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /skyon bral rdo rje chen po'i rigs/ /thugs rjes 'brel ba'i slob dpon ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /dri ma med pa'i dam tshig chos/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin re

bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ni/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /sdom pa ma

lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid du so sor gzung / /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung bgyi/ /sems can dngos grub

che la dgod/ /dkyil 'khor me tog sngon por bcas/ /rdo rje 'chang la dbul bar bya/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga gtor ma'i tshogs/ /rnam pa kun du bsten par bya/ /thabs kyis bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni/ /snying rje las byung bsgral bar bya/ /lan gsum bar du dam bcas pa/ /

rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phros pas/ /rang rang ye shes yig bzhis bstim/ /rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus/ /mas rim bzhin du brtan par bya/ /de rjes mchod pa spro bar bya/ /a shwat+tha dang pa la sha /u du m+WA ra la sogs pa'i/ /sor bcu gnyis sam yang na brgyad/ /rtse

mo me tog mdzes pas brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad rnam lngas byug /shar bltas dbus su sos bzung nas/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas dor byas te/ /khyod ni dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /zhugs pa'i dngos grub brtag pa'i phyir/ /rnam shes dag pa'i so shing 'di/ /sos

bzung nas ni dbus su dor/ /bdag dang bla ma steng bltas nas/ /mchog gi dngos grub dam pa yin/ /phyogs su phyin las so so ste/ /mtshams su 'jig rten dngos grub 'byung / /thur bltas sa 'og grub pa yin/ /sa la ma lhung mkha' spyod do/ /bdud rtsi byin brlabs thod par

blugs/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje'i chu/ /'thungs shig dam tshig byin gyis brlabs/ /gal te dam tshig 'das pa na/ /dmyal bar nges par sreg par byed/ /oM hrIHbi shud+d+ha d+harmA sarba bA paM ni sh+tsa/ sho ya bi kAlpAn a pa na ya hUM hUM/ lan gsum skyor chus ngag dag byas/ /lha dang rjes mthun

skud pa la/ /sngags btab g.yas dang phrin las g.yon/ /khro bo gtum po'i byin rlabs dang / gsang sngags nus pa bla na med/ /skal ldan bar chad med par bsrung / /su yang gnod pa ma byed cig /ku sha gtsang ma byin brlabs te/ /bzhin bzangs tshur nyon dkyil

'khor du/ /'jug pa'i rtags rnams brtag pa'i phyir/ /ku sha'i rtswa 'di sngas dang stan/ /thub pas ting 'dzin grub ltar shog /ma nor seng ge bzhin nyal nas/ /mtshan ma ji ltar byung ba ltar/ /bla ma'i mdun du brjod par bya/ /bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed/ /gal te ngan

na bskrad dang bsrung / /me yi las kyis bzlog par bya/ /gzhan yang dge ba'i las kun shis/ /bla mas rdo rje can khyod la/ /nang par langs te dkyil 'khor pa/ /nam mkhar bteg la thig gad pa ste/ /bu mo gtsang zhing sdom ldan gyis/ /bkal ba ras bal las byung ba/ /

ye shes lnga ni gcig bsdus pa'am/ /yang na sku gsung thugs kyang rung / /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA spa ra s+pha ra a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA t+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ti sarba d+harmAH/ zhes brjod pas ni bsgril par bya/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas kyang / /mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la/ /blo ldan

ye shes bstim byas la/ /nam mkhar ye shes dza dzas gdab/ /sgo yi bcu gnyis cha dang ldan/ /srid kyang khang pa nyis 'gyur la/ /tshangs pa'i las thig drang byas nas/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ /tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa/ /

bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des/ /cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye/ /gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /chad na bla ma'i srog g.yo zhing / /dman lhag nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo ldan nyes pa med par bya/ /gru bzhi sgo dang rta

babs bcas/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /nyi zla dril bu g.yer khas spras/ /pad+ma khyams dang rdo rje'i phreng / /dur khrod me ri la sogs pa/ /rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /rin chen rnam lnga 'bru phye dang / /'byung khungs las byung rnam pa lnga/ /pad+mar so sor gzhag byas te/

sngags kyis btab pa yig 'bru bsam/ /ye shes bstims la yig gsum gyis/ /byin gyis brlabs te mthing ga blangs/ /dbang ldan mtshams su drang bya ste/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa gnas/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin ljang gu drang byas la/ /'di ni so sor rtog pa dag /dmar po mnyam nyid ye shes te/ /ser po bya ba grub pa la/ /dkar po me long ye shes dag /me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag /thams cad g.yas skor ma nor bar/ /sbom phra chad pa med par bri/ /nyes

pa 'byung ba'i rim pa ni/ /tshon mi mnyam zhing yo dang dma'/ /dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ /yon pos rtsod la gdung bar 'gyur/ /sbom na nad 'byung gal te phra/ /nor nyams chad par gyur pas na/ /'chi 'gyur phyogs nyams phur bus 'debs/ /shar dkar

lho ser nub phyogs dmar/ /byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /lte ba mthon mthing 'khyil par bya/ /mtshams sogs cho gas brtag pa dang / /dur khrod rnams ni rim pas bri/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor lhar bsgrub pa/ /yol bas bcad pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /khrus byas

dri yis lus byugs te/ /gos bzang gis brgyan lan gsum bskor/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /nga rgyal byas te hUM sgrogs pas/ /shar gyi sgo nas nang du zhugs/ /sgo bzhi yang ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzra ud+g+ha Ta sa ma yA be sha ya hUM/ bum par rang gnas 'dug byas

te/ /mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs brgyan nas/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /ye shes bstims la mchod par bya/ /bstod cing glu dang ldan pa yis/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya/ /de nas lhag pa'i lha yang bsdu/ /bzlas pa'i rim pa bzhin du brjod/ /

shar du zhi ba'i me las bya/ /de nas shar gyi dbang stegs la/ /slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar/ /slob dpon dbang dang ldan par bya/ /me tog thogs la tshig 'di brjod/ /hUM thugs kyi sras po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad gtum po yis/ /slob ma smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /

bdag la dbang bskur sbyin par mdzod/ /de ltar rim pa rdzogs pa dang / /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /yol ba'i phyir gnas rim pa bzhin/ /khrus byas sngags 'dis dag par bsam/ /kA ya bAka tsit+ta sarba pA paM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas lhar byas gnas gsum du/ oM badzra

ban+d+ha traT kA ya bAka tsit+ta/ zhes pas sdig pa dral byas la/ /rang rang yi ge bsam par bya/ /bgegs bskrad sdig pa gzhom pa dang / /bla mas rang gi sa bon gyis/ /slob ma'i sdig pa sbyang bar bya/ /oM kA ya shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA kA ya shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM bAka shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA

bAka shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM tsit+ta shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA tsit+ta shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ rnam dag lha yi ngo bor bya/ /gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni/ /bu khyod su yin ci la dga'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bo khro bor bcas pa yis/ /lha rnams

kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni skal bzangs rigs yin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'/ /phrin las ma lus khyod la rdzogs/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /slob mas yon phul sngags 'di brjod/ /oM A khaM bI ra

hUM/ rang rang gnas su bzhag nas kyang / /bgegs kyi bar chad bsal bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor la ni bskor byas te/ /shar gyi phyogs nas sgo phye la/ /lha dang sangs rgyas rnams bskul te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /bdud bzhi rnam par

dag bcom nas/ /sngags 'dis phyag gsum brkyang la bya/ /oM na ma ste hUM/ oM na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ de nas thal sbyar shar phyogs nas oM trai lokya bi dza ya/ bU dzo pas+thA nA ya/ At+ma nAM ni R+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a k+Sho b+h+ya/ /a b+hi Shany+tsi a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ mi

bskyod brgya byin steng du gsal/ /oM ma hA kA la pU dzo pas+thA nA ya/ /At+ma nAM niR+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na saM b+ha ba/ a b+hi Shany+tsi a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ lho yi phyogs nas phyag byas te/ /dpral bar sku ni khyab 'jug mnan/ /nub nas gsung gi dbang phyug gzhom/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da

li/ pU dzo pas+thA nA ya/ At+ma nAM niR+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ge ta pad+ma d+ha ri/ a b+hi Shany+tsi a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ oM AR+ya dzaM b+ha la pU dzo pas+thA nA ya/ At+ma nAM ni R+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha sid+hi/ a b+hi Shany+tsi a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ nub byang rim pas phyag bya'o/ /las kyi bum pas khrus

byas te/ /sdom pa ma lus pa yang sbyin/ /byin gyis brlab phyir ye shes kyang / /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzod la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bla na med/ /bdag la da lta bskyed du gsol/ /sdig bral spos kyis

bdug byas nas/ /'gying bcas rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /sangs rgyas ma lus lhag pa'i lhar/ /bsdus la gnyis med bde ba che/ /zag med bde bas yan lag khyab/ /hUM 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje gtum po sems dpa' che/ /ye shes rdo rje bla med 'di/ /da lta nyid du

'bab par shog /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ A be+e sha ya s+t+waM b+hA ya/ rA rA rA rA/ tsa lA ya/ a hUM ma hA dz+heM badzra tsaN+Da A be sha ya/ a a a a a/ zhes bzlas gang la babs gyur kyang / oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ya/ sngags kyis brtan byas lce la a/ /dge

mi dge yi lung bstan bya/ /me tog rdo rje dang bcas pa/ /spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod/ /hUM rdo rje gtum po deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs pa ni/ /gal te tshul 'di gzhan smras na/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /bdud rtsi lngas bkang ka pA lar/ /

sngags btab rdo rje dang bcas sbyin/ /hUM 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byad/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /oM AHhUM badzrod ka Tha hUM/ /shar du 'dug la 'di skad brjod/ /de nas

brtsams te khyed rnams kyi/ /rdo rje gtum po nga yin gyi/ /khyed kyis nga la brnyas pa na/ /mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas/ /dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni dngos grub brtag /mdzes pa'i me tog lha la dor/ /gsang ba bla med me tog 'di/ /pho brang

dkyil 'khor lha mchog la/ /las dang rjes mthun brtse ba yis/ /rigs dang mthun par 'bab par shog /pra tIts+tsha ho badzra/ lha yi stod dang rked pa dang / /smad dang nye ring gtso 'khor gyi/ /bye brag dngos grub rtags yin no/ /de nas bla mas me tog blangs/ /slob ma'i mgor

bcings sngags 'di brjod/ /oM d+harma kuN+Da a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ lha bstim rigs kyi ming yang gzung / /sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /ma rig ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin khyod kyi mig dbye ste/ /ye shes mig gis mthong bar shog /badzra tsak+Shu pa tra laM hri/ /gdong

g.yogs bshus la 'di skad brjod/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /mthong na dad pa rab tu skye/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te/ /dngos grub ma lus snod du 'gyur/ /rigs kyi rnam par dag pa bstan/ /de nas slob ma dad ldan

pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /yon mchog bla med phul nas kyang / /dbang bskur ba yi gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /

sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni slob dpon mchog bgyid do/ /lan gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas/ /chu rnams thod pa'am bum par bsdus/ /rdo rje'i glu dang dril bur ldan/ /

rigs lnga rig pa'i lha mor ldan/ /bag chags ma lus dag byas te/ /sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi bdud rtsi rnam dag 'dis/ /mi bskyod rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro/ /oM A daR+sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ chu yi dbang bskur dam pa

'dis/ /sgrib pa rnam pa gsum bral nas/ /mi bskyod rnam dag ye shes 'thob/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dngos grub shog /lugs ma'am thang ga 'bur bris pa'i/ /gser sogs dbu rgyan rin 'byung bsam/ /dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa 'dis/ /sems can tshim par byed pa'i mchog /

yid bzhin bsam pa 'grub byed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa man+tA dz+nyA na hUM tiSh+Tha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dbu rgyan dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs/ /bdag gi mgo la brgyan gyur te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dngos grub

shog /rin chen la sogs rdo rje la/ /snang ba mtha' yas bcug byas la/ /lag tu gtang la tshig 'di brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /mi phyed rnam dag 'od gsal stong / /dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra pra ti be sha ya

dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bdag gi rgyud la skyes gyur te/ /snang ba mtha' yas dngos grub shog /dril bur don yod grub pa bcug /lag pa g.yon gtad tshig 'di brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /

'gro don mnyam pa med byed pa/ /'dod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed cing / /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM a d+hiSh+Tha na a nuSh+ThA na sid+d+hi dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dril bu'i dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /gsung gi dngos grub

bdag gyur te/ /don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog /rnam snang bskyed la mtshog ma'i steng / /'khor lo thogs pa'i ming sgrogs te/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub thob pa'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pas/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /

oM pra ti shod+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi hUM/ ming gi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /stong gsum bye ba phrag brgya ru/ /sprul pas 'gro rnams chos ston cing / /rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog /rigs lnga yum gyis ma rig lnga/ /rnam dag ye shes lnga sbyor bas/ /

rig pa'i dbang du rgyud pas bstan/ /shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug /steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang / /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur te/ /slob dpon rang bzhin 'od dpag mchog /skal ba chen po bdag la gsol/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi dbang bskur ni/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas dpag med do/ /brtul zhugs bla na med pa de/ /ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag la gsol/ /de nas rnam rgyal bum pa blangs/ /steng 'og bzhag la tshig 'dis sbyin/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum

kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yis/ /phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams/ /bu yis gzhan don bla med byos/ /khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas sras yin no/ /zhes bya dung dang rol mo

dbul/ /lung bstan bya phyir bla ma yis/ /sprul pa'i skur bcas dga' dang bcas/ /chos gos bzung la 'di skad brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mtha' ni grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /kye rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa che ge mo zhes/ sid+d+hi badzra tsaN+Da te thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pas/ /khyod la lung bstan byas pa 'di/ /gsang sngags rdo rje'i mthu yin pas/ /dad pas 'di la spro bar gyis/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /rdo rje lag tu legs

byin la/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hUM/ de nas dril bu sbyin byas te/ /'di ni

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha g+haN+Da sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hUM/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /mi shes rab rib bsal ba

ltar/ /bu khyod kyi yang mi shes pa'i/ /ma rig ling thog bsal bar bya/ /sman ldan gser gyi thur ma yis/ /ye shes dag par mig 'byed do/ /oM badzra ne tra a pa ha ra pa tra laM hri/ /de nas me long g.ya' dag bstan/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal

la rnyog pa med/ /brjod du med cing gzung du med/ /rgyu dang las las thams cad 'byung / /de nas rdo rje me long phyar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin ni/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /zhes bya ho yis

mda' gzhu sbyin/ /bskyod la phyogs bzhir bdud la 'phangs/ /de nas hUM las skyes pa yi/ /'khor lo rkang pa'i bar bcug la/ /de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /kun du dri med sdig dang bral/ /de nas dung

byin bus nas kyang / /chos kyi dung ni bla na med/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'dir ni rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan btags drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pa 'di kun kyang / /khyod la rjes su srung bar byed/ /de nas rigs lngar bsam byas la/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar

gyis/ /de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba/ /khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no/ /de nas slar yang rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsal bar byas te tshig 'di brjod/ /deng nas bzung nas rigs kyi bus/ /zhi rgyas nga dang gsad pa dang / /dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang / /

bskrad dang g.yo ba la sogs pa'i/ /phrin las sna tshogs bsgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste/ /thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa/ /de dag khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis/ /ma lus gnang ba sbyin par bya/ /bde bar dbugs

dbyung rnams kyang sbyin/ /khyad par bkra shis dbang rnams kyang / /rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya/ /gal te gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan/ /lus la dri yis byugs byas te/ /rtse dang dgod pas g.yo byas la/ /thabs dang

shes rab gnyis phab ste/ /nor bu byang chub sems ltung bas/ /bde gshegs khu ba mtheb srin gyis/ /drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru dbab/ /a ho su khas de btung ngo / /rdo rje ro yis nyon mongs 'joms/ /mtshan ldan bde ba bskyed pa de/ /yol bas bar bcad

snyoms 'jug brtsam/ /bsrub dang srubs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgra yi rgyun med longs spyod kyi/ /rlabs kyi rgyun ni chad pa las/ /lhan cig skyes pa ye shes kyang / /rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dran par bya/ /skad cig de dang ma bral na/ /mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de nyid brjod
