ni rnal 'byor bye brag gis/ /sum 'bum drug dang bcu gnyis sogs/ /mtshan ma mthong ba myur du 'byung / /des kyang ma grub pa rnams la/ /bsnyen sgrub man dag tshul du sogs/ /des ni mtshan ma mthong ba gsungs/ /rtags rnams byung bar ma gyur na/ /sdig sgrib shin tu che bas

na/ /rgyud sbyong bzlas pa bar 'dir gsungs/ /lus ngag yid kyi rnam smin las/ /sdig 'gyur dbyung dang bsreg dang bkru/ /mi sdug yig 'bru 'od kyi gzugs/ /hUM dang raM dang haM rnams la/ /ming gi yi ge rab bskul te/ /mgal me phreng ba nyi ma yis/ /rgyud rnams yongs su

sbyangs par gsungs/ /spogs te bsnyen sogs gong bzhin bskyal/ /des ni mtshan ma'i rtags phyin 'gyur/ /the tshom med pa shin tu gces/ /mtshan ma 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'o/ /khyad par bzlas pa'i man ngag yang / /bar du gcod pa'i 'byung ba'o/ /bdag 'od dkyil 'khor

lha la 'phros/ /'gugs shing dbang du sdud par byed/ /de la khro bo mad spros te/ /ral gri mtshon dang thog 'bebs dang / /gcad gtubs gzir ba'i sha khrag rnams/ /ma lus sha khrag mdun du bstabs/ /ha ha ru lu sgra sgrogs shing / /pa stabs pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o/ /rang

srung phyi la bzlog pa dang / /khro tshogs 'khor lo thogs pa yis/ /snying dang klad pa 'khor lo bskor/ /bzlog pa dus kyi bzlas pa'o/ /rnga mo cang yi khro tshogs kyis/ /phyogs sub zung nas 'phen par byed/ /bskrad nas tshar gcod don du gsungs/ /'od zer dkar po'i tshogs

byung nas/ /lha la sogs pa'i sdig pa sbyong / /tshur 'dus rang gi sdig pa sbyong / /zhi ba'i man ngag rab tu gsungs/ /'od 'phros gang zhig gang gi stobs/ /ma lus bsdus nas rang gi stobs/ /gzi brjid rang 'byung tshe yid gsos/ /bkrag dang gzim ma dngas rab tu rgyas/ /

'di ni rgyas ba'i man dag go/ /ming gi sngags bzlas ting nge 'dzin ldan/ /'od zer kha dog rnam lnga 'phros/ /spos sogs lha mo rnams kyis gang / /gang la phul na don grub pa/ /mchod par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'o/ /rin chen tshogs bskang mchod pa yang / /gong ma bzhin du rab tu

gsungs/ /'od zer dmar nag 'phros pa las/ /spyi bo gtsug gnas rnams su gzir/ /'od zer gzhan gyis gsos 'debs pa/ /rengs par byed pa'i bzlas pa'o/ /dmigs pa don gyis bzlas pa yang / /rtsa rlung bde ba byang chub sems/ /yid la brten pa'i man ngag gam/ /

rang gi hUM las 'od byung nas/ /bdag zhu der 'dus pa thob pa/ /rdo rje tshig gi gsol 'debs shing / /dmigs pa stong nyid gsal ba ste/ /gsang ba dus kyi bzlas pa'o/ /rnam dag don la rab dmigs shing / /mi rtog snga phyi rgyu 'bras su/ /skyed par byed pa stong nyid gsal/ /rdo

rje tshig dang rab ldan pa/ /'di ni don dam bla med sngags/ /gsang sngags brjod pa ma lus pa/ /'di ru cung zhig bstan par bya/ /oM na mo nI lA m+bar+ra d+ha rA ya/ badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ oM na mo badzra pA Ni ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ badzra kro d+ha nI lA m+bar+ra d+ha ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM na mo badzra kro d+he shwa ri mu

hUM hUM phaT/ oM ra ti sha ya de ba tA dza mu khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM sarba de ba mA ra ya/ ts+tshi nad ts+tshi nad hUM phaT/ b+hi nad b+hi nad hUM phaT/ gr-i h+NA gr-i h+NA hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ su ru su ru hUM phaT/ mu ru mu ru hUM phaT/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM

phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya na ha sa ya na hUM phaT/ kI li kI li a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de ba rA dza ba li ba li/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA nAM Ad+ya nu t+pa n+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM shA natiM ku ru swA hA/ bu ShaTiM ku ru swA hA/ ba shaM

ku ru ma Ni d+hI hUM/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ s+t+waMm+b+ha ya/ s+t+waMm+b+ha ya/ nA ga rA dza/ nA ga rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha bi d+h+wAn+sa ya/ he b+ha ga bA na ku ru ku ru/ ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM a pa smra' ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM/ sarba bre ta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM/ oM shud+d+he shu dad+he bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni

hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la sarba pa'i paM da ha ni dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ha pa oM sa khri/ oM gr-i h+NA gr-i h+NA sarba sha trUM mA ra ya mA ra yi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ nA ga bi tan nA ga ra k+Sha ra k+Sha ya k+Sha/ ka rma go ru pa ra bi tan/ zhes pa'i tshig gis/ /bsnyen pa la sbyor sha ma bu'i sngags/ /gcig tu byas la

yongs su bzlas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu yongs bskyed la/ /gsang sngags skyon rnams rab spangs nas/ /'dis ni 'bras bu 'byin pa las/ /las rnams gzhan gyis thob pa min/ /zhes pa ni/ sngags kyi man ngag gi le'u gnyis pa'o// //tshogs rnams khyad par 'dod pa

yis/ /tshogs pas bsags nges pa 'dir ru bstan/ /'jig rten rdzas rnams ma lus pa'i/ /kun tshogs rang gis ma nyams bsham/ /rnal 'byor lha grangs bstun pa'am/ /yang na rnal 'bro mang yang rung / /'tshams pa dang ni mchod pa dang / /de nyid med du mi rung ngo / /

rgyas pa'i tshogs 'khor dus su'o/ /sngon 'gros tshogs la sogs rdzogs/ /maN+Dal lnga'am bcu sogs la/ /me tog dang mchod pa dgram/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bAM/ /slob dpon rgyal pos sems dpa'i bskul/ /phyi rol rnal 'byor nang du bsdu/ /de tshe

rgyal pos mtshams rnams bcad/ /dge slong nub la dge tshul byang / /sngags ba lho la yon bdag dang / /rdzas rnams shar du bsag bar bya/ /phyogs kyi dngos grub thob par gsungs/ /rang rang nang du maN+Dal bya/ /rgal pos mtshams byas tshogs rnams bsag/

bskyed de med pa las byung ba'i/ /rgyal pos bzhin ni thob bya ste/ /bde ba la gnas nyid dag las/ /lha mo bzhis gsol skur ldang ste/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas nas rgyal po len/ /so sor gdan dang gsal ba las/ /bdag gis 'jug pa ji bzhin du/ /'khor rnams

dam pa don la 'jug /mchod pa sgom dang sngon du rdzogs/ /las dang bdag por 'brel pa yis/ /sgra dang ldan bas tshogs can dang / /dam tshig ldan pas byin gyis brlab/ /las kyis bsang ba'i cho ga yang / /yaM raM a las rlung me thod/ /nang du dam rdzas bcu ru

dmigs/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /yang ni ye shes bdud rtsi phab/ /bla ma rang dang lha mchod la/ /cho ga yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /lha ma gcig tu bsdu bya ste/ /kha chus bran la mkha' 'gro bskang / /gsang ba'i don dang 'brel pa'i tshogs/ /tshes grangs

bzang po shis pa la/ /nam phyed dus su bya bar gsungs/ /grogs kyi tshogs la nges pa med/ /zhi rgyas tshogs la sogs pa yang / /sngags kyi man ngag bzhin du gsungs/ /'di la rtag tu gnas pa yang / /bar chad sel cing dngos grub myur/ /'di yis 'byung gi gzhan

gyis min/ /rgyal po la sogs pas tshogs bsag pa'i man ngag go/ /de ma nus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'byor pa chung zhing bsam gtan ldan/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa bstan pa yang / /rdzas ni lnga'am bcu yi bar/ /slob dpon gcig dang gnyis dang gsum/ /skyed

de khyab byad bu mo yang / /rim gyis 'di ru bya ba yin/ /drang dang byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i bar du mchod/ /bzhi pa'i bar yang gsungs pa yin/ /slob dpon nus pa bye brag gis/ /las ni gong dang 'og tu sbyar/ /mi rtsom 'di yis sdig pa

sbyong / /'dis kyang las kun 'grub par gsungs/ /'bras bu gang 'dod nges par 'byin/ /tshogs kyi man ngag bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas rigs kyi bu'am bu mo/ /bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin par 'dod/ /sbyin sreg las la brtson

par bya'o/ /sa chog la sogs gzhan bzhin te/ /sa yi rigs bzhin thab khung bzhi/ /zlum po gru bzhi zla gam e/ /thag khung dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /dkar ser dmar dang nag po yang / /thab kyi kha dog nyid du gsungs/ /bru dang bri ba gang yin pa/ /sor gsum bzhi

gnyis gsum yang dor/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma bri/ /thab la mtshan par rab tu bya/ /de yang rgyud las/ zhi la dkar po'i shing rnams te/ /rgyas la ser shing las rnams bya/ /dbang la seng ldeng shing bsregs te/ /drag po tsher ma nag po'i shing / /gzhan ni tsan+dan shing gis bya/ /

zhes gsungs pas/ rang rang gi thab tu dang rang gi thab tu rang dang bsdebs pa'i shing / /zlum po la sogs pa bcer bar gsungs so/ /las mang pa'i thab ni rin po che 'bar ba'am/ /b+ha ga lta bu'i dbyibs la kha dog sna tshogs par bya bar gsungs so/ /shing yang de nyid do/ /gzar bu rdo rje bzhi

yi dbyibs/ /rdo rje rin chen chu srin gyi/ /rin chen las byas gzar bu brgyan/ /byin brlabs so so dbyibs dang ldan/ /mchod rdzas g.yas la sreg rdzas g.yon/ /mi dmigs traM las rin chen snod/ /so so de nyid rgyas pa las/ /ha ho hrI yis bdud rtsi sbyang / /sku gsung thugs kyis

byin gyis brlabs/ /rang rdzogs rang gi sa bon las/ /'od 'bros mi dmigs b+hUM du gyur/ /de las me yi khang pa ni/ /rang gi gsong ma'i dbyibs dang ldan/ /me lha bskyed pa'i rim pa yang / /b+hUM las gru bzhi'i de nyid gsum/ /so so'i kha dog dbyibs dang ldan/ /de zhu raM las ye shes

me/ /pad steng raM bcas yi ge bzhi/ /so so'i me lha kha dog bzhi/ /so so'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan byas/ /zhi ba'i me lha bab pa ka / sku mdog dkar po tshul gnas/ /khro d+ha me tra ma ye tra/ ma ta zhes pa la sogs pa/ /so so'i rigs kyi kha dog la/ /sna tshogs pa ru yang dag gnas/ /zhal

gcig phyag ni bzhi pa la/ /g.yas kyi dang pos 'dzin pa ni/ /dbyug pa bgrang phreng ral gri dang / /lcags kyu nges par bsnams pa'o/ /gzhan yang phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin/ /ye shes spyan drangs dbang bskur zhing / /rgyan dang rgyas gdab 'thor 'thud rdzogs/ /snying gar

phyogs skyong bcu po rdzogs/ /so so pU dza rgyas pa la/ /dang po mchod pas mchod bya ste/ /gtso bo dang po man ngag kyang / /shing gi 'od ni skyed byed pa/ /mar gyis 'od 'phros kun la khyab/ /dkar gsum spyi yi sdig pa sel/ /bu ram lus la gnyis pa yis/ /'og ma gnyis po so

sor 'byin/ /'bras dang 'bru yi chan dag gis/ /gong ma gnyis po so sor 'byin/ /nas thug 'o ma'i thugs pa yis/ /rnam smin re re gnas su bsreg /til gyis snying gi nad rnams 'byin/ /yang na til gyis sgo dgu 'byin/ /tha ma mar gyis bskur bar byed/ /rdzas de ser po byas pa

la/ /dmar ser zhi yis kun la khyab/ /dkar gnyis kyis ni gzi byin bskyed/ /mngar gsum phul bas gsal bar snang / /'bru dang 'bras kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes bcud rnams spyi bor sdud/ /nas dang 'o ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten bcud rnams kun du sdud/ /tha ma

dUr ba'i bsang gtor gyis/ /tsA ru btso zhing dngos grub len/ /mar gyi dgang blugs gsum po yis/ /rgyas par byed pa man dag sogs/ /bdag gi spyir ba byed pa la/ /ba lang sha dang til la sogs/ /dmar po sbyor ba phul pa yis/ /steng gi 'khor lo rab tu 'phros/ /

myur du 'gugs shing dbang du bsdus/ /gsad pa las gzhan tha ma yang / /dang po khrag gis 'dod du 'phro/ /de bzhin sha yis khro bar byed/ /rus pas steng gi 'khor lo 'phro/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od 'phros sbrul ba 'gyed/ /'bru nag sprul pas drag tu bsreg /dug rnams rdzas

kyis 'gugs shing bsreg /yungs [(]kra [,]kar [)]phye ma gsum po yis/ /'byung po ma lus thun gyis bsreg /tha ma mar nag srung zhing bsreg /me yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /snying gar bkod pa lha rnams la/ /so so de nyid rgyas pa las/ /gong du mchod pa bdun 'gyur rdzogs/ /

bsdu dang gshegs su gsol byas nas/ /bzod gsol me yi sbyor ba yang / /gcig tu bsdus te dbul bar bya/ /bstod cing phrin las dngos grub blang / /nyis skor sum skor la sogs pa/ /gang gi man ngag don dang ldan/ /tshe dang rigs sel rgyas

pa'o/ /bsrung ba zhi ba cha la gdags/ /dgug pa dbang gi cha yin te/ /drag po las gzhan tha ma cha/ /dngos grub bzhi dang 'brel pa yi/ /'di yis 'grub pa ma gtogs pa/ /gang zhig gzhan gyis 'grub ma yin/ /des na man ngag nan tan gces/ /sbyin sreg bstan pa'i

le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //las rnams ma lus 'jug pa la/ /kun gyi kha skong gtor ma shis/ /gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog /las kun la ni yongs su bsngags/ /zhes gsungs pas/ gtor ma yongs su bstan to/ /phyi nang rdzas rnams ma lus ldan/ /ma nyams

rdzas kyis yongs su gang / /lhag 'gyur 'od zer kun du 'phros/ /raM gyis bsregs te yaM gis bus/ /khaM gis bkrus te dag pa las/ /yaM raM rten dang nyi zla bcas/ /sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje bcas/ /yaM raM dbab pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis med 'dres/ /de

dang gsang sngags 'dis kyang dgug/ /oM a ral+li ho dzaHhUM baM hoH sa ma ya dr-i sh+ya hoH zhes gnyis med bsre/ yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /gdan gsum dang ldan ye shes tshogs/ /gnyis dang bzhi yi bar du mchod/ /rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags la ni/ /kha kha khA hi

khA his dbul/ /grangs ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /brgya'am stong gi sbyor bas 'grub/ /bshags shing bstod pa dngos grub blang / /smon lam btab la gtor ma dgye/ /lan chags chu bo'i gzhung la'am/ /yang na ri rab rtse la bskyal/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i gtor ma yang / /rang rang

cho ga byas pas 'grub/ /rdzas ma tshogs dang bsam gtan bral/ /sngon bya med cing go rims bral/ /'di ni bar chad sbyor ba ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya/ /phyi yi gtor ma rgya chen yang / /sha chang spangs pa rdzas rnams tshogs/ /byin gyis brlab cing spyan drangs

la/ /so so rang gi khyad par yang / /sngags dang tshigs bcad yongs su bsgrags/ /za ba rgyun gyi gtor ma yang / /chags pa nyams pa tshig dang bral/ /mchod cing srid mtsho yongs bsgral ba/ /sems kyis yongs su zin pa dang / /rang gsal snying ga'i lha rnams

bkod/ /ye shes 'khor lo gnyis med bstim/ /zas ni sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ /yaM raM sbyor bas byin gyis brlab/ /yang na sku gsung thugs kyis so/ /byin gyis brlab la dbul bar bya/ /lce ni rdo rjer bsams la dbul/ /lag pa lha dang lha mo'am/ /gzar bu rdo

rjer bsams la dbul/ /zos pas mnyes shing ldad pa bzhi/ /rgyas dang phrin las la sogs kun/ /gong du bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /btung ba la sogs gzhan pa yang / /bdud rtsir byin brlabs gong bzhin mchod/ /chang sogs longs spyod byed pa yang / /nad sel btung

ba bye ba yin/ /ci ran sman gyi tshod tsam mo/ /bdud rtsir byin brlabs ma 'thungs nas/ /chags shing skom sogs 'thung byed pa/ /skye ba lnga brgyar smyon par skye/ /nad sel yongs su spang bar bya/ /dug lnga'i grogs su 'gro ba ni/ /'thung zhing spyad par bya ba min/ /'grol

bas mchod pa'i dus su yang / /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub brten/ /thigs gsum lce la bzhag pa yang / /kA ya bAk+ka tsit+ta hUM zhes brjod la reg par bya'o/ /zas sogs bdud rtsi thams cad kyang / /lag na rdo rjer dbul ba dang / /yang na lha mos dbul ba'o/ /

rdo rje lce 'thung las byed pa/ /nang gi gtor ma bstan pa yin/ /'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin no/ /sna tshogs stong pa ye shes dang / /dran med mtha' spongs sa spros bral ba/ /bla med gtor ma zhes ni gsungs/ /gang zhig gtor ma'i sbyor ba la/ /mi brten dngos grub sbyar

ba spangs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gtor ma'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //bsam gtan dag la ma mos shid/ /mchod pa dag la mos gyur par/ /de yi gang zag gzung bar bya/ /dngos sam yid kyi mchod pa las/ /dang po dngos po mchod pa bstan/ /spos dang me tog

mar me dri/ /bshos gtsang la sogs sbyor ba yang / /thams cad ma spyad snod du blugs/ las kyi chu yis sbyar byas nas/ /bsangs te skyon rnams bsal ba las/ /snod rnams traM las rin chen snod/ /yon chab zhu ste yi ge a/ /de las yon chab dpag med

gyur/ /AH yis rtog sbyangs oM gyis 'bar/ /mchod pa gzhan yang de bzhin du/ /byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin/ /de ma nus pa'i gang zag gis/ /gsang sngags 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab/ /'di ni spyi rgyud man ngag go/ /yang na rgyud 'di man ngag yang / /yon chab

la sogs man ngag yang / /ha ho hrI yis sbyang byas te/ /yon chab zhu bas yi ge AH// de nas stong gsum yon chab bsdus/ /slar la lha mo me tog ma/ /de yi 'od las me tog tshogs/ /bsnyen pa'i skabs su kha dog lnga/ /ldan par byas te mchod pa'o/ /mchod pa gzhan yang

de bzhin byas/ /yang na ming gi dang po la/ /hUM zhes pa yis byin gyis brlab/ /byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa yang / /seng+ge glang po pad sogs la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/ /mdun du gsal bar bsam byas la/ /rin chen me tog mdun du gtor/ /

rin chen la sogs gdan gyi mchod pa'i rim pa'o/ /yon chab thogs pa lha mo'i tshogs/ /dpag tu med pa mdun du sprul/ /rdo rje glu dang ldan pa yis/ /dang po lha mo sbrul byas te/ /gnyis pa nam mkhar bzhugs pa gsal/ /gsum pa nam

mkha'i rdo rje'i tshig /bzhi pa so so'i gnas su dbul/ /A ha ra yi sngags bzlas pas/ /yon chab kyis ni phyag zhabs bkru/ /spos me shangs la me tog dbu/ /de la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /ming dang rang gi sngags rjes la/ /so so'i gnas su dbul bar bya/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan yang 'dod yon lha mo ni/ /sku gsungs thugs kyi sngags rjes la/ /ta sha ra ti sngags bzlas pas/ /dkar mo gzugs ni spyan la thim/ /pad+ma ra ti sngags las byung / /dmar mo sgra ni snyan la thim/ /karma ra ti sngags las byung / /ljang gu dri ni

shangs la thim/ /rat+na ti sngags las byung / /ser mo ro ni ljags la thim/ /badzra ra ti sngags las byung / /mthing ga reg bya lus la thim/ /shin tu 'gying bcas kyis mchod do/ /badzra kro d+hI shwa re brjod/ /sngags las mthing ka byang chub sems/ bi shwa kro d+hI shwa ri yis/ /ljags

las dkar mo dri chen no/ /rat+na kro d+hI sngags las ni/ /ser mo sha chen zhes su gsungs/ /pad+ma kro d+hI sngags las ni/ /dmar mo khrag gi thod pa ste/ /ka rma kro d+hI shwa ri'o/ /sngags las ljang gu dri chu'o/ /lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang / /thal ba'i mtshan mas lus byugs

shing / /dar dang zhing chen dril bu thogs/ /g.yas ba thod pa'i snod nang du/ /bdud rtsi so sor bkang nas su/ /rdo rje tshig gis ljags la dbul/ /gsang ba'i pU dza bstan pa yang / /badzra kro d+hI gu h+ya yis/ /mthing ga byang sems yang gsal/ /dkar dmar ser dang ljang

gu yis/ /gnas lnga phyi dang gnas lnga yi/ /nang du yang dag bstan pa yin/ /gnas gcig byang sems gsal zhing rgyas/ /'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo mnyes pa yin/ /sgeg dang khro bo la sogs pa// /rin chen sna bdun dag dang yang / /mchod

pa nyi shu dbul bar bya/ /bdag dang lha mo gang gis dbul/ /yi ge oM gyis mgo brgyan cing / /rdo rje glu yis brten byas te/ /lha mo bskyed pas skyed par byed/ /rang gi gtso'am gang byed pa'i/ /ming gi sngags kyis mgo drangs te/ /rdo rje lha mo'i sngags rjes la/ /pU dza me g+has

mu dra spa ra Na sa ma yi hUM/ /zhes pas dbul bar bya'o/ /yang na badzra oM gnyis la/ /pU dza yang ni gnyis dang ldan/ /so so'i ming gi ring po la/ /mjug tu hUM zhes bya ba yin/ /tshegs rnams bsags pa'i man ngag la/ /las kyi sems dang 'khor gyi sku/ /mchod pa'i lha dang

yum gyis su/ /bdag nyid mnyes par byed pa yin/ /gtso bo gzhan mchod mnyes pa yang / /dkyil 'khor gnyis dang gsum mnyes pa'o/ /rdzas dang bsam gtan phyag rgya sngags/ /rdo rje glu dang gnyis 'dus dang / /gsum 'dus la sogs mchod pa bya/ /dngos dang

yid ni re re'am/ /gnyis kas mchod par bya ba'o/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgyal ba dang / /thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa/ /mchod pa byas pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /des na brtson 'grus bzang po yis/ /mchod pa rgyun du gsal ba gsungs/ /gzhan yang gsang

sngags lam sgrub pa/ /rnal 'byor bla med sbyor ba yis/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu bsgrub par bya/ /bar chod bgegs sel dngos grub myur/ /rtsod ldan dbul phongs dus su ni/ /des na 'byung ba'i sku mthun bstan/ /don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mdzes pa maN+Dal rin chen

rgyan/ /de la bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /rin chen ldas mtshan sa brkos te/ /bdag las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /sa skyon dag pa brko bar bya/ /rin chen sna lnga rang bzhin te/ /srog chags med pa sa dang chu/ /gnyis med bsres pa 'od du zhu/ /'khor lo pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan/ /

yi ge gsum las legs grub pa'i/ /sku gsum lha ru gsal ba la/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod nas bstims/ /gnyis med 'gyur la mchod phul te/ /'od dang sngags kyis bskul gyur te/ /'od zhu byang chub thig le'am/ /yang na 'od kyi gong bur gyur/ /byang chub tshon

gyi snum yang bsku/ /kong bu byin gyis brlab pa yang / /'od zhu me las nam mkha' ste/ /bcang ba kong bu phra mo nyid/ /rlung gis nam mkha' stong la thim/ /brdabs shing gnyis med sngags sgra sbyor/ /phyung bas bde gshegs ring bsrel ni/ /rin chen bzhi las legs phyung ba/ /

bar rim bzhi gnyis zur bzhi pa/ /dbu gsum lnga dang dgu sogs te/ /'od zer lnga dang ldan pa la/ /bzhag pas gdan steng don byed 'gyur/ /stong las sdong bu yum yin te/ /thig la lag pa yab tu gyur/ /rlung gi stobs kyis b+ha gar zhugs/ /gnyis med dpal ldan

sku mchog yin/ /bzhugs pas gdan steng don byed 'gyur/ /yang na nam mkha' stong pa las/ /brdabs dang sngags sgras lha mo bskul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings nas sku byung bzhugs/ /de dag gi ni sngags gsungs pa/ /oM na ma s+t+rai ya d+ha'i sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/

gar+b+he dz+wa la hr-i da ya/ d+ha rma d+hA tu gar+b+he saM ha ra/ A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ uSh+Ni Sha bi ma le/ /bi shud+d+hi swA hA/ /lha yi sku ru sgrub pa la/ gsang sngags oM na mo nI lA m+ba ra zhes pa dang spel bar bya'o/ /rab tu gnas pa bsdus pa yang / /ye shes spyan drangs mchod bstod nas/ /rang

rang ngo bor gnas pa las/ /gnyis med bstims la dbang bskur la/ /mchod bstod ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /phyag 'tshal yid kyis mchod byas la/ /rkang pa brgyud mar long btags la/ /mgrin pa'i sil snyan bskul nas ni/ /'od las rin chen pad+ma'i gdan/ /sdig

sbyong don byas bsam pa bskyed/ /bskor ba bya zhing smon lam gdab/ /khyad par ting nge 'dzin spros 'dod na/ /sdig pa dbyung dang sreg pa yi/ /dz+wa la raM dang gri ha dza/ shud+d+ho\u0f85haM gi sham+bu'am/ /phrin las bzhi yi sngags dang 'od/ /rang rang rigs kyis yongs su bstan/ /'byung ba

mchod rten dag mi brten pa/ /dngos grub sbyor ba kun spangs sdug bsngal dag dang phrad/ /sngon gyi bram ze blo gros mchog /tshe 'di nad med dngos grub kun dang ldan/ /shi dus dpal 'byor lung bstan la/ /brten nas bla med thob kun gyis/ /lung bstan yin par bla ma

gsungs/ /mchod rten phra rab rdul du ma brlags par/ /mi de ngan song gsum du nam yang 'gro ma yin/ /mtshams med lnga byas 'bum tsho gcig gis byang / /gong ma'i yon tan de bzhin 'phel bar gsungs/ /bar mchod kun sel 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /mchod pa dang

tshogs bsags pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de ltar tshogs rnams sogs pa la/ /bdud 'byung man ngan bstan par bya'o/ /bdud ni rnam par gnyis yin te/ /las kyi bag chags smin pa dang / /'phral gyi bar du gcod pa'o/ /de la yang ni phyi dang nang / /phyi ni dad

ldan gang zag la/ /pha ma mkhan po gnyen bshes tshogs/ /zhi bas log pa'i lam la 'dzud/ /tshogs drug ro la chags 'gyur zhing / /gzungs ni dkar dmar la sogs pa/ /gsal 'gyur mi gnas bdud kyi rtags/ /snyan dang mi snyan ting 'dzin nyams/ /bdud

kyi rtag sa su bstan pa yin/ /ting nge 'dzin la bzhag pa'i tshe/ /rang bzhin med dris smad pa dang / /mang ba'i rigs la nyung ba ston/ /che ba'i rigs la chung ba ston/ /de las bzlog par shes pa dang / /dkar mo'i rigs la gzhan sogs ston/ /zab pa'i rigs

la mi zab ston/ /mi zab pa la zab pa ston/ /grol ba'i rigs la chags lam dang / /chags pa la yang bzlog pa ston/ /mtshan bcas la yang mtshan med rdzogs/ /dngos su sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams/ /gser dang g.yu yis spras pa la/ /zegs par lam rnams non

no dang / /bstan bcos mtha' dag brtson zer dang / /sems can byang chub lam la yang / /dgod cing ma lus don rnams kyis/ /de la sogs pa'i gdams dag ster/ /'di ni phyi yi bdud du gsungs/ /nang gi bdud kyi sbyor ba yang / /bsam gtan ting 'dzin dus la sogs/ /

'du ba bskyed dang bsam pa bsgyur/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rnams/ /med bzhin bskyed dang bsam log dang / /dam pa dag la ma mos shing / /rtag tu bsam la ma mos shing / /tha ma la pa la chags pa dang / /khro dang 'khon 'dzin 'chab pa dang / /phrag dog ser sna la

sogs pa/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ /bsam gtan dang la skye 'gyur dang / /log pa'i shes pa bsam dgu rgyu/ /shin tu gdug rtsub drag po skyed/ /sngon gyi 'bras bus rkyen bslang zhing / /rtag tu mig rtsa rgod pa dang / /de bzhin 'phyar dang g.yem pa dang / /zhum pa

dang ni g.yem pa dang / /'jig rten log chos bla ma spong / /'di yang bdud kyis bslus pa yin/ /bsam gtan 'phro la mi gsal zhing / /nyams mi dga' zhing log la dad/ /zas dang skom la snga rol bas/ /chags par gyur pas de dag dang / /kun rdzob spyod la dga' ba

dang / /phyag rgya rang gi rigs la brten/ /de las nyon mongs skye ba dang / /chags shing nus pha phrogs pa dang / /tshogs drug skye mched rnams su sbyar/ /log pa'i bla ma bsten pa dang / /yang dag bla ma dor ba dang / /sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang / /bsam gtan mi mos

log chos mos/ /'jig rten rdzas sogs chos rnams 'tshod/ /'di yang bdud kyi rtags su gsungs/ /sngar gyi chos 'dor gzhan dag 'dod/ /thar pa bde 'dod tshul yang 'chos/ /kha smra dbugs rgod mig rtsa grung / /thar pa yin zhes sna tshogs smra/ /'di yang bdud

kyi rtags su gsungs/ /bdud kyi brtag pa ma shes na/ /'bras bu med de bdud kyis bslu/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams/ /bsam mi khyab ste gzhan las shes/ /'di ru brtag pa mdo tsam byas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon du dpyod/ /ces gsungs so/ /bdud brtag

pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //yang dag rtags kyi man dag kyang / /dngos dang nyams dang rmi lam gsum/ /sngags grub gdon thub nad thon rtags/ /gsum dang drug tu ston pa yin/ /yang dag don gyi bla ma la/ /sems bskyed dbang bskur yang yang brtsam/ /dam

tshig mi brjed nan tan byed/ /rang rang rigs kyi chos rnams brten/ /khyad par sbyin pa tshogs sog cing / /dge ba'i grogs rnams bsten par byed/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgyal ba'i phyir/ /rgyu bcas dge la shin tu mos/ /gzhan la bskul zhing nyams sogs ldan/ /

'di yang dngos kyi rtags yin no/ /me tog sngon po 'thu ba dang / /glegs bam dag la spyod pa dang / /chos kyi bgro ba byed pa dang / /gzhan gyis mchod dang gzhan la mchod/ /stong gsum thams cad mthong ba dang / /nyi zla'i steng na 'dug pa dang / /thod du bcings shing shar dang

phrad/ /'khor lo klad la bskor ba dang / /mchod rten rtsi la 'dzeg pa dang / /rags shing bkrag pa'i rgyan rnams thogs/ /gos sngon lus la gyon pa dang / /gos sngon sku gzugs mthong ba dang / /bde gshegs khad par phyin pa dang / /yid bde ting nge 'dzin gsal ba dang / /mi

gtsang me yis bsreg pa dang / /khrag sogs lus las 'thon pa dang / /nang khrol ba ten cing chu gtsang shol/ /lus skrangs rang sogs mang po 'byung / /ngan skyugs byung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu/ /'o ma dang 'dres 'khrud pa dang / /sha mdog sdo 'gyur bdud rtsi spyod/ /lus la mi gtsang

gzugs byung na/ /me nang bsreg cing dri ma 'khru/ /rtag tu gcer bur 'dug pa dang / /rang la mtshon brgyab bar la gris gtub/ /stong nyid stong pa mthong ba dang / /bsams pas rmi lam ci yang med/ /mthong lam skyes shing lus dang bral/ /dngos kyi nyams la

brten pa dang / /dbang dang srung ba byed pa dang / /sems can dman la tshang med 'byung / /yang dag don la brod pa skyed/ /sems can bdag dang 'dra bar sems/ /'khor bas skyo la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /sngon pas nga rgyal nyon mangs chung / /zab pa'i don la chog mi shes/ /dngos

po rdzas la chags pa med/ /mig yang yun ring mi 'dzums shing / /'jig rten gleng mo 'tshol bar smra/ /mngon shes phra mo ston nus shing / /sems can sdug bsngal sel bar nus/ /gser sogs rin chen 'dong mi skyes/ /rkang lag bcad kyang yid mi 'khrug/ /rtag tu sbyin pa gtong

bar byed/ /ldang ba yang zhing zo mdog bde/ /'byung ba bzhi yi dgras mi tshugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye bdun no/ /gsang la dad cing yid tshe so/ /rang gi lhag pa'i bla ma la/ /ci yod rin chen tshogs bkad dbul/ /bla ma rigs dang mthun pa ni/ /mthong

na dga' zhing man ngag la/ /the tshom med cing yid ches 'byung / /de yang lam zin gang zag go/ /gzhan yang grub pa'i rtags bstan pa/ /dang po bde gshegs sku gzugs la/ /bde gshegs sku gzugs mthong ba dang / /'gul dang bzhad dang sgra 'byung dang / /

'od dang du ba 'byung ba yang / /'di yang yang dag rtags rnams so/ /yon chab la sogs mchod pa la/ /rang gis byin brlabs 'bras bu 'byin/ /snang dang 'od dang sgra 'byung ba/ /'di yang yang dag rtags rnams so/ /sbyin sreg dngos grub tshol ba na/ /me bus sangs

rgyas rab yin te/ /de las sgra byung 'bring du bshad/ /ma ni bdag gi dbang 'gyur zhing / /las dang mthun pa 'byung ba'o/ /gtor ma'i sbyor ba la brten pa/ /khol dang 'od sgra bskams pa dang / /gang dmigs la byin de dbang 'gyur/ /rab 'brid tha ma go rims bzhin/ /dung dang

dril bu la sogs pa/ /ma bsgrags sgra rnams 'byung ba dang / /'jug pa nang rtags ye shes kyi/ /thams cad shes shing smra ba dang / /'gul dang shes pa brtag pa dang / /rab 'bring tha ma go rims bzhin/ /gzhan yang dkar dmar 'ong gyur pa/ /gsal ba sgyu mar bsgom pa

dang / /mi gsal gshegs pas gsal 'gyur ba/ /'di yang rab kyi rtags su gsungs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtags rnams la/ /rab 'bring gong gi stobs su gsungs/ /mdzes pa lha mo bde ster dang / /gang zhig nam mkha' stong las bsgral// /sdig spong dge la

'dzud pa dang / /bstan pa dam pa ston 'gyur na/ /yang dag rtags su 'di yang gsungs/ /nam mkha' lha mos dbang bskur dang / /byang chub sems kyi chu 'bab dang / /mchod pa sna tshogs ster ba dang / /gzhan yang rtags kyi sbyor ba ni/ /'ja' tshon dang ni sbyin sngon dang / /

nyi zlas stong khams gang ba dang / /de gseb nang na 'dug pa dang / /sprul tshad rul zhing mtsho rnams bskams/ /tsan+dan tshal dang nor bu'i tshal/ /sman gyi sdong po gur kum spang ri dang / /sngon gyi ljon shing sdug bsngal sel byed cing / /'dir rin rtag tu rang 'dug zhing khang chen

po dang / /mchod rten sku gzungs dag dang ni/ /bum pa sngon po rdo rje dang / /rtag tu thod rlon nyams sogs mdun du 'byung / /'di yang dam pa'i rtags yin no/ /khrag dang mchi ma dngos su 'byung / /yi dags dbang du sdud nus dang / /yi dags zil gyis mnan pa'i tshe/ /

mnan 'gyur skad ngan rtser sgra 'don/ /'o dod khus 'debs byed pa rnams/ /'di yang gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan byed dus su/ /dam chos dngos su brdar ma gdags/ /phyis ni rjes su drin zhing shes/ /ma thos nges pa ston pa dang / /

sems can srid dman gang 'khyams pa/ /snying rjes zin cing don byed/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing gsang sngags mos/ /theg pa thun mong gcig tu shes/ /nang du mu stegs chos rnams la/ /ma gshe rang rgyud zhi zhing nges/ /sgyu ma rang bzhin med par shes/ /'di

yang yang dag dam pa'i rtags/ /de la sogs pa dpag tu med/ /'byung bar 'gyur te gzhan las shes/ /de rnams gong du bstan pa'i skyed par byed/ /srid mtsho rgal byed srid pa'o/ /rtogs pas bskyed pa srid pa 'khor/ /zad par byed pa'i las rnams ni/ /

mi rtag 'chi ba la sogs pa/ /srid pas 'jigs shing mi rtag pa/ /yud tsam las grub lo dang zla/ /rtag par sems pa byis sems yin/ /thang cig yud tsam mi sdod pas/ /gsang ba'i bde ba myur bar bya/ /dam tshig dam pas gzhi yis/ /nan tan bskyed la bsrung zhing btsa'/ /

de 'du bde ba spyod pa yang / /dal 'byor mi yis spyad pa ste/ /bsod rnams las byung mi lus 'di/ /sa dug rim pa gsum pa ru/ /chu tshigs 'byung bar shin tu dkon/ /dkon pa'i dus 'di thob pa la/ /mi rnams rgya mtsho'i gling du phyin/ /nor bu chen mi len pa/ /bya ba la

sogs g.yengs pa ni/ /skyes bu glen pa bdud kyis bslus/ /mi lus thob dka' rin chen 'di/ /thob nas yal bar 'dor ba yang / /skyes bu mi mkhas 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /des na brgal dka' 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal zad mi shes/ /snga phyi dus byung ba yis/ /

rang nyes khrel zhing nyes pa brjod/ /tshe 'di'i bde ba thob dus su/ /thang cig yud tsam mi sdod par/ /srid mtsho 'khor ba'i nang du rgyug /mi sdod rgyug pa'i bar 'di ru/ /rang gsos drag pos don bskyed de/ /dbang po ma nyams lus 'di yis/ /bsam gtan sngags bzlas

brtson pa dang / /rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang / /shin tu bla ma dam pa rnams/ /mchog cing gsol 'debs pas dge ba la/ /tshul khrims dam tshig ma nyams par/ /bla ma dkon mchog mi mos spang / /tshogs dang gtor ma ci nus bya/ /gal te dge 'dun 'dun pa dang / /

dbul ba'i sems can ma lus pa/ /mchod cing sbyin pa mang du dgye/ /phyi mar gyur pa'i smon lam yang / /gtsang mar rgya cher gdab par gsungs/ /smon lam las byung dge ba yang / /nam mkha' nam mkha' mtha' dang mtshungs/ /zad mi shes pa'i 'bras bu 'byung / /yang

na 'byung ba de yi las/ /shin tu bzhugs pas las rnams 'grub/ /kun rdzob la brten don dam dang / /thabs lam brten shes rab dang / /srid pa'i bde ba ma brten par/ /thar pa mya ngan 'das pa med/ /des na gsang sngags nus pa yis/ /mi bslu 'bras bu 'byung ba ru/ /

nges par gtso ru gzung bar gsungs/ /yang dag rtags dang rgyu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //bdud kyi rtags rnams bzlog pa dang / /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal 'dod pas/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /dam tshig sdom pa gtsang ba yis/ /nyes pa med cing bar chod

med/ /bdud rnams bzlog pa'i gtso ru gsungs/ /dang po gsang sngags sgor zhugs nas/ /lta ba spyod pa zung du 'brel/ /gsang sngags las kyi gtso ru gsungs/ /lta ba gtan la ma phebs pas/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/ /bdud kyi bar chod pas la

ba dang / /dngos grub myur bar 'dod pa yis/ /lta ba nyams su lon par bya/ /lta ba gnyis med yang dag log /dngos po rnams dang mi mthun pa/ /bsam mi khyab ste gnyis su 'dus/ /rtag pa dang ni chad pa'o/ /yang dag pa yang gnyis su gsungs/ /shes rab snying

rje che chung dang / /chung ba 'di ru mi smra ste/ /shes rab che ba gnyis su gsungs/ /gsang sngags pha rol phyin pa'o/ /de don gtan la dbab pa ni/ /don dam pa dang kun rdzob bo/ /yang na bden gcig 'dod pa dang / /khas len kun dang bral ba ni/ /rnam gcod med cing yongs

gcod med/ /kun rdzob gnyis te dman dang mchog /dman pa gnyis te/ log pa dang ni yang dag go/ /log pa gnyis te smig rgyu dang / /gong du gsungs pa'i grub mtha'o/ /shes rab ngan pa'i rtog pa'o/ /ma brtags gcig pu nyams dga' ba/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i chos

tshul can/ /don byed nus pa snang ba la/ /de ni yang dag yin par gsungs/ /mchog ni dngos po 'di rnams kun/ /gzhal yas khang dang lha mo dang / /sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu mas mtshon/ /sems kyi snang ba bag chags tshogs/ /srid pa bla mar shes par gsungs/ /bla ma la

brten bag chags tshogs/ /dan song gsum las rgal bar gsungs/ /don dam pa yang rnam pa gnyis/ /phyogs snga 'dod pa rtog pa dang / /rang gi rtog pa gnyis su gsungs/ /phyogs snga rtog pa ngan pa rnams/ /yang dag don la skye ba med/ /

med pa grub par 'dod par snang / /de tshe skye ba med grub na/ /med dang grub pa 'gal ba yis/ /phan tshun spangs pa mi gnas pas/ /me pa grub pa rigs ma yin/ /grub po zhe na rtogs par 'gyur/ /gal te skye med grub na ni/ /de ni chos tshul grub par 'dod/ /'gal skyon

gnas par 'gyur ma yin/ /chos tshul grub ba rtog yin phyir/ /bsgoms kyang mi rtog thob pa med/ /dper na me shi tsha ba 'bar ba bzhin/ /yang / stong pa don dam ma lus pa/ /chos nyid rang bzhin mtshan ma zhi/ /mi 'gyur phyir na rtag pa yin/ /de la/ rtag pa yod na mi rtag yang / /

chos tshul phye bas grub bas na/ /mi rtog ma yin rtogs par 'gyur/ /stong nyid mu stegs bdag yod du/ /rtag pa gcig par grub par 'gyur/ /kha cig rang bzhin med pa la/ /med las chos tshul rigs snang 'dod/ /de bzhin sems kyis sems brtags pas/ /med par

gyur kyang snang zhe na/ /mi rigs rgya mtsho mi dpog bzhin/ /mi dmigs gyur yang snang zhe na/ /de ni yid rtog dpyod pa ste/ /lod bas zla ba'i gzugs dpog bzhin/ /kha cig dngos por 'dzin pa de/ /de ltar yod pa'i phyis med par/ /'dzin to de yi gzhung lugs la/ /phyis

ni rtog pas med par 'dzin/ /yod pas med pa grub 'gyur na/ /mi rigs thug pa med par 'gyur/ /mi rigs rgyu 'bras 'dus byas bzhin/ /la la don dam gnas tshul la/ /rang bzhin med pa'i shes pa la/ /de dngos rang bzhin med par 'dod/ /zla phyed dngos la yod par

'dod/ /dper na byas pa mi rtag pa/ /ma byas rtag par shes par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa dpag tu med/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i ngo bo yang / /lung dang rigs pas shes pa yi/ /rnam grangs don la yongs 'das pa'i/ /khas len bral bas yongs su 'dod/ /dmigs sogs

sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /lha mo shes rab stong pa yis/ /srid dngos bla ma stong par grol/ /dngos por snang ba'i rnams kun/ /gcig dang du mar ma grub pas/ /shes rab kyis dpyad rang bzhin med/ /dngos po snang ba 'di rnams kun/ /smig rgyu chu zla bzhin du snang / /

rigs pas grub pa'i shes pa la/ /chos can snang bar ngas ma mthong / /nges par brtags na rigs pa la/ /chos can chos tshul grub ma yin/ /gang yang ma grub gyur pa de/ /bla med don rnyed ces su gsungs/ /don de dngos po gnas tshul ni/ /ming med tshig med yi ge med/ /

rtag med chad pa yod pa yod pa yin/ /de ltar yod par ma grub pas/ /med pa ma grub de yi phyir/ /de yi mtha' dang dbus ma grub/ /de ltar ma grub de shes na/ /phyag rgya chen por sbyor zhes bya/ /de bzhin lung rigs du ma yi/ /rdo rje gzegs ma rten 'brel sogs/ /nges par brtags

na grub pa min/ /zhib pa 'di ru ma spros so/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya chen po yi/ /rang bzhin mi gnas spros bral yang / /thabs dang shes rab snang stong dang / /rigs dang bde la sogs pa yang / /rigs pas ci yang grub pa min/ /don dam rang bzhin gnas tshul yang / /rab tu

mi gnas rang bzhin te/ /mi gnas pa yi ngo bor 'dod/ /bden gnyis gcig gi ngo bo yang / /don dam spros bral stong nyid bsgom/ /kun rdzob sgyu mas bsod nams bsag /de ltar rtogs pa'i man ngag kyang / /bla med bla med las byung gi/ /pha rol dbu ma pa la min/ /zhes

gsungs so/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i gzang zag la/ /lam la bar chod bdud med de/ /gang byas 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyur/ /lta bas man ngag rtogs pa ste/ /rigs pa bar chos myur du zhi/ /bar chos rang gi sems las byung / /des na shes rab mig tu gsungs/ /lta ba

gtan la dbab pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// //bdud rtsi lnga la spyod pa dang / /rig ma ye shes skye tshul gyis/ /gsang bas bzlog par bya ba ni/ /gsang ba'i spyod pas bzlog pa'o/ /cho ga bcu yis bshags pa dang / /yi dam lha la lus dbul zhing / /gsol ba 'debs

shing skyabs su 'gro/ /cho gas dbang du sdud pa'o/ /bdag las byung ba'i khro tshogs dang / /lus las mtshon cha'i char 'bebs dang / /de dang drag po sbyor sngags dang / /mi 'da' gsang ba'i sngags zlos pa/ /bdag 'od dbyibs las byung ba yi/ /

thog 'bebs sbyor ba rtsom pa dang / /me dang chu yi 'khor lo dang / /man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa'o/ /yungs kar dang ni yungs nag dang / /skye tshe shang tshe gu gu la dang / /dgu 'bras bra bcing rdzas kyis bsrung / /rdzas kyis bzlog pa'i man ngag go/ /mdun gyi snying du sems

dpa' bskyed/ /'od 'phros ye shes me 'bar ba/ /'di yang man ngag stobs kyis bzlog /gang yang dmigs pa'i mgrin pa ru/ /a bsams de dang spyi bo ru/ /rtsa las 'khor lo bskor ba yang / /sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba ste/ /'di ni bsam gtan bzlog pa'o/ /rdo rje

rtse gsum phyag rgya dang / /dam tshig rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis/ /rga gra ral gri la sogs pa/ /phyag rgya bzlog par gsungs pa yin/ /dngos dang nyams la sogs pa ru/ /bkra shis 'khor lo dga' zhing sogs/ /chags par gyur pa rul myags dang / /dum bu

lang ling rnam par bsam/ /shin tu khro bar 'gyur ba la/ /byams pa bsgom zhing dngos po btsal/ /snying rje la sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /gti mgu la sogs chos rnams dbye/ /de bzhin mi dge gnyen po ru/ /dge ba ma lus bsam pa yin/ /gzhan yang log pa'i

don bstan na/ /bdag la chos dang chos can rnams/ /rang bzhin med dang sgyu ma dang / /stong dang zhi ba sems kyi dang / /tsho 'phrul yin par shes pa yis/ /brda dang phyag rgya la sogs pa/ /don dang sbyar la sbyin par bya/ /thabs kyis ston na shes rab la/ /shes rab

thabs la sogs par sbyar/ /glen pa'i lan yang myur du sbyin/ /bdud rnams sbyor ba ma lus pa/ /ting 'dzin gsal zhing brtson 'grus drag /bdud rnams bzlog pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ /bar du gcod pa ma zlogs na/ /dngos grub med cing phyal bar gtong / /des

na bzlog pa shin tu gces/ /bdud bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //mdangs dang srog la par chos byed/ /gdug pa ma lus sel ba'i phyir/ /sbyor ba'i 'di yi man ngag bstan/ /gnas ni yid 'ong la sogs su/ /bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs pa

dang / /zhi ba la sogs so so yi/ /gang ltar 'dod pa'i sku bskyed pa/ /bsdu ba la sogs rdzogs pa yis/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas la sogs/ /tshogs dang gtor ma sngo zhing bsdu/ /des kyang 'dul bar 'gyur bya ba ni/ /yang na de yi sbyor ba la/ /rkang pa g.yas pa ral gri

la/ /g.yon pa lcags su kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo mi g.yo bsgom bya ste/ /g.yon pas bkug cing g.yas pas gtub/ /ral gris gsang sngags bzlas pa dang / /gdab pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /yang na gzir pa'i cho ga ni/ /nad pa'am ni gzugs dag la/ /dmigs pas

legs par bkug byas nas/ /rkang pa g.yas pa ri rab la/ /rgya gram 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /rgyal chen phyogs skyong gong dang 'og /bad rim rnams la nges par bsam/ /bus mo chu srin rgyal mtshan te/ /mkha' lding rgyal po rab tu khros/ /gnas lnga las dang sbyor ba yis/ /

g.yon pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /bkug pa la sogs pa sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar mnan gyur drag sngags dang / /'byung po khrag tu 'thon 'gyur te/ /ma mo mkha' 'gros 'thung bar byed/ /mi bzod smre sngags 'don pa dang / /lus las bral zhing 'bros par 'gyur/ /yang

na snying nang raM las me/ /'bar zhing shin tu 'bar ba yis/ /gnon sems gtor zhing 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs skyong gang dang 'dul ba yi/ /gong ma'am ni khor bo bcus/ /gzir zhing ral la srung bar byed/ /lha chen po yang 'dra zhing 'bros/ /bar chad byed pa gzhan yang

sel/ /'bros par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /mdangs la rgol ba'i gdug pa yang / /khyad par klu yi sbyor ba ste/ /rigs bzhi la sogs klu rnams la/ /gzir ba mkha' ding lnga po ste/ /dgongs dang bka' brgyud gzhan rnams dang / /'dir yang 'os pa rab tu bsten/ /

yang snying pad+ma 'bar ba tsam/ /dus grangs la sogs bskyar ba yang / /ha pa la sogs ga ru tas/ /shin tu grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /lnga la lnga ni legs gnas te/ /lnga po yi ni sbyor bas 'dzin/ /bus mo dpung ba nu 'dzing drug/ /thogs med 'khor

lo rab tu bsam/ /byin rlabs nus dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje brdeg cing lcags kyus 'dzin/ /sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa'o/ /gang yang rung bar 'dod pa yis/ /klu gnyen bde gshegs skur gnas te/ /g.yas pa rtse lnga thogs med lnga/ /rang gis bon 'og tu

gnas/ /g.yon pa rtsa las byung ba ste/ /suM las rin chen rdo steng du/ /khro las byung ba sna lnga bsam/ /'od zer gyis ni legs bkug ste/ /lus dang ba spu'i mtshams rnams su/ /nus dang ldan par byas pa la/ /bdag 'od bug dgu sogs zhugs/ /lte ba

'khor lo bskor byas te/ /g.yas kyi rdo rjes par byas te/ /g.yon pas lan par byed cing 'don/ /g.yon sbyor la sogs man ngag kyang / /mdangs rgol nad la shin tu bsngags/ /yan na me gnyis steg par byed/ /yan na 'khor lo brgyad 'bar pas/ /gnas brgyad du ni

bsam byas te/ /bsregs pa rlung gis gtor byas te/ /bkrus pa byang chub thig le las/ /dpal ldan skur gyur byin gyis brlab/ /dbang thob sku yi gsang sngags bzlas/ /yang na zangs sogs dmar pa'i snod/ /gzugs byas yongs su bskor ba las/ /bdud rtsi

gso zhing mchod pa las/ /de nas rang gi gnas su bskyal/ /des kyang dul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khyad par can gyis bdag dang gzhan/ /gdul thabs gnyis phyir bsal thabs gnyis/ /myur du gnod sel nus pa yin/ /de bas 'di ni thabs kyi mchog /

sbyor ba gzhan la yod pa min/ /bar chod kyi bgegs bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //mi rgod la sogs ma rungs pas/ /gtses shing chos la gnod byed pa/ /gnad la bor ba'i dam tshig ni/ /dung khrod mkha' 'gro 'du gnas su/ /drag po gru gsum

dug gis bri/ /rkang rjes gos sogs pag zan dang / /bsreg te mi rgod gzugs byas la/ /de yi snying gar ming rus gzhug /tsha ba bskyed pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /de la tshon skud rnam lngas bcing / /rabs chad thod par gzhug pa yin/ /rang bskyed rang gi chog rdzogs/ /bde

gshegs mchod dang chos skyong sbyin/ /de yang rna las gzugs su gyur/ /bdag las sprul pa'i khro tshogs kyis/ /dpag tu med pas 'jig rten bkang / /gzung nas khrid par byed pa la/ /rdo rje 'gugs pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /khro bo mang po sprul pa khros/ /

gang gis dngos po gzung ba yis/ /gnyis med bstim la las kyis mnan/ /thogs lnga la sogs myos su gzhug /ye shes 'go ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /gshegs shing srog rtsa bram ze'i gzugs/ /gdug pa'i khro mo byar mas bdug /khros pa'i stabs kyis

khrag 'byin cing / /rang gis rol za bar byed/ /bdag dang ye shes khro bo yis/ /sprul pa thogs lngas 'byed par byed/ /phyi ma gsum gyis gsad pa dang / /theg chen sbyor ba'i las bya yi/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang sngags kyis/ /gsad cing mnan pa'i las

rnams bya/ /yang na gsang ba'i dam pa ni/ /lcags dang rigs mthun gyur pa la/ /khro bo de dang mthun byas la/ /dkyil 'khor gsum dang 'brel pa yi/ /phur bu kho nas gsad pa yi/ /ki li'i sngags brjod gdab par bya/ /ral gri thob gri rnams kyis/ /gtub

cing gsad dang rdzas rnams ni/ /yungs kar yungs nag phye ma gsum/ /bdug pa'i 'grub rnams ma lus las/ /khro chung gdug pas khra ba nas 'brub/ /drag sngags bzlas shing thun rnams brdeg /bsnun cing gtub pa'i rdzas dang gzugs/ /mnan sreg gsad dang 'phang

ba dang / /yang dang yang du dgug pa dang / /thugs rjes bag chags sbyang ba'o/ /gzugs can gdul ba'i las rnams bstan/ /mdze can rabs chad thod pa ru/ /'khor lo gzhung dang mthun pa la/ /dug dang myos pa'i chu sbyar te/ /sbrul nag sbyor ba mdze can khrag gis

byas/ /de la dgug pa sngon 'gro pas/ /lus nang nang nas lcags sbrang mang / /lus nang sbrul nag sbyor nas ni/ /lcags sdig srin bu la sogs pas/ /ba spu'i bu gar sbyor bas na/ /de ni mdze yis 'chi ba yin/ /de bzhin 'khor lo nag po'i sten/ /

gang yin sgos su gsal byas nas/ /bsam gyi mi khyab phung las bu/ /stong gsum sprul na dgug cing bstim/ /sgrub las lcags sprang gzi ma yis/ /ba spu'i bu gnas zhugs pas/ /me yis bsregs pa 'byung ba yi/ /'di yang thabs kyi dam pa yin/ /

byang du bltas pa'i chu mig tu/ /thod dum bu drug yod par/ /gang yin ming rus spags te gzhug/ /sbrul nags srin la sogs bstim/ /yang yang bkug la mnan pa yis/ /zhag bdun gyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gsad pa'i dam pa'o/ /yang nam mo'i sbyor

ba yang / /bud med thod pa lcang lo nang / /dri rgod snying la rab bsams te/ /bdud rtsi lnga byas ling+ga la/ /lnga pa las sogs phral byas na/ /snying nang ma mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /khar blugs gyur na myos nas 'chi/ /thod pa glang pa 'khor lo bskor/ /dug dang myos pa dug khrag dang / /

lug dang glang gi khrag dag gis/ /smyo byed sbyor bar byas shing / /mkhar ba'i thun yang rab tu brdeg /ma ma ra k+Sha kha thun tra ma hi hriM hi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ zhes bod cing rbad par bya'o/ /dgug pa sngon du song ba la/ /mdun du ma mo khrag 'jib pas/ /phur bus spyi bor gdab

byas nas/ /rkang pa khrag 'thung 'jib pa yis/ /de ltar byas pas skya sla ma 'gyur/ /yang na spyi tshags byug pa la/ /mdun du skyi tshags rdo rje brdeg /yang ni kha dog nag po la/ /mgo po me yi phreng ba bskul/ /sum skor 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ /rdo rje spyi bor zhugs

gyur nas/ /'od zer snying nar sreg par byed/ /thig le dag kyang 'dzoms la yin/ /yang na 'od zer nag po yang / /lte bar 'khor lo bskul byas te/ /me 'bar stobs kyis sreg pa dang / /spyi bor khu ba bkug nas ni/ /rkang pa me nang sreg par byed/ /yang na za byed la

ru sreg /yang na rdo rje yi ge gsal/ /spyi nas gsang ba rdo rje rgyab/ /bshad pa'i yi ge bshig pa yin/ /yang na snying gar raM las me/ /se nang me yis sreg pa dang / /dbang phyug la sogs bdud chen rnams/ /tshe mi tshad kyang 'jigs par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni

byas tsam gyis/ /gang ltar 'dod pa myur du grub/ /yang na dbang phyug mthu chen gyi/ /rig pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /nag po tshes gcig zla ba la/ /dmigs pa chu yi 'od zer la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni byas tsam gyis/ /dgu dang mi yi sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu 'chi bar

'gyur ba bzhin/ /gang yang myur du 'grub pa yin/ /sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag kyang / /bla ma'i srog la gnod pa dang / /dkon mchog bstan pa bsnub pa dang / /rang srog gcod par byed pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bya ba las/ /gzhan la byas na dam tshig nyams/ /bar

chod bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //dngos grub khyad par 'dod pa yis/ /sku gsungs thugs kyi rtags rnams la/ /rab gnas byas pa thob par 'gyur/ /des na rab gnas cho ga la/ /yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu/ /dang po bsnyen pa skyel ba

yis/ /gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri/ /yo byad sogs la bskyal ba yin/ /lha dang bum la sogs pa/ /sta gon lhag par gnas par byas/ /sku gsungs thugs kyi rtag rnams la/ /dang la bgegs bsal byung phud la/ /phur bu sbyin sreg chang phud

gtor/ /me la phul zhing bskor byas nas/ /thal ba'i sbyin sreg phyi ru bskyal/ /dbang stegs dag la khrul rnams byas/ /dang po dra chu dang sbyar ba'i/ /mngar gsum a ka ru la sogs/ /me long sbyin nam dUr bas bkru/ /lhag gnas slob ma cho ga rdzogs/ /dkyil

'khor bris la yongs su bsgrub/ /dang po dbang bskur rab gnas la/ /slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtag rnams la/ /rang rang sku gsum lhar bskyed de/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ni/ /me long bzhin du chu dbang bskur/ /

des na de la dbang rnams rdzogs/ /rang gi sngags sam gzhan rnams ni/ /badzra satwa zhes pa yis/ /gang gi stobs kyis gong du gnas/ /yang na [(]sbu [,]spu [)]rnams so so la/ /rang gi bdag po gtso 'am gang bskyed la/ /dbang bskur la sogs gong bzhin bya/ /

lha khang sgom pa'i rten yin pas/ /ye shes byin brlab gong bzhin bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phreng ba rnams/ /ye shes rdo rje dri phreng rnams/ /A li kA li ye shes dang / /byin gyis brlab pa tsam yang bya/ /de nas mchod bstod la sogs pa/ /rgyas par byas la dkyil 'khor bsdu/ /rdul

tshon chu bo'i gzhung la dbo/ /de ltar slob dpon de la yang / /ci 'byor ba yin yon rnams dbul/ /dga' ston bya zhing smon lam gdab/ /des ni bsod nams chen po thob/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtags rnams la/ /rab tu gnas pa ma byas na/ /mu stegs lha rten dang 'dra bas/ /des na

rab gnas bya ba gces/ /rab tu gnas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de la de yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi khrus bstan pa/ /rdzas rnams tshogs pa'i bum pa la/ /lhag pas bum pa sbyang byas te/ /pad+ma bzhi ste gos sngon bskyed/ /bskyed de cho ga rdzogs gyur nas/ /

dag par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyis/ /ye shes chu bor byin brlabs te/ /nam mkha'i lha mos snod thogs nas/ /lha mos rgyun phab chu bo yis/ /gang la bkrus pa tsam gyis na/ /'thor bas dag par byed pa dang / /dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rnal

'byor rnams kyis ni/ /des na khrus la brtson par bya'o/ /rdo rje khrus kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de las dngos grub mchog 'dod pa/ /rnam grangs don ni rab brten la/ /thabs kyi lam ni rab tu bstan/ /dang por mtshan bcas mtshan med la/ /nor bu 'phel

par byed pa yin/ /rten gyi man ngag cung zhig yang / /gang zhig spyi bo khang pa ru/ /bdun cu gnyis sam drug cu bzhi/ /sum cu gnyis dang brgyad dang bzhi/ /mkha' 'gro rtsa grangs bzhin du'o/ /kun brtags rtog pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /A li gnyis dang kA li gcig//

brgya dang 'byung bzhi yang dag ldan/ /de ltas de las ye shes 'bar/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu tshul ni/ /dbang po 'gag par byed pa yin/ /yang na tshangs nas smin mtshams bar/ /rtsa lnga kha phye spyod pa yis/ /skye mched yul rnams sbyong ba'o/ /snang ba mtha' yas gnas dag tu/ /

bzhi bcu'am ni sum cu gnyis/ /bcu drug brgyad du snang ba la/ /'byung bzhi A li bcu drug ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon du 'khor bar gnas/ /dbus kyi oM ni dpa' bo'i bdag/ /dbang gi dga' bzhi skyed pa dang / /yang na bde chen kha 'byed cing / /'byung 'jug 'di la

gnas pa yis/ /bde ba chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /snying gar brgyad dang bcu drug bzhi/ /dbus su d+hU tI g.yas g.yon du/ /la la nA dang ras nA'o/ /A li kA li thabs shes rab/ /byang chub thig les nyon mongs shing / /'byung ba bzhi dang yi ge yi/ /dang po brgyad pos

yongs bskor ba/ /thig le las byung 'byung ba bskul/ /thig le ye shes la brten nas/ /dbang gi dga' bzhi'i tshul du bskyed/ /'byung ba dang na 'jug pa dang / /gnas pa stong pa bdag nyid de/ /gang zhig 'di la rtog gnas na/ /rnal 'byor bde ba myong bar byed/ /yang na snying ga

nas spro ba'i/ /rtsa lnga khrag dang chu dang yang / /byang chub sems kyi thig le las/ /mdung dang ral gri nges pa la/ /mgrin nga pad+ma kha 'byed pas/ /phyogs su gzhol zhing slob pa yin/ /kha phye thig le 'gro 'ong dag/ /'byung dang 'jug pa 'dir bslabs pas/ /rnal 'byor

bde ba myong bar byed/ /re re'am ni lnga lnga bar/ /rnal 'byor slob ma bde ba'i lam/ /lte ba sprul pa dpa' bo bdag/ /brgyad dang nyi shu sbyor ba yis/ /kA li phyed bcas su bzhi brgyad/ /a nas dga' bo rlung stobs kyis/ /rtsa lnga snying gar slob pa dang / /dpa' bo 'gegs par

byed pa yin/ /kha cig slob pa'i dus dag tu/ /bzhi ni so sor slob pa ste/ /bzhi ni gcig tu slob pa'o/ /nyi ma rdo rje rlung gis gsor/ /la la yi ge thig ler 'dod/ /gcig ni sdud par bslabs pa yis/ /stong pa me las rnam rtog sred/ /dbang gi dag pa dam pa'o/ /bde

pa chen bo thob par byed/ /gang yang sbyong pa 'di dag ni/ /nyi ma me ni lte bar 'bar/ /yi ge thig les yang dag gsos/ /dbang gi dga' bzhi dag pa yis/ /dbyings la thug nas mar la byung / /'og gi badzre 'khor lo la/ /dbab dang bzlog dang 'grub

ba yang / /'khor lo bzhi yid dbang du gsungs/ /rigs gzhan chags pa'i gang zag gis/ /rigs gzhan pho nya'i sbyor ba bya/ /gang tsha rang gi rigs mthun nam/ /la las skyes pa'i bu mo dang / /ye shes bu mo sgrub pa dang / /g.yon gyi yum dang snying ga la/ /byin

gyis brlabs dang gnyis med sbyor/ /rtag tu dam pa bde ba dang / /'di yi sbyor bar dga' pa rnams/ /rim gyis phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'grub/ /'byung ba'i bu mos sbyor byas shing / /dbab dang bzlog pa'i man ngag gis/ /rtse la phyin nas nub byang 'gyur/ /tha ma las kyis

dus rnams su/ /rked pa tha kus bkyig pa dang / /dbus dang lus kyi bzlog pa yin/ /thabs ni kun nas rdzogs pa ru/ /ri lu phreng bas mgul nas thogs/ /sprul gyi zhags pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun nas 'phros pas dngos grub 'byung / /gang nas rnal 'byor ma rnams

kyis/ /rtag tu bde ba ster bar byed/ /ye shes bogs dang dbang bskur gnyis/ /gzhan gyi las su ma gsungs te/ /de nas de spangs dngos grub 'byung / /zhes pa'o/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sgom pa yis/ /'dod pa rdo rje bzhin du 'grub/ /zhing khams gang dang gang

yang rung / /sprul pa byin brlabs phyogs bcur 'gyed/ /'di yi sbyor ba dag 'gyur na/ /zhing khams gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur/ /man ngag ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rdzogs rim gyi le'u bstan pa ste bco ldan pa'o// //yang na 'khor lo

sbyor spangs pas/ /bcu drug brgyad dang bzhin yi dang / /dbus su byang chub theg le bsgos/ /stong nyid yongs chod bral ba la/ /sgom med goms par bya ba'i yul/ /gnas dang mi g.yo bde ba dang / /rtog bral rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /tha snyad ma grub bde chen dang

thig le nyams len shes pa yis/ /srid rtse sna gsum mthar phyin nas/ /mthong lam byang chub myur du 'byung / /de las srid gsum bgrod pa yang / /skya ba rmi'am bar do ru/ /thig le mi rtog stong nyid yang / /thig le ye shes de dang las/ /rnal 'byor bde ba chen po yang / /ma

lus cig shos mtha' dang bral/ /srid gsum rang bzhin 'phro ba yang / /'bras bu stong nyid 'byin pa ste/ /'di ni rnam shes 'pho 'jug go/ /zhes lung las gsungs so/ /mtshan med kyi man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //gang zhig 'di la rab bcom

pas/ /zla ba drug gam bcu gnyis na/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rab tu thob/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sprul pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs pas/ /rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma/ /pho nya tshogs 'khor thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu byin brlabs bde ba ster/ /bdud

dang gnod sbyin lha klu'i tshogs/ /ma lus gnod pa bzhi bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nad las sogs pa rnams/ /ma lus myur du thar bar 'gyur/ /thun mong dngos grub ma lus 'grub/ /gzhan don ma lus lhun gyi grub/ /ces gsungs so/ /gang yang gsang ba'i man ngag

'di/ /dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa dang / /gsang sngags phrag khyer 'tshong ba dang / /bla ma mi gus le lo can/ /dbyar gyi tsan+dan lta bu ste/ /mkhas pa brten pa mi brten par/ /glegs bam mthong bas khengs pa la/ /tsan+dan sbrul gyi shun pa 'dra/ /gsang ba'i don dang phyi lam

bsre/ /la la log pa'i chos dang bsre/ /gang zhig ster bar 'gyur ba ste/ /tsha grang nga song sdug bsngal myong / /mkha' 'gro byad ma srin po dang / /ro langs sogs kun gyis gsod/ /gsad pa 'di yi don rnams dang / /rang srog gces dang nor bu dang / /dri ma chog ga

phur bzhin du btsa'/ /gal te btsa' ba ma shes na/ /seng+ge'i 'o ma snod nang du/ /blugs pa ji bzhin 'bras bu med/ /gsang ba 'di yis brlab par 'gyur/ /gang gi don las log pa'i snod dang ldan ba la/ /gsang ba 'di yi man ngag yang / /rang gi rang don len pa

bzhin/ /de la ma lus sbyin par bya/ /nor la bltas te gsang don bcad/ /gsang ba srid pa'i rgyu la byin/ /ma mos btsongs pas dngos grub yul/ /seng+ge'i 'o mas snod 'jig bzhi na/ /srid tsho ngan song gsum du 'khor/ /'bras bu tsha grang sdug

bsngal myong / /des na bu dang 'dra bar sbyin/ /des ni 'bras bu bde ba 'byung / /gzhan gyi shugs 'byung ma lags 'di la dga' ba skyes/ /khams gsum sems can srid mtsho dag la las rgal phyir dang / /rdo rje be con gsang ba'i don la sogs pa ma lus pa/ /

rang nyid mos dang gsang thabs rnams/ /rdzogs par kun la bstan phyir bris/ /rnyed pa la sogs grags phyir min/ /man ngag bla ma dang 'dra lam 'di bstan/ /lag na rdo rje'i rgyud la sogs pa ma nyams bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i don rnams thabs kyi yan lag tu/ /man ngag

rgyas par bstan pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /las kyi bag chags ngan pas ma grol yod srid cing / /tshig dang don la nyes pa yod srid pas/ /rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang / /bla ma// mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ /sems can lam gnyis ma lus bsgral

ba dang / /bdag dang sems can thams cad kun/ /rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa yongs zhi nas/ /sdom gsum lam gyis srid pa yongs rgal nas/ /tshul khrims gtsang mas gsang ba'i don rnams zhugs/ /phyag rgya chen po don nyid rab mthong zhing / /de ma mthong ba'i

ma lus sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal skyed pa'i kun 'byung rtsad gcod cing / /g.yon pa mdze 'bras nad rnams rab tu zhi ba dang / /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab tu skams pa dang / /gos sngon dngos grub myur thob cing / /zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog /de kho na nyid

sgron na zhes bya ba'i rgyan/ /bla ma'i man rgyud ma chad pa/ /de kho na nyid nyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs chen po dge slong klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta gu ru pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / lo tsA ba glang dpal gyis seng+ges bsgyur ro/ /slad kyis kyang paN+Di tas rgya gar

phyogs nas sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ro/ /bi la badzra las bla ma sman btsun khros pa la gnang / /des dngos la gnang ba lags so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ A R+Ya badzra pA Ni nI lA m+ba ra d+ha ra sarba maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma a ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo

rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa zhes bya ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpa' 'grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong pa chen po'i mchog /mnga' brnyes phyag na rdo rje la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal

te/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis bshad/ /rkyen thub sa non yan lag rdzogs/ /ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs bzang zhing / /log pa'i lam spangs mang pos bkur/ /de sogs yon tan kun ldan pas/ /yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'am/ /yang na nyams dga'

bkra shis gnas/ /ri zlum dag gam chu bo'i 'gram/ /byin che yon tan lnga gnas su/ /stegs bu sngon po mdzes pa la/ /me tog sngon po gcal bkram ste/ /steng du gos sngon sku gzugs gzhag/ /yan lag ye shes bskyed ldan pas/ /mchod pa'i cho ga sngon btang

nas/ /phyi nang dgug dang bstims la gnas/ /sngags kyi bsnyen pa 'bum sogs bya/ /yang na mtshan ma gsum thob pas/ /bsgrub pa'i cho ga brtsams par bya/ /rab tu brtags pa'i sa gzhi la/ /zlum la mdzes pa'i maN+Dal brtsig/ /steng du dpal ldan dkyil 'khor

bskyed/ /spyan drang byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ /phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor dbul/ /stong pa dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas phyogs skyong srung ma dgug/ /oM in+d+ra ye hUM dzaH ag+r+na ye hUM dzaH ya mA ya hUM dzaH nai r+ra t+yA a hUM dzaH ba ru NA ya hUM dzaH ba ya be hUM dzaH/ ku be rA

ya hUM dzaH// I shwa nA ya hUM dzaH te ha a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH sUR+Ya tsan+d+rA ya hUM dzaH de skad ces brjod la spyan drang ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dgug/ /phyogs skyong la sogs byin gyis brlab/ /gtor ma tshul bzhin byin brlabs te/ /ci bder phyogs skyong tshogs la dbul/ /

de nas las rnams bcol bar bya/ /lha dbang me lha gshin rje dang / /bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha/ /gnod sbyin dbang ldan nyi zla dang / /bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs/ /rdo rje spyan dang snyan mnga' ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i don ldan pa/ /mngon shes can gyis

mchod ba bzhes/ /sa phyogs dge ba'i gnas 'di ru/ /bdag gi dge ba'i grogs po mdzod/ /bdag gis bzod pa de yis ni/ /mi bslu dam tshig dgongs mdzad la/ /rtags dang mtshan ma bstan du gsol/ /zhes las bcol lo/ /lag pa sa la reg pa yis/ /sa yi lha mo

dbus su bton/ /de la byin brlabs mchod pa bya/ /dngos su las bcol tshig 'di bsgo'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las/ /sa dang pha rol phyin la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng+ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /

de ltar bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes brjod pas gnang ba byin nas thim par bsam mo/ /sa bslang ba'o/ /legs par byin pa'i gnas ched du/ /sa bdag legs par blta byas la/ /zla bzhir dbang du phyogs bzhir blta/ /de yi lto ba'i

dbus nas bru/ /rol sogs pa'i skyon rnams bsla/ /mar gyi mdog dang 'dres par gyur/ /mchog tu gyur bas blangs par bya/ /sa brtag pa'o/ /sa gzhi bzang pos bkang du dus su/ /dag par byed pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /stegs kun bu khru ni bcu drug gam/ /bcu'am lnga ru legs

byas te/ /shin tu 'thas par bcag par bya/ /mthon dman med par gyur pa dang / /bdud rtsi lnga'am pa yi lnga/ /dri dang sman gyis legs par byur/ /bdag bskyed gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /rtsa ba'i yi ges grub par bya/ /sa sbyar ba'o/ /de nas sa las 'od byung ste// yaM

las rgya gram rlung du gyur/ /de steng baM las chu dkyil 'khor/ /gser gyi sa gzhi laM las bskyed/ /de steng suM las ri rab bskyed/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ /de la lag brdeg par y+ba/ /de yis gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas/ /oM me dI nI badzrA b+ha ban+d+ha ni hUM phaT/

ces bzlas 'od dang ldan byas te/ 'od kyis stong gsum thams cad gsal/ /sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /deng nas brtsams te gos sngon can/ /phyag rgya che dang ldan gyur pas/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan/ /pad+ma la sogs dbus bting nas/ /de yi steng du

'dug par bya/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /mchod pa lnga 'am nyi shu brgyad/ /bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/ /bstim pas bkrag dang gzi byin bskyed/ /mngal nas skyes pa'i tshul can nam/ /sna bug sngags kyi

'od zer las/ /yang na nyi zar tshul can gyis/ /'khor rnams gsal bar gyur pa las/ /ye shes bde gshegs spyan drangs bstim/ /de nas gsol ba ni/ /gsang bdag dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyir/ /bdag nis chen bzung bar byed/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /dbang thob gyur nas gsang sngags bzlas/ /sku yi 'od kyis gsang sngags rgyal/ /reg pas bdud dang srin po 'bros/ /bsam gtan las ma yengs pas/ /sngags kyi phreng bas bzlas ba bya/ /

zhes ba ni sa gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhir rnal 'byor bzhi/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs bsam/ /shar nas gtso la mchod pa phul/ /gsol ba 'di yang gdab par bya/ /rdo rje rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can/ /dpal ldan dkyil 'khor chen po bri

ba'i phyir/ /mnyam ba'i ngag las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la/ /zhe snang rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /lho nas gtso la mchod pa phul/ /gsol ba 'di dag gdab par bya/ /oM rin chen rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon

can/ /dpal ldan rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gri ba'i phyir/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la/ /nga rgyal rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /nub nas gtol mchod phul la/ /gsol ba'i dag gdab par bya/ /

oM pad+ma'i rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la/ /'dod chags rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /byang nas gtso la

mchod pa dbul/ /gsol ba 'di dag gdab par bya/ /oM las kyi rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon can/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs la/ /phrag dog rigs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /zhes

gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i khro bo bzhis/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la gsol ba gdab/ /mnyes pa'i tshogs kyang ci nus byas/ /des ni bgegs rnams 'byer bar 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /de ni gtso bo bslang ba'i cho ga'o/ /deng nas brtsams te gos sngon can/ /

shin tu khro ba'i gzugs su langs/ /mig gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor du/ /raM dang a gnyis bsam par bya/ /rkang par ljang gu yig hUM las/ /sna tshos rdo rje 'od ldan bsam/ /mig dang rna ba'i nang du yang / /khro bo'i tshogs ni bsam par bya/ /nga rgyal chen po bskyed

nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu bskor bya zhing / /rkang ba rdo rje'i stabs ldan pas/ /phyogs mtshams su ni blta bya ste/ /hUM zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs bsam/ /ha ha'i gad mi chen po dgong / /nga rgyal bskyed pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten nas/ /g.yas bas rdo rje gsor byas te/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad mdun bsams te/ /bka' bsgom bden par brdar bar bya/ /gang dag sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i/ /lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / /gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lto 'phye'i tshogs la sogs thams cad ma gnas par dengs shig/ /hUM nga ni

dpal ldan gos sngon can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang ba ste/ /lha dang klu dang lha ma yin/ /brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /gnas 'dir ma 'dug gzhan du dengs/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /stobs chen khro bo gos sngon gyis/ /klad pa 'gas par

gdon mi za/ /phaT na maHsa ma n+ta kA ya bA ka tsi t+ta badzra nAM/ /na mo nI lA m+bar hUM/ /kha kha khA hi/ /tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ baN+d+ha baN+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ /da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gadza gadza/ spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/ sarba big+hAn bi nA ya kA nA/ ma hA ga Na pha ti dzI ban+tA n+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT/ bgegs bskrad

pa'o/ /dpal ldan gos sngon snying po las/ /yi ge lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /mtshon cha lnga yis thog phab pas/ /gdug pa thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /thog 'bab pa'o/ /de nas rkang pa rdo rje'i stabs/ /lag pa gar stabs bskor ba yis/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams

te/ /rdo rje bskor ba la na gsum mam/ /yang na ji ltar nus pa yis/ /bsrung ba khro bo'i khang par bsam/ /sa bsrung ba'o/ /deng nas brtsam te dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha yi sta gon bya bar gsungs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis/ /thig le lha yi gnas su ni/ /gdan du bsams la

dbab par bya/ /de steng hUM las phyag mtshan gyur/ /de las so sor skur rdzogs te/ /dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par bya/ /de la phyi rin nga mchod pa dbul/ /bstod pa dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /rig sngags rgyal la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ slon ma rnams la phan phyir dang / /khyed la mchod pa'i don du yang / /de la bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /byin brlabs gnang ba mdzad par 'os/ /dgongs shig bcom ldan gos sngon can/ /

rdo rje 'chang chen sprul pa'o/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag/ /gsang sngags rig sngags kun gyi lha/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /bdag ni slob ma rnams kyi phyir/ /dpal ldan gos sngon dkyil 'khor bri/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa rnams/ /thugs

rjes nye bar gzung du gsol/ /bdag par du gcod pa'i bgegs/ /'byung po sha za gnod sbyin dang / /gang dag gnod sbyin sems ldan pa/ /thams cad bdag la bsrung du gsol/ /thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang / /de bzhin mchog tu gyur pa dang / /thugs rje chen pos

dgongs mdzad la/ /bdag la myur du stsal du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /deng nas brtsams te gos sngon gyi/ /rin chen dngul gyi bum pa'am/ /yang na dkar po khams sogs la/ /nag

bo dang ni ra ri med/ /de lta bu yi bum pa la/ /pad+ma brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /dbus su so so'i snying po'am/ /yang na so so'i phyag mtshan dgong / /de nyid 'od du zhu ba las/ /dkar po yi ni yi ge ba/ /de las bum pa'i gzhal yas khang / /nang du pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan/ /lto che mgrin

pa ring ba dang / /mchu ni kang ka'i dbyibs can la/ /dbus su so so'i snying po bsam/ /de nas phyag mtshan sku rdzogs 'gyur/ /mi dmigs dbyings nas sangs rgyas bskul/ /gnyis med gyur la mchod pa dbul/ /gong ma'i gsol ba gdab bar bya/ /de nas sman lnga 'bru lnga dang / /

rin chen lnga dang snying po lnga/ /thun mong bum pa'i rdzas su blugs/ /rnam rgyal bum par lha tshogs bskyed/ /btung ba snum po dag dang ni/ /mi 'chi ldan kyang dgang bar bya/ /las kyi bum par khams gsum rgyal/ /'od zhu de yis las kun byed/ /sngags ni so so'i snying po'o/ /

de nas bum pa thams cad kun/ /dpag bsam shing dang 'bras bu can/ /yon tan ldan pas kha brgyan nas/ /de ni ma nyams ras dag la/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /rnam rgyal bum pa bca' bar bya/ /gzhan ma kha dog re re'o/ /shar du 'dab ma brgyad pa yi/ /maN+Dal byas te de ru bzhag /bum pa sta gon

gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas slobs ma brtag pa'i cho ga bya ste/ chags dang grol ba'i gang zag ni/ /lhag par gnas pa gcig tu gyur/ /dang por phyi nang khrus byas te/ /dri zhim phyugs la gos bzang brgyan/ /de nas dkyil 'khor phyi rim dgod/ /slob dpon la ni gsol ba

gdab/ /ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la skya'o/ /de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /bla na med dkon mchog

gsum/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /lan stsal ba/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshig 'di ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /tshul chen khyod kyis shes par

gyis/ /she'o/ /de nas sdig ba bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang / lus dbul ba ni gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sdom pa pog la 'dzin du gzhug/

bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang bkur bar bgyi/ /

rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyid re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dam pa la/ /phyi nang gsar ba theg pa gsum/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /las

kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa tham cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi ngon gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /zhes sdom pa gzung ngo / /de nas slob ma'i yang 'phros/ /phyag rgya che dang ldan gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gnas rnams su/ /dri yi thig le re re gdab/ /lha rnams kyi ni gdan du bsam/ /spyi gtsug bde gshegs gos sngon can/ /mgrin par pad+ma'i gos sngon can/ /snying gar thugs kyi gos sngo can/ /lte bar rin chen gos sngon can/ /gsang bar las kyi gos sngon can/ /

dpung pa la sogs rkang lag bzhi/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs brtag /de nas spos dang me tog dang / /mar me dri dang rnam lnga dbul/ /dri yi chu la bdud rtsi'am/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed/ /bcu gcig 'od zhu dag pa'i chus/ /dag gi nyes pa

sbyang bar bya'o/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya/ /de nas srung skud byin brlabs te/ /dag pa'i chu gtor 'od zhu pas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bskyed/ /bkug nas 'od du zhu ba las/ /'bar ba'i 'od lnga ldan par bya'o/ /de la mdud pa

drug byas te/ /mdud pa re la lha re bstim/ /rdo rje de nyid sngags kyis grub/ /dpung ba g.yon par gdags bya'o/ /de nas so shing byin brlabs te/ /u du m+bA ra pa sha'i shing / /ma yo mgas 'bus ma zos/ /sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad du bya'o/ /'od zhu bskyed pa god

bzhin te/ /shar du kha bltas mi smra bar/ /bca' dang bru ba'i cho ga bya/ /bsam pas byang chub sems bskyed de/ /rtags ni gsum du shes par bya/ /dang po 'jug pa'i rtags bstan te/ /bor bas slob dpon la bltas na/ /de ni 'jug tu rung bar bshad/ /gal te rang

la bltas gyur na/ /de ni phyir yang dor bar bya/ /gnyis pa bgegs kyi rtags rnams lta/ /gsum pa dngos grub grub rtags ni/ /sor mo'am ni bor ba'i tshe/ /steng du lus na mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /shar du yang ni de bzhin te/ /mtshams dang byang du bltas na/ /zhi ba la sogs

dngos grub 'gyur/ /de nas dag gi nyes pa sbyang / /de nas ku sha byin brlabs te/ khams gsum rgyal po'i khro bo dang / /las kyi gos sngon phyag rgya sngags/ /de yis byin brlabs sngas dang stan/ /de steng seng ge'i stabs kyis nyal/ /sbor ba bskyed pa'i cho ga bya/ /sangs rgyas chos

dang mthun 'gyur ba'i/ /u dum+b+hA ra'i me tog ni/ /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid/ /skye ba 'di yis thob pa yis/ /'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos/ /'byung 'gyur yang na ma'i 'byung srid/ /gsang sngags don 'di thob pa yis/ /dga' ba thams cad mthar phyin te/ /las 'phro

dang ni thugs rjes 'byung / /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /thogs pa med pa'i sku brnyes pa/ /'di yi tshul gyis mngon par bsgrub/ /sems can skal ba ngan pa yis/ /de yi ming yang thos mi 'gyur/ /spyad par 'gyur bas mos ci dgos/ /sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kun/ /

dkyil 'khor bzang po mthong ba yis/ /bla med mchog la reg par 'gyur/ /zhes spro ba bskyed pa'i chos gzhan yang bshad par bya'o/ /nang par sngar ni ba'o can langs/ /rmi lam ci mthong dra bar bya/ /gos sngon sku gzugs mthor ba dang / /ri bo'i steng du 'dug pa dang / /mchod

rten skas la 'dzeg pa dang / /me tog steng na 'dug pa dang / /chos kyi 'gro gleng byed pa dang / /glegs bam dag la spyod pa dang / /gzhan gyi dbang bskur dkyil 'khor mthong / /de dang gzhan yang bzang 'gyur rang / /yi rang tshig brjod gal te rtags/ /mi gsal ba ru gyur

pa na/ /nyams pa rnams ni bskang par bya/ /gal te bar chos rtags byung na/ /drag po'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang / /drag po'i chogs dang 'khor los bzlog /gong ma'i rtags dang ldan 'gyur par/ /thig gdab pa yi tshogs bya/ /thig skung kha dog lnga ldan la/ /yi ge lngas ni

byin brlabs te/ /de las rigs lnga'i sku ru gyur/ /ye shes rigs lnga bkug cing bstim/ /'od zhu thig skud sna sngar grub/ /yang na ye shes byang chub sems/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan bar dgug /des ni nam mkha'i thig gdab bo/ /sa yi thig kyang 'di lta ste/ /dang po tshangs pa'i

thig gnyis gdab/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rnams brgyad dang / /gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhi dang / rta babs la sogs so sor dbye/ /de nas nad du phur bu gdab/ /mtha' skor dag ni gnyis su bskor/ /nang gi snam bu'i nang du ni/ /chu chud gcig la skor gnyis ba skor/ /dbus

su bskor ba gcig dang ldan/ de nas rtul chon brtsam par bya/ /dbus su mthing ga shar du dkar/ /lho yi pad+ma 'das ma ser/ /nub kyi pad+ma 'dab dmar/ /byang gi pad+ma ljang gur bya/ /mtshams ni mthing gar yang dag lnga/ /'khor lo'i mdog kyang de bzhin no/ /dbus su

rdo rje dgod ba ste/ /shar du 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /lhor ni rin chen 'bar ba dgong / /nub tu pad+ma dmar po ste/ /byang du sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /yum ni so sor 'khril ba'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni khams gsum rgyal/ /mgon po 'phags skyes rnam thos sras/ /so so'i phyag

mtshan dgod par bya/ /gru tshad dang ni lha mo mtshan/ /kha dog ljang gu'i tshon gyis bya/ /khyams kyi shar ni dkar po bya/ /lto ser nub ni rnam par dmar/ /byang gi khyams ni lhang gu'o/ /khyams te ji bzhin sgo de bzhin/ /

shar gyi sgor ni lcags kyu ste/ /lhor ni zhags ba nub lcags sgrog/ /byang gi sgor ni dri la bug tong / /sgo khrung phyi rol la sogs pa/ /khyams dang pha gu dra ba dang / /dra ba phyed bas rnams par brgyan/ /rta babs bzhi yang de bzhin te/ /twa

ra Na bzhi yis kyang brgyan/ /ri mo'i tshogs rdzogs gyur nas/ /dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs par byed/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug gnas bstim/ /de nas mchod pa'i tsho ga brtsam/ /badzra d+hU ba sngags las byung / /dkar mo spos kyis shangs

la dbul/ /badzra puSh+pe'i sngags las byung / /mthing ga me tog sku la gtor/ /badzra A lo ke sngags las byung / /dmar mo mar mes dkyil 'khor gsal/ /badzra gan+d+hi sngags las byung / /ljang gu dri chab phyag zhabs bsil/ /de la

sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs/ /ci 'byor thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dang por sems bskyed phyag 'tshal nas/ /skyabs gsol sdom pa gzung bar bya/ /dbang bzhi'i dkyil 'khor lha las blang / /yang na nam mkha'i dbyings su blang / /

thos dang bsam pas bdag nyid 'jug pa'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /phyi rol khrus kyi cho ga bya/ /bum par gyur dang rdzas rnams dgram/ /ci 'byor yon rnams dbul bar bya/ /sems bskyed sdom pa la sogs sngon bzhin bya/ /

sdom pa legs par 'dzin pa la/ /bka' bsgo dam tshig bdud rtsi blud/ /yid 'ong rnal 'byor chen po khyod/ /gos sngon dkyil 'khor chen por chud/ /nga yis khyod la dngos grub 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /ces ba ni spro ba

bskyed pa'o/ /gsang mchog gos sngon dkyil 'khor 'di/ /sems can dad pa med pa dang / /gang yang log chos spyod pa dang / /mnar med ngan song rgyud can dang / /rna bar ming yang bsgrag mi bya/ /zhes pa ni gdams ngag go/ /gal te de la smras

gyur na/ /dam can chad pas bcad nas ni/ /cho yi 'du byed 'di bskum nas/ /mnar med dmyal bar myur du dengs/ /gos sngon chen pos mdo la spong / /zhes pa 'di ni skyon bstan pa'o/ /de nas snying nang sems dpa' bskyed/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar

ba'am/ /yang na dri yi chu blud de/ /'thung zhig rdo rje 'bar ba'i chu/ /dam las 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'grub/ /oM badzra sa twa hUM ma hA pany+tsa a mra ta/ /kha kha zhes pa ni mna' bsgags pa'o/ /

de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/ /gsang chen rdo rje nga yin gyis/ /nga la ba rnyas par ma byed cig /gal te brnyas par gyur na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyen pa min/ /tshe yi 'du byed 'di bkum nas/ /dmyal bar skye bar gdon mi za/ /zhes pa ni man ngag

go/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /slob dpon la ni gsol ba gdab/ /chos dbyings byin rlabs las byung ba'i/ /bcom ldan rdo rje chad chen po/ /de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /zhes so/ /de nas slob ma mtha' yas la/ /raM dang bcas

pa'i yi ge bsam/ /bskyod nas drod bskul chu la phog /bskol bas sa yi dkyil 'khor zhu/ /lus nang me yis bsreg byas nas/ /sdig pa tshig par gyur pa dang / /bde gshegs byang chub sems phab ste/ /snying gnam lus nang 'khyil par bsam/ /

de nas rdo rje 'chang chen bsgom/ /me tog dkyil 'khor lha la dbul/ /pra tI tsh+tsa ho zhes brjod/ /de nas phreng ba mgo la bcing / /oM ma hA ba la badzra/ /a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi zhe'o/ /rmad byung gsang ba'i me tog 'di/ /gsang la babs pa rigs kyi lha/ /las 'phro

thugs rjes 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtso bo'i thugs sogs mchog dngos grub/ /dbus dang nyen dngos grub nye/ /ring na dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa la sogs pa ni dbab pa'i cho ga dang me tog go/ /dpal ldan chen po gos sngon can/ /khyod kyi mig

dbye ba brtson par mdzod/ /tsak+Shu pra be sha ya phaT/ brtab pa'i lta bas blta byas te/ /dkar po mthong na zhib 'grub/ /ser po mthong na rgyas pa 'grub/ /dmar po mthong na dbang gi las/ /nag pos grag po'i las 'grub 'gyur/ /khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong / /zhes dri

bar bya'o/ /deng nas brtsams te dpal ldan che/ /khyab nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i 'og tu ni/ /yon phul gsol ba gdab par bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral

slad du/ /bde gshegs bum pa'i dbang mchog stsol/ /zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis/ /bum pa'i chu ni bsdus byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dag/ /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /spyi gtsug dag tu dbang bskur ro/ /oM gsang ba

gsum las legs byung ba'i/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /dri med rdo rje chu dbang gis/ /mi bskyod dngos grub thob par shog /oM sarba ta thA ta A da R+Sha a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi/ chu'i dbang ngo / /oM sangs rgyas byin rlabs las byung ba'i/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba che/ /

dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen grub pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na badzra a b+hi Sh-i ny+tsA mi/ /zhes pa ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo / /oM ye shes lnga yis rtags 'chang ba/ /thugs mchog rdo rje bla med pa'i/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /snang ba

mtha' yas dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tas saman a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi/ zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo / /oM chos sku sgyu ma'i sgra sgrogs shing / /stong pa'i don las sad par byed/ /bla med dril bu'i dbang bskur bas/ /don yod grub pa'i dngos grub shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kri tA nu Sh+ThA a

b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ zhes pa ni dril bu'i dbang po/ /kye rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i// /byang chub chen po thob pa dang / /rnam par snang mdzad dngos grub shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta shi sa ma ya dz+nyA ta nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ zhes pa ni ming gi dbang ngo / /

chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rtog pa med/ /mi long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rang byung lha ni shes par gyis/ /zhes pa ni me long ngo / /lung las/ /dang po gsol ba gdab ba ste/ /gsan nas ye shes 'khor lo gzhug /sdig pa dag par chus bkrus

te/ /so so'i dbang rdzas lag tu sbyin/ /nyon mongs lnga yi dri ma bskur/ /dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dgod/ /ce'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ /rdo rje'i dbang gis mngon sangs rgyas/ /ye shes lnga dang rdo rje 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bcang par gyis/ /zhes pa thugs kyi dam

tshig go/ /gsung rnams sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ /rtog pa med pas sna tshogs sgra/ /brjod bral dpag gis mi lang pa'i/ /dril bu 'di ni khyod kyis zung / /zhes pa ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgra/ /mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo 'di/ /'khyud pa'i phyag rgya'i dam

tshig ste/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /zhes pa ni sku'i dam tshig go/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la gnas/ /khyid kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra pa'i ni hUM ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM ta

ye hUM ha ha ha ha hi/ /zhes pa 'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /chags dang grol ba'i gang zag gis/ /thun mong dkyil 'khor cho ga yin/ /gang zag rnam pa gnyis po de/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ru zhugs tsam gyis/ /dngos grub gnyis dang 'brel bar byed/ /klu dang 'byung pos zin pa

la/ /dang po cho ga sngon song nas/ /smre ba'i rdzas kyis dbral bar bya/ /de nas bral ba gso ba dang / /nad pa chu yis bskur bar bya/ /de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /zhugs pa tsam gyis myur du thar/ /rims dang 'brum bu la sogs pa/ /gtor ma'i 'khor lo sngon song bas/ /

dkyil 'khor 'di ru zhugs gyur na/ /myur du nyen las thar bar 'gyur/ /bud med dag kyang bu 'dod na/ /dang po cho ga sngon sogs nas/ /khur skyis dag nas gos bzang bgo/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir lugs pa yis/ /bus pa'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang / /

bus pa dbyung bar gdon mi za/ /yid gas bkol ba'i cho ga yang / /lha la sogs pa bkug gyur nas/ /sdom pa legs par bzung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ru zhugs gyur nas/ /bdag gis bcol ba thams cad de/ /thogs ba med pa'i rdo rje bzhin/ /ro yi las rnams
